bu rnam snang mdzad// rang byung che ba'i ye shes kyis// rgyun gyi nyon mongs rtsad nas gcod// ma spangs 'bras bu he ru ka/ ye shes dbu ni nyi shu gcig/ 'bar ba'i phyag ni bzhi bcu gnyis// bstan pa'i zhabs kyang rnam pa brgyad// sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa bdun// de rnams 'gro ba'i don la spyod// ces gsungs so// brtag btsag las ni zin pa dang// nang dang phyi yi dngos po kun// bdud rtsi lus kyi rang bzhin te// thams cad sbyor ba'i dbus nyid du// zho sha gsum gyi phye ma gzhag/ de yi nang gi rnam pa la// skad dang mi mthun rnam pa ste// phyi yi yod ni thams cad gzhag/ de yi nang gi rnam pa la// tsha ba gsum nyid sbyar la gzhag/ de yi nang gi rnam pa la// gur kum pa swo rnam pa lnga// de yi nang gi rnam pa la// 'dza' ti pha la btags bag zhag/ de yi nang du ga pur te// dri yi rgyal po'i nang nas dge/ 'od dang dri dang du ba sgra dang ni// phun sum tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang 'di skad gsungs so// zhal bu ka pA la'i mtshan gsol pa// ye shes lnga ldan rdo rje ka pA la// 'bar ba'i bu ga gnyis dang ldan/ mtha' gnyis mdor phyir na dbus// sku gsung lhun grub rdo rje ka pA la// 'bar ba'i skud pa tshad pa'i dkyil na gnas// lhag gnas sna rtser yongs su brtol// zhe sdang ma spags phyir na shar du 'dor bar bya// yid bzhin gter ldan rdo rje ka pA la// rin chen dbyings las dgos 'dod 'byung ba ste// dpag bsam shing dang 'bru bcud gnyis dang ldan// nga rgyal ma spangs lho yi phyogs su gzhag/ khams gsum yongs sgrol rdo rje ka pA la// thams cad dbang du sdud pa dum bu gcig pa ste// dbyings dang ye shes tha dad med pa'i phyir// 'dod chags ma spangs nub kyi phyogs su gzhag/ cho 'phrul rtags 'dzin rdo rje ka pA

la// las kyi mtha' ru phyin pas ban d+ha sul bzhi pa// drag po las la shis pas rgya gram bzhi ru bstan// phrag dog ma spangs byang gi phyogs su gzhag/ ye shes lnga dang ldan pas phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga// bde gshegs rigs lnga'i pho brang yin par bshad// de ru maM sa bshad gci khu ba rag ta khrag/ skyobs dang rtsa bar sbyar te gzhag par bya// de nas yang ban d+ha'i skyobs 'di gsungs so// mi 'gyur g.yung drung rdo rje ka pA la// mchod rten dbyibs su 'dug pas bkra shis sgo mangs te// mtshan dang ldan pas ban d+ha ye shes skyobs// mi shigs mdzod ldan rdo rje ka pA la// rtsal gsum rdzogs pas seng ge'i thod pa ste// thams cad ma lus zil gyis gnon pa yi// stobs lnga ye shes shar lho mtshams su gzhag/ srid pa yongs sgrol rdo rje ka pA la// srin po mda' sha gri bas ma btul glang po che// dmag dpung 'khor byed khyung mchog rin po che// stobs ldan ye shes lho nub mtshams su gzhag/ dus gsum gtan sungs zhal bu ka pA la// lha chen ma hA de ba bsgral ba'i thod pa ste// 'jig rten rang na che btsan gsang ba ste// 'jig rten ye shes chen po byang nub mtshams su gzhag/ mtshan ma spros bral zhal bu ka pA la// tshil chen lang ling gzugs kyi phung po ste// li tsa ku ri thong ba dngos grub rdzas// gtum pa ye shes thod pa byang shar mtshams su gzhag/ gzhan yang de bzhin gru chad la// bsgrub pa yi ni bkra shis rdzas// yongs su rdzogs ldan rdo rje ka pA la// lcug 'phran 'phel byed ye shes gsum gyi rdzas// shar gyi gru la de bzhin gzhag par bya// bkra shis mtshan ldan rdo rje ka pA la// ga bur gangs zhun dkar pa 'dzag pa'o// ming du ma phye rigs su gzhon pa yi// ye shes gsang ba'i thod pa lho yi gru la gzhag/ mi 'gyur sra mkhregs rdo rje ka pA la// ma smra ma shig lcug phran sdong po 'dra// de yi ban da yang dag bkra shis pa// ye shes gsang ba'i thod pa nub kyi gru la gzhag/ A yu dpal ldan rdo rje ka pA la// mkhas pa mang po'i gzungs ma byas pa de// dbang bskur dbang dang ldan pa'i thod pa ste// ye shes gsang ldan thod pa byang gi gru la gzhag/ gzhan yang ye shes thod pa bzhi// sgo bzhi dag tu gzhag par bya// zhes gsungs so// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang// de bzhin rang bzhin bdud rtsi rnams// bshad kyis kar ma he rus nyon// ra sa ya na phyi yi sman// dam rdzas lnga po nang gi sman// rlung lnga rnam dag gsang ba'i sman// sku lnga rnam dag mthar thug sman// bsam gyis mi khyab brjod las 'das// rtsa ba brgyad dang yan lag stong// thams cad ma 'dus gcig kyang med// de yi phyir na bdud rtsi zhes// bsam gyis mi khyab pas na de skad gsungs// rgyu dang

las dang snod dang ni// don dang lus dang 'bras bu yin// thams cad kun la nges par khyab// ces gsungs so// phur pa bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i rgyud las// bdud rtsi thig le'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas yang kar ma he ru kas/ sgrol byed kyi rgyal po la/ phyag rgya chen po bdag nyan 'tshal// sgrol byed chen pos bka' stsal pa// sems nyid mya ngan 'da' ba dang// sku mdog phyag mtshan mtshon ba'i phyir// phyag rgya chen po ngas bshad kyis// nyon cig kar ma he ru ka/ skye med rnam dag chos kyi dbyings nyid las// skye ba'i cho 'phrul 'jigs pa'i skur ston pa// kI la ya yi tan tra dang// rnam par grol ba mtshon ba'i phyir// e yi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// bcom ldan dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po rtse dgu me dpung bsnams// bar gnyis rtse lnga kha T+wAM kha// tha gnyis ri rab phur pa 'dril// brkyang dang bskum dang dor stabs dang// rdo rje gzhon nu thabs kyi rgya// 'khor lo rgyus 'debs phyag rgya ni// cha lugs gtso dang mthun pa la// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing// g.yas pa shes rab thabs la brten// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// kro d+hi shwa ri dbyings kyi rgya// 'bar ba'i gdan la bzhengs nas kyang// kI la ya yi dngos grub gsol// bcom ldan 'das dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu dang// yum chen 'khor lo rgyas 'debs ma// khro bo'i tshogs kyis bskor ba ni// hU~M mdzad mthing skya sti ra mda' gzhu 'gengs// rnam rgyal dkar sngo 'khor lo tri shul// dbyug sngon sngo skya be con me dbal bsnams// gshed po mthing nag ral gri dbyug tho 'phyar// mi g.yo smug nag dgra sta zhags pa bsnams// rta mgrin dmar po spu gri zhags pa 'dzin// 'dod rgyal dmar skya ba dan rnga yab 'phyar// 'khyil pa ljang nag rgya gram rin dbyug 'phyur// bgegs 'dul ser po tri shul mda' gzhu 'gengs// stobs chen dung kha gshol dang tho ba bsnams// 'bar ba'i gdan la bzhengs nas kyang// kI la ya yi dngos grub gsol// bka' 'khor de yi phyi rim nas// pho nya tshogs kyis bskor ba ni// yab kyi pho nya mche ba can// yum gyi pho nya gshog pa can// mche gshog rab 'byams pho nya khra thabs tshogs// phyag na dbang drag phur pa 'dril// 'bar ba'i gdan la bzhengs nas kyang// kI la ya yi dngos grub gsol// bka' 'khor de yi phyi rim nas// sgom tshogs kyis bskor ba ni// phu shud mgo can lag na lcags kyu phur pa bsnams// skya ka'i mgo can lag na zhags pa phur pa 'dril// srin bya'i mgo can lag na lcags sgrog phur pa 'dril/ khra yi

mgo can lag na dril bu phur pa bsnams// 'bar ba'i gdan la bzhengs nas kyang// kI la ya yi dngos grub gsol// bde ba ma bcos rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i sku// dus gsum rgyal ba sangs rgyas kun gyi dbyings// srid gsum ma lus dmigs su med pa rnams// kun bzang mchod sprin mchog tu rol// oM na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya// bi shwa mu khe b+h+ya sarba tad khaM ud ga te spar na hi maM ga gan khaM swAhA/ 'gro ba'i don du phyag zhabs sku bsil nas// rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol// a ha ri a ha ra bud+ha tsit+ta swAhA/ oM badzra kI li kI lA baM/ badzra d+hu be/ puSh+pe/ a lo ke/ gan d+he/ bde chen dbyings nas dpal chen skur bzhengs nas// dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu'i thugs ni rin po che// kI li kI la ya yi 'khor gyi 'phreng bas bskor// bde chen dbyings nas dngos grub stsal du gsol// oM A hU~M/ bshang gci sha dang nyi zla dang// glang rta ba glang khyi sha dang// me tog la sogs gtor mar bcas// dkyil 'khor lha tshogs rnams la dbul// thugs dam bzhin du bzhes nas kyang// kI la ya yi dngos grub gsol// rgya phor mtshan ldan srub med du// mu tig dkar po dri med gcig/ tsan dan smug po rma med gnyis/ khams gsum bsgral ba'i sha chen gsum// dngos grub bcud ldan dri chen bzhi// dag byed rdo rje dri chu lnga// ye shes lnga yi ngang nyid du// gnyis su med par mnyam sbyar nas// rgyal ba 'khor bcas rnams la 'bul// thugs dam bzhin du bzhes nas kyang// kI la ya yi dngos grub gsol// dza hU~M baM ho/ shrI he ru ka ma hA badzra sarba duSh+tan sa ma ya mu tra kha raM khA hi tri ta yas pi hU~M phaT/ khams gsum ma lus bsgral ba'i zhing// rang byung ma bcos thig le ni// rig pa dag gi glong rtogs te// thams cad ma lus gnyis med dang// rang byung dbyings su gnyis med bsgral// raM/ thog mar gnyis med rgyal ba'i klong// dag pa'i mkha' nas gzhon nu'i sku// hU~M chen la sogs skur bzhengs nas// dug gsum ljon shing gcod pa'i phyir// gnyis med sbyor ba'i mchod pa 'bul// sa ma ya sto/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ a nu rA ga yA mi/ u nu rA ga yA haM/ bo d+hi tsit+ta ti Sh+wa badzra/ zhes gsungs so// bskul bskyod thams cad phyag rgya ste// gang byas gnyis med don du shes// 'di ni rgyal ba kun gyi rgyal// 'gres log spyi tshugs gar 'gres kyang// snying po'i don las yongs mi 'da'// 'dzin chags med par rgyal pas gsungs// snang srid thams cad mchod pa'i rdzas// phul tsam nyid na phul ba med// rol ba'i cho 'phrul ma 'gags pas// gang ltar spyad kyang me tog skye// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// khyad par gsungs pa chen por 'gyur// zhes par gsungs so// phur pa bskal pa me ltar 'bar

ba'i rgyud las/ nges 'byung mchod pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang kar ma he ru kas/ sgrol byed kyi rgyal po la/ rnal 'byor grol lam bsgrub na ji ltar bsgrub// kI la ya yis bka' stsal pa// rnal 'byor grol ba'i lam 'jug pas// gnas mal bde zhing 'tshol ba bsog/ bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bsams nas su// bsod nams yan lag bsogs byas nas// stong pa'i snying rje yi ge las// mkhas pas skur sogs gdan bshams la// dgug gzhug phyag rgyas thabs mchod nas// bsnyen bsgrub yan lag rdzogs pa ni// tshogs lam pa zhes rgyal bas sbyar// ngang nyid chos dbyings rnal 'byor pas// gnas pa rtsa yi 'khor lo las// me rlung las kyis 'khor lo bskor// de la zab mo'i sngags bkod bas// A li kA li 'bru dgur sbyar// de ni sbyor lam rnal 'byor yin// de yang 'pho ba'i rlung gis bskyod// 'ju ba'i mes bzhu thig le gzhir gsal te// sa gzhi dga' bzhi drod mthong ba// mthong ba lam gyi rnal 'byor pa// de yang me rlung gis sbyor bas// rims kyi chos kyi thig ler gsal// 'jug dang gnas dang ldang ba'i tshul du bsgom// de ni bsgom lam rnal 'byor ro// snang ba gsum gyi ngo bo yis// 'od gsal zung 'jug chos kyi skur 'gyur te// sku dang ye shes dang/ pha rol phyin par 'gyur// mthar thug lam de rdzogs pa'i rim pa yin// ma rig pa dang ye shes gnyis// kun gzhi rgyud la ye shes gnas// gang gi ye shes rgyas thebs nas// lha dang phral zhes de la bshad// de nyid ma bcos don shes shing// gang gi rgyud la rab gnas pa// gzugs la dbab ces de la bshad// 'bras bu ye shes nar son cing// gang la de yis sbyor byed pa// yan lag bcings par de 'gyur ro// sa nas sa ru 'phar ba dang// sgrib gnon ye shes skye ba dang// smyo ru gzhug ces de la gsungs// gang la bag chags rgyud gnas kun// ma lus kun nas rtsad 'byin bas// rdul du brlag ces de la byed// shes bya kun la thogs med pa'i// 'bras bu thams cad lhun gyis grub// thams cad ma lus 'ub chub pas// zhal du bstab ces de la bya// zhes gsungs so// phur pa bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i rgyud las// don nges par gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas yang kar ma he ru kas// sgrol byed kyi rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bsgrub pas sgrol ba'i 'phrin las dag/ kI la ya la bdag nyan 'tshal// sgrol byed rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// sgrol ba las kyi 'phrin las rnams// yang dag nyid du ngas bshad kyis// nyon cig kar ma he ru ka/ dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab/ sprul pa chen po'i dus la bab/ phyag gnyen chen mo'i

dus la bab// shwa na mu kha'i dus la bab// bdag nyid chen mo'i dus la bab// sa bdag chen mo'i dus la bab// sa bdag chen mo'i dus la bab// khyed kyi thugs dam dus la bab// mthu rtsal dbyung ba'i dus la bab// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing// dus gsum rgyal ba'i gdung 'tshob pa'i// rig 'dzin bdag cag rnams la ni// gnod cig gdug pa'i dgra dang bgegs// bdud dang bar du gcod pa rnams// dngos grub 'phrog cing 'tshe ba rnams// khro bo chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// yud tsam gyis ni 'dir bkug nas// mngon spyod tshul bzhin bsgral pa dang// lus ngag rdul du bshig nas kyang// sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod// oM laM hU~M laM staM b+ha nan/ mo ha g+ha ya b+ha ga ban/ shi tri ta ba ki kri badzra hU~M/ hU~M kar hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ oM badzra kI li kI lA ya/ dza hU~M baM ho/ sarba big nan baM hU~M phaT/ badzra kI li kI lA ya/ hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT/ badzra hU~M ka ra hU~M a/ zhes kun gzhi'i bag chags dang bcas nas phul// dngos grub bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// zung zhig sdoms shig rnam par chings// rtogs shig grogs dang bral bar gyis// rings par khug la smra ru chug/ phob cig rnam par gzir bar gyis// nga yi dbang du gyur nas kyang// bsgo ba'i bka' rnams nyan par gyis// hU~M par b+h+ya d+hi/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da dz+wa la pa hUM phaT/ b+hi na da b+hin da hUM phaT/ grih+na grih+na hUM phaT/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ ban d+ha ban d+ha hUM phaT/ ta tha ya ha a hUM phaT/ ha sa ya ra ha ta ya na hUM phaT/ Sha krin A na ya hUM phaT/ ya dz+wa la pa ya hU~M phaT/ A be sha ya A be sha ya hU~M phaT/ bin d+ha ya bin d+ha ya hU~M phaT/ ces las nyon mongs pa skye ba'i bag chags sgo lnga'i rnam par shes pa phul lo// bran dang pho nya bka' nyan tshogs// khyed kyi dam tshig dus la bab// sngon chad ji bzhin dam bcas pa'i// mngon spyod 'phrin las myur du mdzod// ha na ha na badzra/ da ha da ha badzra/ pa tsa pa tsa badzra/ ma tha ma tha badzra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la badzra/ su ru su ru badzra/ mu ru mu ru badzra/ ka tang ka te/ dza ye bi dza ye/ a tsi te/ a pa ra rdzi ta/ ma ra sa na pra ma ta na ye hU~M phaT/ ces pas rnam par shes pa tshogs brgyad phul lo// rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' las ni// sdig can gang zhig 'da' byed pa// stobs chen khro bo chen po yis// klad pa tshal pa brgya ru khos// nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren tshogs// nga yi bka' las 'da' ma byed// oM ma ma pa shi ku ru/ ma taM nya ka ra in Na/ da ti ma ma kar ma/ shi traM ka ra ye hU~M phaT/ ces pas rnam par shes pa'i rten mgo bo bag chags dang bcas ba phul lo// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa yi// lha'am gnod sbyin bdud kyang rung// nga la bar chad byed pa

rnams// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par byos// sarba a na ya hU~M phaT/ ta tha ya/ ta tha ya hU~M phaT/ ces mthud rdzu 'phrul phrogs so// rdungs shig rdo rje 'bar ba'i gtun// bka' las 'da' byed sdig can rnams// rdo rje me dbal snying bsregs nas// lus ngag rdul phran bzhin du lhogs// khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung du// rdo rje tho bas brdungs byas nas// lha yang rung ste rlag par byed/ kha thaM/ kha thaM/ kha thaM/ yum gyi mkha' dbyings su/ khams gsum dus gcig tu bsgral te/ byang chub sems kyis ma nyes par gyur to// nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ badzra yak+Sha kro d+ha/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ ha ha ha/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ chos nyid kyi bden pa'o// gsang sngags kyi byin brlabs so// sangs rgyas kyi mthu'o// ab+hi tsar+ya'i dus la bab ba rnams kyi brnag pa'o// oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas/ brnag pa de kho na la'o// kI li kI la ya bco brgyad do// dkar nag gi mtshams su'o// hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ dgyes dang/ gso dang/ rgyun gnas so// zhes gsungs so// phur pa bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i rgyud las// smad las nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas yang kar ma he ru kas/ sgrol byed rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bsgral ba'i las rnams gtan tshigs kun// kI la ya la bdag nyan/ 'tshal/ sgrol byed rgyal po' bka' stsal pa// sngags drug las rnams gtan tshigs ngas bshad kyis// nyon cig kar ma he ru ka// gsang ba'i las dang don kun la// gdab pa'i las kun gang byed kyang// ngan sngags las rnams mgo la rdzogs// gnyis kyis bsnyen pa bzhi yis bsgrub// 'phrin las sdegs su rnam par bshad// gcig la gcig ste rtags rnams 'byin// gang gis gsad pa'i las sbyor ba// ngan sngags srog gi 'khor lo'o// rgyal ba kun dang dgongs pa gcig/ de nyid smad las rdzogs par bya// ma lus kun la gang sbyor ba// dgug gzhug drag po'i las la sbyor// shin tu gtum khrod ros kyang// bu dang bu la gdams par bya// bsnyen bsgrub las rnams thams cad// kun gyi las la gang mtha' sdud las kyi rgyal por 'gyur// dus ba drug dang sngags drug la// go rims ji bzhin sbyar byas la// rbad pa'i sngags su de 'gyur ro// byang chub oM las grub pa'i mtha'// snying la gzir bar rab tu bshad// gnad la dbab pa'i pho nya brgyad po dang// dkyus kyis gnyis pa rab bsgul la// bdun dang rtsad gcod snying po la// drug pa'i sngags kyis rab tu gsad// de bzhin go rims kun du 'gyur// dngos gsum pa dang gnyis pa dang// de bzhin gsum pa'i gsum pa la// bdun pas mgo mnan brgyad pa

blang// drug pa yongs su rdzogs par brtag/ gsad pa'i thabs su de 'gyur ro// stod kyi glod dang bar gyi skal// tha mas mthong dang sngags kyis gsod/ khong bkra lung du de 'gyur ro// las la shis phyir kun gyi mgo la dag la// las gzhug brtul phyir kun gyis gzhug la gdags// 'phrin las sdebs phyir 'phrin las rdegs su gtang// man ngag rtsang phyin phyir ni khong khror gtang// lha rnams las la gzud phyir pho nyar gtang// bsnyen bsgrub mdor phyir srog la 'khor lo bskor// nyung bar gsang phyir sngags su gtang// mi 'ur phyir nas sbad ba'i sngags su gtang// gdul bya tshar gcod phyir ni pho nyar gtad// zhes gsungs so// phur pa bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i rgyud las// man ngag sder sbyin pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang kar ma he ru kas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// mi shigs rdo rje gang lags pa// kI la ya la bdag nyan 'tshal// mi shigs don rnam gnyis ste// bskyed dang dgug dang bzlas pa dang// bstim dang bsrung dang sba ba'o// gzhal yas 'khor dang gtso bo dang// pho nya ting 'dzin phyag rgyas dang// 'phro 'du 'od zer 'du 'phro dang// rigs lnga'i sngags kyis rab tu bsrung// gzhal yas tsit+ta'i dkyil 'khor du// bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor gnyis med bstim// mi 'gyur ye shes dngos po la// rang byung ye shes rgya yis gdab// rgyu las ma byung rkyen gyis ma bskyed pas// mi 'gyur ye shes g.yung drung tshe// dngos po gang la bden med pas// rang bzhin 'gyur med skye med tshe// sems nyid gang du ma btsal bas// g.yo ldang med par sems kyi tshe// bdag dang gzhan du mi 'byed pas// gnyis med byang chub sems kyi tshe// zhes gsungs so// phur pa bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i rgyud las// rdo rje tshe'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang kar ma he ru kas/ sgrol byed kyi rgyal po la 'di skad ces zhus so// bsnyen dang bsgrub pa gang lags pa// kI la ya la bdag nyan 'tshal// nyon cig kar ma he ru ka/ bsnyen bsgrub don rnams ngas bshad kyis// rtse gcig pa yi yid kyis nyon// dur khrod brog gling rkang gcig drung// dben la nyams dga'i gnas dag tu// rdzas dang yo byad kun sogs la// lhun 'gyur zhe sdang che ba'i 'khor// shin tu drug po'i dus la 'jug/ bsod nams dbung dang phyin bshags bya// stag dang glang po la sogs te// cho ga yan lag rdzogs par bya// bsnyen pa zhes su rgyal bas gsungs// ting 'dzin rim pa rab gsal zhing// rig pa'i ye shes grangs bstim pas// las mthar phyin pa bsgrub chen po// kar ma he ru kas yang gsol pa/ de don rgyal bas bshad du gsol// nyon cig kar ma he ru ka/ ngas gsungs pa

la the tshom med// lnga yis don gyis gzhi bzung la// bzhi yis de nyid las bsdebs la/ gsum gyis don gyi khog phub ste// gnyis kyi don gyi spyis rnams 'byin// mthar phyin las kyis rgyal por bshad// gcig la gsum ste rab tu dbye// dang po rnams pa gnyis su 'gyur// gnyis la rnam pa dgu ru bshad// gsum la yan lag rab tu dbye// gnyis la gnyis te gnyis so tra// gsum la rnam drug nyid do// bzhi la gsum gyis yongs su rdzogs// zhes gsungs pas/ 'khor gyis bstod do// sgeg po dpa' bo 'jigs su rung ba dang// rgod dang gshe dang 'jigs par khro ba dang// snying rje rngam dang zhi ba la sogs te// sku yi dngos po shin tu klas pa yin// rgyan dang cha lugs ldan pas sgeg sgeg 'dra// bdud bzhi gdan du bting bas dpa' dba' 'dra// sku che yan lag rags pas 'jigs 'jigs 'dra// zhal g.yas dkar la 'dzum pas rgod rgod 'dra// zhal g.yon dmar la gdang bas gshe gshe 'dra// zhal dbus mthing la rngam pas khro khro 'dra// rgyud drug la sogs 'dren pas thugs rje che che 'dra// gdug pa zhal du gsol bas rngam rngam 'dra// chos sku mtshan ma med bas zhi zhi 'dra// de 'dra'i khro bo cha lugs 'jigs par bstan pa ni// rdo rje rtse dgus sa dgu'i rtog pa 'joms// rdo rje rtse lngas rgyud lnga rab tu 'joms// me dpung 'bar bas khams gsum nyon mongs bsreg/ kha T+wAM rtse gsum dug gsum rtsad nas gcod// ri rab phur pas khams gsum zil gyis gnon mdzad pa// sku smad dpal dang chas pas gdug pa sgrol// gnyis med thugs las skyed pa'i yum chen dang// yab yum gnyis med sku gsung thugs dang ldan// drag po las kyis gdug pa sgrol mdzad pa// kI la ya yi dngos grub stsal du gsol// de nas yang rang bzhin gyi 'khor gyi gtso 'khor la bstod do// bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// gdug pa 'dul phyir dus las mi 'da' ba'i// khro rgyal 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// rdo rje gzhon nu'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad bskyed pa'i yum// bde chen dbyings las skyed pa'i 'byung gnas gtso// mdzes pa'i sku mchog sems can sgrol la mkhas// 'khor lo rgyas 'debs yum la phyag 'tshal lo// phyogs bcu dreg pa bsnol ba'i// gdan stengs nas// bdud 'dul chen po ye shes khro rgyal bcu// hU~M dang phaT kyis srid gsum 'khor ba 'joms// khro bo chen po bcu la phyag 'tshal bstod// bde chen dbyings las skyed pa'i khro rgyal yum// khro ba'i sku+u la dgyes par so so 'khril// srin po'i cha lugs shin tu brjid bar ston// ye shes khro mo bcu la phyag 'tshal bstod/ khams gsum

dbang sdud ye shes phyag snyan tshogs// che mchog gtum khro pho nya 'bar ba'i sku// rngam pa'i stabs kyis srid gsum 'gugs mdzad ma// mgo brnyan nyi shu'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// tshad med bzhi rdzogs gsang ba yum gyi dang// 'phrin las rnam bzhis 'gro ba'i don la brtson// phyag rgya rnam bzhis gdug pa 'dul mdzad ma// sgo skyong 'gug 'dren tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// phur ba bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ bsnyen bsgrub dang dgyes te bstod pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas yang kar ma he ru kas/ sgrol byed kyi rgyal po la gsol ba/ nges 'byung snying po gang lags pa// kI la ya la bdag nyan 'tshal// nyon cig kar ma he ru ka/ ngas gsungs pa la gdon mi za// rang byung ye shes rgyal po las// 'khor 'das thams cad 'byung gnas chos// sna tshogs ngo bo 'bras bur smin// kar ma he rus yang gsol pa// e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rang bzhin gsang ba'i dngos po rnams// spyod yul ma yin ngo mtshar che// kun la snang ba rgyal ba'i zhing// ngo mtshar rmad byung rgyal ba'i thugs// ngo mtshar rgyal ba kun dang mnyam// sgrol byed rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// kun 'byung ye shes rgyal po 'di// ston pa rdo rje'i thugs la gnas// ma btsal bde ba'i sems nyid las// sna tshogs snang ba ngo mtshar che// bde gshegs zab mo'i spyod yul las// gang ltar snang ba ngo mtshar che// e ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// kun brjod gsung gi rgyal po 'di// ji snyed tha snyad kun brjod kyang// 'bras bu bye brag so sor snang// tha snyad brag cha ji bzhin te// ma brjod sgra yi ngang du gnas// sgra de ma brjod tha snyad las// dper na bcom ldan sbrid sangs bzhin// ston pa rdo rje'i gsung las 'byung// e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// kun nas thugs kyi rgyal por gnas// zla ba lta bur dngas pa las// nyi ma lta bur kun la khyab// ma g.yos rgya mtsho lta bu las// shugs las 'byung ba rol par snang// rang bzhin dngos po dngos med dang// me long dngas pa'i tshul bzhin no// ston pa rdo rje'i thugs la gnas// e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// 'phrin las sna tshogs cir snang yang// zhi rgyas dbang dang drag po dang// mngon spyod 'phrin las bsam yas kun// las rnams bya ba ma lus kun// gcig ma lus par thams cad grub// byas so cog rnams las su 'gyur// byas dang gang las g.yos pa med// e ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// yon tan bsam yas gsang bar gnas// zhing khams rgyan la sogs pa rnams// gang yin de las mi zhan pa// rgyal ba'i yon tan brjod las 'das// de phyir yon tan kun la snang// e ma ho yang dag

rdzogs lung rgyal// chos rnams bstan pa'i rgyal por 'byung ba'i rgyu// mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa yang// bstan pa'i rgyal po nga las 'byung// dam tshig bsgrub dang bsgrub pa dang// bstan pa'i rgyal po 'di las byung// sku dang gsung dang thugs rgyud dang// bstan pa'i rgyal po 'di las byung// sa dang lam rnams brgyud pa yang// bstan pa'i rgyal po 'di las byung// ston pa sgrol byed rgyal po ngas// nga yis ma byas gang yang med// ston pa dag pa mtha' dag nga yi 'khor// tha snyad grags pa thams cad kun// de dag thams cad dang las byung// nga las ma byung gang yang med// chos so cog tu grags pa kun// kun kyang nga yi dngos gzhi yin// bstan pa'i rgyal po mtha' dag kun// don gyi ngo bo nga las byung// zhes gsungs pas/ kar ma he ru kas gsol pa/ e ma ho sgrol byed rgyal po lags/ kun gyi gzhir gyur de ltar na/ gang ltar gang byung gang du smin// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal// don gyi snying po kun 'byung gzhi nyid de// 'og min gnas mchog dam pa ru// sku yang sgrol byed rgyal po 'dis// 'khor yang kun khro 'khor rnams la// tshig gcig gsungs pa med mod kyang// rang bzhin don gyis go bar ston// 'og min grags pa de ltar gyis// gong dbye ba yi gdul bya la// sgrogs pa kar ma he ru ka/ de yang nga snang mya ngan 'das 'og tu// bstan pa kun 'byung rgyal po 'di// rig pa 'dzin pa'i gnad gsum la// nges te nges par 'byung ba yin// nges par 'byung bar gdon mi za// rgyal ba'i dgongs pa'i bcud gnas 'di// de yang gang zag mos dbang las// rtog pa'i bye brag thams cad las// chos dang bye brag brjod las 'das// de bsdus rnam par gsum nyid de// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ste// gnyen po gang ltar 'tshal bas na// snod dang sbyar la gtad par gsungs// de yang snod kyi bye brag las// dug can rnams dang phrad mi 'gyur/ kha sbub zhabs rdol spong ba'i rgyu// dad ldan brtson 'grus che ba dang// dka' thub dam la gnas pa dang// brtul zhugs che zhing sgrol la brtson// skad gdangs che la las khrigs mkhas// de ltar tshangs pa'i snod la gdams// zhes gsungs so// phur pa bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ gang ltar byung ba dang lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang sgrol byed rgyal pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'khor gnas khro rgyal thams cad kyis// 'byung gnas bstan ba'i rgyal po 'di// kun la spel zhing rgyas pa dang// yongs su dang zhing smin pa dang// mi nub rgyal mtshan chen po ste// kun la mthun par yang dag zung// pho nya 'khor tshogs thams cad dang// mkha' 'gro pho rgyud mo rgyud kyis// ngas

gsungs rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di// snod ldan gang la gnas byed pa// de la skyob cing brtse bar zung// phur pa bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ rgyud yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste bco lnga ba'o//// rdo rje phur pa bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i rgyud ces bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so//// u rgyan gyi mkhas pa chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba brang ti dzA ya rak+Shi ta dang/ lce ku ku ra tsa dang/ snubs nam mkha'i snying pos/ bsam yas brag dmar du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//// rgya gar skad du/ bu tra tan tra ka pa na ma pra ta pa/ ka ru na sa ta nA ma/ ka ra ma ra ya d+ha ba/ ka ra ma ku ru ma la/ san d+ha na/ g+hu ha/ man tra ti/ sid+hi ka pra ti paM/ g+hu ha u tong ta/ sarba ma ha ra tsa/ bod skad du/ mdo rgyud rtog pa bsdus pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba/ thugs rje sbyang thag gi gnas// mdzad pa lha'i cho 'phrul 'phrin las mthar phyin pa'i bsgrub pa/ gsang sngags nges par 'byed pa'i don gsal bar byed pa'i sgron ma/ lung thams cad kyi rgyal po chen po'o// bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po ye shes rig pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas 'di ni rab bshad pa// kun gyi lung chen 'di yin te// yong ye bskal pa bsam yas shing// brjod du med par gnas pa yi// phyogs bcu rnams dang dus gsum du// bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang// mdzad pa'i 'phrin las sna tshogs pas// 'gro ba'i bsam pa tshim mdzad cing// ya mtshan byin rlabs rmad po ches// cho 'phrul rnam pa mang bstan yang// don rdzogs gzhan la phan par ni// thams cad kun gyi dgongs rgyud gcig/ mkha' dbyings dag pa'i klong yangs su// rig pa'i ye shes stong gsal bas// chos sku thig le chen po'i ngang// sangs rgyas nyag gcig spyod yul lo// kun bzhi ma bcos byang chub sems// de bzhin nyid gcig dbyer med la// ma rigs 'khrul pa'i snang ba yis/ gzung 'dzin dngos por rtog bsogs pa'i// gdul bya thabs kyis gzung ba'i phyir// thugs rje'i sbyang thag rgyun chad med// che ba'i chen po sangs rgyas rnams// 'gro ba drug la sogs pa kun// byams pa'i thag pas 'dzin pa yis// byed pa po dang bya ba dang// dmigs pa'i gnas su nges so zhes// ma bcos thig le rdzogs pa yis// rang 'byung ngang las skur snang ba'i// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs// thugs rje chen po sangs rgyas kyang// gnas lugs ngo bo nyid kyi gzhi// ji bzhin pa yi don de la// sangs rgyas sems can dbyer med cing// ye sangs rgyas su lhun gyis grub// ma btsal bsal dang bzhag pa med// rkyen gyi rnam pas rtog min yang// sgra tsam zhig tu bstan

nyid na// gol sgrib rang sar dag gyur ba'i// chos nyid mu mtha' mnyam nyid kyis// mtha' bzhi ma spangs mi gnas las// sangs rgyas zhes ni de nyid bzhed// brda yis brtags pa'i sangs rgyas la// che ba'i yon tan bsam yas shing// gzhal dang grangs las 'das mod kyang// mdor bzhag sku dang ye shes so// lnga dang bzhi dang gsum dang gnyis// de bzhin gcig gi sku rnams phye// ngo bo nyid dang rnam smin dang// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa lnga// rnam smin rgyu mthun 'bras bu ste// des na thub pa'i sku mchog bzhi// ngo bo nyid sku bral 'bras zhig/ sangs rgyas gsungs pa sku gsum nyid// mdor na sems nyid sangs rgyas te// de nyid ma yin sems can zhig/ 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin pas// ma bcos ye nas mngon sangs rgyas// kun kyang bral ba'i 'bras bu ste// de phyir ngo bo nyid skur gcig/ mkhyen pa'i ye shes bzhi dang lnga// me long bzhin dang mnyam pa nyid// so sor rtog dang bya ba bsgrub// chos dbyings shes pa'i ye shes so// de nyid dngos dang mkhyen pa gnyis// skye 'gag bral yang tha snyad du// so so'i rgyu dang bcas nyid de// kun gzhi dang ni nyon mongs yid// yid dang sgo lnga'i rnam shes dang// chos kyi dbyings las yang dag byung// des na rgyu dang 'bras bu zhes// bral ba tsam la brtags pa'o// ma nor ma bcos dpal gyi dpal// lhun gyis gnas pa'i sangs rgyas las// thugs rje'i bya bas yul gang la// sgyu ma'i sbrul pas rab tu bzung// yang dag nges pa'i don nyid la// byed dang bya ba mi dmigs kyang// sngon du goms pa'i 'bras bu las// thugs rje chen po'i sprul pa shar// gzhi lam 'bras bu rnam phye bas// thugs rje rnam pa gsum yin te// sems can dang ni chos la dmigs// dmigs med snying rje chen po zhes// phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs rgyal ba yis// dgongs rgyud gcig pas yang yang gsungs// de ltar thugs rjes rjes bzung bas// gdul bya gang dang gang dag la// gsung dbyangs du ma'i gsung rab kyang// sna tshogs nor bu ji bzhin du// rnam pa du ma gsal ba dag/ gsungs pa med bzhin gsungs bar snang// thugs rjes 'jug pa sna tshogs pas// ji ltar 'os pas 'dul mdzad de// phyi rol byed pa'i sde rnams la// de dang der snang ston pas gsungs// gang yang chad par lta 'dod la// 'di ltar snang tshad 'di tsam ste// sems can skye ba snga phyi dang// thams cad mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas dang// lkog tu gyur ba'i 'gro med dang// dbang phyug dang ni byed po dang// las dang 'bras bu las med pas// tshu rol skabs 'di mdzes so zhes// lha yi bla ma'i gzugs nyid kyis// rgyang 'phen pa yin bden don gsungs// gang zhig

drang srong rjes slob cing// rgyu la 'bras bu gnas 'dod la// shes bya bdag rang gtso bo ste// bdag ni byed med myong ba'o// gtso bo rang bzhin rnam 'gyur zhes// rgyal ba'i rjes 'brangs ser skyas bshad// de bzhin bdag dang gtso bo las// rdzas dang de las byung ba yis// rtag dang mi rtag smra byed la// dus gsum gyi ni rdzas drug la// srog dang srog ma yin pa dang// rten dang sdom pa bral ba dang// bcings dang thar dang bsod nams dang// 'gro dang song bas go 'phang dgu/ gcer bus ngal dub spyod pa yis// las zad 'dod pa rnams la bstan// dbang phyug nyid dang shes bya'i gnas// rdzas dang yon tan las dang spyi// bye brag 'du ba drug nyid de// de shes dbang phyug mchod legs pas// thar zhes rigs pa can dag dang// bye brag pa la rab dgongs te// rang la na yi tshul gyis gsungs// la lar khyab 'jug tsor byas nas// thams cad 'di nyid kyis sprul zhing// shes pas bdag nyid shes min te// mchod sbyin dang ni khrus byas bas// sdig dang sgrib pa zad 'gyur zhes// spyod pa la la tshangs pas bstan// de'i gzhung kha cig sems tsam du// byed pa po bdag dang dge mi dge// dus khams yon tan stong pa rnams// yod cing rnal 'byor goms pas na// bdag nyid gcig bur kun 'dus pas// don dam zhes tshangs pas smra// dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i gzugs// thub dbang rgyal ba mchog gis kyang// ji lta ji ltar 'dul 'gyur ba// de bzhin mthun pa'i bstan pa gsungs/ kha cig la ni gang zag dang// dus gsum shes par bya ba'i gnas// rdzas su grub ste yul sems gnyis// tha dad dus mtshungs don dam du// yul sems bden par smra rnams la// chos kyi bdag ces nges par bstan// de 'dra kha cig la dgongs te// ji ltar snang yang sems nyid la// rnam par 'jog don sems kyi gzhi// skyes te 'dra ba'i chos bdag nyid// de ni dam ba'i don yin te// bden pa grub ces rgyal bas gsungs// thams cad sems su smra 'dod la// kun tu btags dang gzhan dbang dang// yongs su grub pa shes bya gsum// ji ltar snang ba'i don gnyis dang// gnyis med shes pa'i rab dbye bas// ngo bo nyid gsung bden gnyis te// rig snang shes pa ma lus pa// bden zhes kun tu btags pa dang// don shes ming yang ma rig pas// bslab pa'i snang ba kun btags par// smra zhing sems kyi rnam pa las// yod dang med pa'i gzhung du snang// gang yang ngo bo nyid med 'dod// bden pa gnyis la rab brten nas// sgyu ma rab tu mi gnas bar// nges par bden zhes thub bas gsungs// bde gshegs gsung gi ngo bo las// grub mtha' so sor snang ba rnams// sangs rgyas sa la

drang ba'i phyir// bstan pa'i dbye bar gsungs pa yin// tha mal pa la blo zlog phyir// mu stegs phyed kyi bstan pa'o// de yi 'dod blo so so'i tshul// mya ngan 'das las drang ba'i phyir// mchog 'gyur sangs rgyas bstan pa ste// de yi grub mtha' so sor gsungs// nyan thos sde dang rang sangs rgyas// blo chen sems rtogs dbu ma pa// rgyu 'bras mnyam nyid la sbyor phyir// bya ba'i rgyud sogs so sor gsungs// bde gshegs thugs rje chos kyi char// brgyad khri bzhi stong gsungs pa yang// gdul bya'i sgrib pa bral phyir te// sangs rgyas 'phel ba'i phyir ma yin/ kha cig drang ba'i tshul gyis te/ kha cig nges pa'i tshul gyis so/ kha cig skyo ba bskyed pa ste/ kha cig brod pa bskyed pa'o// mdor na de dag thams cad kyang// thugs mchog dgongs rgyud gcig gis gsungs// mdo dang rgyud dang cho ga dang// le'u dum bur rab phye dang// rtog pa la sogs ji snyed pa// thugs rje'i rgyun gyi dpyang thag go/ 'phags pa'i thugs rje gsum nyid kyis// gzung bar bya ba'i gnas nyid kyang// log par zhugs dang nges par 'dzin// mnyam pa nyid du shes pa'o// thog mtha' med pa dus kyi dbyings// 'phel 'grib med par gnas pa ni// chos rnams kun gyi rten gzhi ste// bde gshegs thugs kyi snying po'o// de las sems dang sems 'byung gi/ sna tshogs yul gyi dngos por gzung// des bskyed rgyu gsum ngo bo nyid// gnas lugs ye don ji bzhin pa'i// mtshungs par ldan ba'i ma rig pa// kun 'gro kun tu btags pa yin// de bskyed log par zhugs pa yang// the tsom bskyed dang ngar gzung zhing// de la chad dang rtag brtags pas// 'jig tshogs mthar 'dzin nyid du 'gyur// log zhugs ji ltar brtags don la// chags sdang nga rgyal skyes pa ni// btang mi bra zhing rlom sems las// log pa las kyang log par zhugs// gzhan yang khro ba bskyed pa dang// lha dang tshul khrims brtul zhugs la// mchog tu 'dzin dang log lta rnams// log pa las kyang de bzhin bzhugs// de dag kun tshogs 'dus pa las// shing rta chen po'i 'phang lo bzhin// rigs drug gnas su 'khor gyur te// rang rang sdug bsngal bsal bar myong// 'gro la dmigs pa'i thugs rje yi// dpyang thag gis ni de mi gtong// nges par 'dzin pa thugs rje'i gnas// rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba na// chos nyid dngos po'i gnas lugs sam// gzugs dang sems dang sems las 'byung// 'du byed khams dang 'dus ma byas// brtag cing shes pa'i gzhir bzhag ste// ngad dang dran dang ting nge 'dzin// brtson 'grus dang ni shes rab rnams// rjes su dran phyir zag bcas te// shes rab rgyu yis rab bskul

nas// rang rang lta ba nges par gzung// 'di yang kha cig med ces nas// tha snyad 'dzin la skur pa 'debs// la la nges par yod do zhes// yang dag don la sgro 'dogs te// de yang kha cig 'dus ma byas// rtag pa gcig pa'i dngos por smra// 'ga' zhig 'dus ma byas pa'i don// mi rtag du ma'i dngos por brtags// la las gnyis kar brjod med ces// la la thams cad dngos med pa'i// bden pa grub pa'i don du brtags// des na nges 'dzin bsam mtha' yas// mdor na don rnams ji snyed kun// yod dang med dang tha dad dang// gcig pa nyid ces rtag gzung bas// mtha' cher ltung zhes lung 'dir bshad// mtha' 'dzin nges pa'i blo can rnams// chos la dmigs pa thugs rjes 'dzin// dmigs med thugs rje'i dpyang thag yul// mnyam pa nyid du shes pa ni// phung po khams dang skye mched dang// gnas lugs ngo bo nyid dag ste// mdor bsdus bden gnyis lus rnams dang// brtags snang blo bzhag grub pa'i mtha'// gzhir bzhag rang 'byung ye shes kyi// rig pa'i blo yis 'ub chub pas// de rgyu dngos dang dngos med mtha'i// mthar thug spyod pa mkhas pa yin// de phyir mnyam nyid rtogs zhes pa// yod med rtag chad mu bzhi la// skyon bzhi rtags bzhi sgra mthun pas// mtha' zhes so sor sor bzhag ste// don la khyad 'phags mnyam par grol// de'ang tshig yin der 'dzin grol// des na thams cad mnyam nyid de// 'ub chub kun 'dus mnyam pa'i dbyings// dbyer med lhun grub chen po la// dag dang ma dag gnyis med de// thams cad bral ba'i ngang gnyis pas// chos rnams thams cad sangs rgyas yin// de ltar rgyu 'bras mnyam nyid cing// thams cad ye gcig chen po la// dmigs med thugs rje chen po yi// mi g.yel dpyang thag rgyun du 'dzin// 'di ni 'gyur med ma chags pa// ma bcos lhun gyis grub ba'o// mdo rgyud rtog pa bsdus pa'i sgron ma lung thams cad kyi rgyal po las// thugs rje dpyang thag gnas kyi lung bstan pa ste dang po'o rdzogs so//// de nas kun gyi de nyid don// lung chen bsdus pa rab bshad bya// phyogs bcu dus gsum 'jig rten na// skye 'jig med par rtag bzhugs pa'i// bde bar gshegs pa kun rnams kyi// gsung gi 'phrin las mtha' yas kyang// de yi sku yi che ba las// mdzad pa lha yi cho 'phrul phyung// de nyid bsam yas brjod med de// mdor bstan rgyud ces bya bar smros// rgyud ni 'brel ba'i don yin te// de 'dir mtshungs pas rgyud kyi mchog/ lha zhes bya ba byang chub sems// de ni rgyun du rab tu brjod// tha snyad tsam gyis phye ba ni// gzhi lam 'bras bu gsum du brjod// gzhi ni gnas pa don nyid de// lam

ni rnal 'byor bsgrub pa'o// 'bras bu mthar thug mdzes pa'i las// rgyud ni rnam pa gsum zhes brjod// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// ma bcos lha bdag nyid// gzugs ni rnam par snang mdzad de// tshor ba myong ba rin chen 'byung// 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas la// 'du byed don yod kun tu grub// rnam shes mi bskyod rdo rje sems// ye nas ma bcos ji bzhin gnas// sa dang sha ni spyan ma ste// chu khrag ma ma ki ru brjod// me drod gos dkar ma zhes bya// rlung dbugs lha mchog sgrol ma'o// mig gi skye mched sa snying po// rna ba phyag na rdo rje ste// sna ni nam mkha'i snying por bshad// lce ni spyan ras gzigs dbang nyid// lus ni sgrib pa kun sel te// yid kyi skye mched 'jam dpal yin// gzugs ni gzugs kyi rdo rje ma// sgra la de bzhin sgra rdo rje// dri dang ro yang rdo rje ste// reg chos nyid kyang rdo rje ma// yul rnams dag pa lha mo'i tshogs// ngo bo nyid kyi lhun gyis grub// de dag so sor rab phye ba'i// rigs dang ye shes la ltos pa'i// lnga lnga ru ni 'gyur ba ste// rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni// kun la khyad par dbye ba las// mdor na dam pa'i rigs brgya ste// phye ba'i rigs la grangs med 'gyur// rigs kyi dbye ba ji snyed pa// de bzhin gshegs pa sa khams te// rdo rje rigs mchog rnam par shes// rin po che rigs me yi khams// pad+ma'i rigs las chur shes bya// las kyi rigs mchog rlung yin pas/ khams lnga'i rang bzhin rigs las ni// de nyid kho na'i rigs lnga'o// rigs kyi dbye ba lnga nyid kyang// sa dang chu ni lus kyi sku// de bzhin me rlung gsung du brjod// rnam pa shes pa thugs rang bzhin// sku dang gsung thugs dbyer med pa'o// gsang ba chen po'i rigs gcig nyid// gcig dang mang po'i rnam dbye kun// phun po khams dang skye mched dang// yid dang chos dang dus bzhi dang// mthar byed bzhi dang 'gro ba drug/ rang bzhin rnam par dag gnas pas// bde gshegs rgyal ba bzhi bcu ste// zhi ba dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du// bcos med ngo bo nyid kyis 'grub// rang bzhin gdod nas zhi ba'i phyir// zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgyar brjod// rol ba'i cho 'phrul 'gag med las// thog ma'i dus nas ngang gis khro// 'di ltar snang srid ma lus kyang// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rol pa las// gzhan du gnas pa ma yin te// lha yi mchog las lha yi ngang// dug lngar snang ba gtso bo'i sku// 'dod chags rta mchog rgyal po ste// rdo rje zhe sdang he ru ka/ nga rgyal gshin rje gshed rgyal po// phrag dog rdo rje gzhon nu'i sku// gti mug che mchog he ru ka/ ser sna 'chab sems mngon rdzogs rgyal// gdung ba'i sems ni rdo rje chos/ khong khro dregs pa kun 'dul

nyid// mnar dang sems dpa' stobs ldan bdag/ nyon mongs gtso bo re re la'ang// so so'i bye brag lnga lnga ste// de dag rigs bzhi so so'i 'khor// nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs dag/ sna tshogs pa yi 'khor yin no// mdor na 'di ltar snang ba yi// srid zhi 'jig rten ma lus pa// snod du snang ba gzhal yas khang// bcud ni lha yi tshogs yin no// dag pa'i 'jig rten dag pa'i klong// rnam dag chen por lhun gyis grub// 'byung ba lnga ni yum lnga'i klong// gnas shing brtan pa'i sa rnams kun// gzhal med khang pa dkyil 'khor yin// pha dang ma ni yab dang yum// bu dang bu mo sras pho mo// phyi nang nye ba'i 'khor rnams ni// dkyil 'khor can gyi lha nyid 'khor// bran dang mngag gzhug dmangs kyi tshogs// bka' nyan las byed pha nya'i tshogs// rgyan bcas mtshan dang dpe byad de// tshig brjod snying po gsung gi sgra// longs spyod mchod pa kho na ste// yon tan tshig thos bstod pa'o// spros shing 'jug pa bya byed las// mdzad pa'i 'phrin las de nyid yin// chags par byed pa chags pa'i tshul// 'jig pa 'jig pas srid mthar byed// stong par shes pa stong pa nyid// sngar bzhin gnas bshad gnas pa'o// 'di ltar sems nyid sna tshogs su// snang zhing srid pa'i dngos po kun// rang bzhin rnam dag lha yi dbyings// lha yi rol pa lha yi sku// de bzhin dngos rnams ma lus par// ye nas lha yi rang bzhin pas// lha yi gzhi zhes rab tu brjod// de ni rgyud du shes bya ste// dus rnams kun tu 'bral ba'o// bde gshegs lha yi dgongs pa yis// lam zhugs rnams la sgyu mar sprul// cho 'phrul bgrod bya'i skur snang yang// rnal 'byor sgom pa'i rgyud ces bya// skyes bu chags pas rab gdungs ba// zhi ba'i sgo la sbyong byed pas// bsod nams tshogs ni rab bsags nas// mi rtog mi dmigs de bzhin nyid// lha ner gzhal las thugs rjer shar// rgyu yi ting 'dzin yi ge las// thams cad skye byed rang bzhin ni// 'byung ba yum lnga'i dkyil 'khor du// ye shes gzhal yas lhun gyis rdzogs// gdan stengs sa bon las bskyed pa'i// rigs gcig rigs lnga rigs brgya yi// sku dang bsdus pa bzhi bcu gnyis// mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can// gsal 'tsher lhun sdug gzi byin 'bar// mtshan dang dpe byad ma 'gags chos// rang rig byang chub sems las byung// dbyings nas spyan drangs dbyer med bstim// gnyis med gus pas phyag 'tshal te// mchod bstod dges mdzad 'phrin las bcol// gsang sngags bsnyen pa'i bzlas brjod kyis// nye bar byas te dngos grub blang// bzod par gsol la smon par bya// mi dmigs mi rtog chags bral pas// chos nyid

kyi ni dge rtsar bsngo// 'di ni zhi ba zhi mdzad lha'i// mdzad pa'i cho 'phrul bsam rdzogs pa// 'dod pa can rnams 'dul ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas rol mos gar mdzad do// shin tu gdug pa'i zhe sdang can// 'jug pa'i sgo ni khro bo ste// mtshams bcad bgegs bskrad gdug pa 'dul// sngon du 'gro ba'i bya ba bdun// rdzogs nas ting 'dzin gsum sgom zhing// 'byung ba lnga dang ri rab bskyed// rin chen dur khrod rab 'bar ba'i// gzhal yas mdzes shing 'jigs pa sgom// de dbus gdan stengs rgyu mchog las// bskyed pa'i gtso sras dang bcas// so so'i 'khor dang rab ldan pa// sgeg dang dpa' ba 'jigs pa dang// bzhad dang gshe rngam khro ba dang// snying rje zhi ba'i tshul 'chang bas// gar dgu'i nyams dang ldan pa'o// de 'dra'i 'jigs byed chen po'i sku// bskyed dang spyan drangs gnyis su med// bstim bzhugs phyag 'tshal mchod pas mchod// bstod dang sngags bzlas rjes bya'i rim// dus drug dus bzhi dus med du// rab tu 'bad pas gang bsnyen cing// bsgrub ba rnams ni lam gyi nyams// rnal 'byor rtog pa'i sgom pa ni// khro bo chen po'i stobs mchog gis// lam dang lam gyi rgyud du gsungs// zhi dang khro bo'i skur gsal bas// chag sdang dang zhe sdang rab bsal te// gzhan gyi don du skur snang ba// thob med 'bras bu de yi mchog/ de ni 'brel pas rgyud ces bya// gzhi lam 'bras bu dbyer med pa'o// gzhi dang 'dra ba'i lam bsgoms pas// de 'dra'i lam dang 'bras bu snyems// thugs rje'i mdzad pa kun rnams kun// 'gro ba'i don la rab tu brtson// zhi ba la ni zhi ba ste// khro ba can la khro bo'i sku// 'dod chags can la chags pa'i tshul// zhe sdang can la de yis 'dul// ma rig pa la gti mug tshul// ser sna la ni 'jungs pas so// phrag dog phrag dog gis 'dul zhing// zhi la zhi dang rgyas la'ang de// dbang chen la ni dbang sdud tshul// drag shul can la de nyid kyis// tshar gcod gzugs su ston par mdzad// rigs drug 'gro la rang gi gtso// thub byed drug gi sku rang bzhin// skyes pa la ni skyes pa'i gzugs// bud med la ni bud med de// mkhan po slob dpon rgyal po dang// bram za rje rigs dmangs dang bran// tshong dpon dmag mi mel tshe ba// tha na dud 'gro yan chad gzugs// gang gis 'dul la der ston te// mthun pas mthun pa 'dul bar byed// 'dod pa spangs la dka' thub dang// bde ba 'dod la longs spyod kyis// gsog 'jog can la sbyin par 'dod// tshul khrims bsrung dang ma bsdams dang// bsam gtan bsgom dang g.yel la sogs// gang gis gang 'dul de skur ston// ji ltar 'tsham pa'i don sbyar nas// skyes bu mthun pas

'dul 'gyur bas// 'di ni mdzad pa'i bya ba ste// 'bras bu'i rgyud du rab tu brjod//// mdor na rgyud ces bya ba'i don// dngos po'i gnas lugs gzhi yin te// gzhi las gzhan pa'i 'bras bu med// 'bras bu'i tshul las 'da' ba yin// lam gyi sgom pa gang lam mchis// de bas rgyu dang 'bras bu dang// lam zhes grags pa brtags pa tsam// 'di ltar snang ba 'di kho na// lha nyid yin te de las gzhan// chos dbyings sprul pa med pa'o// de ni don dam kun rdzob ces// lung chen kun las gsungs pa yin// 'di ni lung chen mdor bsdus pa// sangs rgyas 'phrin las bstan pa yi// rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul kun// rab tu bsdus min rgyas min par// rdo rje sems dpas bstan pa de// 'dir bstan pa la the tsom med// de bas ma 'ongs skye bo kun// yid gnyis spangs pas 'dud par bya// 'di ni rmi lam sgyu ma 'dra// de bzhin gzugs brnyan sprul pa dang// smig sgyu dri za'i grong dang mtshungs// sangs rgyas mdzad pa bsam yas par// ma mdzad pa la mdzad pa che// thams cad rang rang lha ru nges// e ma chos nyid spros dang bral// e ma ho rang bzhin ma 'gags snang// e ma ho rol pa bla na med// e ma sgyu ma phyag rgya che// e ma thugs rje ma lus 'dzin// sbrul pa'i sku ste lha yi mchog/ lha rnams nyid la gnyis med 'dud// mdo rgyud rtog pa bsdus pa'i sgron ma lung thams cad kyi rgyal po las/ mdzad pa cho 'phrul lha'i lung bstan pa ste gnyis pa'o rdzogs so//// de nas 'phrin las mthar phyin pa'i// sgrub pa'i lung mchog bshad par bya// rtsod dus gang zag rnams kyi phyir// rgyud rnams kun tu gsungs pa yi// bsdus pa'i lung ni mchog yin no// gsang ba sngags kyi bka' gsang lung// bsgrub bya bsdus pa 'di lta ste// yid 'ong dben pa'i gnas dag tu// mthun pa'i grogs dang bcas bzhin pas// bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu mthar phyung la// 'gro ba'i don la rab brtson bya// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das pa'i// dngos grub mchog ni dmigs pa'i yul// rang gzhan mtho ris thob 'dod pas// bsgrubs na myur du 'grub pa'i rgyu// dad brtson shes rab ldan pa ni// de yi rkyen du shes par bya// bsgrub bya bcu las bsgrub pa'i thabs// rnam pa bcu ste bsgrub lugs drug/ mnyam nyid zhi ba'i bsgrub pa dang// zhe sdang khro bo'i bsgrub bya dgu// gang zhig bsgrub par bya ba yi// lus ni rnam par shes par bya// de yi bsgrub lugs bsam yas pa// 'dir ni mthar thug kho nar brjod// kun nas zhi bar gnas pa la// zhi ba chen po bsgrub 'dod pas// gang la dmigs pa lha yi sku// bsgrub pa'i rten du gzhag par bya// de ni zhi ba'i lha rnams kyi// bsgrub rdzas rten gyi mthar thug

yin// yul gsum gsal bar gyur pa dang// rang 'dod lha yi rnal 'byor sgom// lus kun ting 'dzin lhar mnyam ba'i// bskyed pa'i rim pas sku rdzogs pa// bskyed rim don gyi mthar thug ste// sku yi bsgrub pa zhes bya'o//// oM A li kA li dz+nyA na pan tsa sa twa kro d+ha mu ne ye swAhA/ oM a hU~M swAhA/ oM A hAM/ snying po'i yi ge bco brgyad pas// dam pa'i rigs ni bcu phrag bcu// snying pos skul bar byed pa yin// gsang sngags snying po 'bru lnga pos// bde gshegs rigs lnga'i thugs dam bskul// gsung mchog 'bru gsum dag gis ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs skul byed// 'di dag gsang sngags dam pa'i mchog/ zhi bar snang ba'i lha rnams kyi// mthar thug gsung gi bsgrub pa ste// brag cha sgra brnyan ji bzhin du// thams cad gsung du snang zhing stong// gsung gi de nyid kho na ste// ming 'di mthar thug zab cing zhi// spros med yul dang bral ba ni// zhi ba thugs kyi sgrub par brjod// de bzhin du ni khro bo yang// kun nas ma lus mtshungs 'gyur te// yon tan gtso dang sku gsung thugs// 'phrin las rbod gtong drag sngags dang// mchod bstod dang bcas bsgrub lugs brgyad// bsgrub rdzas rten dang sgom pa'i lha// bzlas pa'i sngags dang lta dgongs bzhi// zab don gsang ba'i mthar thug pa// kun la lnga lngar rgyal bas gsungs// bum pa mar me thod pa dang// phyag rgya phur pa tsit+ta dang// mchod gtor ling ga nya bo dag/ bsgrub rdzas rten gyi mthar thug yin// dkyil 'khor rgyas bsdus yab yum dang// so so'i dpa' bo gcig rnams la// spro dang bsdu dang rab bsdus pas// mthar thug bsgom bya'i lha ru 'gyur//// oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA shrI he ru ka hU~M phaT/ oM ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA kro d+he aM ka ya man ta ka ha na ma tha ban dza hU~M phaT/ oM pad+ma ta krid ha ya gri ba hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kI li kA la ya sarba big+ha nan baM hU~M phaT/ oM d+hu ya dz+nyA na shrI he ru ka g+hu ya dz+nyA na kro d+hi sho ri s+t+waM/ ma ma yo gi ni ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M phaT/ oM badzra tsan+t+ra sarba duSh+tan ta ka ha na da ha ban tsa hU~M phaT/ oM badzra sarba duSh+tan hU~M phaT/ so so'i gsung sngags brgyad pa la// rang gi sku dang mthun brjod pas// thams cad gsung gi mthar thug ste// thugs kyi snying po skul byed pa'i// bzlas pa'i sngags su shes par bya// phyi nang snod bcud dngos po'o// skye 'gro 'byung ba rgyu 'bras bcas// ma lus bdud rtsi lnga dang gcig/ rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa kun// rang bzhin rnam dag mnyam sbyor ba// yon tan che mchog mthar thug pa// ye nas don chos sman rdzas te// rnam dag dgongs pas de don rdzogs// lha dang dkyil 'khor mchod rdzas sngags// rgyu dang chos nyid snying po dang// sgra dang dngos

grub shes pa yis// ma lus thugs kyi dgongs par 'dus// dus gsum shes bya gcig pu nyid// bde chen 'bras bu kun 'dus pa// yongs rdzogs sku gsung mthong pa'o// srid gnas gcod pa dang sprul pa dang// 'khor lo bzhi yi don spyad pas// sku yi dgongs pa mthar thug cing// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gshin gyi rje// ma lus 'joms par byed pa'i gshed// mnyam nyid ldan pa rab bsgrub pa'o// mtshon pa'i dpe dang gdul bya'i thabs// lta spyod dgongs pa'i don dag gis// gsung gi dbang phyug 'phrin las don// ma lus mnyes par byed pa'i yul// gcig dang du ma'i mthar thug pa// theg pa rim par bgrod pa dang// sa dang lam la sbyar ba dang// gsang sngags la shan dbye ba yi// rim pa nyid kyi dgongs par thug/ 'phrin las rgyu bzhir rab rten cing// thabs dang de las byung ba yi// rnam bzhis zab mo'i don spyad cing// thar phyin dgongs pa de mthar thug/ lus gnas nyid dang de las g.yos// rnal 'byor grol dang 'jig rten snang// drag shul sngags dang gab pa'i gter// phyi nang gsang ba nyer spyod cing// yongs rdzogs sku la sbyor ba yi// gsang chen de yi mthar thug don// bsgrub mchod bstod bskul rbad pa yis// nyer bsten so so'i las grub cing// snang ba gsum la kun sbyor cing// gzung yul ma grub tshul shes shing// rang gi ngang gis 'phrin las grub// bde spyod mchod bstod mthar thug pa'o// sngags rdzas dam tshig ting nge 'dzin// gcod 'phrog gnas pa gnad la dbab// rang gi mtshan ma mngon spyod kyi// 'phrin las tha dang nye bar bsgrub// stong phrag dag gis bcad pa yi/ khams gsum 'dul la rab tu shis// bya ba'i bye brag sna tshogs kyis// rang nyid chen por longs spyod nas// thig le rab sbyar dgyes par rol// 'di ni rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor te// zab don mchog tu mngon sang rgyas// gsang ba dpag dka' rgyud kyi don// ma lus bsdus la bsgrub lugs drug/ bsnyen pa nye bsnyen sgrub pa dang/ nye bar sgrub dang bsgrub chen po/ khyad par las la sbyor ba rnams// theg chen lung du gsal bar gsungs// gsang sngags snying po yid 'ong sgra// brgya stong la sogs grangs bcad nas// rgyun du bzlas shing brjod pa ni// rnal 'byor ldan pa'i bsnyen pa'o// dben pa'i gnas su ngag gzhan spangs// de nyid 'bad pa nye bsnyen te// thun mtshams bzhi yi rnal 'byor gyis// le lo med pa'i rtags 'byin pa// sgrub pa yin te de dag nyid// grangs dang dus dang mtshan ma la// rim pa bzhin du rab sbyar nas// rdul tshon dkyil 'khor chen zhugs shing// sngon 'gro bsrung dang mtshams bcad nas// phyi nang gsang ba'i grub rtags

kun// mthong zhing brtan par sgrub byed pa// nye ba'i sgrub pa zhes bya'o// rtags thon sgrub pa chen po ni// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// tha mal pa dang mchog tu 'gyur// 'jig rten tha mal dngos grub ni// phran chags las dang dngos grub ces// rgyal ba mchog gis gsungs pas na// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang dgug/ bskrad dang bsgral la sogs pa yi// las kyi bya ba rnam mang po// gang la 'dod pa de bsgyur zhing// dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis bsgrub// dngos grub chen po mchog bshad pa// mkha' la spyod dang rkang mgyogs dang// sa 'og spyod dang chu la 'chag/ me dang rlung gis mi brdzi dang// mi snang ba dang 'chi ba med// mig dang rna ba sna dang lce// lus dang yid ni dag byas pas// lkog gyur ring ba'i yul 'dzin cing// lha dbang dag pa ma lus mthong// rgyal ba'i thabs mchog bsam yas pa// rgya chen rgyud du gsungs pa rnams// so so'i rtags rdzogs bar du bsgrub// 'di dag tha mal sgrub pa che// dngos grub chen po ster bar byed// de nas gang 'dod las la sbyar// 'bad pa med par gzhan don spyod// kun 'dren lcags kyu lta bur gyur// las la sbyor zhes de la bya// 'di ni lung chen kun bsdus pa// 'phrin las mthar phyin bsgrub pa ste// dpa' bo chen pos gsungs pas na// nges pa'i lung du shes par bya// mdo rgyud rtog pa bsdus pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba lung thams cad kyi rgyal po las/ 'phrin las mthar phyin pa bsgrub pa'i lung bstan pa ste gsum pa'o rdzogs so//// de nas gsang sngags zab mo'i don// nges par 'byed pa'i lung chen po// gsang chen rig pa'i gter gyur pas// rgyal bas bka' stsal rab tu bshad// 'di ltar gsang sngags zhes bya ba// theg pa dman la gsang 'os shing// yid skyob phyir na gsang sngags te// de ni nges pa'i don yin no// ma man zhes pa yid yin te// tra tra las ni skyob par byed// ma lus yid skyob byed pas na// gsang sngags zhes ni rab tu brjod// man ni gang zag dngos po'i bdag/ tra ni chos bdag gzung 'dzin dngos// gsal ba gnyis med mnyam pa nyid// gsang sngags zhes ni nges par brjod// man ni rang rig ye shes te// tra ni gzhan la gsal bar byed// gsang ba gnyis med zhi bar rtogs// kun la bsngags pas gsang sngags so// man ni rmi lam sgyu ma bzhin// tra ni de la gnas med gsal// sgyu ma rab tu mi gnas don// dbyer med mthong ba gsang sngags don// man ni 'khor ba'i rgyu 'bras te// tra ni spros bral mya ngan 'das// gsang ba'i snying po gnyis med shes// spang sgrub bral ba gsang sngags so// man ni sems dag ngo bo la// tra ni sna tshogs rig pa'i yul// yul sems

snang la ma 'gags pa// gsal la rtog med gsang sngags so// man ni skyed byed rgyu yi chos// tra ni 'bras bu smin pa'i don// rgyu 'bras mnyam pa gsang ba'i sgru// ma bsgrubs so sor grub byed sngags// man ni bdag nyid kho na ste// tra ni pha rol gzhan pa po// gnyis 'dzin bral bas gang sbyor zhing// mnyam par rab spyod gsang sngags so// man ni kun rdzob bden par snang// tra ni don dam bden par shes// 'khrul pa dang ni yang dag gi/ don shes mi 'da' gsang sngags shes// man ni gsang ba'i sems nyid de// tra ni stong nyid yangs pa'i dbyings// gsal stong lhan cig skyes pa nyid// ngo shes snang ba gsang sngags yin// man ni snying rje chen po'i yid// tra ni shes rab zab mo'i dbyings// mi phyed de bzhin gnyis med don// rab rdzogs sbyor ba gsang sngags nges// man ni ma 'gags thabs chen te// tra ni ma skyes shes rab dngos// zung 'jug lam la rab bzhugs pa// nges don phyin pa gsang ba'i sngags// man ni gzhi tshul bskyed rim te// tra ni de dag rdzogs rim don// bskyed rdzogs thun mong dus bzhir sbyor// srid pa'i gnas sbyong gsang sngags so// man ni nyon mongs zhi bar gnas// tra ni lhag pa'i ye shes mthong// tshul gnyis rjes 'gro bzlog par snang// rab tu nges pa gsang sngags yin// man ni gnas gsum mnyam par gzhag/ tra ni rjes la brtan pa thob// phra rags rtog pa lam du spyod// spang blang bral ba gsang sngags yin// man ni nyon mongs sgrib byed pa// tra ni shes bya'i sgrib pa tsam// bag la nyal dang kun nas ldang// skad cig gnas sbyong gsang sngags yin// de bzhin bsgom dang sgom ma yin// yang dag pa dang log pa'i lam// bde bar snang dang sdug bsngal dang// che chung snyoms 'dra ring dang thung// gsal dang mi gsal bzang dang ngan// sdug dang mi sdug snyan mi snyan// gdang dang dri ro bro mi bro// 'jam rtsub lci yang tsha dang bsil// gsal dang mi gsal bzang dang ngan// dgra gnyen nye ring pho dang mo// mdza' sdug sdang dang mdzes mi mdzes// mtha' dbus phyogs mtshams 'gro dang 'dug/ dge dang mi dge dkar dang nag/ bya dang bya min bgrod mi bgrod// gtong dang mi gtong len mi len// drag zhan dka' dang sla ba dang// de sogs gcig la gcig ltos shing// gnyis su snang ba sngags yin te// dbyer med ro gcig gsang ba'i don// des na gsang sngags zhes su brjod// gsal sngags snying po lung gi don// gnyis su yod pa ma yin te// de nyid nges don rtogs 'dod pas// dngos por gang yang mi gzung zhing// gnyis su 'dzin pa'ang mi bya zhing// de nyid dor bar yong mi bya// chos kun skyob par byed

pa'o// dngos po rnyed pa ma yin te// skyob pa med pa'i chos rnams la// blun po kha cig skyob byed don// skyes bu tha shal gyur bdag/ chos kun spang dang shes bya zhes// skye med mnyam la ma dad par// rmongs pa'i skyon gyis mu cor smra// bus pa gnyis la chags pa ste// gnyis su med pa mi shes so// gang dag tha snyad brjod pa ni// mnyam nyid lhun rdzogs don 'di la// mi 'da' gnyis su dbyer med do// de ni sgyu ma'i yul dang mnyam// zab mo bus pa'i yul min pas// gnyis med brjod bral don 'di la// byis pa gti mug rmongs pa rnams// spros la dga' zhing gnyis su 'dzin// ma rtogs log par rtogs pa yis// dud 'gro rmongs pa'i lus su skye// de 'dra rgyu 'bras kun spangs nas// shin tu yun ring 'khor min par// rang rig mtshan ma med spyod yul// brjod bral tha snyad yongs chad pa// rtsol bral don dam chos nyid de// rtog ge kun las 'das mtshan nyid// 'du byed dang ni don dam bden// gcig dang tha dad bral mtshan nyid// mya ngan 'das de gnas med zhing// chos kun mtshan ma med pa las// rtsa ba mi dmigs bzod gnas shing// tha ma gzugs med snying po med// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi// chos rnams 'od gsal nyid snang grol// zhi zhing mi gnas mya ngan 'das// de la dbung nang gzung du med// shes ldan de ltar rtogs nas grol// chos rnams thams cad dngos med pa// ma lus mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid med// skye ba med cing ma 'gags par// de ltar chos kun rig par bya// thams cad dngos med yi ge med// stong zhing gzod nas dri ma med// chos rnams de ltar gang shes pa// gzhon nu'i lus kyang sangs rgyas yin// ji ltar smig sgyu dri za'i grong// sgyu ma rmi lam ji ltar bur// mtshan ma ngo bo nyid kyis stong// de bzhin chos kun shes par bya// klung dang rol mo dud mo las// rten te brag cha'i skad 'byung yang// sgra de nam yang grub ma myong// chos rnams thams cad de bzhin no// sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sprul pa'i gzugs// skyes pa bud med rta glang sogs// snang yang gtan nas yod ma yin// chos rnams ma lus de bzhin no// ji ltar mtshan mo'i chu zla dag/ dang zhing rnyog bral 'od gsal la yang// gzung yul grub pa de la med// chos kun de dang mtshungs par gsungs// smig rgyu'i chu ni yod mod kyang// rmongs pa'i 'gro ba btung bar 'dod// ji ltar bsnyags pa de ltar med// chos kun de ltar rtogs par gyis// chu shing rlon pa'i sdong bu la// snying po 'dod phyir shun pa phye// phyi nang kun na snying po med// chos rnams kun yang de 'dra'o// de ltar gsang sngags nges pa yis// yang dag nyid kyis yang dag shes// de yi mtha' de rab shes

nas// de la ci yang bshad pa med// gcig shes pas ni thams cad shes// gcig mthong ba yis ma lus mthong// ji snyed rnam pa mang shes kyang// de la dregs pa skye ba med// stong ba rtog pa med pa'i chos// 'di ni mkhas pa'i yul yin te// byis ba rnams kyi spyod yul min// sangs rgyas sras kyi 'jug pa'o// zhi ba mnyam nyid brdal ba'i klong// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa// rgyal sras spyod pa bsam mi khyab// sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyan yin no// 'di ni nor bu chen po ste// gnas ma yin la bstan mi bya// gal te snod min la bstan na// bdud rtsi dug tu 'gyur ba yin// 'di ni las med 'bras bu med// las kyi bsgrub pa yod ma yin// 'jig rten byed pa ma byas te// sus kyang mdzad pa ma yin te// byed pa po zhig yod gyur na// 'di rnams thug pa med par 'gyur// de ltar gyur ba'i nyes pa yis// mthar thug dri ma can du 'gyur// byis pa byed pas rmongs pa dag/ chos rnams gsog tu ma shes te// ma lus mtshan nyid gcig pa la// de la tha dad 'byed bar byed// dngos kun rmi lam lta bu ste// 'dus byas thams cad yang dag min// sgyu ma bzhin du mthong bas ni// de la snying por mi 'dzin te// byang chub btsal du med pa'o// don la tshol ba sha thang chad// sems kyi thog pa rnams kyis ni// bla med byang chub rtogs mi nus// chos nyid ming gis lung bstan te// chos nyid rnams ni byed pa med// rtsa ba med cing gnas med cing// thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do// des na chos rnams thams cad kun// ye nas gnyis med byang chub sems// thig le chen po'i rang bzhin du// ma bcos gcig tu mngon sangs rgyas// 'di ltar 'khrul te snang ba kun// kun tu bzang po'i rol pa yin// sems can khams dang nam mkha'i khams// mngon par byang chub dag pa'i zhing// spyod yul dngos kun ma lus pa// rang byung ye shes rang shar ba'o// 'di ni mngon par sangs rgyas so// bdag nyid chen por gyur pa'o// chos kyi dbyings su sangs rgyas te// de nyid dang du rdzogs pa'o// thams cad du ni sangs rgyas te// che mchog bla med gyur ba'o// kun tu bzang po'i dbye ba med// spang dang dor ba'i rtsol ba med// ma bcos lhun bzhag 'jug pa 'di// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid ces brjod// 'di ni rgyud kyi rgyal po ste// rang bzhin ma bcos ngang du 'brel// 'di ni gzhi zhes brjod pa ste// 'khor 'das ma lus de las byung// 'di ni lam gyi mchog yin te// ma bgrod mnyam pa nyid du grol// 'di ni 'bras bu chen po'i sa// dmigs med dmigs su med par thob// de phyir 'di ni nges don rgyud// rgyal ba kun gyi thugs la gnas// chos rnams tha

dad bya ba med/ khyad par med cing mtshan med par// gang gis mthong zhing thos bdag/ de dag sangs rgyas bstan pa 'dzin// gnyis rtogs dngos po mnyam par grol// gsang sngags nges pa'i don chen de// 'di ni sangs rgyas chos dang ni// dge 'dun rnams kyis bstan pa yin// 'di ni rgyud kyi don mchog ste// lung rnams kun gyi bla ma yin// 'di ni gsang ba'i mdzod yin te// bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs kyi gter// 'di ni sems can kun gyi sems// rnal 'byor dam pa rnams kyi lam// 'di ni byang chub sems rnams kyi// rlabs chen spyod bas 'gro ba'i lam// yang dag nges pa'i lung yin te// bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs klong btol// snang grags dngos po thams cad du kun// ye nas dbyings su gcig pa'o// mdo rgyud rtog pa bsdus ba'i sgron ma lung thams cad kyi rgyal po las/ gsang sngags nges pa don gyi lung bstan pa ste bzhi pa'o rdzogs so//// de nas gzhan yang gnas lugs gzhi// ma bcos ngang du btang snyoms las// rtag tu mnyam par 'jog pa yi// gsal byed sgron ma'i lung 'di bshad// bu gang yang dag gsang ba'i don// thob par 'dod pa spang blang dang// dgag sgrub spros la sogs pa yi// mtha' gnyis po ni mdor bstan te// gnyis su med pa mnyam gnas bya// 'du shes 'di ni spang mnyam du// gang gis 'du shes 'byung ba ni// 'du shes spros la spyod pa ste// shes pa tsam las de mi thar// 'du shes kyi ni kun shes phyir// 'dzin pa yang ni de bstan te// yang dag 'du shes mi 'dzin pa// dben pa'i don du rab tu bstan// gcig tu dben par gang sems pa// nam zhig sems dpa' med par 'gyur// bsam pa dag la mi sems na// bsam pa nyid kyang med par 'gyur// chos kun sgyu ma ltar shes na// shes bzhin dran pas zin pa yis// btang snyoms 'du shes rab gzhag nas// dang po las kyi lam mchog yin// chos rnams 'di dag bsam mi khyab// bsam dang blang bral rang bzhin zhi// de nyid mtshan mar rab shes na// rkang gnyis gtso bo sangs rgyas mthong// de nyid skye 'phor gyur pa na// sems bzhin du ni bsgyur ba med// sems la dbang ni thob pa na// de dag lus ni 'od gsal lo// ting 'dzin mnyam pa med pa yis// shin tu blta dka' phra zhing zab// 'du shes thams cad spangs pa ste// de phyir ting nge 'dzin zhes bya// rtog pa med cing rnam rtog med// gzung ba med cing bstan du med// dmigs med thogs pa med pa ste// de phyir ting nge 'dzin zhes bya// de la nam zhig mnyam gzha ga ste// chos kun la ni rlom sems med// ma yengs pa yis ji bzhin lta// de phyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya// skyon yon rtsol ba

gzhan dag gis// ma bcos sus kyang ma byas par// rang gi ngang gis gsal bzhin na// tha snyad tsam du bsgom zhes bya// skyes shing 'chi bas bsnal 'gyur zhing// sems la skye med 'chi 'pho med// gang gis de ltar gang rig pa// de yi ting 'dzin rnyed mi dka'// stong pa'i chos la bdag bzod bzhin// sems can yang dag mi rtog cing// chos la'ang rtog par mi byed par// 'jig rten na ni de mnyam gzhag/ bsam gtan byed cing bsam mi gnas// de yang rnam par mi sems pa// mnyam gzhag chos rnams rab tu shes// bsam gtan 'du shes ci bde ba// mi mthun po ni dbyer med pas// mtshon rtog ldan pa mi spang ste// de nyid la yang rten mi 'cha'// thob bya mngon du bya ba med// 'di ni rang byung ye shes te// ting nge 'dzin zhes tha snyad brjod// byang chub don du gnyer bas kyang// ting nge 'dzin 'di bsgom par bya// gang gis ting 'dzin 'di thob pa// de ni skye bo'i sa lam 'phags// gang gis ting 'dzin lam bsgoms pa'i// bsod nams phung po de la ni// tshad gzung yod pa ma yin no// yon tan dpag med de dag ni// nam zhig nyon mongs bsal gyur nas// de tshe rdzu 'phrul de dag thob// nyon mongs bsal yang mi zhi zhing// dag cing dang ba 'od gsal ba// mi 'khrugs 'dus ma byas pa ni// rig pa 'dzin pa'i spyod yul lo// zad mi shes shing nye bar gnas// lhun gyis grub cing bstan du med// rnyog pa med pa yang dag mtha'/ sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod lul lo// ting nge 'dzin gyi don rig nas/ 'jig rten chos kyis ma gos pa// de ni de la mi chags te// lus ni thegs pa med par yang// sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro bar byed// nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin// de dag rnyed par mi 'gyur te// de 'dra'i rang bzhin byang chub de// byang chub sems dpas rtogs par 'gyur// su dag chos kyi skur ltaja ba// de dag gis ni 'dren par mthong// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// de ni sangs rgyas mthong ba'o// dpa' bo chen po chos kyi sku// sku ni chos lngas skyes pa ste// gzugs kyi sku ni nam du yang// rgyal bas bzhag pa yod ma yin// de ltar mnyam nyid khang chen du// rig pa mnyam nyid cher bzhag pas// goms shing gdeng dang ldan pa yis// sems la dbang thob gyur pa na// g.yo dang mi g.yo snang ba med// byang chub sems kyi don mthar thug/ gang zhig rnam par mi rtog don// bstan du med cing brjod bral ba// rang gi blo yis mthong zhe na// de ni nyams myong cha yin phyir// zag pa'am bzung ba dang bcas pas// de ni bden pa'i don mthong min// de phyir gsang ba'i don mtha' la// bden pa nyid kyang mthong med na// brdzun pa nyid kyang ga la

mthong// mthong bral lam la mthong zhes brjod// 'di la mthong dang mthong bya med// de phyir yul gyi mthong zhen med// des na chags dang ldan pa med// dngos por snang yang rdos mi snang// bral dang gnas pa'i shes pa gang// blo yi mdun na mi gnas pa// gdeng chen rnyed pa drod yin no// gdeng chen thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas// spyod pa'ang de bzhin gnyis med par// 'gag med stobs kyis spyad bya ste// mkha' la sgyu ma'i gar mkhan bzhin// 'di la spang bya yod ma yin// mi blang pa yang gang yang med// 'di la mi spyad gang yang med// mi shes pa yang yod ma yin// mi sgrub pa yang med pa ste// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang// nga rgyal phrag dog nyon mongs lnga// thabs kyis zin dang rang bzhin shes// nyon mongs chen po mi spang ste// de bas spang bar bya ba med// de ma rtogs pas bdag ltar bcings// rgyal bas dgongs pa'i tshig la brten// bag med pas ni nyon mongs spyod// 'gro ba drug tu 'khyam par 'gyur// byang chub sems kyi khu ba ni// dkar dmar gnyis dang bshang dang gci// sha chen por ni gyur pa rnams// rigs lnga ye shes lnga rang bzhin// 'phags pa mchod dang dbang bskur dang// bdud rtsi myed dang zlog pa'i phyir// chos rnams mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs kyis// dang du blang bar bya ba yin// tshig tsam la brten bag med spyod// mi dge ba yi 'bras bur 'gyur// sbyor sgrol ma byin len dang brdzun// ngag brlang po ste mi dge'i chos// mthun 'jug 'tsham pa'i spyod pa ste// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i thabs chen yin// sgra rjes 'brangs nas rang dgar spyod// thur du kha ltas dmyal bar ltung// gzugs tshor 'du shes 'du byed dang// rnam par shes te phung po lnga// zag pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyi// sku lnga ye shes lngar shar bas// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// mi shes pa ni yod ma yin// thams cad sku dang ye shes lngar// bsgrub par bya ba dmigs pa ste// 'dis ni mi bsgrub yong min te// de nas kun gyis bsgrub cig pa'o// de nyid rtog pa ci dgar spyod// rnam grol sgyu ma'i tshul bstan pa'o// de nyid gsal dang 'grib dang med pas// dur khrod gsang ba gcan gzan gnas// lha min yi dwags lam la sogs// 'jigs dang ya nga'i gnas rnams su// dogs pa med par rab tu rgyu// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshogs nang du// lha mo rnams dang mnyam du rol// 'di ni brtul zhugs spyod pa ste// sngags kyi spyad mchog bla na med// skad cig nyid la 'bras bu ster// 'di la bsrung ba'i tshul khrims med// ngo tsha'i rnam rtog yod ma yin// gang zhig tshul khrims ldan par rtog/ gnyis 'dzin tshul khrims ngan par gsungs// tshul khrims mi ldan gang rtog

pa// gnyis su med pa'i tshul khrims mchog/ 'di 'dra'i gsang don mi shes pas// sdig pa 'ba' zhig dge ba med// 'khor ba'i sa bon rnam par shes// sa bon yod na 'bras bu 'byung// rtsig pa yod na ri mo bzhin// yongs su shes na 'gag par 'gyur// rang gi sems ni ma mthong bas// lta ba'i 'dra bar 'jug par 'gyur// nga rgyal khangs pa 'khrul rjes rtog/ sred len ma rig mdud pas bcings// nyin mtshan 'dod pa'i yon tan sems// de dag lhas dang grong khyer rgyu// sems can yongs su grol zhes smra// 'gro la snying brtse bdag la yod// kun la phan sems de bzhin te// zhe sdang 'dod chags sred sems kyis// chos nyid 'tsho ba'i tshul can brjod// 'tsho dang snying rje 'dus pa ni// nam yang yod pa ma yin no// des na de dag log pa'i phyir// sna tshogs thabs kyis 'dul ba'i thabs// thog ma med nas 'khor ba na// byis pa dngos la zhen pa yi// gsang ba'i don gyi snod min la// byams pa'i thugs rjes bzung nas kyang// shing lo'i gzugs kyis byis pa rnams// brid nas 'dzin pa rnam par bzlog/ dngos po'i don gyis bzung rnams la// 'khor ba'i rang bzhin brjod pa yis// skye ba chen pos rab bskul nas// dam pa'i don la gzud par bya// gsum la sogs pa skyabs 'gro zhing// byang chub sems kyi rnam par sbyin// pha rol phyin drug spyod pa la// gsang mchog gzhung du dbang bskur te// yongs su rdzogs shing spro ba la// bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan// rtsa dang rlung dang byang chub sems// mi shigs thig le'i don rtogs nas// gsang chen mnyam pa chen po yi// mtha' las bkrol te klong du bskyal// 'di ni 'jig rten 'das pa yi// dngos grub mchog gi bsnyen pa ste// skyes mchog chos kyi rgyal po che// rgyal ba'i rgyal tshab rnams la bshad// 'di ni lung gi lung chen te// zab pa'i 'jug pa bla na med// gsang ba las kyang ches gsang ste// gsang ba chen po'i mchog gyur ba'o// mtha' yas mngon par bar mthong ba ste// mthar thug gnas su phyin pa'o// 'di yis phyi nang thams cad du// snang grags srid dang zhi ba kun// mnyam grol chen po'i klong nang du// thams cad ma lus brdar sha bcad// de ltar rgyal ba ma lus pa'i// dgongs rgyud gcig tu bsdus pa ni// lung mchog 'di ste dus gsum gyi// rgyal bas sems can don 'dus phyir// mdo dang rgyud dang rtog pa las// yang dang yang du bstan te gsungs// rdo rje sems dpa' bla med pa// rdo rje chos ni rgyal po ste// rigs 'dzin mi yi thod pa can// gtso chen byang chub sems dpa' yis// rgyal pa rnams la yang yang thos// snyigs dus 'gro la phan pa'i phyir// rgyud las lung du

phyung 'di// mkha' 'gro rnams la brgyud nas ni// ma 'ongs rnal 'byor skal ldan gyi// thugs kyi dkyil du gsung don rnams// ma nor rgyud du gsal bar 'gyur// mdo rgyud rtog pa bsdus pa'i sgron ma lung thams cad kyi rgyal po las/ gsal bar byed pa sgron ma'i lung bstan pa ste lnga pa'o rdzogs so//// bcom ldan 'das bde ba gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i thugs rje dpyang thag gi gnas/ mdzad pa lha'i cho 'phrul 'phrin las mthar phyin pa'i bsgrub pa/ gsang sngags nges pa'i don gsal bar byed pa'i sgron ma/ mdo rgyud kyi rtog pa bsdud pa lung thams cad kyi rgyal po chen po rdzogs so//// rgya gar gyi mkhan po slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba bai ro tsa na bdag gis bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgyal po'i bla dpe'o// gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya'o////
rgya gar skad du/ gu h+ya tsan+d+ra shri/ ka li tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud/ dpal 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid/ 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po che ba kun gyis bdag nyid/ zab mo'i gsung brjod du med pa'i/ sgra skad sna tshogs su gsung pa/ dran rtogs thams cad ye nas lhun gyis grub pa'i dgongs pa las mi g.yeng ba'i sar// rdo rje'i ngang tshul brten pa'i bdag nyid kyis/ snang ba'i ngang ma bcos pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'i dbyings nas/ thams cad gsal ba'i 'od kyi nyi ma lta bu'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ srid pa'i bags ma lus par bsregs pa mdzad pa'i 'ong yang sang ba ste/ 'og min gyi gnas/ dbus mtha' med pa'i gzhal yas khang/ ye shes rin po che dur khrod kyi rgyu las byung ba/ 'jig rten drug gis phyogs bcu thams cad dur khrod gdal ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin/ khrag gi rgya mtsho rba klong 'khrug pa'i klong nas/ keng rus chen po'i ri rab steng du/ rdo rje me dpung klong du 'khyil ba'i steng// 'og rdo rje rgya gram mig mangs ris su bris pas tams pa ma rungs pa// srin po bsgral ba'i sa zhes bya/ srog chags bsad pa'i khrag rjes dang/

g.yul bgos pa yi mkhar nyil dang/ mang po bsad pa'i phung sa dang// brag dang srin po 'dus pa 'dra// ri ni thal phung nyil ba 'dra// lung pa me yis bsregs pa 'dra// rtsi shing rkang thang 'bros pa 'dra// sgo nga mi ro sbas pa 'dra// de ni 'jam dpal drag po'i gnas// da lta bu yi gzhung mthun du// yun du bsrings na gdon mi za// dam tshig ma nyams ting 'dzin gdeng// de dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// mtshams bcad byin brlabs gtor ma sbyin// zhag grangs 'di tsam bya ba nas// drag po'i las 'di ma grub par// gnas 'dir rnal 'byor sgrub pa pos// gtor ma byin pa 'di long la// ma grub bar du gzhan du dengs// gtor ma btang la bsgo tshigs bsgrags// de nas gzhung du maN+Dal brtsigs// dam rdzas chag chag tshul du gdab// tshon rtsi byin brlabs dgye ba tsam// 'jam dpal pho brang gang yin bri// lha dgod spyan drangs pU dza dbul// drag po gnas kyi rim pa ni// man ngag gi tan+t+ra zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// gnas kyi rim pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// da ni bsgral ba'i dmigs bstan te// bsgral ba'i dmigs ni bdun du gsungs// dam las nyams dang srog las nyams// don las nyams dang bka' las nyams// mtshan las nyams dang las kyi nyams// 'dod pa log pas nyams pa'o// de dag so so'i mtshan nyid ni// srog las nyams pa mkhan po gsod// slob bu gsod cing ngan rme byed// dam las nyams pa slob ma slu// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun gcod pa// gsang ba'i man ngag gzhan du spel// bka' las nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// dam la btags na sku mtshang 'bru// bsgrub la bsgrun na ya kha 'dogs// man ngag bstan na skur pa 'debs// bden par bstan na log par srid// don rtogs bstan na log pa 'dzin// don la nyams pa bya ba de// bya ru mi rung sna tshogs byed// rdzas dang lag cha mngon du 'dzin// stan 'gan sbyor sgrol dngos su spyod// lta ba ting 'dzin rgyab tu bor// spyod pa rlang po mngon du 'byin// khro gtum nga rgyal rang la gtong// don gyi man ngag log par go/ phyin ci log gi don la mkhas// bka' gzhu bor nas rtsom par byed// log par spyod pa kha dag yod// las kyis nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// bsgrub pa las kyi blor 'ongs pa// sngon chad mkhan mkhon 'ong med par// dpung pa bsnyems nas klan ka 'tshol// brgal ba med par rang la rgol// 'phrogs sa med par bdag la phrogs// bdag nyes ma byas gnod pa 'dzugs// bdag la mthu rtsal 'ded pa de// las kyi nyams pa bya ba yin// gzhan yang las kyis nyams pa ni// gal mi che bar ya ga 'dogs// phan rgyu med par bdag la 'tshe// 'ong rgyu med par

sgrub para'ong// mtshan mas nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// chos la phyogs char bzung bas nyams// lta ba sgro skur btab pas nyams// mtshan ma can gyi chos bzung nas// lha srin bran du ngas 'khol lo// mthu 'gran byed pa su yod kyang// nga yi nyams su dpal chen byung// zer ba mtshan mas nyams pa ste// 'dod pa nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// shes pa med par chos nyan zer// la 'ur mthu che rtsal 'dod pa// spyod pa rlang po mi mgo thogs// ral bsigs dmar gtor glo la 'dogs// zhing lpags phrag bkal sgro nag khur// gzhung bor bya ru mi rung sna tshogs// khrag gis gdong byugs tho bor byed// gzhung bor de yi rkang 'dren byas// phur pa btags kyang sngags pa 'joms// dug tu song yang lto ru za// thob tu 'dod na dpe kun byed// zas su bsgrub pa'i longs spyod za// 'di dag 'dod pas nyams pa ste// de dag bsgral na rnal 'byor btsun// bstan pa gnyan la bar chad nyung// 'di dag myur du ma bsgral na// mtho ris 'grib la dmyal khams 'phel// rnal 'byor bsgrub la bar chad byed// gsang sngags thag pa'i mthu dpung dar// dngos po rang du bsgral na btsun// legs pa'i yon tan brjod pa las// ting 'dzin lta ba ldan par bsgral// de bsgral byang chub myur du thob// man ngag gi tan tra la// zla gsang nag po'i bsgral ba'i dmigs bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// da ni ston pa la sdud pa pos zhus pa/ ston pa lags/ gang bsgral/ gang du bsgral/ ji ltar bsgral/ gang gis bsgral/ ci'i phyir bsgral/ bsgral bas 'bras bu gang thob/ sa dang lam ni gang thob bshad du gsol// zhes gsol ba btab bo// ston pas gsan te/ nyon cig 'jam dpal rnon po khyod// nga yis bsgral ba'i don bshad kyi// gang bsgral nyams pa bdun po bsgral// gang du bsgral ba lho nub mtshams su bsgral// ji ltar bsgral na thabs kyis bcings pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rigs drug sa bon 'bru drug po// gnas pa'i yi ge drug bkod de// kha yi myug ma shes par bya// bdag gi khong du tshur 'dus te// sgrib pa rnam gsum sbyang bya ste// shel sgong ltar byas byas dag par te bsgral bar bya// gang gis bsgral na las kyi gshin rjes bsgral// rang gis khrag 'thung sha rus zos// nag la ring pa gsus khyim che// thod pa theng khrol lha ru bsgom// dkyil 'khor dkyil du dgod par bya'o// de nas rdzas de sbyin sreg bya// bros sman smon lam rgyas par gdab// ci'i phyir bsgral na nyams pa de rnams bsgral ba'i phyir// bsgral bas 'bras bu bla med thob// sa dang lam rim gang non na// sa ni skye shi med pa'i sa// lam ni mthar thug bar chad med// ces gsungs so// yang zhus pa// shes

pa'i spar lugs ji ltar lags// zhes zhus pas/ yang ston pas gsungs pa// nyon cig 'jam dpal rnon po khyod// rang bzhin dbyings su sbyor ba yin// yaM las rlung bskyad shes pa bskyod// phaT kyis skye med gnas su 'phangs// 'phen tshul rdo rje rtse sems tshul// skye shi med pa'i sa dang thob// gsungs so// kha yi tsit+ti'i pho brang dbul// thod tshal rus pa nang khrol rnams// dbang po rnam shes dal du dgod// lha ru bskyed la bsgrub pa bya// lhag lhog med la sbyin sreg bya// man ngag gi tan tra zla gsang nag po'i tan tra las// bsgral ba dang sbyor ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// da ni bsrung ba mtshams kyi las bshad par bya'o ste/ yang zhus pa/ 'khor ba rtogs pas bcings pa la// bar du gcod pa'i bdud dang bgegs// 'di dag bsrung rim ji ltar bgyi/ zhes zhus pas// ston pa nyid dregs pa can 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de ru sad dang/ nyon cig 'khor rnams dang bar nyon// mtshams zhes bya ba'i rnam grangs ni// spyi ru bsdus pa rnam gsum ste// dang po phyi mtshams gsang bar bsdu// bar du gsang mtshams nang du gdon// tha mar nang 'thams phyi ru gdon// lta ba ting 'dzin/ mu tra dang// sngags dang/ rdzas dang/ lag cha dang/ tshig dang mtshang ngam gtum tshig gis// log par rtogs pa mtshams bcad do// mtshams kyi dgongs pa 'di ltar bshad// rang nyid khro bo gshin rje gshed// dbang bskur byin brlabs nga rgyal skyed// rang sems rdo rjer bcas nas ni// dug lnga me ri rtogs par bzlog/ thugs khar rdo rje rgya gram dgod// ljags la rdo rje zla tshes bsam// smin mtshams rdo rje 'od du 'phro// spyi gtsug rdo rje me lnga 'bar// ma 'dres so so gsal bar gnas// smin mtshams rang rang gnas su bsdu// stong gsum ril gyis me yis khengs// bgegs zhes bya ba ming yang med// bsgrags pa'i gtum tshig 'di lta ste// hUM/ rdo rje ri rab lhun po'i rtse brgyad nas// 'bar ba'i lha brgyad
