dbang chen bka' stengs na// shin tu mi bzad gtum chen ha la'i gzugs// gshin rje ma trang ro yi dbyug pa 'phyar// gang la ci 'dul tsit+ti'i 'phreng ba bsnams// 'phra men brgya khri mang po'i tshogs kyis bskor// bskal pa'i me ri smug nag 'bar bas gtams pa la// me yi 'khor lo 'bar ba la// rdo rje rgya gram 'bar ba'i me gtor bas// steng gi me lce 'bar ba 'og tu 'phro// me ri dgon pa dag gis phyogs na// me yi dam tshig gang lags gang mi lags// dur khrod mtshan mo'i me na smug cing gdang// zhe sdang 'joms pa'i me ni sngo nag 'bar// nga rgyal 'joms pa'i me ni ser nag 'bar// 'dod chags 'joms pa'i me ni dmar nag 'bar// phrag dog

'joms pa'i me ni ljang nag 'bar// gti mug 'joms pa'i me ni smug nag 'bar// dbang drag gdug rtsub me ni kham nag 'bar// dur khrod 'bar ba me yi mtshams las gang 'da' ba// rdul tshub phra mo bzhin du brlag par bya'o// sngags/ phaT/ raM/ he raM/ dz+wa la raM/ trag kha raM/ hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba// yang gsang rmad du byung ba'i dkyil 'khor du// gsang sngags nyan zhing lta ba mi dbang pas// thos shing mtho ba'i skal dang mi ldan pas// bgegs dang log 'dren ma 'dug gnas su dengs// phaT raM dz+wa la raM hUM dang// drag po thal mo lan gsum gdab// thams cad skrag na brgyal bar 'gyur// man ngag gi tan tra zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// mtshams gcad pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// da ni zhi khro'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste// sa gzhi shin tu nyams dga' bar// sa yi las rnams gzhung du bsnyeg/ phyi skongs sgrib pa sbyang ba dang// tshogs bsags don du 'bum bshags bya// gser skyems gtang la dam bdar bya// khrus dang sa gsang gzhung du bsnyeg/ phyi gtor gtang la stegs pu brtsig/ tshad ni rang khru rgyal khru do// dpangs su khru gang brtsig par bya// dang la zhi ba'i maN+Dal bzhi ru gsungs// rdo rje rtsibs bzhi bya ba dang// rin chen 'dab bzhir bya ba 'am// yang na pad+ma 'dab bzhi pa// yang na rgya khram rtsibs bzhi par// byas te rdul tshon thig chog bya// rdul tshon dbus mthing rigs dang bstun// sgo rtsegs bya 'am rkyang pa'o// sgo ba lha mo bzhi srung ngo// dbus su 'jam dpal sems dpal 'o// rtsibs la dgod pa'i yig 'bru ste// de nas lhar bskyed spro bsdu bya// zhe sdang 'jam dpal sku mdog dkar// nga rgyal 'jam dpal sku mdog ser// 'dod chags 'jam dpal sku mdog dmar// phrag dog 'jam dpal sku mdog ljang// lha dgu pa ru rab tu grags// sngags dang phyag rgya bshad bya ba// 'jam dpal sku mdog dkar po ste// phyag rgya ting 'dzin glegs bam 'dzin// sngags ni panyapa de ros bskyed// byin rlabs dbang bskur ye shes dgug/ zhe sdang 'jam dpal bud dung ste// nga rgyal 'jam dpal rdor dril bsnams// 'dod chags 'jam dpal ut+pal 'dzin// phrag dog 'jam dpal tri shul 'dzin// sgro ma dzaHhUM ba ho// sngags ni pany+tsa de ro d+ha gi/ hUM d+h+rig swAhA// traM d+h+rig swAhA// hri d+h+rig swAhA// ha d+h+rig swAhA/ dza d+h+rig swAhA// hUM d+h+rig/ baM d+h+rig/ ho badzra d+h+rig/ pU tsa rim pas dbul bar bya// las kyi lhag ma gzhung du bsnyag/ man ngag gi tan tra las// zla gsang nag po'i zhi ba'i lha bshad pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// da ni zhi bas mi 'dul ba'i dregs pa rnams drag pos gdul bar bstan te// nyon cig 'khor

tshogs ma lus kun// 'gro ba'i don du dkyil 'khor ni// bsnyen bsgrub drag po'i maN+Dal te// lha lnga pa ni bsnyen pa'i dus// sgo rkyang dag tu gsungs pa'o// bsgrub dus dkyil 'khor bcu bdun pa'o// sgo brtsegs dag tu gsungs pa'o// drag po lcags mkhar sgom med pa'o// tha ma lcags ris bskor ba ste// lha rabs sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// rdul tshon dag la skyon pa ste// 'khor lo bskyon te bsad pa'o// 'og skor steng du gcod pa ni// dper na chu yi 'khor lo 'dra// mo 'khor dag tu shes par bya// zung bzhi gdug pa'i ka ba bzhi// mda' gang tshad du bya ba'o// sked pa rdo rje gdung bzhi bri// steng du pho 'khor dbub bar bya// stong 'khor 'og tu gcod pa'o// dper na mtshon cha'i 'khor lo 'dra// ka bzhi'i rtse mor dar nag dbub// dar nag stong du ming yang gdags// de ni drag po'i las sbyor ro// rdul tshon bri ba rigs dang mthun// gshin rje'i grong khyer dag tu bshad// las kyi btson rar tshud pa'o// zla gsang man ngag gi tan tra las// khro bo bsnyen bsgrub shan dbye ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// da ni ji ltar yin pa dang// mu tra'i rim pa 'byung ba ste// sku bskyed mi 'gyur rtsa ba'i sngags// bcu bdun sngags kyi rgyal po ste// gsang ba srog gi snying po bshad// oM a kro te ka ya man ta ka ha na ma tha bany+dzu hUM phaT// sku mdog mthing nag zhal gsum phyag drug go/ g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// ma he gdan dang byi bcings pa// phyag mtshan thod pa 'khor lo ral gri dang// tho ba ri rab phur bu bsnams// skye 'gro yum dang gnyis med 'khril// gtso bo yab yum bshad pa'o// 'khor gyi sku mdog phyag mtshan dang// mtshan bstan mu tra'i skabs su bstan// sngags rnams thugs nas bton pa 'di'o// gdan du gyur pa'i rig sngags ni// ru tra ti ra baM/ rag sha sti ra baM/ ya ma sdi raH ma he maN+Da la hUM// ma sU r+ya maN+Dal hUM// a tsaN+d+ra maN+Da la hUM// paM pad+ma maN+Dal la hUM// gdan gyi sngags su gsungs pa'o// rtsa ba'i sngags rnams gsungs pa ni// yum gyi/ oM AHhUM/ pe ta li rag sha ma na hUM phaT/ oM trig trig ser ser ku lu mi khu hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta bA ka sid+hi aM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta sid+ha hUM// ya ma rA dza sa to me ya// ya me to ru na yo ta ya// ya ta yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ yak+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya// oM hri ku ru dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ oM e hri kri ya hUM phaT/ oM A r+ya d+ha rma hUM phaT/ oM ma hA pa ta hUM phaT/ oM sarba ting ha hUM phaT/ oM sarba de ba hUM phaT/ oM a sa mi pany+tsa hUM phaT/ oM hri sti baM hUM phaT/ oM raM dza la ni hUM phaT/ oM bu d+ha ku+u lan he he ho ho a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM maM/ oM badzra ku lan he he ho ho a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM maM/ oM rat+na ku lan he he ho ho a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM maM/ oM pad+ma ku lan he he ho ho a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM

maM/ oM karma ku lan he he ho ho a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM maM/ badzra ku lan/ rat+na ku lan/ pad+ma ku lan/ karma ku lan// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// lha bskyed pa'i sngags dang dbang bskur byin brlabs kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//// yang rdo rje rnon pos gsol ba// thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'jam dpal khyod// ma rtogs pa yi sems can la// ting 'dzin maN+Dal bskyed pa dang// lha bskyed ting 'dzin dgongs pa rnams// khyed kyis 'khor la bshad du gsol// bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'jam dpal rnon po pa// maN+Dal brtsig pa 'di lta ste// rtogs pa dag la mi dgos te// ma rtogs pa la ngas bshad kyis// thugs las bton te 'bru drug po// dug lnga rtog pa bzlog pa'i phyir// e yaM raM khaM suM kaM b+h+ruM bton te// dbang chen gzhal yas bskyed pa'o// bdud bzhi gdan du bting pa'o// lha yi ting 'dzin bstan pa'o// mi shig rdo rje gar gyi bdag/ rdo rje gsang ba'i gshin rje bdag/ 'phrin las rgyal po grub po'i las// yang dag nges par 'di bstan no// rtogs med spros bral chos kyi dbyings// mi dmigs mkha' mnyam byang chub sems// dngos po mtshan mar mi dmigs pas// chos nyid ngang du dbyer med mnyam// oM ma hA shu n+ya ta dz+nyA na sa ma ti hUM// chu zla'i dkyil 'khor ji bzhin du// sgyu ma'i sems kyang de dang 'dra// mkha' la 'ja' tshon snang ba yang// nam mkha'i ngang du ro gcig mnyam// d+harma d+hA du sa ma ti hUM// yod de yod pa ma yin te// gzugs dang kha dog yul las 'das// med de med pa ma yin te// stong pa nyid las cho 'phrul 'byung// dz+nyA na sa ma ti hUM/ yang gsol pa/ 'jig rten zhes pa ji ltar sbyang// gzhal yas bdag gis ma rtogs pas// gsal gdab bskyed lugs ji ltar lags// zhes zhus so// yang bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rnon po khyod rnams nyon// zhen pa raM yaM khaM gis sbyang// gzhal yas dbang chen bskyed pa ni// rtsa sngags lnga ru rab tu grags// rkyen du sngags 'di gdon par bya// e a ga ni maN+Dal// yaM karma rag sha hUM/ raM dz+wa la maN+Dal hUM// raM rak+ta dz+wa la maN+Dal hUM// su badzra sti ta maN+Dal hUM// keng ni ri ti dz+wa la ni hUM// zhe sdang 'bar ba'i nam mkha' la// phrag dog 'bar ba'i rlung nag 'khrigs// 'dod chags 'bar ba'i me chur chags// gti mug 'bar ba'i sa gzhir chags// nga rgyal 'bar ba'i keng rus brtsegs// yang gsol pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ston pa khyod// bdag cag ma rtogs ma gsal bas// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar 'tshal/ yang bka' stsal pa/ dur khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yang khang// ye shes 'bar ba'i gnas chen po// mtha' dang dbus med nam mkha'i dbyings// phyi dang nang med chos nyid dang// b+h+ruM bi sha bi

shud d+hi haM/ 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi sgo bzhi ldan// mu khyud gru 'degs lcags rir bcas// sbrul gyi rgya graM mtha' bskor te// rdo rje rgya graM thod 'phreng mdzes// dz+nyA na tsakra maN+Dal hUM/ yang gsol ba// gdan du gding ba ma 'tshal na// nyi ma'i 'dings sam rkyang pa lags// bka' stsal pa// bdud dang mu stegs thams cad dang// gnod sbyin srid po gdan du bting// gshin rje pho mo khyo zhugs te// ma he glang chen brdzis nas bzhugs// steng du ru tra sbags te bting// de stengs lha rnams dgod par bya// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// ting nge 'dzin gyi dam bskyed pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// rnon pos yang zhus ba// ston pa thams cad mkhyen pa po// pU tsa rim pa ji ltar dbul// bkal stsal pa/ mchod pa phyi nang gsang ba gsum// bka' gzhung mthun pas ma gsungs so// mchod pa dbul bar dam yang bca'// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor nas// 'jam dpal gsang ba'i maN+Dal 'dir// bdag dang gnyis med bzhugs su gsol// smug chen smug chung byi la'i gcin// sha chen mar khu sbrang rtsi dang// khrag dang 'o ma thal chen dang// sha snang snying sna 'byor tshad dbul// chas gos nag po thod sngon bcings// dpral bar me long rgya long gdags// be shing bzang po seng ldeng gi/ 'khar ba 'dom tshad rtag tu bcang// rang nyid khro bo nyid du bsgom// rag sha bgrang zhing bgrod dkar 'gro/ sdigs mdzub sgreng zhing snying po bzlas// mi dang phrad na lam mi gzur// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// pU tsa dang spyod lam bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// yang zhus pa/ ston pa thams cad mkhyen pa khyod// bdag cag ma rtog blo ngan na// las kyi them yig bshad du gsol// gsungs pas// nyon cig 'khor rnams dad par gyis// las kyi them yig ji ltar bshad// zla gsang nag po'i tan tra 'dir// mi bskyed mi rung lha gsum ste// zhi ba'i dus su 'jam dpal nyid// drag po'i dus su gshin rje gshed// sprul pa'i dus su+u ma ru rtse// mi bsgom mi rung lha gsum la// sbyor ba'i yum ni pe ta li// sgrom yum e ka dza ti ma/ sbrul pa'i yum ni re ma ti// rgyun du gdon pa'i sngags gsum yod// sku yi sngags ni a kro gdon// gsung gi sngags ni many+dzU gdon// thugs kyi sngags ni hriSh+ta gdon// mi bcang du mi rung ba'i rdzas gsum yod// ut+pal ral gri mu tra dang// dbyug tho bsdigs pa'i mu tra dang// sdigs mdzub brdeg pa'i mu tra'o// dam tshig las ngan phyag rgya che// gzhung du gsum du dgod pa'o// mi btang mi rung pho nya gsum// rtel pa ral pa tshar dgu dmigs pa gsum// dbugs len bla dgu skos len gsum// mi dag mi rung phyag brnyan gsum// ya ba sti

bsi lha snyen 'debs// a ba glang mgo snying du 'dzud// mig dmar gyis ni srog rtsa gcod// mi bkol du mi rung bran gsum ste// gshin rje dung gi bya rgod mgo/ lcags kyi spyang mo seng ge'i mgo/ bse yi kang ka bya glang mgo/ mi mchod mi rung dam rdzas gsum// bsgrub dus me mar tshil chen rgyun mi gcad// bsnyen pa'i dus su gsur chen gtang// drag po'i dus su sha chen rgyun mi gcad// mi srung mi ring dam tshig gsum// bsgrub ba'i dus su phyag mi btsal// lam mi gzung ba thug phrad bya// gtam dang tshig gi bar mi gcad// bsnyen pa'i dus su bzlas thabs gsum// bsnyen dus bzlas thabs 'bum du gdon// las sgrub dus su khri khri gdon// rgyun du nar mar lcogs tshad gdon// bar du chad na don mi 'grub// 'jug dus gsum dang gdon dus gsum// ya man ta ka nya la 'jug/ 'khor gyi 'chi bdag dgu la 'jug/ srid pa'i ma mo bcu la 'jug/ dgu dang bcu dang nyi shu gdon// mnan sa gsum dang bsrung sa gsum// dur khrod rgya gram lam 'og gam// tsha tsha rab gnas byas pa 'am// them 'og gnyan sar gnan par bya// zla gsang nag po'i tan tra las// las kyi them yig gi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// yang gsungs pa/ sbyan drangs phyag 'tshal bshad par bya// nyon cig 'khor tshogs dad par gyis// rtogs pa'i blo la drang mi dgos// ma rtogs pa la spyan drangs 'tshal// 'phags pa'i rgyal po khro rgyal gshin rje gshed// chos sku byang chub sems kyi byin brlabs las// byams dang snying rje thugs kyis bzhengs nas kyang// bdag nyid khro bo 'bar ba'i sku ston pa// tshangs pa brgya byin lha chen drag po rnams// gnyis med byang chub sems kyis bsgral bar mdzod// thugs rje chen po'i dbang gis gshegs su gsol// oM hriHSh+ti ya hUM dza/ 'phags pa'i rgyal po khro rgyal gshin rje gshed// nye ring 'joms par mdzad pa'i gshin rje gshed// thams cad rlag par mdzad pa'i gshin rje gshed// ma he'i stengs na brkyang bskum bzhugs// rdo rje zhags pa nyid kyis bcings nas ni// las kyi dbyug pa dag gis rdul du rlog/ bdag dang mtha' yas sems can don slad du// rang bzhin grub pa'i gnas nas sbyan 'dren gyis// thugs rje chen po'i dbang gis gshegs su gsol// hUM/ gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// ya man ta ka yab yum gshegs su gsol// zhe sdang me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// ya ma rA dza yab yum gshegs su gsol// nga rgyal brag ltar gtams pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// myos byed 'bar ba yab yum gshegs su gsol// 'dod chags chu ltar 'khrugs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// ar+ya ma ru yab yum

gshegs su gsol// phrag dog rlung ltar 'tshub pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// ral pa tshar dgu yab yum gshegs su gsol// ru tra pho mo bsnol ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// bdud 'joms yab yum gshegs su gsol// dri za pho mo yab yum gshegs su gsol// kong rtse brag gyon yab yum gshegs su gsol// me lha pho mo yab yum gshegs su gsol// a ba glang mgo yab yum gshegs su gsol// grub bum pho mo gshegs su gsol// yab ti yab yum gshegs su gsol// srin po pho mo yab yum gshegs su gsol// phye sangs yab yum gshegs su gsol// klu brgya pho mo yab yum gshegs su gsol// dmigs pa yab yum gshegs su gsol// rlung lha pho mo gshegs su gsol// rtel pa yab yum gshegs su gsol// gnod sbyin pho mo gshegs su gsol// lha mchog pho mo gshegs su gsol// dbang ldan pho mo gshegs su gsol// chos kyi= sa bdag= mig dmar=/ g.yas pa gsum na tri shul te// na mo bud d+ha ya/ d+ha rma saM g+ha te b+h+ye/ bi ri ya/ a gats+tsha ya/ hUM dza/ zla gsang nag po'i tan+t+ra las// spyan drangs pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// yang zhus pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ston pa lags// phyag rgya mchod pa ji ltar lags// zhes zhus pas// bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig/ mnyes pa phyag rgya'i mchod pa 'di// ngag tu brjod pa thams cad snying po yin// bsgul bskyod thams cad phyag rgya yin// spyod yul thams cad dkyil 'khor yin// de ltar rtogs na 'di mi dgos// ma rtogs pa la 'di dgos pa// phyag rgya bcas dang snying po bzlas// drang don dag tu 'di skad gsungs// gshin rje nag po'i rgyud dag las// dbus kyi gshin rje'i phyag rgya ni// zhal gsum phyag drug sku mdog mthing// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// g.yas pa gsum na bsnams pa ni// 'khor lo ral gri tho pa bsnams// g.yon pa gsum na bsnams pa ni// thod pa sdigs mdzub phur pa bsnams// sku la 'khril ba'i yum rnams ni// g.yas na e ka dza ti ma// g.yon na nag mo pe ta li// g.yas pa gnyis ni gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa rak+ta gtso la stobs// yab yum gnyis su med pa bsnams// brda dang gar gyi mchod pa bzhes// ya ma rA dza'i phyag rgya ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog smug/ g.yas na ma traM ro dbyugs phyar// g.yon pa srid pa'i 'khor lo bskor// myos byed 'bar ba'i phyag rgya ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ser// g.yas pa kha TAM g.yon 'khor lo// Ar+ya ma ru'i phyag rgya ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dmar// g.yas pa ma TAM g.yon 'khor lo// ral pa tshar dgu'i phyag rgya ni// zhal gcig phyag

gnyis sku mdog ljang// g.yas na ma TAM g.yon 'khor lo// khro mo yum gyi phyag rgya ni// sku mdog so so'i gtso dang mthun// g.yas pa rnams ni gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa rak+ta gtso la stob// phyag rgya gar gyi pU tsa 'di// dkyil 'khor le tshe'i phyi rol na// ya man ta ka yab yum la// 'khor gyi gshin rjes bskor ba ni// steng gi bdud 'joms phyag rgya ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog nag/ g.yas pa'i phyag na be con bsnams// g.yon pa srid pa'i 'khor lo skor// kong rtse brag gyon phyag rgya ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar// g.yas kyi phyag na brag kyang bsnams// g.yon pa srid pa'i 'khor lo skor// a ba glang mgo'i phyag rgya ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ljang// g.yas pa'i phyag na tri shul bsnams// g.yon pa srid pa'i 'khor lo skor// ya ba ti'i phyag rgya ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ser// g.yas pa'i phyag na lcags kyu bsnams// g.yon pa srid pa'i 'khor lo skor// gshin rje phya sangs phyag rgya ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing// g.yas pa'i phyag na ral gri bsnams// g.yon pa srid pa'i 'khor lo skor// gshin rje dmigs pa'i phyag rgya ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dmar// g.yas pa'i phyag na thod 'phreng bsnams// g.yon pa srid pa'i 'khor lo skor// gshin rje rtel pa'i phyag rgya ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog sngo// g.yas pa'i phyag na dbyug tho bsnams// g.yon pa srid pa'i 'khor lo skor// lha mchog dud kha'i phyag rgya ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ljang// g.yas pa'i phyag na tho pa bsnams// g.yon pa srid pa'i 'khor lo skor// chos kyi rgyal po'i phyag rgya ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog smug/ g.yas pa'i phyag na khraM baM bsnams// g.yon pa srid pa'i 'khor lo skor// gshin rje mig dmar phyag rgya ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dmar// g.yas pa'i phyag na shod d+he bsnams// g.yos pa srid pa'i 'khor lo skor// khro bo yum gyi phyag rgya ni// g.yas pa rnams ni gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa rak+ta gtso la stob// brda dang gar gyi mchod pa bzhes// sgo ma rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// gsang ba'i lha mo bse mo bzhi// sku mdog cir yang ma nges te// g.yas pa'i phyag na phur ba 'dril// g.yon pa rdo rje lcags kyu bsnams// brda dang gar gyi mchod pa bzhes// 'jam dpal dngos grub stsal du gsol// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// phyag rgya mchod pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// yang zhus pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ston pa po// dbang bskur byin brlabs ji ltar lags// brtan par bzhugs pa ji ltar lags// phyag gi rim pa ji ltar mchis// ston pas

bdag la bka' stsal 'tshal// zhes pas// nyon cig 'khor tshogs khyed rnams kun// dbang skur byin brlabs bya ba la// gsum gsum dag tu ngas bshad kyis// dbang la phyi nang gsang ba gsum// phyi dbang dag la gsum du bshad// yi ge 'bru lngas bskur ba dang// sku lnga phyag mtshan lnga yis bskur// nang dbang dam rdzas lnga yi dbang// gsang dbang byang chub sems kyis bskur// byin brlabs dag la gsum du bshad// yi ge 'bru gsum bskur ba dang// sku gsung phyag mtshan gsum gyis brlab/ ka ya wAka tsit+ta brlab// 'di yis brtan par bzhugs pa ni// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtsibs stengs su// phyogs skyong bsnol ba'i gdan stengs su// yi dwags bsnol ba'i gdan stengs su// ma he glang chen gdan stengs su// stiSh+Tha lhan// da ni phyag dang mchod pas mnyes pa ste// srid gsum gdug pa 'dul ba dang// nga rgyal dregs pas 'joms pa dang// chos sku ma skyes zhi ba'i gnas// khro gtum gdug pa tshogs rnams dang// thugs rjes gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa// 'jam dpal khro bo'i tshogs la phyag bgyid do// zla gsang nag po'i tiSh+Tha las// byin brlabs dang phyag dang brtan par bya ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// yang zhus pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ston pa po// thugs dam bskul ba ji ltar lags// zhes zhus pa las// yang ston pas 'khor gyi dang po la bka' stsal pa// bsnyen po'i dus su gtso bo bskul// bsgrub pa'i dus su sbags te bskul// las sbyor drag po bskor dus su// shan pa mon pa bdud po bskul// gtso bo gshin rje gshed po ste// rang nyid khro bor bsgom par bya// rak+Sha rus 'phreng bgrang ba dang// chas gos nag sde sdigs 'dzub bsgreng// tsham rngam bcas chos nyid kyi ngang// lag tu be shing bzang po 'am// seng ldeng 'khar ba 'dom tshad pa// thogs te rkang pa bgrad tshul bstan// stong gsum sprul pas kheng bya ste// dmigs pa'i yul rnams 'gugs par bsam// mdun du dmigs la don po yi// snying khar be con gtad la bskul// las la bskul ba 'di lta ste// hUM gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// ya man ta ka yab yum gshegs su gsol// gtum chen rab 'bar gshin rje 'joms mdzad lha// nyi ma 'bum bas lhag pa'i 'od ldan khyod// phyag mtshan mang pos bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// rang 'bar gshin rje 'joms mdzad lha la phyag 'tshal lo// kun tu 'ur 'ur 'brug gi nga ro rab sgrog pa// lha mchog ya man ta ka ma lags sam// bka' bzhin brnag pa'i dgra po rdul du rlog/ lha mchog ya man ta ka ma lags sam// 'bar ba nag po glog gi 'phreng ba can// lha mchog ya man ta ka ma lags

sam// 'bar byed bdud 'dul dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// lha mchog ya man ta ka ma lags sam// zhal bgrad rdo rje'i mche ba gtsigs// lha mchog ya man ta ka ma lags sam// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// g.yas kyi dang po khra dang rdo rje rde'u chung bsnams// tha ma rdo rje lcags kyu bsnams// g.yon gyi dang po dung chen dmar gyi bkang// bar ma ba su ta yi rgyu zhags bsnams// phyag drug g.yon gyi tha ma la// zhing chung dbyug pa sngon po bsnams// dur khrod 'bar ba'i chas kyis brgyan// sku mdog sngo nag dbyar gyi char sprin 'dra// mthing nag 'bar ba'i ral pas srid gsum khengs// dri med ye shes mche ba dkar po gtsigs// ma rungs sdigs mdzub 'phyar zhing klad la bskor// srog gcod las kyi be con bsnams// lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma byung ba'i tshe// bstan pa bsrung bar nyid kyis zhal mches pa'i// zhal mches bzhin du bcol ba'i las rnams mdzod// gtso bo bskul ba'i rim pa'o// da ni gshed rnams bskul ba ste// yab cig 'jam dpal nag po ni// sku mdog mthing nag ral pa can// mthing gi ral pa shar ra ra// ral ba 'bum la gshin rje 'bum// gshog zer stong la ma mo stong// chibs su gshin rje 'bum gyi khri la bzhugs// 'khor du ma mo dmar nag 'bum gyis bskor// smug nag dgra 'dul las la khye// dam nyams dgra bo khug la shog/ shar phyogs ya ma rA dza ni// sku mdog mthing nag ral pa can// lcags kyi ral ba shar ra ra// ma mo gshog sgra di ri ri// ral pa 'bum la gshin rje 'bum// gshog zer stong la ma mo stong// chibs su chu glang sngon po chibs// 'khor du nag mo 'bum gyis bskor// nag mo dgra 'dul las la khye// dam nyams dgra bo 'dir khug la// dgra bo rnams kyi gshed ma mdzod// lho phyogs myos byed 'bar ba ni/ sku mdog ser nag ral pa can// khrag gi ral pa shar ra ra// chibs su drel rta rkang gsum chibs// 'khor du ma mo phya sangs 'bum gyis bskor// dmar nag dgra 'dul las la khye// dam nyams dgra bo 'dir khug la// nub phyogs gshin rje ma rung rtse// sku mdog dmar nag ral pa can// bse yi ral pa shar ra ra/ chibs su lkugs pa lug la chibs// 'khor du ma mo dmar nag 'bum gyis bskor// dmar mo nad gtong las la khye// dgra bo de yi gshed ma mdzod// byang phyogs ral pa tshar dgu ni// sku mdog mthing nag ral pa can// khro chung ral pa shar ra ra// ma mo gshog sgra di ri ri// chibs su sbrul nag chibs su chibs// 'khor du ma mo ser nag 'bum gyis bskor// smug nag dgra 'dul las la khye// dgra bo 'di yi gshed ma mdzod// hUM/ lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma la// ya

man ta ka'i spyan snga ru// 'khor gyi gshin rje gshed po yis// bstan pa bsrung bar khas blangs la// thugs dam bzhin du bdag bskul na// khyed kyi dam tshig dus la bab// 'og gi rgya mtsho'i gting rum nas// rdo rje gtams pa'i steng shed na// gser gyi rus sbal khri la ni// 'chi bdag ral pa tshar dgu bzhugs// sku yi sprul pas klu rnams 'dul// thugs kyi sprul pas dmyal ba 'dren// gsung gi sprul pas dge sdig ston// srid pa'i skos 'debs mthu mo che// thugs dam bzhin du bdag bskul na// gsung phur gdab pa'i dus la bab// hUM/ mnar med dmyal ba'i khang pa na// khyod chung lcags kyi khang pa na// 'chi bdag a ba glang mgo can// chu srin mgo dgu chibs su chibs// sku mdog dbyar gyi char sprin 'dra// phyag na gdug pa'i mtshon cha bsnams// thugs dam bzhin du bdag bskul na// gsang phur gdab pa'i dus la bab// 'chi bdag gshin rje ya ba ti// chibs su za byed spyang khu chibs// sku mdog ma nges cir yang snang// phyag na sprul pa'i ltas ngan 'bebs// cho 'phrul gtong ba'i mthu bo che// thugs dam bzhin du bdag bskul na// gsang phur gdab pa'i dus la bab// 'chi bdag gshin rje dmig dmar ni// sku mdog dmar po 'jigs pa'i sku// phyag na gcod byed ral gri bsnams// srid pa'i srog gcod mthu po che// thugs dam bzhin du bdag bskul na// gsang phur gdab pa'i dus la bab// 'chi bdag gshin rje dmig dmar ni// chibs su spyan rno 'ug pa chibs// srid pa'i bla rkun mthu bo che// bdud kyi zhags pa g.yon gyis 'phen// btsan gyi shod rde'u g.yon gyis 'grems// srid pa'i skos 'debs mthu bo che// thugs dam bzhin du bdag bskul na// gsang phur gdab pa'i dus la bab// 'chi bdag gshin rje rtel pa ni// gdug pa phag rgod chibs su chibs// srid pa'i dbugs len mthu bo che// bdud kyi zhags pa g.yon gyis 'phen// phyag na thog gi bu yug 'thor// thugs dam bzhin du bdag bskul na// gsang phur gdab pa'i dus la bab// 'chi bdag gshin rje phya sangs ni// tshangs pa lha yi 'khor na gnas// dbang sdud bya khung chibs su chibs// 'phrul gyi me long g.yas kyis gzer// nyi zer zhags pa g.yon gyis gzigs// srid pa gsum gyi bya ra mdzad// thugs dam bzhin du bdag bskul na// gsang phur gdab pa'i dus la bab// 'chi bdag gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po ni// sku mdog skyon med gdan la bzhugs// sku yi sprul pas stong gsum khyab// gsung gi sprul pas 'gro ba 'dren pa'i dpal// thugs kyi sprul pas gshin rje 'dul// srid pa srog gcod mthu bo che// bdud kyi zhags pa g.yon gyis 'phen// thugs dam

bzhin du bdag bskul na// gsang phur gdab pa'i dus la bab// 'chi bdag gshin rje brag gyon rje// dpa' brtul stag gi khri la bzhugs// srid pa grong gi mthu bo che// phyag na bdud kyi thog 'bebs pa// zhal nas nad kyi rlang pa 'thor// thugs dam bzhin du bdag bskul na// gsang phur gdab pa'i dus la bab// 'chi bdag dud kha lha mchog ni// gtum pa dom gyi khri la bzhugs// zas su mi sha rta sha za// skom du mi khrag rta khrag 'thung// bdud po bcu gsum pho nyar 'gyed// ma bdun rgyal mo sprul par gtong// thugs dam bzhin du bdag bskul na// gsang phur gdab pa'i dus la bab// phyogs skyong skul ba'i rim pa'o// yum gyi thugs dam bskul ba ni// g.yon gyi phyogs nas gshegs su gsol// e ka dza ti gshegs su gsol// pe ta nag mo gshegs su gsol// nag mo mig can dbyings nas bzhengs// sprul pa nag mo re ma ti// nam mkha'i dbyings nas spyan 'dren gyis// chos kyi dbyings nas sku bzhengs la// pho brang 'di ru spyan 'dren gyis// thugs dam dbang gis gshegs su gsol// gshed bzhi yum mchog srin bran ma// mi snying za zhing mi khrag 'thung// rtag tu sring gsum sha khrag gsol// khams gsum ma lus khram 'debs ma// bcol ba'i las 'di myur du mdzod// phyogs skyong bcu yi srin mo'i ngang// dgra bgegs lto ru za mdzad ma// srid gsum phyag mas thong la shog/ nga yis bcol ba'i khram la thob ci srin mo rnams// da ni 'khor lo bskor tsam na// mon pa bzhi bskul ba ste// hUM/ 'jam dpal nag po thugs kyi sprul pa ni// mon pa nag po= dmar po= sngon po= ser po= bzhi rbad de=/ hUM lcags kyi mon pa nag po ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog nag/ sku la drag po'i 'bru slag gsol// sku smad dug sbrul sham thabs can// lcags kyi ral pa'i nyi li li// dung gi smin ma khyug ge khyug/ lcags kyi dmig rtsa 'u ru ru// lcags kyi skad sgra tog ge tog/ ag tshom me 'bar ya la la// mche ba zla tshes thams se thams// zhal na gdug pa'i drag sngags zlos// g.yas pa ma trang ro dbyugs bsnams// g.yon pa srog gi 'khor lo bskor// ya ma ra dza srog gi bdag/ lha srin kun la mnga' mdzad ma// srid pa shar gyi mnga' bdag mo// sngags kyi byin rlabs khyod kyis bskyed// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// khyod kyis mi 'dul gang yang med// bstan pa gnyan po bshig byed pa/ srog la dug gi rlangs pas bdugs// lus srog dbral ba'i dus la bab// oM badzra tsit+ta baM ril zhun thun che ge mo zhig/ a mu ka pra ma ya hUM phaT// hUM/ gser gyi mon pa ser po ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ser// sku stod zhe sdang

stag lpags gsol// sku smad chu sbrul sham thabs can// gser gyi ral ba si li li// g.yu yi smin ma khyug ge khyug/ gser mig ser po khyi li li// gser gyi rngog thag phya ra ra// mche ba dkar po thams se thams// zhal nas gdug pa'i ngan sngags zlos// g.yas pa ma traM ro dbyug 'phyar// g.yon pa srid pa'i 'khor lo bskor// ma ra nag po srog gi bdag/ lho phyogs srid pa'i mngal mdzad ma// gsang sngags gdug pa'i dpal bskyed cing// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// khyod kyis mi thub gang yang med// bdud dang mu stegs ru tra 'dul// srog la gshed kyi sngags kyis gdug tshe srog dpral ba'i dus la bab// tri zhing rbad khaM a mu ka mur dza ya// hUM/ bse yi mon pa dmar po ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dmar// sku stod glang chen ko rlon gsol// sku smad sbrul gyi sham thabs can// bse yi ral pa shar ra ra// shel gyi smin ma khyug ge khyug/ bse mig dmar po lhang ma lhong// bse yi ag tshoms phya ra ra// mche ba brnon mar thabs se thabs// zhal nas gsod ba'i ngan sngags zlos// g.yas pa ma TaM baM chen bsnams// g.yon pa gshed kyi 'khor lo bskor// ya ma na te srog gi bdag/ lha 'dre kun gyi mnga' bdag po// nub phyogs srid pa'i mnga' bdag po// gsang sngags gdug pas da sgrol cig/ bcol ba'i las rnams grub par shog/ khyod kyi mi'adul gang yang med// gang zhing 'gal ba rdul du rlog/ dam nyams srog la bar chod thong// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// oM ba yu rbad ti du ba la yab yum su ru che ge mo ya// ma khas rag ta tsa ra ya hUM phaT// hUM g.yu yi mon pa sngon po ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog gnag/ sku stod zhing gi g.yang gzhi gsol// sku smad dam sri'i sham thabs can// g.yu ral sngon po gsig pa yis// gshed kyi ma mo kun kyang 'dul// ma mo 'dus pas bla tshe 'gugs// bla tshe 'gugs pa'i bdag po ni// gser gyi smin ma brang nge brang// g.yu mig sngon po lhangs se lhangs// g.yu yi rdog thag chems se chems// mche ba bsnon mar khrigs se khrigs// zhal nas gshed kyi ngan sngags zlos// gshed kyi byug pa phyu ru ru// g.yas pa bdud kyi be con brdeg/ g.yon pa srid pa'i 'khor lo bskor// ya ma na te ku be ra// gnod sbyin gdug pa'i gshed ma ste// srid pa byang gi skos bdag po// gsang sngags dug dang 'dra ba'i bdag/ dam nyams dbang dang chung srid phrogs// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// gang zhun pa tri zhung tshul// gri raM baM pra be che ge mo mA ra ya hUM// mon pa bzhi bskul ba'i rim pa'o// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// bskul ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// yang zhus pa// ston pa thams

cad mkhyen pa po// drag po sgrol ba'i bskul ma gang// thun zhes bya ba du tsam mchis// zhes zhus pas// bka' stsal pa/ spyir ni thun la mang du gsungs// bsad pa srog gi thun// dgug pa dug gi thun// dbye ba rdzas kyi thun// 'phang pa zor kyi thun dang// 'di ni bsad pa srog gi thun te// thun gyi rnam grangs brgyad du bshad// lcags phye zangs phye rdo phye dug/ phur thun mda' thun khrag thun dang// nyungs thun man ngag thun dang dgu/ thun kyong rabs chad thod pa 'am// shin tu mi shig snod du bya// dug thun ha la ha la te// phog pa tsam gyis 'chi bar 'gyur// lcags dang zangs phye rdo phye yis// khong nad 'dzud cing lo nad gtong// phur pas gnas su gdab par bya// g.yas chen bsad na bzhin du gtong// mda' ris dpag chen mda' ltar brdeg/ nyungs thun ri rab ltar du brdeg/ khrag thun ma mos sprul pa yis// thod bcings zor thogs stong khams khengs// gzas pa'i gzugs la 'phen par bsam// rang nyid khro bor gsal bar bsgom// thun sngags ring po spyir byas la// mtha' yi sham bu so sor gdags// thun bskul tshig ni 'di ltar ro// bskal pa gsum gyi pha rol na// thun gyi bdag po bdag bskul gyis// stong gsum thun gyi sprul pas gang// dam nyams dgra la thun 'bebs pa// so so rang rang gnas nas thugs dam bskul// thun gyi bdag po khyed rnams la// las su dgra bgegs bsgral bar mdzod// e raM he raM dza la raM hUM phaT/ lcags phye zangs phye rdo phye dug/ mud ka ra yi chu dang sbyar// khrag las sbyar ba'i gtor mas brab// mtshon cha lnga yi char gyis brab// skud pa dkar nag byang du gzhud// dug thun mgo la khyab par rgyob// khrag 'thung kha nas lkugs su chug/ rdo thun klad pa'i rgyas su rgyob// lcags phye zangs phye khong bar lud// mda' thun snying gi dkyil du rgyob// phur thun gnas lnga dag tu rgyob// nyungs thun yan lag bzhi la rgyob// man ngag bla la bzla'o// skyes bu go mtshan brdar ba dang// seng thog rgyab dang spu gri ltar// lcags kyi gzer chen btab pa dang// bya rgod gzan la 'jums pa 'dra// bcu bdun pa yi btu yig la// sham bur btags la brab cing gdab// btab bas de la thar thabs med// thun bskul mon dang shan pas bya// zla gsang nag po las// thun gyi las thabs dang bca' lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// yang zhus pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ston pa po// mchod rdzas byin rlabs 'tshal mi 'tshal// ma rtogs 'khor la bshad du gsol// bka' stsal pa/ shes rab chan la bshad mi dgos// ma rtogs med la bshad par bya// ting 'dzin sbyang lugs bka' dang

mthun// b+h+ruM las ban d+ha lcang lo ru// bdud rtsi rak+ta gtor ma phud// mar me dam rdzas la sogs brlab// sngags rnams mthun te ma gsungs so// chen po dam pa 'di skad do// oM las 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'bar// 'bar nas dri chen bdud rtsir zhu// hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar// 'bar nas byang sems bdud rtsir zhu// sa las rin chen bdud rtsir 'bar// 'bar nas sha chen bdud rtsir zhu// paM las pad+ma 'dab brgyad 'bar// 'bar nas rak+ta bdud rtsir zhu// ha las rdo rje rgya gram 'bar// 'bar nas bdud rtsi dri chur bdud rtsir zhu// oM gyis ye shes me byung bas// AHyis mes sregs thal bar gyur// hUM la dag pa'i bdud rtsir gyur// stong gsum tsam gyi dur phor du// rgya mtsho tsam gyi rag ta bskyil// mu la rak+ta rtsa ba'i khrag/ chu dang ma 'dres dwangs ma'i khrag/ khrag sna stong gi rak+ta 'di// ci bde ba ru bzhes su gsol// stong gsum baM gyi gtor gzhong du// bcud kyi gtor ma snod du sbyar// sha sna snying sna 'bru sna las// sbyar ba'i gtor ma bzhes su gsol// 'bru bcud stong las sbyar ba'i dza gad 'di// chu la chang gi rang bzhin med// mkhas pas thabs dang 'bru sbyar bas// mnyam pa nyid kyi phud du gyur// ci bde ba ru bzhes su gsol// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// pU tsa brlabs pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// yang rdo rje rnon pos// ston pa 'jam dpal la gsol ba btab pa// ston pa lags// las sbyor drag po byed dus su// shan pa bskul ba ji ltar lags// bskul ba'i mkhan po gang gis bgyi// bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig rdo rje rnon po khyod// shan pa bya ba bzhi yod de// gshin rje ma mo bdud dang ging// bzhi ru tan+t+ra 'di dag gsungs// bskul ba'i las mkhan bya ba de// rang rang gshed bzhi rang gis bskul// sngags pa chas gos ji lta bu// gshed bzhi chas gos ji lta bu// dus tshod sa mtshams ji lta nas// zhus pas/ bka' stsal pa/ chas gos nag po dar nag thod// seng ldeng 'dom tshad mi 'bral bas// gshed rnams chas gos zhing lpags bgo/ gon la khro bo tsha rngam dang bcas te// bden pa brdar zhing ma nyes bgrang// kho yi nyes bgrang gzu dpang gsol// dus tshod nam phyed nyid phyed do// 'khor lo bskor tsam dus su bskul// 'jig rten lha srin sde brgyad dang// gshin rje lha rabs sum cu rtsa// gnyis kyi khong snying bkol ba yi// shan pa bya ba bzhi yod de// gshin rje'i shan pa dang/ ma mo'i shan pa dang/ bdud kyi shan pa dang/ ging gi shan pa'o// bzas pa'i rdzas ra rus blangs la// gru gsum 'brub khung du bcug la// dgug dbye'i las byas la/ rang nyid gshin rje'i nga rgyal du bsgom/ dran sngags bzhi ni brab par bya// nyungs kar thal chen bsres

la brab// oM badzra mu ha la da ha// pa tsa pa tsa tshal pa tsun tsha tshal pa// tsun tsa tsun tsa sarba pu tsa ka ya// rak+Sha rak+Sha sa pre ta bi sha tsa// kun pan da pu ta na// ka ta pu ta na sa ra sa na hUM/ a mu ka ma ra ya phaT/ trag rag sha kha mu tra b+h+yo// ru tra rbad/ rag sha rbad// ma ma snying rbad/ kha thuM kha thuM rbad/ tsi ta tsi ta rbad/ bal phur bal phur/ ma ma dun rbad/ du yaM tsa yaM ru thuMs/ yang na rbad hUM phaT/ tri ling shang ka dun dri za yag sha rbad/ phye ma kha dar ru ru pra pra duM duM shig/ drag po mA ra ya/ pa shang mi ki ra hUM la/ a ta ta ta ba ma ra shal te hUM phaT/ da ni gshin rje'i shan pa bskul// hUM mi bzad rgyal po hUM sgra can// mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// gsod byed ya ma rA dza drag shul can// tshe la dbang ba'i 'jig rten gshin rje gshed// zhal gsum po la phyag drug po// g.yas ni dkar la g.yon ni dmar// dbus ni mthing la rngam pa'i zhal// g.yas pa gsum na bsnams pa ni// 'khor lo ral gri dbyug tho bsnams// g.yon pa gsum na bsnams pa ni// thod pa sdigs mdzub phur ba bsnams// gshin rje gshed po dgra bo'i gshed// nyon mongs skye shi rtsa ba gcod// log rtog 'joms pa'i mthu bo che// shan pa kha chan mi zad pa// khong nas 'khyil ba'i phung po 'joms// rno drug po la rtse gsum po// zug par byed pa'i kha TAM kha// snying la brdeg pa'i tho ba yin// tshe dang phung po bcas la 'joms// dmar po mi sdug lcags sgrog dang// snying nas 'dren pa'i lcags kyu dang// dgra bgegs snying gi rtsa nas drongs// rdul du rlog cig gshin rje gshed// khyod las lhag ba'i mthu che med// 'di dag longs spyod rkyen du 'bul// snying khrag rkang khrag 'dod pa rnams// gsol ba'i don du gsol du gsol// de la khyed kyi longs spyod kyis// mi mthun dgra bgegs thal bar rlog/ bdag ni rnal 'byor bsgrub pa po// bsgrub pa po la dgra byung gis// bcol ba'i las rnams grub bar mdzod// ma mo'i shan pa bskul ba'o// hUM dur khrod 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// khro mo chen mo gshegs su gsol// gdong gsum mig gsum khros pa'i tshul// rab tu 'joms pa'i khro gnyer can// skye 'gro kun gyi tshe srog bdag/ ral ba'i zar bus stong gsum khengs// lus la me yis tshub mas 'tshub// ma mo yongs kyi bkrag kyang 'phrog/ g.yas kyi phyag na khram bam bsnams// g.yon na nad rkyal khraM shing thogs// zhing chan bsgral ba'i gdan stengs na// brkyang bskum tshul du brjid par bzhugs// ma mo chen mo bos pa'i tshe// nag mo khyod kyi mtshan nyid ni// sku la mi lpags rlon pa gsol// mi lpags thang la zhol lo lo// mi mgo'i 'phreng ba sku la brgyan// mi mgo thal ba phu ru ru// chibs

su rlung nag ser bu chibs// zas su mi sha rlon pa za// skom du mi khrag mngar mo 'thung// sha za khrag mngar mo 'thung// sha za khrag 'thung snying la rol// snying khrag dron mo zhal du gsol// srid pa gsum la b+h+yo zlog byed// zhal nas khrag 'dzag zu lu lu// mi nad phyug nad kun gyi bdag/ chibs su drel rta rkang gsum chibs// dur khrod kun tu rgyu ba'i mthu mo che// ma mo kun gyi gtso mo ste// dgra bgegs kun gyi shan pa mo// gsang sngags rnal 'byor dam tshig can// sngon gyi dam tshig gnyan po rjes dgongs nas// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyan po 'dir gshegs shig/ drongs shig khug cig dgra bo khug/ shan pa chen po'i dus la bab// srog bdag chen po'i dus la bab// da ni ging ging shan pa bskul te// hUM gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// dug gsum gnas nas len pa'i mthu bo che// khams gsum dbang du sdud pa'i drag shul can// srid gsum zil gyis gnon pa'i lha// 'phrin las kun gyi bdag po khyod// srid gsum gnon pa'i rtse mo mchog/ srid pa gsum gyi rtsal 'chang khyod// dam tshig nyams pa'i gnyan po khyod// skye 'gro yongs kyi mnga' bdag po// khams gsum yongs kyi tshe 'dzin po// shin tu gdung zhing bskul ba'i tshe// skye 'gro yongs kyi dbang sdud mthu bo che// sku la mdzes pa'i rgyan cha sna tshogs gsol// 'khor ba'i bag chags 'joms pa'i mthu bo che// dug gsum nad kyi bdag po khyod// spyan yang shin tu bgrad pa ste// 'jig rten me stag 'bar ba'i 'od// zhal yang shin tu bgrad pa ste// 'byung po dregs pa'i mnga' bdag po// sgrol ging bdag po dam tshig can// khyod kyis mi 'dul gang yang med// khyod kyis mi thub gang yang med// mdor na dregs pa thams cad khyod kyis thul// dbang phyug chen po'i dus la bab// dbang sdud chen po da tshur gshegs// dbang sdud chen po sa ma ya// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// da ni bdud kyi shan pa bskul// 'jigs byed chen po rA hu la// khyab 'jug chen po rA hu la// lus po gcig la mgo bo dgu/ mgo lus med par mig gis khengs// ro stod mi la ro smad sprul// mi rnams kun gyi srog gi bdag/ klu rnams kun kyang 'khrugs shing klong// lus la brjid pa'i dud kha ba// lag na chu srin zhags pa thogs// pha ni srin po ma ni klu// klu srin 'tshogs pa'i mthu bo che// lho nub mtshams nas sku bzhengs la// zla ba'i rjes gcod shar du rgyu// nyi mi'i rjes gcod nub tu rgyu// nyin mo rgyu zhing mtshan mo 'joms// bar snang khams na rgyu tsam na// 'jig rten khams kun sreg par byed// lo nyes 'khrug pa rims nad gtong// rgya mtsho'i gting na gnas pa'i tshe// klu rnams kun kyang 'khrug cing

klong// thog ser ki kang sa g.yos 'bebs// ming brgya po la mtshan stong po// dus tshod tshes grangs kun gyi bdag/ lha 'dre kun gyi dmag dpon byed// mi rnams kun gyi tshe 'phrog pa// shan pa chen po'i dus la bab// bdud rgyal chen po'i dus la bab// srog bdag chen po'i dus la bab// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// las 'di yang// ra rog po 'am/ dkar po gnya' nag sker dgra'i ming btags la/ sngags khri khrir bzlas// lam rgya khraM maM// gnod sbyin rgyun srang du gnan// rgyun du yi ge bcu bdun pa// las su shan pa bzhi bskul la// 'khor lo bskor ba'i dus su bskul// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// drag po las kyi thus ka'i dus su thun bskul shan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// yang zhus pa// ston pa lags// rtags kyi la nye ji ltar lags// bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig 'khor tshogs ma rtogs pa// nyams kyi rtags dang la nye ni// bsnyen bsgrub drag po byed dus su// gza' skar mda' 'phen brtsi brtsi la// ma nor gnas su 'jug par bya// rtags kyi la nye gsum bshad de// grub rtags chu chen ri nag po// rlung 'tshub than de grub pa'o// mi reng skya shar go gon rab// mon nag phyag byas ling ga 'gul// gas shing me 'bar bdar ba dang// skra dang sen mo byung na rab// gos dum bsnal ma sems can rab// don po rang dang sdong po gcad// rtsig pa bshig tsing g.yas ra gsad// pho sgrub mor 'ong mo sgrub pho// zhib rtsan bud med can de zhang blon dang// pha khu mo rigs dmag 'dren dang// shing gcod rkang rkong len pa dang// mkhar 'bebs me gtong sngon byed dang// shan pa byed dam mtshon thogs dang// dge slong mang po gnod sbyin gzugs// mon pa mon mo dgra sna tshogs// bdag la de kun bkur sti byed// g.yul rgyal mtshon bzung grub brgal ba// 'brug thog zhing 'chu chos 'chad pa// rgyan rgyal stobs bzang zas ster ba// gtam snyan thos shing nyams dga' bar// dri zhing phra med snying pa dang// mkhar spe brtsig dang dgra bsad dang// de ni bzang rtags lha rtags yin// ngan pa'i 'dre rtags bshad pa la// mun khang nang nas mi thar pa// brlan zhi 'thibs dang rta bong rmi// lug rta bshas dang khang pa zhig/ chu yis khyer dang btson du bzung// g.yul ngo 'pham dang phyugs kyis brdungs// mtshon rgyab brdungs dang rkang rkong chag/ shwas khyer rbab tu song ba dang// phrum zer spu zing gnyid song dang// mi de kho rgyal rab 'pham pa// rgyan 'pham bang bul cho long 'pham// sems can mi thub rang yan shor// lag cha chag dag gtong ba de// ngan rtags dag tu bshad pa yin// rtags kyi la nye bshad pa la// lam zhugs la nye

brtags pa la// las thabs brnag pa gang byed dang// rta bong ded dang bud med phrad// mi ring lag yu mul srang dang// bya bye khras btab shor ba dang// kha la sprin ni rab rib bo// mi phyugs zha grum sgra mi snyan// dgra dang phrad cing blo bur ngan// su khung nang du brag btags pa// 'o rjes bya rjes phyugs rjes ngan// sbrang ma byung na 'bru khugs ngan// bzang ba'i la nye rngon pa dang// dmar dang shan dmar khur ba dang// tshub can kha ba gcan gzan rgyu// khra dang spyang khus btab pa dang// mdze sprang bskyas dang phrad na ngan// ngan ba byung na 'bru 'ded gtang// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// rtags kyi le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// yang zhus pa// ston pa lags// las kyi shan dbye ji ltar lags// yang gsungs pa// skye shi med pa'i dbyings nyid nas// byang chub sems kyi rig ba shar// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i phung po lnga// rgyu yi gzugs bzhis bskyed pa la// khams dang skye mched rnam shes yul// de ye zhen pa bzlog pa'i phyir// dug gsum rtsad bcad sku lnga ste// 'bras bu ye shes lnga ru smin// gnyen po gshed bzhi gtso mchog ste// khams dang skye mched zhen pa ste// phyogs skyong 'khor gyis bzlog par gsungs// dal gyis bzlog ba'i rtsibs bcu gnyis// skye mched zhen pa dag dang sbyar// dbus kyi le tshe lnga dang dug lnga sbyar// rdul tshon dang ni phung po lngar// rim gsum lus ngag yid du brtsi// de bzlog don du las thabs brgyad// brtsam pa dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams// brdeg pa gnod sbyin phyogs nas brdeg/ dbye ba rlung lho phyogs nas dbye// gnan pa klu rgyal phyogs su gnan// dgug pa srin po'i phyogs nas dgug/ gtad pa gshin rje'i phyogs su gtad// bsreg pa me yi phyogs su bsreg/ dma' ni dri za'i phyogs su dbab// de ni spyi yi las brgyad do// 'dug stangs gnas la bstan pa bas// des byas las rnams shis par gsungs// de yi dus kyi cho 'phrul bzhi// 'jam dpal sprul pa bstan pa la// lus po sbrul du 'dug pa la// mgo bo bya rog mgo dgur skyes// mgo lus mig gis khengs par 'dug/ sbrul la sring mo bzhi ri byung// ya man te kas ming la rog ti nag por btags// ya man ta kas dam stsal te// khyod cag lnga po 'di lha srin sde brgyad nal bu yin// khyod kyis rgyal khams phung bar nges// de bas nga yi rdzas sbyin gyis// nga yis bcol ba'i thog ser thong// byas te bdud rtsi gtigs// khong par ma bzod ngo tsha nas// lan cig brgyal te shi tshul bstan// 'jam dpal gshin rjes ral gri kha T+wAM kha thogs te// lus po dum bu brgyad du gtubs// ri rab ri yi phyogs bzhi ru// steng dang 'og tu sbas te bzhag/ de nas sba ru ma btub

nas// lus de dum bu re re la// sprul ba'i ki kang re re byung// 'jig rten yongs ni phung la khad// ri rab kyi ni shar lho nas// drang srong chenapo ra hul byung// nub nas du ba mjug rings byung// shar nas srin po bya ti pa tri byung// bya rog mgo brtsegs lus po la// bya la mgo dgu brtsegs pa byung// lho nas khyab 'jug chen po byung// shar nas byin nu rA dza byung// nub nas dmag dpon ljang sngon byung// byang nas ra dza ka byung ngo// de rnams sba ru ma btub bo// sring mo bzhi yang ri rab zung bzhi yin// 'jam dpal ya man ta ka yin// ri rab kyis ni gzir te bzhag/ phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhir bstod de bzhag/ sring mo bzhi po mtshams bzhir 'dod// dmag dpon brgyad ces bya ba'o// zla gsang nag po'i tan+t+ra las// shan dbye ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//// yang zhus pa/ ston pa lags/ bsgrub bsnyen drag po byed dus su// gsang sngags brda 'di 'tshal mi 'tshal// rmongs pa rnams la bstan du gsol// bka' stsal ba// nyon cig nga yis brda bshad kyis// sbyir ni brda la mang na yang// lus brda ngag brda yid kyi brda// gsang ba'i yig 'bru brda chen dang// bsgom bsgrub thun mtshams sgra yis gcad// brda tshig rkyen gyi ting 'dzin gyis// bsgrub na dngos grub myur du thob// gsang sngags skyon yod ma yin te// bar chad bgegs la shin tu gsang// gsang phyir brda tshogs sna tshogs bstan// lhur yang lag brda shes pa shin tu gces// gong du bzlas pa'i grogs mched kyis// byas na thams cad shes par 'gyur// rang la rnal 'byor gtam zer na// lag gi brda yis brda bar bya// zas skom 'dod na lag gi blangs// smras na dngos grub yal ga'i rgyu// gsang sngags brda yis ma brjod na// gsang sngags dngos grub yal bar 'gyur// log rtogs 'phral la skyed pa'i phyir// brda don smra zhing ting 'dzin bsal// bar chad mi 'byung dngos grub myur// de phyir brda la nan tan bskyed// de phyir brda sgo brda phyag gsungs// lag brda byed na g.yas g.yon sor mo bcu yis bya// gcig ni g.yas kyi mdzub mo bsgreng// gcig ni g.yon gyi srin lag bsgreng// de gnyis mdzub mo bsnol mar bstan// thal brdebs se gol gang yin brdab// sbyan mdog mchu 'gros ngag gi bya// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las brda le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o//// yang zhus pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ston pa khyod// sngags zhes bya ba ji ltar lags// mgo la bzhag pa ji ltar lags// tha mar brda yi ji ltar lags// sngags 'byung ba yi gzhi ni gang// dbye ba ni ji ltar dbye ba bshad du gsol// bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje rnon po khyod// gsang

sngags bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni// bshad na rnams pa gsum du bshad// sgra dang dbyibs dang bshad pa e baM ma ya ste// dug lnga gdan kyi dkyil 'khor te// lha yi dkyil 'khor dbyings su bshad// don du bsad pa mkhas pa'o// ngo la rang rig yin par bshad// de ni don gyi bshad pa'o// sgra ru bshad pa bya ba de// dang po sngags kyi pha ma bstan// tan+t+ra 'di nas 'di skad gsungs// sngags kyi gzhi dang pha ma ste// mtshan dang dpe byad yi ge ste// a li shes rab yum gyi ngang// ka li thabs kyi mu tra ste/ de gnyis 'dres pa'i byin rla bas las/ 'jam dpal gsang sngags 'byung bar byed/ de nas zhi khro lha tshogs bskyed// sngags rnams 'byung ba'i rgyu bstan pa// khog pa mgrin pa rkan dang lce// sna dang spyi bo so dang mchu// spyi dang re re cha dag las// phrad dang cung zad phrad pa dang// dog pa dang ni yangs pa dang// drang po bkug dang bgreng ba dang// bstod pa dang ni smad pa dang// grims pa dang glod pa'i nga ro byung// sde tshan rnam pa brgyad du grags// sngags la dbye na gsum du gsungs// brjod pa tshig gi sgo nas mtshon pa'i sngags// mtshon pa sngags kyi sgo nas mtshon pa'i sngags// rten pa phyag rgya'i sgo nas mtshon pa'i sngags dang gsum// rten pa phyag rgya'i sgo nas mtshon pa'i sngags bya ba de// gnas phyal pa dag la bzhugs pa'i sngags bya ba de pho brag na bzhugs pa'i sngags/ lding khang na bzhugs pa'i sngags so// brjod pa tshig gi sgo nas mtshon pa'i sngags bya ba de gsum ste/ rang bzhin gyis bzhugs pa'i sngags bya ba dang/ bya ba byed pa'i sngags dang/ ma bcos lhun gyis grub pa'i sngags gsum mo// mtshon pa sngags kyi sgo nas mtshon pa'i sngags bya ba la gsum ste/ kun btags rang bzhin gyi sngags bya ba dang/ bya ba byed pa mi slu ba'i sngags dang/ spros bral rang bzhin gyi sngags dang gsum mo/ spros bral rang bzhin la gsum ste/ rang bzhin gyi sngags bya ba dang/ ngo bo nyid kyi sngags dang/ byin rlabs skye ba'i sngags so// byin rlabs skye ba la gsum/ bde ba byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags bya ba dang/ tshig gis byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags dang/ ye shes kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags dang gsum mo// ye shes kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags la gnyis te// rig sngags dang/ gzungs dang/ gsang sngags gong du bshad do// gzungs sngags la gsum/ mtshan ma 'joms pa'i sngags/ gnyen pos sbyong zhing gnon pa'i sngags/ de dag dgongs pa bsdu ba'i sngags so// rig sngags la gsum/ rgyu ma nor ba rtsa ba'i sngags/ skyed pa rkyen gyi sngags/ bzlas pa 'phrin las kyi sngags so// 'ub bsdus rnam pa gnyis su grags/ byin brlabs

dbyings su grub pa'i sngags/ 'od zer rgyud sbyor rab tu gnas dang gnyis te/ de ni man tra'i dbye ba'o// dang po oM gzhag 'di ltar gzhag/ oM ni sku gsung rigs lnga'i bdag/ nor bu 'dzin pa'i gzungs thag ste// ye shes skye ba'i rgyu yin pas// kun gyi thog mar 'gro ba'o// ya ni ma skyes yan lag bzhi// sngags rnams kun gyi mes po yin// de phyir kun gyi dbu la gzhag/ oM dam bca' pa dang bkra shis pa'o// nor bu 'dzin pa'i snying po ste// sngags rnams kun gyi thog mar gzhag/ mtshon pa gzungs kyi yi ge yin// a ni yan lag lnga dang ldan// don rnams 'byung ba'i rgyu yin pas// sngags rnams kun gyi mgo bo yin// tha mar gdags yin bya ba de// rang rang las thabs gang byed pa'i// sham bu nyid ni gdags par bya// hUM bsdu phar spro b+h+yo yis 'phang// dzas dgug swA hA zhi bar bshad// rtsegs mar byung bas gnan pa'i las// rgyas par puSh+t-i ku ru la// dbang la ba shaM ku ru'o// drag po dag la mA ra ya// gnan pa dag la lang zhes bya// mtha' 'gyur gzhan la nges pa med// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// sngags bshad pa'i le'u ste rtsa gsum pa'o//// rdo rje rnon pos gsol btab pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ston pa khyod// ma rig ma rtogs thams cad la// rgyud kyi rnam grangs mang po ru// bdag gi rna bar grags pa de// de don ma 'tshal shan dbye 'tshal// nyon cig dad pa rab tu legs// shin tu legs so rigs kyi bu// 'di la gol sa khyad par che// shes rab can kyi bshes gnyen gyis// ming gi rnam grangs tha dad bstan// gang zag 'dul ba'i don ched du// drang don dag tu ngas bshad kyis// blo la long la 'khor la ston// btags pa'i rgyud ces bya ba yin// rnam grangs tan tra grags pa'o// 'khor lo 'dum pa bya ba dang// pra khog snang bya ba de// lha min drang srong ma thos par// mdun gyi bar snang khams shed na// mkha' 'gro ma dang mi ma yin// rgya yis btab ste ma grags so// ro langs drug cu'i tan tra dang// rag sha srin po'i tan tra de// klu yi yul du rkus te bros// mi yi yul du+u ma grags so// rak+Sha tshe srog bya ba'i rgyud// lcags sde khram gyi tan tra ni// lha ma yin gyi yul du khyer// mi yul dag tu ma grags so// mi yul grags pa'i dum bu rgyud// 'jam dpal gsang rgyud bya ba de// phyi nang gnyis su bshad pa ste// ha la ma la gter bsgrub bshad// nag po 'dus pa'i tan tra de// 'jam dpal spyi yi thun du gsungs// dgra 'khor nag po bya ba de// yi ge btu ba'i rgyud la bzhag/ las bzhin 'khor lo bya ba de// zhi rgyas dbang drag las su bshad// 'jam dpal spyi yi las su bshad// me lce 'bar ba'i tan tra de// gshin rje dmar po'i rgyud du

bzhag/ 'khrul 'khor rgyal mtshan bya ba de// 'jam dpal spyi yi ming du btags// lhur yang 'khor lo cha rkyen no// 'phrul gyi me long bya ba de// 'jam dpal spyi yi shar bur bstan// lcags kyi me long bya ba de// sra bas lcags su 'dug pa'o// don rnams gsal bas me long ngo// don la ming du btags pa yin// gsang ba nyi shu bya ba de// dgra sta ral gri sor rtub dang// dngul gyi dong tshe la sogs pa// go mtshon dmag dang me tog sgrub// de lta bu gsang nas bsgrub pa nyi shu la// gsang ba nyi shur btags pa yin// gsang ba bzhi bcu bya ba de// de yi ma tshang kha skong ba// bzhi bcu ston pas bzhi bcu'o// nag po zla gsang bya ba 'di// sgrub thabs man ngag rgyud du gsungs// bya rog mgo brtsegs bya ba 'di// rog ti mdo rgyud grags pa yin// mdor du mdor rgyud gsang rgyud gnyis// gza' gdong rgyud du grags pa yin// phal che ba la ming du btags// chos rnams cha cha dag nas kyang// de yi phyir na dkrugs pa yin// de phyir 'khrugs sdebs bstan pa yin// ra chod mkhan la dkrugs pa yin// mkhas pa'i ngo la gsal bar yod// mi mkhas pa la le ldebs byas// zla gsang nag po'i tan+t+ra las// rgyud du grags pa'i shan dbye ba'i le'u ste rtsa bzhi pa'o//// yang sdud pa pos gsol ba btab ste// ston pa lags// bdag cag rmongs pa'i 'khor rnams la// 'jam dpal dag tu grags pa'i sgrub don// sgrub thabs 'di yi shan dbye 'tshal// nyon cig rdo rje rnon po khyod// nyon la 'khor la rgyas bar ston// da ltar grags pa'i ne se ka/ ming du grags pa bsam yas kyang// bshes gnyen can gyis byas pa mang// ma 'ongs don du 'di ltar bshad// thar byed gzungs zhes bya ba de// nag po spyi yi khog gzhu yin// mtha' byed brgyad ces bya ba de// sde brgyad 'khor gyi sgrub thabs yin// rgyal rtags spyi lugs bya ba de// drag po dbang bskur sgrub thabs yin// gshin rje bla mtsho bya ba de// 'jam dpal bsgrub pa'i gnas la thogs pa yin// bar snang khams su bsgrub pa yin// 'jam dpal nag po spyi yi las// khyad par gyur ba cang yang med// nag po kha thun bya ba de// dmar nag gnyis kyi sgrub pa yin// mdo ru drug sngags thun la sgrubs// gshin rje las tig bya ba de// sgrubs thabs khrigs su bstan pa yin// nag po spyi yi las su bstan// khyad par phyi ba rdul tsam med// ming gi khyad par bstan pa bas// nag po 'bru gcig bya ba de// de lag gsum du bstan pa la// 'bru gcig ba dang khyi lud dang// nag po seng ge'i bsgrub pa'o// mdor na nag po gcig tu bsgrub pa yin// rgyan gcig pa yi bsgrub pa ste// mdor na skyed ldeng yang sgrub

dang// bzhi ni 'khor lo mi dgos man ngag go/ nag po phye bo bya ba de// bdun 'gyur sngags kyi tshad ma ste// 'bru ded yi ge zad pa dang// zas zad tshe zad dbang thang zad// gcig zad gnyis zad phye bo 'gros// phye bo lugs zhes de la bya// a mu dgu bskor bya ba de// phyi nang gsang ba gsum po la// gsum du phye bas dgu skor yin// las brgya rtsa gcig bya ba de// 'jam dpal spyi yi kha skongs yin// las thabs bcu gnyis bya ba de// 'khor lo bca' ba'i rim pa dang// so so'i ngo bo bstan pa yin// gshin rje las brgyad bya ba de// rang rang las kyi byed dus su// gnas sa 'dus sa bstan pa yin// nyi ma bzhi pa bya ba de// drag po bsgrub pa'i dus// nyi shu drug la zhugs nas ni// gnam stong dag la 'don pa ste// zhag bzhir nyi ma bzhi la bskor// nyi ma dang po mgo 'khor byed// gnyis pa khrag/ gsum pa brgyal bar byed/ bzhi po don po gdon mi za/ des na nyi ma bzhi ru grags/ thugs kyi gzer bu bya ba de// gshin rje dmar po bsgrub pa ste// ming du btags pas 'khrul pa ste// yang dag nyid du btags su med// gshin rje mgon po nag po'i rgyud// par bu nag po thebs zlog dmar po gnyis// gyim sham ga'u dmar nag gnyis// zla gsang rgyud kyi yan lag yin// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// rgyud kyi rnam grangs 'go ba'i 'khor la rgyud don ma 'dres gsal bar shan phye nas bstan pa'i le'u ste rtsa lnga pa'o//// yang zhus pa ston pa chen po lags/ 'khor lo bya ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ de la dbye na du tsam mchis/ bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig 'khor rnams gus par nyon/ spyi na 'khor lo rnam pa bzhi/ rtags dbye ba'i 'khor lo dang/ brda don dgrol ba'i 'khor lo dang// dran 'brel dbye ba'i 'khor lo dang/ bskul ba las kyi 'khor lo dang/ bzhi ru dbye bar bshad/ brda don dgrol ba'i 'khor lo la/ dbye na 'khor lo dag la bcu/ cho 'phrul mngon 'byung 'khor lo dang/ 'phrul pa mngon 'byung 'khor lo dang/ phyag rgya lha yi 'khor lo dang/ mdzad pa thugs rje'i 'khor lo dang/ bka' lung sde sdod rgyud pa'i 'khor lo dang/ don rtags chos nyid kyi 'khor lo dang/ gnas la dbang sgyur gyi 'khor lo dang/ rigs la dbang sgyur gyi 'khor lo dang/ ye shes la dbang sgyur gyi 'khor lo dang/ 'byung ba la dbang sgyur ba'i 'khor lo dang/ rtags la dbang sgyur ba'i 'khor lo dang/ rdul tshon gyi 'khor lo dang/ ras kyi 'khor lo dang/ gnan pa'i 'khor lo dang bcu gsum/ cho 'phrul mngon 'byung 'khor lo la phye bas bcu gsum// phyi ma'i 'khor lo dang/ spyi don 'brel ba'i 'khor lo dang/ rang don nges pa'i 'khor lo dang/ no be ka 'phrin las kyi 'khor

lo dang/ man ngag yig chung gi 'khor lo dang/ 'phyong drug gter gyi 'khor lo dang/ rgyud drug bzhi'i 'khor lo dang/ rang rgyud spyod pa'i 'khor lo dang/ rig pa thugs kyi 'khor lo dang/ rtogs pa phyag rgya'i 'khor lo dang/ 'bras bu sprul sku'i 'khor lo dang/ dam rdzas rdzas kyi 'khor lo dang/ bka' lung brgyud pa'i 'khor lo dang/ phye bas dgu'o// drag po bsad pa'i 'khor lo la/ zhe sdang khram gyi 'khor lo// mdze nag spu gri'i 'khor lo dang// mdze nag mgo gsum hom 'brel gyi 'khor lo dang// nag po khram gyi 'khor lo dang/ gtad pa gzir ba'i 'khor lo dang// mdor ba bkod pa sa bdag srog gi 'khor lo dang/ bzlog pa byad zor gyi 'khor lo dang/ kha 'thab 'dzing sgril gyi 'khor lo/ bzlog pa mdung thung gi 'khor lo/ sgrol ba sbyor ba'i 'khor lo/ brdeg ba thun gyi 'khor lo/ bsrung ba las bzhi'i 'khor lo/ bsdigs pa bya khyung gi 'khor lo/ dbub pa nag po stong gi 'khor lo/ mtha' sdud sngags kyi 'khor lo/ nag po dbubs kyi 'khor lo// gtad rgya bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bcu drug ste/ 'khor lo dbye ba'o// nges tshig don du bshad do// gang yang mi 'khor 'khor zhing 'gro ba dang/ rnam pa gzhan du 'phro yin 'gro/ rtsa bar 'khor zhing rtse mor gcod// 'khor lo zhes su grags pa yin// zla gsang nag po'i tan tra las// 'khor lo dbye ba'i le'u ste rtsa drug pa'o//// yang bka' stsal pa// nyon cig ma rtogs ma go ba// dril bas man ngag lung du grangs// mdo don spyi don gnyis su gsungs// sngags zhes bya ba'i don go dang// bzhi snying sbag mar ma shes na// dam can mkha' la ci la 'du// srog snying 'khor lo ma shes na// man ngag gtan la ci la phebs// gsang sngags 'byung 'jug ma shes na// dam nyams khram la ci la thebs// 'debs pa'i dus kyang ma shes na// dmigs pa'i don dang ci la phrad// rgyud bzhi gdan 'khor ma shes na// ling ga gnad la ci la phebs// drod tshad rtags ngo ma shes na// byas pa'i las la 'bras bu med// ting 'dzin 'khor lo ma shes na// bsgrub bsnyen sbyor ba ji ltar byed// lha yi tshad ma ma shes na// gnas skabs sa tshigs ci yis 'dzin// 'khor lo tshad ma ma shes na// 'khor lo grub rtags ci la 'dzin// sngags kyi tshad ma ma shes na// dbye bshags bzlas lugs ji ltar 'dod// sngags rnams btu+u ba ma she na// sngags kyi nges don ci yis 'dzin// lha ngo 'dre ngo ma bzung na// bab bcol bzlas su ci la 'dod// mtshams kyi dgongs pa ma dag na// byas pa'i las rnams don mi 'grub// rtsa ba nyi shar ma bzlas na// las sgrub byas kyang rtags mi 'byung// rang nyid bsgoms ma rnyed na// 'khor lo bskor kyang rang

la bzlog/ gnan pa byas kyang rang nyid gnon// lha yin tshad dang ma shes na// 'jam dpal khog gzhung phung ba yin// dper na byas pas mar dag sbyin// bsres kyang 'dres par cang 'gyur ram// de phyir gdams ngag rab tu gces// man ngag khong du ma chud na// dam can 'khol du ci la 'dod// zla gsang nag po'i tan+t+ra las// ston pas thugs kyi man ngag dril nas bstan pa'i le'u ste rtsa bdun pa'o//// ston pa ngo mtshar gyi ston pa la re'o ho// zhes brjod de 'khor rnams dad pa skyes so// ston pa la 'khor gyis bskor ba lan gsum du byas te// pU tsa nam mkha' gang ba phul te skra bkrol te bstod pa/ hUM mi bzad 'jam dpal khro rgyal gshin rje gshed// skad cig gsol spyod khams gsum mthur ldan pa// 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje'i sku la klu dbang rab brgyan zhing// gcan gzan gdug pa'i pags rlon na bzar gsol// sku yi rgyan du sbrul dang thod pa bzhag/ tshems kyi gseb nas rdo rje thog 'bebs shing// nad stong srin mo'i tshogs kyang 'dar yed yed// 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// zhal bgrad mche gtsigs 'od rtsub du mtha'i me// bdag spyan bzlog smin ma bsgrengs nas// gdug pa dma' dbab bran du mdzad la 'dud// dur khrod 'bar bar mtshan mor rab rgyu zhing// mi shig mgo nas chem chem za byed pa// 'jam dpal gshin rje'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// mthing nag ma he'i zhal dgu ni// 'jig pa'i spyan rnams bgrad cing spyan rnams bzlog kha kha byas pas dgra bo snying gsol zhing/ srog rtsa dmar nag snying nag dro 'jib ma// nyid kyi rgyud rlog dgra bo gsod mdzad pa// ston pa 'jam dpal khyed bstod a la la ho// zhes gsol ba btab bo// zla gsang nag po las 'khor rnams kyis ston pa la bstod pa'i le'u ste rtsa brgyad pa'o//// yang zhus pa// ston pa lags// rnal 'byor dme 'thab ji ltar lags// nyon cig rnal 'byor rnams ngas bshad kyis// yang ston pas gsungs pa/ 'jam dpal dme 'thab bstan pa'o// nang 'thab seng phur stag 'thab dang// ming gi rnam grangs bstan pa la// seng 'thab/ stag 'thab/ rus sbal 'thab/ sder 'thab/ mche 'thab// 'jing 'thab// mdor bsdus rnal 'byor dme 'thab yin// sngags pa nang 'gras dag la gsum// khyad par las kyi bya lugs la// dkyil 'khor rim pa 'di ltar ro// dbus su le tshe dgu pa ste// rim gnyis bskor te bcu gnyis bri// tha ma bcu gnyis rtse sprad la// bar bar du yang mi yang gzhug/ rtse sprad nang du gsang mtshan gzhug/ sgo ni dkyil 'khor spyi dang mthun// lha rgod ma yin dag tu bya// drag po'i dbang gzugs

so// dam can la yang dbang gzugs so// ma srid rnams la dam yang brdar// de ni bya lugs bstan pa'o// bon po bud med skye bo yi// ming yang 'khor lo'i nang du gzhug/ sngags pa'i ming yang lto ru gzhug/ slob dpon dang ni srin ba'i lha// 'jam dpal lha la dpang yang gzugs// de ni dpang gzugs rim pa'o// da ni sngags dang sgom pa ston// ma yi dag tu shes par bya// mchod bstod bskul ba gzhan dang mthun// bzlas lugs phyi nang gsang ba gsum// nyin gtor mtshan dril la bzlas// nyi ma dang po la bzlas pa'i sngags// pra ma ya hUM phaT// gnyis pa/ mur dza ya phaT/ gsum pa la/ rag tra ra tsa ya hUM phaT/ bzhi pa la/ mA ra ya hUM phaT/ sham bu bzlas te rtsa ba snyag/ bsgrub pa'i sngags su gsungs pa la// yang gsang rag sha nag po yis// sngags pa bshad pa'i gsang sngags gsum// ya ma rA dza sa to me ya nag po rag sha che ge mo rbad/ ya ma ta/ ril baM ril rbad ya// ya mi to ru na/ yo ta ya// rag sha che ge mo snying la to ru me baM ril rbad ya// ya ta yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ ar+ya rag sha che ge mo baM ril rbad ya// yak+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya// trag rag sha shig che ge mo thum ril rbad ya// bsad pa'i sngags su gsungs pa'o// gsang mtshan yod na rab tu legs// med na ming dag la bya// de la thun gyis brab par bya// bzlas pa'i dus la nyin mtshan gnyis// mtshan mo zhi ba'i sngags gsungs pa// oM ru ru trag rag sha/ mo te rtsi snying kha rag tre tre rag sha dam nyams srin mo ru ru dun b+h+yo/ oM sing tsa du kha shag snying la rbad// tsa du dam nyams lce lbibs rag sha tsa pa pra ma la// oM tsa ti ka ma ru rak+Sha pa le dam nyams traM traM srid mo kha la rbad// oM rag mo ru ru tsa pa la// trag mo tro ti sha ri snying la mA ra ya rbad ya// nyin skor mtshan ni skor ro// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med kyis bshad// seng phur kha 'thab ston pa'i thugs las byung// skor ba'i dus su shan pa mon pa bzhi brgyad bskul// gsang sngags dme 'thab gnag pa 'di// sems kyi btsas su bzhag pa yin// las su rtag tu shan pa bskul// ngag tu a kro rgyun du 'don// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// seng phur kha 'thab pa'i le'u ste rtsa dgu pa'o//// yang ston pa la zhus pa// ston pa lags// drag po'i las la du tsam mchis// zhus pas// ston pas gsungs pa/ nyon cig rdo rje rnon po khyod// don dam chos sku zhi ba la// dus 'dir 'jam dpal khro bo nyid// gshin rje dgra zhes grags pa la// 'khor lo bskor ba'i cho ga bshad// de dang ldan pa'i man ngag la// 'byung ba bzhin du cho ga yis// dur khrod dben pa la sogs par// maN+Dal tshad du bri bar bya// ba byung dri yis byi dor bya// phyi nang pU tsa tshul du dgram// tshogs

kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya// 'khor lo bri ba tu spo ba brtsam// sngags pa rnal 'byor ldan pa yis/ kha ni lho phyogs ltas te 'dug/ dam tshig rjes su dran par bya// bcu bdun pa yis sngags 'di gdon// 'khor lo bskor ba'i rim pa brtsam// dbus ni sor ni bcu drug par// kun tu zlum pos bskor bar bya// 'di yi nang gi sa gcod do// rim gsum bskor te rim gsum po// lho ru chud pa'i brda ru bstan pa'o// dbus ni le tshe dgu ru bya// bar pa bcu dang gnyis pa'o// tha ma bcu dang drug pa'o// dbus su ya man ta ka'o// phyogs bzhir las kyi gshin rje gshed// bcu dang gnyis la 'chi bdag bcu// bcu dang drug la ging gis bskor// gdug pa'i rtsang mar phur pa dgod// sgo bzhi bse mo mched bzhi dgod// yig 'bru sngags dgod byin rlabs chud// des na lha grangs tshang bar dgod// lha srin sde brgyad du ma 'dus// man ngag bdag por dbang yang bskur// las 'phro ldan pa'i mi la gtad// lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma la// gos ngan zas ngan gnas ngan brtsigs// dam dgra sku dgra 'dul ba'i phyir// 'jam dpal drag po'i 'khor lo bskor// sbas shing gab pa'i man ngag ste// shin tu sba zhing spyad par bya// da ni sbas pa'i sngags rnams 'byung// ma ni ra tsa k+She ya pra ma ni rbad ya// k+She ra ya ni da yo da ma/ ta na yo ru me to ya/ ma ta to tsa ma ra ya/ oM ka ya tri ta tsi pra ma ya rbad ya/ oM ya tsa pri ta mA ra ya rbad ya// oM ya de ba ti sa ma ya phaT ya/ dbus gnag shar gyi le tshe dkar// lho ser nub dmar byang phyogs ljang// bcu gnyis dmar la bcu drug ser// gong ras sngon po gru chad dmar// lcags ri nag la sgo rig bstun// zur bzhi gdug pa'i ka ba gzugs// de stengs pho bskor dgab par bya// de stengs 'khor lo dar nag dbub// gzer bzhi btab ste sgo lcag gzhug/ dbus 'dug kha ni lho ru blta// smra gcad sngags bzlas thun yang brab// 'khor lo 'gros kyis bskor zhing bzlas// be con thogs te tsham rngam bya// las grub nag po phyogs su rba// sngags su nag po spu gri bzlas// snod ldan bu la sbyin par gsungs// bstan na rgyal khams phung bar nges// khong du sbos shig spel ma min// 'khor lo 'khrul ba'i 'khrul skyon ni// 'khor lo tshad mar shes par gsungs// bstan pa srung zhing gdug pa 'dul// de don bsgral ba'i las 'di gsungs// ming gi mtshan nyid bstan pa'o// gsod pa spu gri btags pa'o// zla gsang nag po'i tan+t+ra las// gsod par spu gri'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o//// yang ston pas gsungs pa// sbyor ba mdung thung bshad par bya// dus ngan tha ma bstan pa'i snyigs ma la// yang dag bor te log ltar spyod// bstan pa gnyan po bskyang ba'i

phyir// sngags kyi 'khor lo 'khrul 'khor sgyur// man ngag drag sngags stong bzhugs kyang// bsad pa'i man ngag 'di las med// sbyor ba'i sngags kyi mdung thung 'dis// ston pa chen po bdag po des// 'khor gyi dang po bdag la gtad// chu srin kha ru rin chen chud pa ltar// bskal par 'khyams kyang khar mi dbyung// bstan pa'i yang snying bskol ba 'di// lha srin sde brgyad man ngag bsdus// sbas tig 'khor lo rgyal mtshan ni// sngags su bya ba'i don 'di dag/ oM ya ma rA dza sa to me ya/ pra ma ya rbad ya// oM me ru do na da yo ya// mur tsa ya rbad ya// oM ta ni yo na k+She ya ya// rag+ta rtsa ra ya rbad// yak+She ya tsa ni ma ra ya// dgra bo mA ra ya rbad ya/ 'di yang seng phur kha 'thab ste// zla gsang nag po las man ngag yig chung gi tan tran ste 'jam dpal la bsnyen pa 'bum du gdon// sngon du lha bsnyen tshad du dbyung// grub nas las la sbyar bar bya// grub nas dur khrod khar song nas// 'khor lo 'di na bri bar bya// spyi ru bstan na ro ras so// nang du bshad na thod par ro// gsang bar bya na zhing lpags so// de dang ldan par bri bar bya// rgyal chen sa yi maN+Dal ni// mkhas pas gsang ste nub mo bri// thig bzhi btab pas le tshe dgu/ bar ma bcu dang gnyis pa'o// mtha' ma bcu dang drug pa'o// phyi ru lcags ri sgo khyud dang// gdeng dang ldan pas bri bar bya// dbus su e gzhag 'khor lo bzhi// bcu gnyis bcu drug rtse sprad de// de yi bar du ming yang gzhag/ gru bzhi la ni zhal bzhi bri// phyag dang zhabs ni 'khor bar bri// sbrul gyi rgya gram gru ma gtad// mtha' ma rgya gram rdo rjes bskor// rdo rje'i bar du gsang mtshan gzhug/ las zin 'khor lo lto ru gzhug/ phur btab dgra la gnan pa bya// de bas bstan pa bsrung ba yi// gser dang 'dra ba'i man ngag 'di// snod ngan bu la mi sbyin no// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ sbyor ba mdung thung gi le'u ste so gcig pa'o//// yang ston pa la zhus pa las// yang snying rnam gsum bka' stsol cig/ bzlog phung sngags rnams bstan par zhu// bka' stsal pa// yang snying bya ba'i don de la// las kyi yang snying bya ba de// sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor bya ba yin// g.yas bskor pho/ g.yon bskor mo/ ste rlung la bskur ba'o// las kyi yang snying bya ba ni// bya tsa ye/ sing nga ye/ du ru ye/ las kyi pho'o// mo'i yang snying ni/ tsi ta ye/ pri ta ye/ ha la ye/ don gyi yang snying bya ba/ rdal la ye/ ma la ye/ kyi pho ye/ grub pa'i yang snying/ a pa ye/ U pa ye/ a pa ye/ ra na dza dza/ yi ge 'bru bzhi pa'o// yang snying yi ge dgu pa ni/ mu ge ye/ a pa ye/ las kyi yang snying/ sing nga ye/ bya tsa ye/ dur ru ye/ pho yi'o// mo'i/ tsit+ta ya/ pri ta ye/ ha la ye/ ha la ye/ de rnams

bzlas na/ tshe zad/ dbang thang zad/ bsod nams zad/ lo/ zla ba/ zhag/ za ma/ yi ge/ zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ 'phrul gyi me long gi le'u ste so gnyis pa'o//// yang zhus pa/ ston pa lags/ dbye dgug sngags rnams ji ltar lags// bka' stsal pa// las kyi sham bur bstan pa ste// rang dbang med par dgug pa la// hUM sa ma ya many+dzu kun tu hUM/ a nu ra na ga ya/ ya man ta ka hUM/ de byi thums thums// ha ha dam dam// sa ma ya dam dam/ baM ril rbad/ hur hur/ rni sti rni sti/ sod sod/ chod chod/ stong du bzlas so// dmigs pa gang yin pa dang/ kha dog dang tshul ci 'dra ba de khugs par bsam zhing dgug go/ da ni lha dang dbye ba/ oM rag+sha rag+sha/ ra ra ga sha phyung phyung/ oM de ba shan ting ku ru swAhA/ oM tsit+ta ye shan ting ku ru swAhA/ rig shan tsin da shag/ tri sha shag/ kha sa ni shag mur tin shag ma ni hri pri ta ya phrol cig/ dbye ba dang dgug pa'i las so// da ni bsgrub pa'i las gsungs te// rang nyid khro bor bsgom bya mgul du btags sam/ bzlas pa bya/ oM a kro te ka ya man ta ha na ma tha b+hany+dza ra na hUM phaT/ oM ha he na hA tri ta ya pra ha ra ni che ge mo'i byad zor bzlog b+h+yo b+h+yo/ sa ma ya bzlog bzlog b+h+yo b+h+yo phra mo de b+h+yo b+h+yo/ nang 'gras na 'di zor la bzlas la 'phang ngo// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// man ngag dbye dgug gi le'u ste so gsum pa'o//// yang zhus pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ston pa khyod// las kyi bya thabs bsam yas kyang// las kyi dmigs sel ji ltar lags// bka' stsal pa// 'khor lo dgu ru bya ba la// ras dang rdo thal myu gu snag tsha rnams// 'khor lo dgu ru rab tu grags// lha bzhi gang bzhi dus tshod bzhi// nyin gung mtshan gung nangs nub bzhi// dang pos las la bskul/ gnyis pas las la gzung/ gsum pas don rnams 'grub/ bzhi pas don rnams gdon mi za// don gyis gnad bzhi yod pa la// mi tshig dag gis bar mi gcad// stan gcig la ni mi 'dug cing// 'du 'dzi spangs te rdzas rnams bsog/ 'khor lo dag la zur bzhi ste// hUM ya ma rA dza du sta mA ra ya hUM phaT/ hu ya ma be sha ra mA ra ya phaT/ ya ma tsit+ta mA ra ya phaT/ hUM ya ma snying da ra ti mA ra ya phaT/ 'khor lo sngags kyis gzer btabs pas// khong du don po bcug pa ste// de la thar par ga la 'gyur// lcags mkhar sgo med bcu drug par// 'jam dpal gshin rje'i grong khyer yin// de la sngags kyi gzer bcu drug ste// a A/ i I/ e A+ai/ u U/ o au/ ri rI/ li lI/ aM a/ lcags mkhar sgo yi gzer du gsungs// ling ga dag la gzer bzhi ste// ya ma snying/ ya ma khrag/ tshal pa baM ril dum pa dum// ling kha gzer du gzhag pa yin// 'khor lo

bzhi la man ngag bzhi// sgrub dus yi ge mgon nang du bstan// bsad dus yi ge phyir ru bstan// thun dus sngags ni dgrol la brab// rdul mtshon phyag la don la brab// thun rdzas gshin rje ma mor sprul// man ngag bzhi ru bshad pa'o// mu tra bzhi ru grags pa la// be con ral gri 'khor lo dang// spu gri dag dang bzhi ru grag/ gnan pa rnam pa bzhi yod de// dur khrod mdun sa lha khang dang// rgya gram them 'og klu gdug gnas// gnas sa bzhi ru gnan pa bya// dbye ba'i rdzas la rnam pa bzhi// gu gul rwa gzhob rgya tshil dang// mu zi tshil chen dag dang bzhi// dbye ba'i rdzas su gsungs pa'o// gnan pa'i thabs la rdzas bzhi yod// 'khor lo rgya gram ri rab dang// phur ba dag la gnan pa bya// brab cing brdeg rdzas rnam pa bzhi// nyungs kar thal chen khrag dang dug/ rdzas dres brabs nas gdon mi za// brten pa'i rdzas ni bzhir gsungs te// mi snying rta snying bya nag snying// khyi nag snying dang bzhi ru gsungs// rten pa'i rta bzhi yod pa la// lug nag smug nag khyo nag bzhi// rten pa'i rta bzhir gsungs pa'o// brdeg pa'i dus tshod bzhi gsungs te// ston zla bor ba tha chung bzhi// brdeg pa'i zla bar shis pa yin// sngags pa mda' 'phen zla ba yin// dmigs pa'i 'phen bzhi yod pa la// ras kyi 'khor lo ling ga dang// rkang rjes tsa ra rog po bzhi// dmigs pa'i 'bem bzhi bya ba yin// man ngag dus bzhi yod pa la// 'khor lo bri ba dus bzhi dang// dus tshod lta phyogs smug gu dang// snag tsha bzhi ras dgos pa bzhi// stim pa bzhi bzhi dag tu gsungs// ting 'dzin dgongs pa rnams la brgyad// las rnams gtan la 'bebs pa ste// phur pa ri rab dag tu bsgom// khrag gi rgya mtsho khol mar bsgom// ras ni rlung nag tshub ma bsgom// ling ga me ltar 'bar bar bsgom// thod pa lcags kyi khang par bsgom// re ba phyar thums gtums par bsgom// mtshon khar sbrul gyis dkris par bsgom// las kyi gshin rje sde brgyad rnams// hab stob byed cing za bar bsgom// ri rab brjid ldan gnan par bsgom// ting 'dzin bsgom pa'i rim pa'o// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// 'jam dpal sbyan sel gyi le'u ste so bzhi pa'o//// yang zhus pa/ ston pa lags// hoM sbrel sbyin sreg ji ltar lags// rgyas par bdag la bstan du gsol// bka' stsal pa// drag po hom du sreg pa yi// dang po stegs bu brtsig pa la// sa gzhi nag po subs can la// khru do rgya ru dpangs mtho do// dbus su gru gsum thur du bru// kha khyer chu zheng sor bzhi pa// dbus su 'jim pa bzang po la// tri shul rtse gsum byas la gzhag/ bang rim gnyis la phyi nang du// thod pa rdo rje rgya gram gtang// zla kham

dmar po'i nang du byung// tha ma zlum pos bskor bar bya// bri 'am rtsig gam 'dam ka'o// phyogs bzhir rdo rje rgya gram bri// sgo dang rgyan rnams spyi dang mthun// rdzas rnams bsags pa'i rim pa la// lcags phye zangs phye rdo phye dug/ khrag dang nyungs kar ldong ros dang// lha bshos nag po zur gsum pa// tsha ba'i rdzas dang gdug pa can// bshams te rab tu shes par bya// rdzas kyi rim pa bshad pa'o// hom du bya ba'i yaM shing ni// bil ba ka ra dag dang ni// kho bo dang ni nim pa la// dri mi zhim pas bskus nas ni// 'di rnams med na mthun pa'i shing bus bya bar gsungs// mthun zhing gdug pa tsher ma can// skyer pa la sogs sor bcu'i tshad// bsreg shing bya rog khra tshang dang// 'ug tshang bye tshang gdug pa'i shing// sor bcu yi ni tshad du bya// zur gsum gzhog la nag pos bku// nyi shu rtsa gcig dag tu bsham// thun snod lcags kyi phru bar bya// de ru sbyar la hom gzar gyis bcus te// ske tshe brdungs la nang du blug/ lha yi grangs dang bstun te bsreg/ khyal bar bsreg rdzas nyungs kar dang// ske tshe nim pa lo ma dang// thal chen rkang rje blangs la brab po// bong du rnga mo phya sra dang// phub ma bya rog tshil bu dang// gos sra dri chen chu dang// tsher ma can gyi shing dang ni/ rus pa bu 'gram bla ba'i sha// bsre ba'i 'os dang bsres la dbul// dug dang lan tshwa mang du bya// khrag dang rgya skyegs khu ba la// don po'i gzugs bris lha dbral bya// rtsa sngags dug dang 'dra ba 'di// mgo la a kro bton te bzhag/ gzhug tu gdags pa'i sngags 'di lta ste/ oM hriHSh+ti bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ sarba sha tru na sha ya/ staM pa ya/ mu de tsa ya hUM phaT/ che ge mo mur tsa ya phaT/ che ge mo rag+ta tsa ra hUM phaT/ mu ra tsa ya phaT/ mA ra ya hUM phaT/ tsa mun hUM dza/ e ka tsa ya mA ra ya hUM phaT/ rak+ta yang sbreng/ rtsa sngags la/ a mu dza khaM mA ra ya shan// tri ku ru dza/ byas la rdzas dbul/ smre sngags gdon// bsreg rdzas rim pa dang dbul ba bstan pa'o// thab khung me lha bskyed pa ni// yi ge raM las bskyed do dza// phaT dz+wa la raM gyis spre// saM ha ra hUM gis bsdus so// skur grub ra kham pa chibs pa// zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ dam tshig me la bskyed pa'o// de nas ye shes me lha spyan drangs te// yaM shing nag po zur gsum po// drag po rigs lnga me spar te// skye ba med pa rang zhes bya// phaT dzA la raM hUM phaT/ dzA la raM hUM phaT/ bstan pa bya ba'i don bshad de// me lha rgyal po khyed rnams kyang// sngon dang da ltar yod bdag ched// rdzas chen dbul bas gdan la bzhugs// dges shing brtan par bzhugs su sol// stiSh+Tha pad+ma sa ma ya lhan// dzaHhUM baM hos bstim par bya// me lha pU tsa'i rim pa dbul bar bya// bsreg rdzas

dbul ba'i tshig bshad 'di'o// drang srong chen po sngon chad ma gtang ba'i// shin tu gdug pa'i yam shing tsher ma can// bsreg rdzas dug dang 'dra ba'i rdzas dbul gyis// dam nyams dgra bgegs zhal du bzhes su gsol// oM a kro te ka ag ne a mu kha shan ting ku ru mA ra ya phaT/ rang re sngags sham bu la// a mu ka mA ra ya ni kun la btags// me bstod rim pa 'di ltar bstod/ tshangs pa 'jig rten mgon gyi sras// me lha'i rgyal po drang srong mchog/ 'jig rten yongs la bskyab pa'i phyir// 'dul ba'i dbang gis sku sprul pa/ gsang sngags 'chang zhing rig sngags bsrung// phyag mtshan bcud ldan gun d+he bsnams// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa// 'jam dpal sprul pa khyod la bstod// yang zhus pa/ lha la sbyin sreg dbul mi dbul// bka' stsal pa/ dkyil 'khor lha la tshang bar dbul// me lha lho ru skyed pa dang// me lha mdun du bskyed pa gnyis// spyan drangs bstim dang mchod pa dbul/ de nas sreg rdzas rim pa dbul// dbul ba'i tshig bshad 'di lta ste// chos nyid brdal ba'i hoM khung du// rig pa byang chub sems kyi me sbyar te// dam nyams dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i phyir// 'jam dpal lha tshogs kun la dbul// drang srong rdzas 'di 'bul gyis// dgra bgegs ma lus rlag par mdzod// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// drag po hom gyi le'u ste so lnga pa'o//// yang zhus pa// ston pa lags// drag po 'khor lo bskor tsam na// las kyi char ka 'tshal mi 'tshal// 'tshal ba lags na bshad du gsol// yang ston pas gsungs pa// las rnams rdzogs pa'i ting thogs la// las bzhi 'dzab ni khri khrir bya// brgya tshar re la sman mchod bya// btab pa re la smon lam re// dug gi brab cing nyungs kar brab// ske tshe thun dang brab par bya// 'khor lo kha dbye ling ga brab// mon bzhi shan pa bskul bar gtang// bzlas pa'i sngags ni 'di lta ste// sku gsung thugs dang 'phrin las dang// yon tan sngags su gsungs pa la// oM a kro te ka ya man ta ka ha na ma tha b+hany+dza hUM phaT// oM ka la ru pa hUM phaT a/ oM hriSh+ta bi kri tA nan hUM phaT/ mu tra be con phyag rgyas bcas// nyi ma dang po ya ma ra dza bsgom// dza sa to me ya/ che ge a mu kaM pra ma ya ni/ sha ku ru ni hUM phaT/ thun ni nyungs kar dug gis brab// smon lam btab la bro ri btang// thun kun mon dang shan pa bskul// nyi ma gnyis pa myos byed bsgom// ya me to tu na yo ta ya/ che ge mo a mu kaM rag ta tsa ra ya ni/ sha ku ru hUM phaT/ smon lam btab bskul gong dang mthun// nyi ma gsum pa ma ru rtse// ya ta ya no ra ya k+She ya/ che ge mo srog rtsa a mur tsa ya ni sha ku ru ni hUM phaT/ nyi ma bzhi pa ral pa tshar dgu/ yak+She ya tsa ni ra ma

ya/ che ge mo a mu ka mA ra ya ni sha ku ru hUM phaT/ thun rdzas brab cing bskul stab bro/ yang dang yang du bya bar gsungs// oM many+dzu shri a kro te ka ya man ta ka kA la ru pa ni sha ku ru ni hUM phaT/ nyi ma bzhi pa las kyi mtha' sdud do// sa ma ya many+dzu shri mu tra// ya man ta ka pany+tsa de ro ni hUM dza/ many+dzu shri a kro te ka ya man ta ka kA la ru pa ni sha ku ru ni hUM phaT/ oM many+dzu shrI mu tra ya man ta ka/ a kro te ka ya man ta ka che ge mo rbad thuM ri li li// rnirAmA ra ya/ ya ma ra du/ ya ma snying/ ya ma khrag/ ya ma dun/ ya ma rbad/ tshal pa tshal pa/ baM ril staM pa nan/ dum bu dum bu/ hu duM hu duM/ shig shig phul/ glong bu shig shig phrul/ a sti staM pa ya a mu rkaM rbad/ thuM ri li li b+h+yo/ de ba ro ta na nan/ big nan to ha nan lang lang to ta nan ma hA do da nan/ 'jam dpal las kyi mthar thug pa// las rdzogs rting la gnan pa bya// 'khor lo man ngag bsad pa'o// snod ngan mi bstan blo gting sba// byang chub 'dod pa'i gang zag la// 'jam dpal tsha tshwa gdab par gsungs// rang nyid ya man ta kar bsgom// 'jim pa rig chen sna lnga las// rin po che yi skor bur bsgom// bdud rtsi bsangs te 'bi 'bi bya// lag pa thabs dang shes rab bsgom// lag mthil gnyis su yig 'bru bsam// g.yas su oM ste g.yon du oM// de gnyis bar du 'jim pa bsam// yig 'bru 'jim pa'i nang du thim// de las 'od 'phros don gsum byas// slar 'dus 'jim pa dag la thim// a kro bzlas pas sku ru grub// phar 'phros don byas dbyibs bsdus te// tshur 'dus sku yang 'od du zhu// kor bu bcug la a kro bzlas// a kro 'od zer spro bsdu las// bcud bsdus 'jim pa sku ru grub/ las bzhi gang byed dbyibs su gyur// btab la dkyil 'khor steng du bzhugs// maN+Dal khrus gang gru bzhi pa// dbus su zlum po gsum rim bya// dbus su me tog phung po dgod// de la lha lnga dgod par bya// bar bar tsha tshwa gzhag par
