mdzod sgo yang phugs kyi// nang rol dag la gdags par bya// de nas sa ser 'dam pa la// mi gzugs rkang pa phyin log bya// de la phur ma de nyid ni// phying ba lag pa tsam cig tu// phyed dkar phyed nag steng du bzhag/ nas de re re gnyis gnyis gsum gsum byung// re re gnyis gnyis nor tshol rung// rus pa tshol yang rung// re re gnyis gnyis chang phud dang// mnyam phud kyi nang du btsal// chang phud nang du sngags bzlas te// 'thungs nas gar gtad sa ru snang srid 'chad// mig ser can gy-i nor rku 'chor// man ngag gting du gsungs pa'o// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// zab mo pra'i le'u ste nga dgu pa'o//// yang zhus pa// ston pa lags// smyo zhing 'bog pa'i las rnams gang// zhus pas// bka' stsal pa/ yang na bya thabs 'di lta ste// rta thod nang du nyungs kar dang// dug sna tshogs la 'di skad do// rbad su rbad/ khrag ti rma ra na rbad// nyos na ling ga 'gyel na

rlag/ phu rlag tu rlag so 'gram// byas te dgra bo ming dang bcas te de ru gzhug par bya// don po gang la gnas pa'i sa// sa dar shin tu mnan pa dam par bya// zhag ni bco lnga dag nas rtags chen 'byung// smyo zhing 'gogs pa khyad par che// yang na pha bang gdong la brdeg/ nyungs kar thal chen nyungs nag dang// ske tshe bsres la sngags 'dis brdeg go/ ru thum ril lu ling/ gug thum ling/ nyam rbad/ sha rbad/ gur tshar ling/ mugs rbad/ smyogs gug/ tshar ling swAhA/ byas te brgyab nas myos nas 'gyel/ gar song byas na sdig tu 'gyur// mi rgod jag chings bya bar bshad// yang thabs mchog bya ba khyad par bya ba la// ma thod rta thod mtshal chen g.yung drung bris// nang du gu gul blugs la/ sngags stong du bzlas par bya// badzra seng sangs srin la rten// sa las tshe'u thul thul// sngags bzlas khyim du chud la legs// g.yas su dong brkos nang du sba// thogs kyang zhag ni bco lnga nas// smyo zhing 'gog pa'i las byung ngo// shin tu rnam smin che che 'dra// thugs rje'i cho 'phrul bya bar bshad// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// cho 'phrul bstan pa'i le'u ste drug bcu pa'o//// yang gsungs pa// rgyal ba'i bstan ba bsrung ba la// skyin thang thog ser dbab pa bstan// 'jam dpal gtsug na me 'bar gyis// gshin rje byi na ya ga bya ba des// dbu gtsug dag na me 'bar bas// ngan sngags ser ba tshigs khrid du// 'bebs pa'i sgom pa 'di lta ste// sku mdog dud kha dbus mthing ba// zhabs bzhi dbu yi gtsug na ni// me 'bar dud pa sprin du chags// phyogs bzhir glog 'gyur 'brug sgrogs pa// g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje rtse dgu bsnams// 'og ma gnam lcags stegs pu bsnams// g.yon gyi dang po ban d+ha dmar gyis bkang ba bsnams// 'og ma zhags pa 'dogs tshad thogs// kha nas khrag gi ser ba 'bebs// 'jigs byed sku la dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan// khams gsum thams cad dregs pas bkang// thams cad dbang du sdud par bsam// bsnyen pa gong de dag nas kyang bya// khrag dang ming 'bral de la bzlas// nyungs kar thal chen dag la bzlas// phyogs su gtor zhing nyungs kar 'phang// ra grod nang du khrag blug la// bud med dag gam sbrang long la// khrag bskur snyung gis bu gar btsags// gar 'bebs sa ru 'dzag tu gzhug/ gzugs byas mgo ni shar du bstan// rkang pa nub tu bstan par bya// snying khar hoM gzugs bsreg par bya// ra rog khrag dang khyi brgya'i khrag/ de dag sbyar te tshil chen// grong pa'i khrag ni khyor gang la// sbyin sreg bya/ bsnyen pa'i sngags dag 'di lta ste// oM badzra phri tsa ni/ de ni bsnyen pa'i sngags su gsungs// sbyin

sreg sngags ni 'di lta ste// oM bi na ya ka u nan/ dar du zir nan/ khugs shi mu phub swA hA// ku hi ku hi la'-i ku dza dzi/ du rten nan/ dgra nan nad zir/ khug cig/ su su he su hi/ sha khrag nan dad si nu su ti/ ke kha khu nan/ su tri su tri/ kring kring mi tsi ri swAhA// sngags shing gong mas g.yang gzhi brdab// phyogs su gtor zhing 'bum lnga klog/ rang nyid 'jam dpal gshin rjer bsgom// spyi gtsug steng du bya khyung bskyed// yi ge krung las bskyed par bya// zhal gcig phyag bzhir bskyed par bya// rgya mtsho'i steng du rdo rje'i brag/ brag thog gshin rje bzhugs par bsam// byang khyung kha nas thog ser rgyu// sna dang mi nas thog dang 'brug/ grag cing skyin thang 'bebs// 'jam dpal zhal nas thog ser 'bebs// phyag na khyung phrug mang po 'phro// khyung phrug kha nas thod ser 'phro// thugs rjes bstan pa bsrung zhing skyong// gza' skar dag la mi ltos te// rnal 'byor nang rtags rdzas la 'byung// byung dus rang du brtul zhugs kyis// gnyan sar drag po las sbyor bya// bya khyung cog rdungs pra ba yin// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// cho 'phrul thog ser dbab pa'i le'u ste drug cu thams pa'o//// yang zhus pa/ ston pa lags// nag po klu ser ji ltar lags// ston pas gsungs pa// 'jam dpal klu nag ser ba la// dbab lugs mi mthun gnyis su bshad// nA gi skyin thang thog ser la// man ngag spyi yi bya lugs la// chu mig kha byang bltas pa dgu pa ru// ngams nag rdo dreg yod pa na// de na klu ni nag po gnas// de ru gru gsum e'i dkyil 'khor gcig/ byas la de yi zur gsum du// rdo ni dkar po glang dmar rwa// de gsum sgyed phur byas la ban d+ha bkal// sked pa mi yi khrag gis byug/ de ru mi khyi ra khrag gsum// thod par blug ste sgyed bur bkal// sbrul mgo bdun ba'i gzugs byas la// bag phyed dag la bya bar gsungs// rdo dkar steng du sbrul de bzhag/ rang nyid bya khyung ting nge bzhugs// klu rnams dbang du bsdu// nyungs kar ske tshe dag la sngags 'di bzlas// oM nA ga shu nan shu na na ga ba yu/ khu ya ba dang// rag sha ga ru Da phaT// da ni bya khyung bskul bya ste// hriHdpag bsam shing la gzhengs pa'i bya khyung ka ru Da// ye shes mig la gser gyi gshog pa can// ri rab rtse nas rgya mtsho'i gting du mchu bsleb ma// klu rgyal gdan du 'dings shing klu phrug zhal du gsol// de phyir klu rnams thams cad bka' las ma 'da' zhig/ klu rnams nga yi bka' las 'das gyur na// klu yi gnas rigs phung zhing rlag gam re// bya khyung mu babs te// oM tsho bzlas// mu tra bcas la zil gyis gnan// de nas me btang thod pa bskol// khrag bskol thod pa kha sbub

bo// thog ser spags pa'i pra rta dbab// lug nag lhas su lhogs pa 'dra// ser ba phyings pa bkab pa 'dra// shin tu gab par gdams pa'o// bya thabs klu yi pra rta la// lung gsum sum mdo mdo gsum du// sgyed sdo gsum du bya ba la// klu rdo gro bo gcig po la// ma mo gang rungs snying po bri// rta yi khrag gis bri bar bya// zhing lpags dag la klu yi yang snying bri// chu mig gting du sba bar bya// yang na klu sbrul nag po mgo gcig pa// sbal po nag po gcig dang gnyis// byas la chu mig gting du sba bar bya// sba ba'i sngags ni 'di dag ste// yi dam lha ru 'jam dpal bsgom// bzlas pa'i dus su bya rgyal khyung// oM ga ru Da pa ti badzra hUM tsi ri pra sha phaT// an tra man tra/ tsin tra/ tsin tra dun tra/ na ga lo dum pa le hUM phaT/ byas te gtor ma gnyan sar gtor// pra rta dkar mo skyin tang 'ong// btsan thabs bya ba'i man ngag go/ man ngag rgyud dus ngas bshad do// snod ngan bu la mi sbyin no// shin tu bsdigs par gsungs pa'o// yang gsungs pa// shin tu zab pa'i 'jam dpal klu ser 'di// khyad par du yang bstan par bya// gnas ni chu mig dgu pa la// byang bltas rdo dreg nag po can// lha klu nag po gnas sa ru// e la mthing nag zur gsum bru// zur gsum zur du sgyed rdo re// dkar nag glang dmar ra dang gsum// sgyed bu byas te ban d+ha dag la// phyi ru khrag gis phugs te nang du rdzas// ra khyi mi gsum khrag blugs la// 'og tu gdug pas me spar te// rang nyid rta mgrin dbu+u la khyung// lus la sbrul ni dkar nag brgyan// mdun na khrag gi rba rlabs 'khrug/ snang srid ma mo bka' non bsam// de nas seng ldeng phur ba sor brgyad pa// gu gul nag po'i dus bas bdug/ sngags ni stong du bzlas par bya// na mo bud d+hA ya/ oM ki li ki li tsan tra tsan tra na ga b+han d+ha ya phaT phaT swAhA// bzlas shing gu gul du bas bdug/ bya khyung spyan drangs klu rnams dbang du bsdu// 'jam dpal dbu stengs bya khyung bsgom// hriHdpag bsam shing las gzhengs pa'i byang khyung ka ru na// ye shes spyan la gser gyi gshog pa can// rdo rje sder mos thogs med lcags kyu can// ri rab rtse nas rgya mtsho gting du mchu mos snyeg/ klu rgyal gdan du 'dings shing klu bran zas su za// de phyir klu rnams nga yi dam las ma 'da' zhig/ nga yi bka' las 'das par gyur pa na// klu rnams kun ka gnas rigs kun ka phung la brlag par 'gyur// khyung gi mu tra bcas pa dang// me tog bag chu dag la bzlas// klu rnams dbang du bsdu'o// da ni dbang bsdus zil gnon bzlas// oM badzra ba ki ka tru na hUM hUM hUM/ mi ri tsi mi ri sri tsa hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA// de bzlas thams cad dbang du sdud// de stengs a kro tshan chen

gdon// klu yi snying po 'di bzlas te/ badzra nA ga rA dza phud/ ces bzlas// drag por phob// bag zan 'byin pa la ming gzugs byas// sbrul nag mgo bdun gcig byas la// ri mo sngon mo bri bar bya// rang nyid 'jam dpal dbu la khyung// mdun du rta mgrin bsgom par bya// de bsgoms klu rnams gdung bar bya// sgyeg rdo dkar po cig tsam la// rdo tshan steng du sbrul bzhag la// mgo la blugs sngags 'di bzlas// oM badzra ma tim mar ti tsa krugs krugs// ma ma sri srog drag tu phob// nA ga nA ga go la khrag la nA ga drag po phob// stong bzlas phog byas ser ba dbab// klu gzugs sbrul mgo bdun yod pa// nag po gal chag brjid pa'o// de bsgoms kha nas glog 'khyug pa'o// kha nas khrag gi ser ba 'ong// des dkrugs ser ba rang dbang med par 'ong// 'bab ste phying ba bkab pa 'dra// des kyang ma phebs srid na yang// bdag gi rta mchog skur bsgoms la// khyi lud khyi lce rtsa ba dang// glang du bsregs la dud pa btang/ ske tshe khrag skam sngags 'di bzlas// oM gshu na gshu+u na gshu ha gshu ta// ba yu ba yu/ ba khu yu ba khu yu// ba ti ba ti/ ta ti phaT/ brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa// sbrul gzugs khrag dang ban d+har blugs// dur khrod ras sam bud med zhal ma// nang du gril la dkar nag gis gril la dkri// chu mig gting du sbas te gnan// seng ldeng phur bu rtse mo la// til mar tshil chen dag gis byugs// rtsa brgyad sngags bzlas gdab par bya// de ni thog ser skyin tang 'bebs// dus ni skya rings shar tsam na// yang na nyi shar nyur 'ub dbab// gza' la mi ltos nya la dbab// ston zla ra ba'i nya la shis// rgyal khams phung ba'i bra rtags yin// phur bu ma phyung bar du 'ong// dus ni srod la nyi zer la// oM hUM phaT b+h+yo b+h+yo dam nyams yul du phob// 'jam dpal thugs kyi ny-ing khu yin// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// thog ser dbab pa'i le'u ste re gcig pa'o//// yang zhus pa/ drag po las kyi byed dus su// thebs pa'i zlas dus ji ltar lags// ldog pa'i dus tshod ji ltar lags// ma 'ongs pa yi sems can la// thugs rjes gzigs la bstan du gsol// yang gsungs pa// nyon cig 'khor tshogs yang dag par// drag po las sbyor byed dus der// phan gnod gnyis su bshad pa la// thebs dang ldog pa gnyis su bshad// thebs pa'i dus tshod 'di lta ste// drag po las thabs gang byed dang// dus tshod nges pa 'di lta ste// dpyid zla ra ba'i bcu bzhi la// brtan ma rul te thebs pa'i dus// 'bring po tshes ni bcu drug la// bdud rnams nyul te thebs ba'i dus// dpyid zla tha chungs nyi shu gnyis/// ma bdun nyul bas thebs pa'i dus// dbyar zla ra ba'i tshes

brgyad la// gza' brgyad nyul bas thebs par gsungs// 'bring po'i tshes ni bco lnga la// klu yi rigs ni thebs par gsungs// tha chung ris la mi bya ste// ston zla ra ba'i nya gsum la// ma mo nyul bas thebs par bshad// 'bring po tshes ni bcu bdun nas// gnam stong bar du rgyu skar nyul// de la thebs par rab tu gsungs// tha chung tshes brgyad gnam stong la// lha chen brgyad po nyul bas thebs par bshad// dgun zla ra ba'i bcu gsum la// bcu drug bar du gnod sbyin nyul// dus der thebs pa dag tu bshad// 'bring po'i nyi shu gnyis nas ni// gnam stong gi bar du 'khor// gshin rje nyul bas thebs par bshad// tha chung nyi shu dgu dag la// lha srin nyul bas thebs par bshad// mi thebs ldog dus 'di lta ste// dpyid zla ra ba'i bcu bdun dang// bcu dag la ni ldog par gsungs// 'bring po gcig dang nyi shu brgyad// dus der ldog par rab tu gsungs// tha chung gnam stong dag la ldog/ dbyar zla ra ba'i gnyis dang lnga// dus dair ldog pa dag tu gsungs// 'bring po tshes ni bcu drug ldog/ tha chung tshes grangs bcu la ldog/ ston zla ra ba nyi shu lnga la ldog/ 'bring po tshes ni gsum la ldog/ tha chung tshes ni gnyis la ldog/ dgun zla ra ba'i bco lnga ldog/ 'bring po nyi shu dag la ldog/ tha chung nyi shu bdun la ldog/ ldog pa'i dus tshod bstan pa'o// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// drag po las kyi dus tshod brtsi ba'i le'u ste re gnyis pa'o//// yang zhus pa// ston pa lags// dbang bskur rim pa ji ltar lags// bka' stsal pa// dbang la rnam pa gsum du grags// thun mong rig pa'i dbang dang gcig/ khyad par rdzas kyi dbang dang gnyis// dam rdzas lnga yi dbang dang gsum// rig pa dbang rnams bka' rgyud mthun// rdzas lnga dbang bskur 'di lta ste// byin brlabs byas te rdzas rnams dbang bskur te// ban d+ha dbang bskur 'di lta ste// mtshan mas spros bral rdzas mchog 'di// skal ldan rnal 'byor 'di la dbang bskur te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub thob// ban d+has dbang bskur ba ni// chos sku skye ba med pa'i don rtogs nas// chos dbyings ye shes ldan gyur cig/ oM a b+hi Shiny+tsa muM/ skye med byang chub sems kyi rdzas mchog 'dis// skal ldan rnal 'byor pa la dbang bskur na// 'jam dpal dngos grub thob nas kyang// me long ye shes ldan gyur cig/ tsit+ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa ma/ khams gsum bsgral ba'i rdzas mchod sha ches 'dis// skal ldan rnal 'byor 'di la dbang bskur na// rin chen rigs kyi dngos grub thob par gyur// a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ gsang mchog rak+ta rdzas mchod 'di// skal ldan khyod la dbang mchog 'di bskur bas// pad+ma rigs kyi

dngos grub thob gyur cig a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM// las mchog bsgrub pa'i dam rdzas dri chu 'dis// skal ldan rnal 'byor 'di la dbang bskur na// gsung mchog gsung gi dngos grub thob gyur cig/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM// da ni rdzas chen pos bskur bar bya ste// thod pa dbyug tho phur pa dang// zhing dang rngai'u chung ral gri dang// thig le gsum gyi dbang bskur bas// phas rgol bas ni mi tshugs dang// rang rgyud grol zhing byang chub rgyu// 'jigs pa brgyad las thar par shog/ 'jam dpal sku gsung thugs mchog gi/ rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i dbang thob shog/ oM bud+ha kun+Da lan a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM// 'phreng ba sha chen be con dang// stag lpags ral nag chas kyi ni// khyed la dpa' rtags dbang bskur don dang ldan// 'gro don mthar phyin gdug pa 'dul// dregs pa 'dul zhing yi dam mi 'bral bas// mthu rtags ldan pa'i dbang thob shog/ bu tha ka la hUM maM/ sngaun 'gro tshems shing ku sha dang// srung skud rmi lam pra yang brtag/ khrus bya gsol gdab me tog gtor// 'jug rim bka' gzhung gzhan dang mthun// yon dbul dam tshig bsgrags par bya// gzhan yang dam rdzas tshang bar bskur// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor dag nas 'dom gang du// dbang stegs 'dom do'i maN+Dal bya// rang nyid 'jam dpal rnal 'byor pas// rtag tu las rnams bya bar gsungs// dbang gi 'jug sgo rgyas par bya// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// 'jam dpal dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste re gsum pa'o//// yang zhus pa/ ston pa lags/ 'jam dpal spyir las kyi spyi rgyugs rtsa ba'i man ngag ji ltar lags/ bka' stsal pa/ las kyi spyi rgyugs rtsa ba 'di ltar bshad de/ sangs rgyas bstan pa mi gnas shing// chos nyid bden pa mi 'dul te// dge 'dun btsun pa mi gnyan na// nga yis bstan pa der 'byung ngo// nga yi dus gsum sngon du 'byung// sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon du byung// nga ni dus gsum da ltar 'byung// nga ni lnga brgya tha ma'i tshe// de tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung// bstan pa thams cad nub pa'i tshe// de tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung// las ngan tha ma spyod pa'i tshe// de tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung// zas ngan lci ba za ba'i tshe// de tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung// gos ngan dug hrul gon pa'i tshe// de tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung// gnas ngan mkhar sbe rtsig pa'i che// de tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung// dge 'dun dag ni nub pa'i tshe// de tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung// dam tshig nyams pa mang ba'i tshe// de tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung// nga ni dus gsum 'byung ba'i sku// nga ni da ltar mngon ba'i lha// nga ni rab tu gsang ba'i rgyud// nga ni srid gsum sngon du 'byung// ji ltar bur ni zhi 'gyur yang// thams cad zhi ba nga yi sku// ji ltar bur

ni khros gyur kyang// thams cad 'phrog pa nga yi sku// dkon mchog gsum ni gnas pa dang// de yi bka' ni bskyang ba'i phyir// bcu gnyis rtsibs chen 'khor lo 'di// yi dwags kyi ni gos la bri// gzhal med thal ba sol ba gnyis// da ru ra yi khu+u ba dang bsres te// nim pa la yi lo ma dang// ka na kha yi khu ba dang// ni yi mang sa sra rtsi pog/ dug ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang// til nag nyungs kar mar khu dang// ra khyi khrag dang dri chu dang// rnyed na khyi khrag ra khrag dang// lan tshwa skye tshe sa dkar ro// tsan dan rgya skyegs gi haM dang// ldong ros gur kum spu bas bri// ma ra gshin rje dngos la ste// dbang ni chung ma'i snying khar bri// zhi ba zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te// rgyal pa lta yi rgyab tu bri// dbye ba rta dang ma he// dgug pa dred dang seng ge/ rmigs pa lug gi khong du gzhug/ bskrad pa rnga mo rgyab tu bya// smyo 'bros shan mar rgyab tu bya// gnan pa ri rab 'og tu bya// las kyi bye brag thams cad la// bstan pa bzhin du shes par bya// de rnams chos mthun brtsis te bri bar bya// bya rog sgro rtsas smyu gu bya// ga 'u kha sbyar nang du gzhug/ mchod rten nag po btab nas su// rab tu dben pa'i gnas su sba// la kha dang ni ma la kha// ri rtse dang ni skyed mos tshal// dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs dang// lha klu gnod sbyin dri zar sgrub// de nas rigs 'dzin nan tan gyis// sa ni yang dang yang sbyangs te// gang du yid dang dga' ba ru// 'bum phrag gcig ni yan chod bzlas// las su bya ba'i bsnyen pa ni// khri khri smra ba bcad la bzlas// phyag mi btsal zhing lam mi gzur// mi smra ba dang dbang po bsdams// dbyig pa thogs shing sdigs mdzub bsgreng// stag lpags gyon zhing bgrod dkar 'gro/ rigs 'dzin dag ni rtag par ni// lag pa'i sor mo thams cad kyis// mthe bong legs par sbas nas ni// rab tu bsdams pa bzang po bcing// las kyi bye brag gang byed dang// ya man ta ka khugs par bya// lha yi sku mdog phyag mtshan ni// zhi khro las kyi dmigs dang sbyar// pU tsa rnam pa lnga dang ni// mchod sbyin gtor ma cha gsum gtang// rang gi lan tshwa a mr-i tas// dus drug dag tu pU tsa dbul// nyur bar dang ni bul ba dang// yi ge mtshams ni 'dres par ni// nam yang smra bar mi bya'o// shin tu gsal bar smra bar bya// skabs su brda yi tshig mtshams sbyar// thog mar byang chub rtsa ba brten// shes rab de lta bu yang bsgom// sems kyang rnam par mi rtogs pas// nga yi gzugs su gyur par byos// dang po rdo rje las la bskul// gnyis pa gshin rje las la gzud// gsum pa gshin rje las rnams bsgrub// bzhi pa las rnams 'grub par byed// dus ni 'brug dang tshub mas gdab// 'brug sgra thog

dang ser ba dbab// lha klu gdug pa 'dul ba dang// nges par gnod pa'i dkyil du bskyal// rab tu dben pa'i sa phyogs sba// yang na dge ba byed pa'i gnas su sba// dus dang gza' skar gtad la bsgrub// thon nas so so'i sbyin sreg bya// hom dang 'khor lo sbrel bar bya// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// las spyi rgyugs bstan pa'i le'u ste re bzhi pa'o//// yang zhus pa// ston pa lags// nad ngan mdze nad kyi don bstan du gsol// ston pas bka' stsal pa// de yang sngon la de mi 'byung// dang la bsrung ba brgyad brtan 'khor lo 'byung// rang nyid bya khyung du bsgom bya ste// yang na phyag na rdo rje 'am// gang rung sku ru bskyed de bya// de la rgyab rten mdze nag sgrub// mdze nag bsgrub pa'i btsa' thabs la// dkar nag gnyis kyi bya thabs te/ de yang nag po mdze sgrub la// dang la rdzas dang bcab gzhi bstan// de yang gsum du gsungs pa la// ya rtags bcab bzhi bstan pa dang// gnas dang bya thabs bstan pa dang// ya ma rA dza klu nag las 'di la// lung gsum mdo dang brag chu 'thab// brag kha byang du kha bltas pa// sngaun na tswa shing gdug pa can// chu mig kha ni byang nub bltas// klu 'am klu srin ma sgrungs pa// dud tshod dbyar zla gsum la bsgrub// ya rtags dgra bo pha mes kyi// mtshal bu yod na rab tu legs// rje dpon rabs chad thod pa'am// de min rabs chad thod pas bya// khyi thod nang du ra brgya'i khrag dang khyi rgya'i khrag/ bud bu'i bdud rtsi dang sgom kha'i thigs pa dang// grogs ma'i zhing sa// srid pa'i lo ma byi la'i spu// de rnams gro ga'i shing lpags sam// shing gi tsan dan shug pa 'am// pha mes sogs pa la 'us bri// chu mig gnyan po'i khar song la// sa ni chag gang mar brkos la// de stengs skyer phur btsugs nas ni// dur khrod kyi g.yam pa la// 'khor lo bcu tri bris nas ni// dbus su dgra ba'i ming rus bsnol// sa khams pa la sbrul nag po// sa mig dmar kha nas me 'bar ba// kha ru dgra yi ming rus gzhug/ pha mes thod pa la sogs rtsal// mgo nas me btang thod khrag bskor// bra ma'i phur pa sor bzhi dang// nang gi ling ga dag la dbab// nam gyi sgor phyed shing phyed na// da ni rdo phug hom khung du// btsug la 'chi bdag nag po mgo dgu ba// dbang bskur byas la gnan pa bya// kha phor mchu lnga pa zhig tu// klu sman sna tshogs blugs te bzhag/ klu dang mthun pa'i ya rtags bsham// sbrul dang sbal pa'i dud pa bsad// sbal nag sbrul nag yod na bzang// de min khams pa'i 'dam pa la// rus sbal nag po'i gzugs byas la// dgra bo pha tshan nye bzhi ming rus te// bse byang dmar po gcig bris la// rus sbal de yi kha ru bzhag/ ro tshas ras kyi kha

bcad la// 'chi bdag klu nag mnga' gsol la// rdo phug nang du sbas te bzhag/ ma nyes dpang gzugs bden pa bdar// ya rtags bsham pa'i gleng gzhi'o// da ni spyod pa'i bya lugs bstan// dang po gtor ma gzhung bzhin btang// klu yi cho ga gzhung du bgyi// klu mchod byas la dpang yang gzugs// de ni gzhal yas khang du bskyed// oM phe ka ru brum// zhes brjod pas// sbrul nag gzhal yas khang// chu srin gyi thog phug/ rus sbal gyi ya them ma them byas pa'o// don po gcal du dgram par bsgom// oM nag po ti// pa tsa sarba rgyu pa tsa pa be ru sha hUM// zhes brjod pas rang nyid snying khar hUM// mthing nag ha la ha la'i dug/ 'dra ba'i don 'di ni sngon dmar 'phros// de lta bu ru bsgom par bya// nag po ti pa tsa ya kha ya sha hUM ya hUM ya// ra hu ya sha hUM/ brjod pas sbrul nag mgo dgu pa// kha nas me 'bar mig dang sna// khrag dang chu zer 'dzags par bsam// sbrul nag lag pa brgyad ldan pa// lag g.yas sbrul nag zhags pa thogs// gzas pa pho mo 'ching bar byed// lag g.yon nad kyi rkyal pa sdebs// mjug ma rgya mtsho'i gting du brkyang// gzugs phud ri rab dag la brten// dbu ni bar snang khams la 'phyo// lag pa stong gsum thams cad nyab// de lta bu ru bsgom par bya// oM na ga rag sha/ phes can pus sha/ pa lag sha hUM phaT// brjod pas klu mo nag mo de// sku stod bud med nag po'i cha lugs la// sku smad sbrul nag 'khyil ba 'dra// sku la sbrul nag thul ba gsol// ral pa sbrul nag mdzes pa la// mdze dang shu ba 'od 'phro ba// mig nag khrag 'dzag sna nas nad rlangs 'byin// zhal nas sbrul nag cho 'phrul 'gyed// lag g.yas sbrul nag zhags pa thogs// thogs te gtso bo'i sku la 'khyud// lag g.yon mdze shu'i rkyal pa thogs// phyogs bzhir nad sna sna tshogs 'thor byed pa// gzas pa po'i sha khrag brabs nas// gtso bo'i zhal du stobs// de 'dra ba ru bsgom par bya// oM phe ra ka sha dz+wa la hUM// bstod pas 'jig rten khams rnams kun// klu bdud sa bdag chu srin dang// klu btsan du mar gyur pa ste// gzas pa pho mo rkang pa bzhag pa'i sar// shul nag mdze dang shu ba'i tsha tshwa 'phro// nad kyi rlangs pa bsam mi khyab// oM nag po ti pa na ga ra ka sha che ge mo ti phu// le phe// shan phos// shig shig chum chum hu ya hu ya// klu nag po mgo dgu pa// dgra bo ma rA ya dza// byas pas las nad gtong sha yang zos// la las khram btab khrag 'thungs// la las yan lag bcings te gre bar bcug/ la las mchon brgyab rlung la bskur// lag tu phur thogs thugs dam bskang// hUM/ bskal pa'i rlung nag 'khyil pa'i hoM khung du// rig pa'i

rgyal po 'chi bdag mgo dgu pa// bdud kyi bdud bdag 'chi bdag klu yi bdag/ dgra bo klu yi bdud du khyod las lhag pa med// mi bzad yun gyi lhar yang bdag kyang mi gtong na// rgyal rten dpung gnyen du yang khyod las mi tshol na// gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// mthun ba'i zhal zas 'di gsol la// dgra bo 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// gdung rgyud klu la mdze dang lhog pa mthong// oM nag po ti pa tso pe ra ka shang u shan te// u traM na na// Na Na la shan ku ru tsa ya// oM mA ra ya dza dza// byas te bro yis gnan te bzhag/ zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// mA ra ya mdze can gyi le'u ste re lnga pa'o//// yang zhus pa// 'jam dpal drag sngags gdon pa bdog mi bdog/ bdog na bdag cag rnams la bstan du gsol// yang gsungs pa// drag sngags gdon pa 'di lta ste// 'jam dpal 'bru gsum bya ba de// don po zhag gsum gyis bsad pa// ngan sngags nyid khu 'di// maN+Dal cha gcig byas la// dbus su gru gsum gting du brko// gru gsum grwa ru gshin rje dgod// shar gyi gra la gan pa ti dgod// lho phyogs gra ru gshin rje stobs mchog dgod// byang du gshin rje dgab rgyal dgod// don po ling ga bya ba'i rgyu// rkang rjes chu shul grog mkhar sa// bag phye bsres la ling ga bya// ming rus de yi snying khar bri// mgo bo shar du bstan de bzhag/ gru gsum dbus su gan rkyal gzhag/ dkyil 'khor mtha' ma khrag gi phor pa drug gis bskor// nyungs nag nyungs kar khyor gang dag tu bzhag/ de nas nub mo dang po la// lcags phur gcig ni lag tu thogs// rang nyid 'di ltar bsgom par bya// rang nyid ga na pa ti ste// sku mdog mthing kha// dbus mthing kha spyan dmar ba// phyag g.yas lcags phur bsnams pa// phyag g.yon lcags kyi 'khor lo bsnams pa// de ltar bsgom zhing sngags 'di bzlas// oM badzra ki li kI la badzra bya tri ka ta// a ha hUM mi tri// ha mi lca// nyu tu ta pa nri// badzra grim ra nu ga ged rbad rbad thum ri li li// shag pa ti mA ra ya phaT// sngags de dang po khri bzlas te// phur pa la sngags de tho rang kha skya rengs shar ba tsam na dpral ba'i skra mtshams dag tu gdab// ting nge 'dzin gyi dgongs pa la// sngags grangs phur bu she dag gyur// dgra bo mgo lus yul thebs par bsam// de nas nub gnyis pa la rang nyid gshin rje stobs mchog bsgom// sku mdog sngon po spyan dmar ba// dbus dkar g.yas seng ldeng phur pa bsnams pa// phyag g.yon zangs kyi 'khor lo bsnams// de ltar bsgoms pas sngags 'di bzlas// oM badzra ki li kI la badzra bi ga de ya// ba ga ta ka hUM// ku ku ta su hi ga ma thuM ri ri li li rbad dza he b+h+yo// ka ma li

shag/ snying kha rag ya// de badzra bi ni mA ra phaT/ nub gnyis pa la khri bzlas la// phur pa sngags te rkang pa g.yon// bol gong dag tu gdab par bya// dus tshod skya rengs shar tsam na// ting 'dzin sngags la 'od zer 'phros// sngags zer phur pa dag tu gyur// mgo lus mjug ma thems par bsam// nub gsum gyi tha ma la// rang nyid gshin rje rga rgyal// sku mdog dmar po spyan rtsa dmar// dbu ni dmar nag ngag dang ldan// phyag g.yas gser gyi mchog phur bsnams// g.yon pa zangs kyi 'khor lo bsnams// de ltar rang nyid bsgom par bya// zhal nas ngan sngags 'di dag bzlos// oM a kro te ka ya ka rdza ni ga ya hUM phaT/ mu ti sa ting snying kha raka rbad// ka ma la snying rbad// mgo gshogs r+g+ri mA ra ya phaT// phur pa la khri re bzlas te gdab par bya// rkang pa g.yas na skya rengs shar tsam na// gdab pa rab tu brgyal pa gsungs// sgom thabs gong dang 'dra bar gsungs// de nas nyi ma shar tsam na// phur pa phyung la/ nyungs kar la rang sngags kyi brgya rtsa brgyad// bsngags shing phur bu shul brdeg/ de nas nyi ma phyed tsam na// rgya tshil me btang sbyin sreg bya// mgo gtums khrag ni thigs re dang// ming byang spel zhing sbyin sreg bya// sngags ni brgya rtsa brgyad du gdon// ming rus smos shing bsreg par gsungs// las zin thal ba rlung la phyar// tshan cig chu yi nang du mkha'// zhag bdun lon nas nyal gyis 'gro/ gong du lhag bsgrub tshad du lon// de nas gsum po rgyun du bgrang// bsgrubs la zhugs pas rtags rnams 'byung// drag sngags 'bru gsum rdzogs par bya// rgya yi btab la glo snying sba// rtags su mi shar ban d+he dang// me dang 'od dag cho 'phrul 'byung// zla gsang nag po'i lto tshil yin// 'jam dpal 'phrul gyi 'bru gsum po// zla gsang rgyud las drag po 'bru gsum gyi le'u ste re drug pa'o//// yang zhus pa// ston pa lags// skyin thang dbab thabs man ngag la// 'jam dpal khyung gis dbab pa dang// ston pas gsungs pa// 'jam dpal khyung gis dbab lugs la// rang nyid 'jam dpal lha bsnyen bya// bsgrub dus bya khyung dag tu bsgom// yang bca' lugs 'di ltar ro// bag phye sbrul dang sbal pa bya// khra bo dang ni ser por bsgyur// khyung gi gzugs brnyan shog bu bri// sku mdog smug nag sder mo lcags kyu bri// sder mo sum rim yod pa'o// mig nas me 'bar sna nas dud pa 'thul// lag gi sbrul ni bzung pa la// lus kyi mgo dang mjug ma la// lcags rtse 'gram gsum rtsigs la spungs// mchu dang sna ni lcags su 'dug/ de ltar bu yi gzugs bris la// rang nyid bsgom pa bya ba yang// de ltar bu ru bsgom par bya// de nas bslugs ma'i nang du

ni// khyi yi khrag che blug pa dang// bya pho khrag kyang khyor gang blug/ gam du yang khyor gang gzhag/ sbrul dang sbal ba slug mar bcug/ de la sngags 'di brab bar bya// oM a kro d+hi ka ya mAn ta ka/ e ha re sha ni khra hUM tshe// mud nyid khu bas ni// he phu he kha she/ u ni sta// ra hi u nyid na hi/ gzir ming shi tshe nyi// hu hi na hi ta ka dza swAhA// sngags de bzlas shing rma bya yi// sgro de khrag tu bcug la ni// slug ma'i sbal ba de la brab// ting 'dzin sngags la 'od zer 'phros// thams cad bya khyung dag tu gyur// klu rnams khyung gis gzir bar bsam// ya man ta kas bya khyung gzir// kha nas thog ser 'bab par bsam// de nas chu mig chu blangs la// de yi nang du sbal pa gzhug/ khrag de chu yis dag par bkru// klu rnams bya khyung ngang gis bya// bsad par yang dag yang byas la// bcom ldan de yi byin rlabs kyi// nga nyid kyis ni zar ma ste// nga nyid kyis ni gzir bas bsam// 'di ring khyod kyi ser ba phob// byas te chu mig dag tu ni// mu tra rdo rje gshog pa yis// brlab cing chu mig nang du bsgyur// sbal pa gcig ni rta dmar bzung// nam phyed gting la bkrus te chu mig nang du bsgyur// zla gsang nag po'i tan tra las// bya khyung ser ba'i le'u ste re bdun pa'o//// yang zhus pa// ston pa lags// gzhi yi 'khor lo ji ltar lags// gsang ba srog snying ji ltar lags// rtsa ba'i gnas lugs ji ltar lags// bslab gzhi bslab bya ji ltar lags// bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'khor gyi dang po ba// srog snying gsang ba ji ltar lags// lha bu gsum// shes pa gsum// mi 'gyur rtsa ba'i srog snying ste// srog ces bya ba rlung yin te// rlung ni rtsa ba gnas pa yin// rtsa ni lnga 'dus mu tra yin// de la gzung zhing bcad du med// srog snying zhes su grags pa yin// 'khor lo zhes su bya ba de// phyi mo bzhi ru grags pa la// snang srid gzhi ma 'khor lo dang// skye gnas gshig pa'i 'khor lo dang// 'jam dpal lto yi 'khor lo gsum// gsod pa mtshon cha'i 'khor lo bzhi// gzhi lam phyi mo'i 'khor lor grags// snang srid bzhi ma 'khor lo de// snod bcud 'khor lo gnyis su grags// snod kyi snang srid 'khor lo ste// bslab bzhi 'khor lo dag tu gsungs// mngon pa ko shar shes par bya// bcud kyi snang srid 'khor lo de// bslab bya dag tu shes par bya// srid gsum sems can thams cad la// thun mong thabs su rang rgyud gnas// srid gsum sems can ma lus pa// snang srid gtan la 'bebs pa ste// gshin rje lto na yod rtags su// rim pa gsum du byung ba yin// srid gsum sems can thams cad la// skye mched bcu gnyis yod rtags su// rtsibs ni

bcu gnyis 'byung ba yin// srid gsum sems can thams cad la// khams ni bcwo brgyad yod rtags su// bcu bdun pa dag sprul pa'i yum// bcwo brgyad du ni byung ba yin// srid gsum sems can thams cad la// rnam shes tshogs brgyad yod rtags su// rtsibs brgyad dag tu byung ba yin// srid gsum sems can thams cad la// sdug bsngalabacu drug yod rtags su// lcags mkhar bcu drug byung ba yin// srid gsum sems can thams cad la// thabs dang shes rab 'brel rtags su// A li ka lir byung ba yin// srid gsum sems can thams cad la// phung po lnga ni yod rtags su// le tshe lnga ru byung ba yin// srid gsum sems can thams cad la// sgrib pa sum cu rtsa gnyis yod rtags su// yig 'bru sum cu rtsa gnyis 'byung// skye rga na 'chi yod rtags su// tshad med sgo bzhi byung ba yin// srid gsum sems can thams cad la// 'byung ba bzhi po yod rtags su// las bzhi 'khor lo 'byung ba yin// srid gsum sems can thams cad la// gnas dang sa gzhi yod rtags su// 'khor lo bzhi dang rgyu rnams 'byung// srid gsum sems can thams cad la// las thabs sna tshogs byed thabs su// 'khor lo bskor thabs sna tshogs 'byung// srid gsum sems can thams cad la// yan lag lnga po yod rtags su// tshangs pa'i yan lag lnga ru byung// srid gsum sems can thams cad la// rtsa bzhi rtsa brgyad yon rtags su// tshangs pa'i ka bzhi gdung brgyad byung// srid gsum sems can thams cad la// nyi ma bzhi ru grags rtags su// bskor thabs bzhi ru grags pa yin// srid gsum sems can thams cad la// dug gsum dug lnga yod rtags su// dug gsum la brdeg byung ba yin// srid gsum sems can thams cad la// gnon pa'i dgra bgegs yod rtags su// rten gyi ling ga byung ba yin// srid gsum sems can thams cad la// 'thab rtsod gsod pa yod rtags su// drag po las thabs byung ba yin// snang srid nang gi 'khor lo la// de ltar rgyal ba'i bka' lung gis// nang rtags phyi ru 'khor lo 'byung// bcud kyi 'khor lo bslab byar grags// snod kyi 'khor lo brlab gzhi ste// snang srid nang gi 'khor lo gtan la 'bebs pa yin// 'khor lo kun gyi phyi mo yin// rtsa zhes bya ba'i gnas lugs la// mi mthun gzhung rnams so sor ston// 'jam dpal rtsa yi gnas lugs la// 'byung ba grub pa'i phung po la// rtsa ba'i bdud pa bsam yas kyang// 'di ni rtsa gnas bcu bdun te// che chung gnyis dang dpral rtsa gnyis// mkhal rtsa gnyis dang ru thung gnyis// snying rtsa srog rtsa gnyis te bcu// mchin rtsa glo rtsa mcher rtsa dang// mkhris rtsa dang byin

gzhug gnyis// glo rtsa a so li ka gnyis// rtsa rnams nang du 'od dpung gnas// de la lha rnams 'od du zhu thig ler gnas// rnal 'byor can gyi 'od zer gyis// shin tu phra ba blo yi brtag/ de la rtags rnams nges par 'byung// phyi nang gsang ba'i rtags rnams 'byung// rang bzhin med pa'i bde ba skyed// mthar thug rdzogs pa'i rim pa ste// sna ba ma bkag stong pa mthong// med pa ma rtsal lhun gyis grub// don dam gtan la 'bebs pa'i mchog/ snying po med pa'i snying po yin// don dam lta so khyad med pa'i// dngos po ngo la khyad par med// kun rdzob lam rim khyad par yod// don dam rgyu 'bras ngo bor mthun// man ngag zla gsang nag po'i tan tra las// 'khor lo phyi mo'i le'u ste re brgyad pa'o//// yang zhus pa/ ston pa lags/ gdon gyis btab pa'i gang zag la// phan gdags rim pa bdog mi bdog/ ston pas bdag la bstan du gsol// yang gsungs pa// phan gdags rnam pa gnyis su gsungs// rten 'brel rdzas kyi nus mthus gdul ba dang// sman sbyar mthu yis gdul bar gsungs// rten 'brel rdzas kyis gdul thabs la// rdzas ni gla rtsi gu gul shu dag dang// sbrang dang g.yer shi spru dkar po'o// sbrang gis sran ma tsam du dril byas te// bskams te brdungs la du bas bdug/ nad pa skra ni spyi bor bsdus// lag pas skra bzung du pas bdugs// lha 'dre gang yin gang yang min smra// yas 'dod kha ni shin tu smra// de la yas byin brang thod tu// re ba chur bcug brang du bkab// steng du 'dag bas zur gsum rtsig/ nang du lha 'dre'i snying po gzhug/ steng du bra ma'i me nag sbar// 'jam dpal hom ni lugs su sbar// sgoms su hom nag sbar bar bya// mnya' sgra rtser gyis 'gro bar nges// bzlas pa'i sngags ni 'di dag go/ oM a kro te ka stam la ya// gran pa ya// ru tri nyal ti swAhA// rna ba'i nang du gdab par bya// sngags kyi 'dis khyor chu sngags la blud// lus la brab cing dral brdab bya// oM a kro te ka b+ha ga ban de ru tra ya// da ra ni ta la ni/ he he man te/ so ga ba li swAhA// yang na bya thabs 'di lta ste// nad pa skye ni rkang pas mnan// ra po gcig ni sna mig blug/ lus la yang ni bsku zhing mnye// yang na ra yi 'o ma dang// sgog pa sgog skya gsum sbyar te// nad pa'i mig tu blugs par bya// yang na zhu mkhan nyungs kar dang// shing ni nim pa la ni// ra dug gcig tu bsres la yang// de yi mgo lus bkru bar bya// des kyang thul te gdon mi za// pi pi ling dang na le sham// tsi tra kha dang zhu mkhan dang// chang skyur bsres la btang bar bya// mig dang rna bar blugs par bya// des kyang gnya' sgra tser gyis 'gro/ nang du rta yi shing kun dang// nas dang

glang gi dmigs pu dang// rta dmigs spu dang kha spu dang// khyi s+phu phag rdub de bsres te// nad pa'i lus la bsku bar bya// des kyang thul te gdon mi za// yang na smen rtsa dkar po dang// pi pi ling dang na le sham// bca' sga g.yer ma ba gcig sbyar// sbrang rtsi sbyar la mig la bsku// des kyang thul te gdon mi za// yang na gu gum nag po dang// khyi lud 'bob zhur sbyar// sna ru bdugs te sngags rnams gdab// snying khar sbyin sreg tshul bzhin bya// de ni rten 'brel rdzas kyis bsrung ba'o// sman gyis bsrung ba 'di lta ste// nad pa'i lta lugs smra lugs dang// zas kyi za lugs mdog la brtag/ 'di yi man ngag bgol ba bas// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// nad pa gdon gyis btab pa'i le'u ste re dgu pa'o//// yang zhus pa/ ston pa lags/ mchu bsnyung mdze'i 'khor lo ji ltar lags// bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje rnon po khyod// mdze nad mchu bsnyung bya thabs la// dang po rang nyid 'jam dpal bsgom// zhi ba'i cha byad dag tu bsgom// dam tshig sngags 'di stong du gdon// gdon zhing gla ba tsan dan chus// kha bkru lag bsnyal lus kyang bkru/ des ni dam la gnas par bya// tad+ya thA// oM tsan ta tsan ta/ bi tsa ta bi tsa ta/ pa tsa ta pa tsi swAhA// de khyung gi sbyor ba bya ba// 'dab brgyad pa yi maN+Dal te// steng du bum pa bkang la bzhag/ chang zan gtsang ba'i gtor ma bya// pU tsa rnam lnga dus su dbul// rang nyid khyung gi rnal 'byor bya// khyung bsnyen bzlas pa khri tsho gcig/ nyungs kar dag la bzlas te gdab// bum pa'i nang du blug par bya// tha ma bum pa'i khrus bya'o// oM badzra di ga ru da// be ge hUM hUM dza dza ra dzi/ sri dza hUM phaT/ rgyab rten khyung gi 'khor lo'o// klu gtad pa 'di lta ste// bca' thabs rim pa 'di lta ste// shog shog gro ga la sogs pa// 'khor lo rtsibs ni brgyad pa bri// de dbus ming rus bri bar bya// rtsibs la nag po ti pa bri// dril bu dril bus glang ru gzhug/ de steng zil gnon 'khor lo bzhag/ de stengs dri ma gang rnyed blug/ kha ni la cha'i rgya yis gdab// kha dog lnga yi skud pas bcings// rtsi sman 'o ma nang du blug/ ma nyes dpang gzugs smre sngags gdon// gsum pa nag po khri tsho gcig/ brjod la gar snyed sa ru gnan pa bya// oM nag po ti pa tsa na ga ra ka sha ting khu la phe shan phos shig shig chum chuM chuM hU ya hU ya na ga ma ra ya dza dza hUM dza/ gzhug chad rigs bzhi 'dom tshad do// 'dom tshad btags la gzhugs pa'o// gdug pa'i ra dang za ba kha// lta ba mig dang lte ba ru// de ru brus te gtad par bya// 'jam dpal las bzhi'i bro yis gnan// rang rje gom bdun go phyogs bskyal// lcags kyi rdo rje rtse lnga ba// phad rog bcug te rang rjes bsub// bya khyung

gzugs gcig shog bu la// bris te kho phyogs kha yang bstan// rang phyogs rgyab rten btsugs te bzhag/ de ni bsrung ba khyung gi lha// rang la mi ldog sgo srungs yin// mdze nag las kyi rim pa las// rus sbal khyung gi 'khor lo'o// mdze nag khrag nag mchu bsnyung la// gtad pa rus sbal 'khor lo ste le'u bdun cu pa'o//// yang zhus pa/ ston pa lags// 'jam dpal rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni// ston pas bdag la bstan par zhu// bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje rnon po khyod// shin tu dka' bas ngas bshad do// nyams su longs zhig 'khor tshogs rnams// rdzogs pa'i rim pa bya ba de// shin tu dkon pa'i man ngag ste// khyed la nga yis bstan par bya// skar ba gyis la pU tsa phul// gsungs pas/ 'khor rnams kyis shin tu dang ba skyes te// phyi nang gi pU tsa bsam yas pa phul te bskor ba byas// sgra sna tshogs bsgrags// zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te// a la la ho// zhes thams cad dam pa phul te// ngo mtshar ba brjod de 'khod do// der ston pa dges pa'i mdangs phyang ste bka' stsal pa// spyir na 'jam dpal gyi chos la// rnam pa gsum du ngas bshad kyis// phyi nang gsang ba rnams pa gsum// 'di la sgrar bshad mang na yang// rnal 'byor lus la dgod pa la// ma 'dres phyi nang gsang ba gsum du gsungs so// a kro rtsa ba'i bshad pa 'di// rtogs tshad tsam zhig dgrol bar bya// phyi ltar 'di ltar bshad par bya// oM a kro te ka ya man ta ha na ma tha b+hany+tsa hUM phaT/ gtso bo sku bskyed phyi ru bshad// gtso bo thugs khar gdan sum rim// thog tu yig 'bru dgod par bya// oM dkar// a nag/ kro ljang ste// ta dmar// ka ser/ ya mAn ta ka sngo// ha na ma tha dmar po ste// b+han d+ha mthing nag/ hUM phaT sngo// yi ge phyi bshad dag tu nges// oM skye med// a ni thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyu/ kro na las te/ te na srid pa gsum la dbang byed pa'o// kas ni klad khrag 'khrugs pa ste// yang na snying khrag 'byin pa'o// man na sa gzhi theg pa'o// tas na rang dbang med par byed// kas ni yan lag 'ching bar byed// has ni bla phur thob cig pa'o// nas ni gnan pa gyis shig pa'o// man ni khrag tu skyugs shig pa'o// thas ni myos su chub pa'o// ban gyis thogs pa med par rgyob// rdzas ni khug la drongs shing pa'o// hUM gis gnas por byed pa'o// phaT nis 'then par byed pa ste// 'og min gnas su 'phangs pa'o// 'bru bshad pa ste che bshad pa'o// thabs lam nang du dgyer ba la// rnal 'byor lus la lha dgod dang// yang na yig 'brur dgod pa ste// spyi bor oM la/ dpral bar a/ lte bar krol/ kha ru te/ snying khar ka la/ dpung par ya/ sta zung ma ste/ g.yon du na/ bus

g.yas ka ste/ g.yon du ka// lte bar ha ste/ gsang bar na/ rkang mthil ma/ nam mtshong tha ste/ rgyab tu ban ltag bar dza ste/ mchan khung hUM/ 'khur bar phaT/ dgod pa'o// lus kyi gnas su yi ge dgod pa'o// bcu bdun pa'i gnas bstan pa'o// de ltar bstan pa nang bshad do// rnal 'byor 'dzab kyi dgongs pa'o// da ni gsang bar bshad pa'o// rang nyid kyi lus nyid la// ro smad drag po'i 'khor lo ste// ro stod yan chad lha yi dkyil 'khor la// skad pa rdo rje maN+Dal te// gshang sgrom rlung dang me yi dkyil 'khor// bzhi btul byas te bsgom par bya// tsit+ta rin chen gzhal yas su// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi shes par bya// skad par 'od 'phros 'khor zhing ldog/ gzer gyi gzas pa 'gugs par byed// yas 'khor mas 'khor bskyed par bgyi// bla ma'i ngag la shes par bya'o// bzlas dang bsgom pa'i dus su'o// ro smad khri yi rkang pa 'dra// bzhi ru gyes gshes bzhin gnas// de yi nang du zur brgyad de// de re steng na pad+ma bzhi// 'dab ma re la yig 'bru gnas// ta ka ha na ma tha b+ha na dza hUM phaT/ yi ge bcu bdun 'od dpung gnas// yi ger med de 'od du yod// phyogs skyong bcu yi sa bon no// gzugs su med de 'od du gsal// so sor ma 'dres tshon gyi gru gu 'dra// khyad par gsang ba'i don bstan pa'o// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// 'jam dpal phyi nang gsang ba gsum rdzogs rim du bstan pa'i le'u ste don gcig pa'o//// yang ston pas ma 'ongs 'gro ba rnams la// phyi nang gsang ba gsum rtogs na// 'dzab dgongs gnas kyi nges pa dang// don rnams bstan la mi 'bebs pas// don 'di khong du chud pa gces// rtogs na 'gro nyal 'dug ldong rung// rnal 'byor pa la nyam nga med// lha dang don dang yi ge dang// 'bras bu 'byung ste 'dod pa ste// rtsibs bzhi dbus su ming yang gzhug/ sngags dang ming byang sbel te bri// 'brub khung nang du ming yang gzhug/ rang nyid phyi nang gsang gsum bsgom// phyi nang gsang ba mi go bar// 'jam dpal byed pa rang rgyud rlag/ 'khrul khrug bca' zhing don rnams bsgom// spyir na a kro te ka bskyed la// sngags ni sgra ru bshad bya na// oM ni ye shes lnga yi bdag/ nang du bshad na srog pa rtsa// gsang bar bshad na byang chub sems// a ni phyi ltar skye ba med// nang du bshad na thams cad 'byung// gsang bar rang bzhin skye ba med// kro ni phyi ru khro ba la// nang du bshad las khro bo yin// gsang bar bshad na gnyis su med// te ni phyi ru 'od phung ste// nang du bshad pa mtshon cha yin// gsang bar bya na ral gri ste// ka ni phyi ltar mig sel ba'o// nang ltar rgyal po// gsang bar 'bras bu// ya phyi ru ste

ba// nang du srid pa gsum gsang bar smin pa med// ma phyi ru skyes par byed// nang du rgod ma// gsang bar smra byed pa// nang phyi ru dal byed// nang du mi 'gyur ba/ gsang bar snying chen mo// ta phyi ltar bdud du 'bab/ nang du za byed pa/ gsang bar sngags zlog pa// ka phyi ru na gru gsum// nang ltar zla kham/ gsang bar thig le/ ha phyi ltar gso ba/ nang ltar chags pa/ gsang ba ltar dag pa/ ma phyi ru gti mug/ nang ltar chos nyid/ gsang ba na dbyings/ tha phyi ru zhe sdang/ nang du rdo rje/ gsang bar gnyis su med pa/ ban na phyi ltar na phrag dog/ nang ltar bu tsa/ gsang ba na sbas pa'i don/ dza phyi ltar dgug pa/ nang ltar du bsad pa/ gsang bar na rig shes/ hUM phyi ru sdud pa/ nang du dngos grub/ gsang bar na srog/ phaT phyi ru spro ba/ nang du bsreg pa/ gsang bar gdams pa'o// da ltar a kro phyi nang gsang ba gsum du bshad/ bcu bdun pa'i bshad pa rdzogs so// lam rim pa rnam gsum ma go bar/ 'jam dpal gshin rje shan mi phyed// de la 'bras bu ci la 'byung// dper na sa bon mes tshig bzhin// bsgrubs kyang 'bras bu ci la 'byung// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// a kro bcu bdun pa'i yi ge rdzogs rim bstan pa'i le'u ste don gnyis pa'o//// yang zhus pa/ ston pa lags// gying chen gsang ba'i pra rta dkar po 'di// bstan pa bsrung phyir bdag la bstan du gsol// sngags dang rdzas dang bya thabs gang// bka' stsal pa/ ging chen ldog med ser ba/ bya thabs sngags dang rdzas bshad kyis// snod ldan rnams kyis yid la chongs// dang po kho nar bca' lugs la// rten du dar dmar rgod mda' gcig/ rna ba 'am g.yag ru cig dang// mkhar khong drung cig rtsa ru bzhag/ sa dkar pos lte dkar gyis// gzugs bris mgo ni shar du bstan// mtshon nag rkang pa nub du bstan// lte bas sa dkar dkar pos bris// tha ma phur pa bcu yis bskor// khro bo bcu ru byin brlabs bya// snying khar shing kar a ka bya bri// steng du spru yi spyang cher hom gyis bya// rtsi shing snar ma gang rung gis// so bya spu dang rta nag khrag des na sbyin sreg bya bar gsungs// srog snying rgyun 'breng rgyun du gdon// lha bsnyen drang ba'i rim pa'o// ser ba bsnyen pa drang ba'i sngags// oM he sa a tri sems la dza du he/ se ma tre sems pa dza du/ kha la ya ya sho sems pa dza du/ kha la ya sho me/ kye pra la ya sho/ e me ke tra kha la ya sho a tro sems pa dza/ hUM raM ging dza dza dun b+h+yo/ badzra gar ba phrom/ nyid dril/ dud phroM phroM/ thog thog/ tsheM tsheM/ kyi gang dgra la phob/ thog ser dgra la phob/ de bsnyen pa'i sngags su bstan pa'o// da ni sgrub pa'i sngags su gsungs pa la/ kha la mu nyid ya man ta ka ke dgra

bo'i yul du thog ser phob ya/ dza ti khai she ya man ta ka/ dza tri khe she ma man ta ke/ hUM dza hUM dza/ dgra yul du ser ba phob la/ dze khe khe dze ta ya/ a tri sems pa kha tri kha tri dgra bo'i yul du ser ba phob ya/ ting 'dzin phya thabs la/ rdor legs shal nas ser ba rgyug pa/ stong gsungs khengs 'phro/ phyag g.yas na lcags kyi ber ka thogs pa/ g.yon na shel gyi dbyug tho thogs pa/ lcags kyi ser bas stong gsum khengs par bsgom// rgya po bcibs pa 'khor du dza la ma stong gis bskor bar de rnams bsgrub pa dag tu bshad// da ni las sbyor bya bar gsungs// badzra sa d+hu sa ma ya// a tri sems dpa' dza b+h+yo/ sa bya sbu dang rta nag khrag/ ra rog khrag dang sbags la bsreg/ oM dug tra ya ni/ sa ma ya du ya sha/ laM raM/ dgra raM/ du raM/ sho sho ri ri raM raM tseg tseg swAhA/ tri tsa pa la a shug me bya/ trig shog trig shog/ tsa ru thuM ru thuM raM/ gug thum ling/ gur tsar ling/ tri tsa rbad/ tri tsa pa la/ a ba me shub me/ baM la shuM tri tsa byo byo byo/ thal ba gtor zhing 'phang ngo// zor sngags la/ badzra se d+hu sa ma ya dgra bo yul du gnam g.yengs/ sha phrom phob ya/ hring hring dgra bo lo thog la rgyob ya/ jo bo chen po gnam rum rje hring hring/ lo thog la rgyob la/ jo bo chen po rgum rje lo thog lo phob ya/ 'ur 'ur lo thog la rgyob ya/ sha ra ra cha li li lo thog la rgyob ya/ badzra sa d+hu sa ma ya hring hring byo byo/ lo thog la rgyob ya/ chem chem nal nal lo thog la rgyob la/ byas la zor 'phang/ rdzas gdab thal ba gtor ro// cho brang gdung zhing ma nyes gzugs// byang bu cig la gar 'bebs sa ru ming rus dang// yul du ming gdags// mi ni che ge'i ming rus bri// ra yi skye ru gdags par bya// gtang rag gtang phud sprod te// 'o ma la lo thog khrag tu bsres// ra sogs bcus shing lo tog gtor// bskul ba drag tu bya zhing sbyor ba bya// hUM/ kun bzang sku la khyed bskul te/ bdud rje rgya dang khyod mtshungs mthu bo che// 'jig rten khams 'dir ser ba'i mnga' bdag mdzad// dgra yul 'dir yang thog ser thong// ser ba'i bdag po 'jig rten mthu bo che// stong gsum las 'gyur mthu bo che// 'jig rten khams 'dir bsar ba'i las mdzad pa/ dmu dang bdud kyi ming btags rdo rje zhal// btsan dang bdud kyi phur bzung rdo rje legs// sku la khrag gi rdo rje bsnol mar brgyan// g.yas na shel gyi ldem mkhar thogs// g.yon na lcags kyi dbyug tho thogs// kha nas lcags kyi ser ba rgyug/ btsan dang bdud kyi bu bzung ming btags pa// rdo rje legs pa lags// ma mo btsan gyi bu bzung 'jigs pa'i gzugs// 'jigs pa gzugs chen rdo rje legs pa ste// badzra sa d+hu sku chen po// lcags tho bsnol mar

gzung// kha nas me 'bar mig nas mtsho chen khol// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can dred mo'i gzugs// lag pa thog sgrog kha nas me 'bar ba// rdo rje dkar mo mtshon gang lte bar skyes// 'a ma rgyan gyi rgyal mos ming btags pa// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can rdo rje lte dkar po// a pa btsan chen mgo yag kha bdud po// pha yi ming btags badzra sa d+hU ste// mi tri mi'i yul du bu bzung ba// a te rgyal mo ba ka ra tsa dang// rgyal mo g.yu ma rga mchog kha 'bar sras// mi yi bu la shes kyi skas chen cig/ lag g.yas lcags kyi tho ba thogs nas ma'i rum na gnas kha la pha ni smu yi bu yin// shel skra la 'bab ser nas lag g.yon rdo rje thogs nas lan gsum gsor// spyi bo'i gtsug nas rin chen rgyal bu skyes// kha nas lcags kyi ser ba tal tal rgyug/ pha dang ma yis bu la ming btags pa/ gser ba lus la rin chen rgyal bu can// slob dpon bu la gsang ba'i spyan sngar ming nos nas// zer nas rus ming dbang bskur// ji ltar ji legs rdo rje lus brgyan pa// nga yi rdo rje 'di yang lag tu long// ming la rdo rje legs par btags// badzra a du a tri sems dpa' dza// lan mang du bzla bar bya// ging chen gsang ba'i bskul mar gsungs// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// ging chen ldog med gsang ba'i pra rta dkar po'i le'u ste don gsum pa'o//// yang zhus pa/ ston pa lags// 'jam dpal spyir gyi man ngag mdo 'drel ji ltar lags// ston pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje rnon po la// man ngag lho mig bya ba de// rus mig nang nas tshil bton pa// khong khrag skyug pa 'di lta ste// dang po gang zag rigs brtag pa// gang zag lnga ru rab tu grags// gang zag theg pa chen po'i rigs can dang// gang zag theg pa chung ngu'i rigs can dang// gang zag rigs ni ma nges pa// gang zag rigs chad bya ba dang// zhe sdang can gyi rigs dang lnga// 'jam dpal ni zhe sdang can gyi rigs kyi bya// dbyibs dang kha dog brtag pa la// kha dog gnag la skra rtse 'khyil// mig skyus dmar la smin ma ring// khro gnyer lag pa chu bya'i lag/ theg pa chen dang zhing mos// des ni 'khor lo bri bar gsungs// mi rigs shis pa brtag pa'o// gang zag des ni bri ba yi// dus tshod nges pa bstan pa la// dus la nges pa gsum du yod// bri dus snyu gu snag tsha'i dus// bris dus nya yi mar ngo la// snag tsha dpyid zla 'bring po la// lha mo dbu ma mkha' car dus// snyu gu smin drug sa 'og song dus su// 'khor lo bca' dus nges pa ni// bsnyen bsgrub rtags thon rdzogs tsam na// 'khor lo rgyu ni bzhi ru bsog/ thig dang sa tshon du// bsnyen dus thig ni ras bal te/ bsgrub dus thig ni rgyu 'phreng

ngo// drag po'i thig skud srog pa rtsa// bsad dus thig skud rgyus chen yin// sa tshon rim pa 'di 'dra ste// bsnyen pa'i dus su rin chen sna lnga ste// bsgrub dus drag pos bsad dus su// 'bru sna lnga dang lcags sol gyis// des kyang zi bar gsungs pa'o// bri ba'i dus tshod nges par bstan// bsnyen pa nyi shar tsam na bri// bsgrub pa nam phyed dag la bri// drag po nyi phyed bsad dus dgongs// bsnyen dus seng ldeng 'dom tshad pa// bsgrub dus shing gdug phur pa lcags sna lngas// bsad dus phur pa mchog phur ro// rang nyid khro bor rgyud du bsam// mi 'bral rgyun gyi dam tshig go/ 'khor lo bris pa'i dus tshod ni// par ti ka yi nyi ma la// bcwa lnga tshes kyi dus su shis// 'dri ba'i dus su zas bstan pa// gang zag bsgom dus bstan pa dang// las bzhi dmigs dang sbyar te bya// bgegs kyis zin pa'i 'khor lo dang// gdug pas zin pa'i 'khor lo dang// rang rang gzhan su 'khor lo rdzas// dgod pa nyid du go bar bya// dmigs pa'i lus laM yi ge dgod/ rtsa bzhi gzer bzhi shes par bya// las bzhi 'khor lo sba lugs te// gzhi ma dus tshod gzungs thag ste// ji ltar yin pa nga yis bshad// dar dkar mdzes pa'i gzhi ma la// tsi ta ka yi nyi ma la// zhi ba'i 'khor lo bri bar bya// dge rtags ldan pa'i yul du sba// ma tra ka yi bags pa la// gur kum ser po byug par bya// ma gad dge yi nyi ma la// rgyas pa'i 'khor lo bri bar bya// rgyal rigs yod pa'i yul du sba// bral zer mi rgod pags pa la// mtshan ldan ma yi rag+tas byug/ ke ko ta yi nyi ma la// dbang gi 'khor lo bri bar bya// skyid rtags can gyi tsher mar gzhug/ dregs pa nag po mon pags la// rgya sol rdo nag thal bas byug/ ko ta ka yi nyi ma la// drag po 'khor lo bri bar bya// sngags pa mda' 'phen zla ba la// rtsibs la mi phung brlag par mnan// yang na gdug pa yod par sba// las bzhi bri ba'i gnan pa bsdung// bram ze mi rgod pags pa la// sog po khros pa'i sog pa la// bon po ban+De bsad pa bri// las sngags bar du ming rus dang// gsang mtshan spel te bri bar bya// bya thabs 'jam dpal me thab lags// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las man ngag spyi rgyug bstan pa'i le'u ste don bzhi pa'o//// yang zhus pa/ ston pa lags// rgyal ba'i 'dzab bsnyen rdzogs tsam na// 'dzab bsnyen mchod 'bul ji ltar lags// ston pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'jam dpal rnon po khyod// 'dzab bsnyen rdzogs pas dngos grub 'byung// drin lan mchod bstod 'di ltar dbul// bdud rtsi rag ta gtor phud rnams// rim pas tshig gis dbul bar bya// sku mdog sngo nag dbyar gyi sprin lta bu// dus gsum

mun khang 'joms pa'i mthu bo che// mthu chen mtshungs med 'gran gyis zla med pa// rag ta dmar gyi mchod pa 'di 'bul gyis// thugs dam bskangs so dgra la sa ma ya// rab sbas gsang ba'i yum gcig ma// thal bar lus rnams kun byugs shing// dpa' tshad khrag gi thig le can// dur khrod rgyu ba'i mthu chen ma// rag+ta dmar gyi pU tsa 'di 'bul gyis// thugs dam bskong ngo dgra la sa ma ya// ya ma 'khor na gnas pa'i dam can ma// rang srog phul ba'i ma mo mthu chen la// rag+ta dmar gyi mchod pa 'di 'bul gyis// thugs dam bskongs las dgra la sa ma ya// sman phud gtor ma 'di bzhes la// rnal 'byor bsam pa 'grub gyur cig/ de ltar rgyal ba rnams la yang// stong pu tsa dbul bar bya// de nas bstod pa 'di bstod de// dges par bya ba'i phyir na bstod pas bstod// hUM/ gtum chen rab 'bar gshin rje 'joms mdzad lha// nyi ma 'bum bas lhag pa'i 'od ldan khyod// phyag mtshan mang po bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// rab brjid gshin rje 'joms la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje sku la klu dbang rab brgyan zhing// glang chen ko rlon 'jigs pa'i na bzar gsol// gcan gzan gdug pa'i pags rlon na bzar gsol// dam las 'das pa sna tshogs zhal du gsol// brkyang bskum zhabs kyi rab brjid gshin rje gnon// mi bzad khro bo'i rgyal po zhal drug hUM sgra can// phaT kyis bsgras te khams gsum dbang du sdud// sha za mgo can dbu yi thod du bcings// spyan bzlog rdo rje ser chen 'bebs// ljags 'dril tshems kyi gseb nas rdo rje thog 'bebs pa// ma mo rnams kyang gcer bu 'dar zhes 'khros// rkan sgra brdabs pas lha chen khyab 'jug kyang// 'bum 'gyel bcas pas khrag 'thung nyid la bdud// stong khams med pas gzhan yang zhal gdangs pa// tshangs pa 'khor bcas rgyun gyi thigs 'dzags shing// nad gtong srin ma'i tshogs rnams 'dar zhing 'bros// phyag na mi mgo rlon pa rab bsnams shing// dngos grub mchog gis klad khrag zhal du gsol// gnod sbyin bse yi mgo can 'phreng bas sku la gsol// dur khrod 'bar bas mtshan mo rab rgyu zhing// sha za mgo nas chem chem za byed ma// ngam thang can gyi rma 'bab zhabs la gtugs// de bas bzod pa dka' ba bdag bdud do// gdug pa'i sems kyi gdug pa dang// gnod par byed pa'i mi chen gang yang rung// rgyob cig gtogs shig gzir nan gyis// gar mdzad gshin rje gshed la da bu 'dud// yun gyi lhar yang khyod la gsol 'debs na// khyod phyir bdag 'gyur de phyir bstod phyag 'tshal// ri rab gser gyi ngos la bya gnas pa// de phyir kha dog bor nas gser du

snang// lha mchog khyod la su dag gang rten pa// mi yi tha ma rnams kyang mchog tu 'gyur// de bas 'di dag phyi ma gnyis ka ru// srog gi phyir yang lha mchog mi gtong na// byams pa'i zhal bzang bdag la bstan pa dang// thugs rje can gyis rtag tu bdag la gzigs// 'dzab bskul byas te da ni bstod// hUM/ lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma la// mtshams med lnga ni kun spyod kyang// dus ngan las ngan spyod pa'i tshe// rigs 'dzin kun kyang dngos grub yal// gshin rje thar byed gang zlog la// da ni de la thugs dges so// lha mo'i nang nas 'od zer can// 'phags pa'i nang na 'jam dpal nyid// 'di nyid ma rtogs dngos grub gzhan// rigs 'dzin kun kyang dngos grub yal// khro bo'i rgyal po 'di yis ni// nges par dbang du ma gyur par// dngos su 'das dag da ltar gyis// phyis 'byung ba ni gang yang med// dgra bo stong ngam 'bul yang rung// de ma thag tu gsod par byed// ji srid dgra po ma gsod na// de srid 'khor pa stongs sam ci// bden pa khyad du ma bsad par// las bcol bden pa grub par gyis// thugs dam bskul lo 'phrin las gzhol// rnal 'byor bstan pa rgyas par mdzod// 'dzab bsnyen dbul lo dge par mdzod// 'jam dpal thugs kyi dngos grub gsol// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// 'dzam bskul bstod pa'i le'u ste don lnga pa'o//// yang zhus pa// ston pa lags// sngags rnams btu ba ji ltar lags// bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje rnon po khyod// sngags btu pa la gsum du gsungs// lcags khang nan nas btu ba dang// rin po che'i 'bru btus bya ba dang// nor bu lugs su btu ba dang// gsum du nga yis bshad par bya// btul ba'i gzhi ma pha ma gnyis// sgra yi dbyangs yig skar ma 'dra// de las thams cad btu bar bya// dang la lcags mkhar nang nas btu bar bya// btu ba'i 'grel po 'khor lo yin// 'khor lo nang nas btu+u ba bya// ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na// ta tha da d+ha na// pa pha ba b+ha ma// ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/ a A/ i I/ u u/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ e ai/ o au/ aM a/ don dam chos sku zhi ba ni// gang 'di khams gsum rnam rgyal te// gshin rje dgra zhes grags pa la// yi ge btu ba'i rim pa bshad// bsnyen pa tshad ldan byas nas ni// 'khor lo bris la yi ge btu// btu dang drang dang sre dang spo// dgod pa dag ni brtsams par bya// sngags pa rnal 'byor ldan pa yis// lho yi phyogs su kha bltas te// dam tshigs dran pa'i sngags 'di bzlas// oM badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM ya// 'di dran 'khor lo bri bar bya// dbus nas gru chad bcu drug pa// dbyibs ni zlum pos bskor ba ni// 'di ni nang gi 'khor lo

ste// rim gsum dag tu bskor ba la// sgo med lcags mkhar bcu drug bya// 'di ni gshin rje'i grong khyer yin// srid pa gsum ni 'jug pa yin// de yi phyi rol mu khyud gsum// kun tu lcags ris bskor ba ste// mu khyud de dag re re la// khang pa sum cu gnyis dang ldan// 'gro drug nyon mongs gcod pa yi// 'khor lo 'di ltar bris nas ni// phyi rim mu khyud tha ma la// yi ge a sogs da yi mtha'// nga nya bsal nas dgod par bya// yi ge d+ha srog k+Sha yi mtha'// 'khor lo nang du bri bar bya// lcags khang nang nas btu bar bya// mu khyud dbu ma dag la ni// dbyangs yig bcu drug gnyis 'gyur dgod// btu sogs dgod pa rtsol ba na// mtshan ma 'di dag shes par bya// zla ba mig dag yon tan dwangs// rigs byed mda' can dbang po dang// rgya mtsho bkra shis bza' dang phyogs// dregs pa'i nyi ma yan lag pa// tshes zhes bya bar rab tu grags// phyi rol mu khyud tha ma la// shar gyi phyogs nas brtsams nas ni// tshangs pa'i thig nas brtsam par bya// rim men gza' can khang pa nas// yi ge bkra shis rtsam brlangs ste// nang gi ngos kyi mu khyud kyi// tshangs thig gi ni ngos dag nas// phyogs bzhi mig gi tshad du sbyin// rim med phyogs can khang pa nas// yi ge mig gi tshad blangs te// nub kyi tshangs thig nas bgrangs pa'i// rgya mtsho can gyi khang pa nas// dbyangs yig bcu drug ldan pa yis// mig gis dang du blangs nas ni// lho yi ngos pa de bzhin no// nub nas rin chen khang pa nas// zla ba can gyi khang pa nas// dbyangs yig bcu gsum par ldan pa'i// mig gi tshad du blangs nas ni// lho ru de rjes sbyin par bya// de nyid dbyangs yig gsal ba ni// mig gis tshad du blangs nas ni// sngon bzhin nub kyi ngos la sbyin// nub nas bkra shis khang pa nas// dbyangs yig bcu gsum par ldan pa// mig gi tshad du blangs nas ni// nub kyi ngos la de bzhin sbyin// byang nas bkra shis khang pa nas// dbyangs yig bcu gsum par ldan pa// mig gi tshad du blangs nas ni// byang gi ngos la de bzhin sbyin// rlung gi sa bon zhes bya ba// mig gi tshad du blangs nas ni// byang gi ngos la de bzhin sbyin// mda' can khang pa la gnas pa// 'od kyi kong bur byas pa la/ zla ba'i tshad du blangs nas ni// byang shar mtshams su de bzhin sbyin// de nyid nas ni bgrangs pa yi// za can khang pa nas gnas pa// dbyangs kyi yi ge bcur ldan pa// zla ba'i tshad du blangs nas ni// byang shar mtshams su de bzhin sbyin// rgya mtsho can gyis khang pa nas// dbyangs yig gnyis dang ldan par bya// zla ba'i tshad du blangs nas ni// shar lho mtshams su de bzhin sbyin// rin chen yon tan khang pa nas// zla ba'i

tshad du blangs nas ni// shar lho mtshams su de bzhin sbyin// rim min bkra shis khang pa nas// dbyangs yig lnga dag ldan pa sbyin// zla ba'i tshad du blangs nas ni// lho nub mtshams su de bzhin sbyin// yan lag can gyi khang pa nas// zla ba'i tshad du blangs nas ni// lho nub mtshams su de bzhin sbyin// rin min tshes can khang pa nas// dbyangs yig gsum par ldan pa yi// zla ba'i tshad du blangs nas ni// byang nub mtshams su de bzhin sbyin// rim min bkra shis khang pa na// zla ba'i tshad du blangs nas ni// nub byang mtshams su de bzhin sbyin// de ltar dgod par byas nas ni// de nas dra ya brtsam par bya// shar gyi tshangs thig sor gnyis nas// yi ge zungs ldan drangs nas ni// dbus kyi khang par gzhag par bya// phyogs thig mtshams thig ngos dag nas// de bzhin zungs ldan drangs nas ni// de bzhin dbus kyi khang par gzhag/ de nas shar gyi yi ge la// zung ldan gnyis pa drangs nas ni// rim pa gnyis pa'i khang par gzhag/ phyogs gzhan du yang de bzhin no// shar gyi zung ldan gsum pa yang// rim pa gsum pa'i khang par dra bar bya// phyogs gzhan du yang de bzhin no// mtshams kyi yi ge ya bral ni// rang rang gnas su drangs par bya/ de dag byung ba'i khang stong du// dbyangs kyi yi ge drang bar bya// dbyangs kyi yi ge shul du ni// ming gi yi ge drang bar bya// ming gi yi ge'i gzhi la ni// so sor dal dang mthun pa yi// sku yi yi ge dgod par bya// bsad dang bskrad pa dbye ba la// yi ge phaT ni gzhag par bya// gnas pa la ni yi ge lam// zhi ba la ni yi ge oM// rgyas pa la ni yi ge swa// dbang la baM gyis brgyan par bya// dgug pa dag la yi ge dza// zhi ba chu ste rgyas pa sa// dbang ni rlung ste drag po me// dbye dgug bskrad pa dbang dang mthun// gnan pa ri rab 'og tu gnan// cho ga yan lag brgyad kyis gnan// drang ba'i sbyor ba byas nas ni// bsre ba'i las rnams brtsam par bya// gnyis med sngags dang ldan pa yi// dbus kyi bkra shis yi ge yang// zla ltar 'od kyi kong bur gnas// 'od kyi kong bu de nang du// 'dod pa'i bsgrub bya gzhag par bya// de yi dkyil du rang ming gzhug/ phyogs bzhi khyim na gnas pa yang// yi ge gzung ba thams cad kyi// de tshe 'od kyi kong pur bsdu// sngags kyi rgyal po bcu pa yang// bcu gnyis khyim du spel te bri// byin rlob hUM zhes pa yang// khang pa bzhi la zung re mdzes// dag par byas te dgod par bya// mchod bstod gtor ma byas nas ni// spo ba dag ni brtsam par bya// las kyi dbye ba ji ltar bya// 'khor lo ras ni brlab bya ste// zhing ba dang ni rgyas pa la// shin tu dge ba'i ras la bya// dbang dang dgug la smad 'tshong

sogs// bsad dang dbye dang bskrad pa dang// mnan pa la ni dur khrod ras// g+hi haM gur gum zhi rgyas la// dbang dbang dgug la tsan dan dmar// gnan pa la ldong ros sogs// bskrad pa bya rog khrag gis bya// dbye ba rta dang ma he sogs// bsad pa dag la dug gis shis// dge ba'i las la bzang po shis// mi dge ba la rus pa dang// lcags la sogs pas bri bar bya// zhi ba shar te dbang la nub// byang du rgyas pa drag po lho// zhi rgyas dbang drag la sogs pa// sa skor rim bzhin dgod par bya// gnam skor dag ni rim par bzlog/ bsad dang bskrad dag dbye dang mnan// sa skor rim pas bzlog pa ste// gnam skor dag ni rim bzhin bri// 'di dag legs par ma bris na// 'khor lo rang la ldog par 'gyur// de phyir nan tan bskyed la bya// ras kyi 'khor lo legs zin nas// sa yi maN+Dal gnas der ni// rang gi 'khor lo spyan drangs te// rdo rje bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// sa yi maN+Dal bsdu bar bya// ras kyi 'khor lo mchod nas ni// bden pa'i byin rlabs dmigs par bya// ji ltar gsungs pa'i cho ga bzhin// 'khor lo sba ba byas nas ni// gsang sngags bzla ba brtsam par bya// oM badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM// dam tshig gi sngags// oM badzra be ga hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyi sngags// oM a sa me tri sa me sa ha sa ma ya ye swA hA// yi ge bsre ba'i sngags// oM badzra sa ma ya dza// 'khor lo spo ba'i sngags// oM ya ma rA dza la sogs bcu bdun pa'o// las thams cad pa'i sngags so// oM hriSh+tIH bi kri tA na na hUM phaT/ 'di ni gsang sngags te las thams cad pa'o// zhi ba shan ting ku ru ste// rgyas pa puSh+ti ku ru'o// dbang la pa shang ku ru ste// bsad pa dag la mA rA ya// dbye ba te sha ya phaT/ bskrad pa/ tam pa hUM laM phaT/ gnan pa/ ni ra ya ka ra sha ya hUM phaT/ gshegs gsol// oM mu ho// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ lcags khang nas yi ge btu ba'i le'u ste don drug pa'o//// yang zhus pa/ ston pa lags// 'di yi dgongs pa'i lus dam tshig/ mdo ru dril ba ji ltar lags// lung du drang ba ji ltar lags// bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje rnon po khyod// dgos don lung du dril ba 'di lta ste// mang la nyung ngu mdor dril ba// a li ka li'i grong khyer du// gsang sngags 'byung ba rtsa ba ste// kun gyi gzhi dang pha ma yin// las kyi btson ra dag tu gsungs// yi ge btu ba'i min na ni// gdang sngags sgra rnams log par 'gyur// yi ge tshang bar ma bkod na// gsang sngags sgra ni nyams par 'gyur// gsang sngags brda yis ma bkod na// gsang sngags dngos grub med par 'gyur// drang ba dag ni ma byas na// shin tu 'khor bar mi 'gyur ro// yi ge bsre ba ma byas na// bcu gnyis khang

pa don med 'gyur// skor phyogs log na don mi 'grub// rig sngags nyams dang log pa ni// lha min g.yul las 'pham pa dang// dbang po sgra yis sgra bsad bzhin// 'khor lo spo ba ma byas na// cho ga dag ni nyams par 'gyur// rgyu yin ba dang sbyor ba dang// dad pa brtan pos 'grub par 'gyur// de phyir nan tan bskyed de bya// dril bas lung du drangs pa'o// zla cig mi gnyis yon tan gsum// rigs bzhi mda' lnga dbang po drug/ rgya mtsho bdun dang bkra shis brgyad// gza' dgu phyogs bcu dregs pa bcu gcig dang// nyi ma bcu gnyis yan lag bcu gsum pa// sa na bcu bzhi tshes na bcwa lnga la// btu yin yan lag shes par bya// man ngag dag gis gtan la dbab// bcu bdun pa yi bcu yig ste// 'gyur med gsang ba'i sngags su gsungs// btu ba'i mtshan ma lcags khang nas// bcu bdun pa las ma btus so// 'khor lo 'grel pa'i bcu yig go/ nor bu lugs su btu ba ni// lhag ma rangs pa btu ba ste// shin tu sla bas 'dir ma bkod// shog phran gud du ston pa bas// de ni nor bu lugs su btu ba'o// gdams ngag dag tu go bar shes par bya// rin po che'i 'bru btus bya ba la// dang po rnam par snang mdzad de// ya man ta ka yin par bshad// de 'og cig pa'i dbu dgus gzhag/ de 'og dang po'i dang po gzhag/ drug pa gnyis pas 'og tu spras// dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pa yis brgyan// de 'og dag po'i bzhi pa ste// de 'og dang po'i dang po gzhag/ de 'og brgyad pa'i tha ltag gzhag/ dbyangs kyis gnyis pas 'og tu spras/ de 'og gsum pa'i tha ma gzhag/ de 'og lnga pa'i tha ma gzhag/ de 'og gsum pa'i gnyis pa gzhag/ dbyangs kyi gnyis pas 'og tu brgyan// de 'og lnga pa gsum pa la// de la tri pa'i lnga pas brgyan// de 'og dbyangs kyi gnyis pas gzhag/ de 'og gnyis pa gsum pa la// 'og tu ni yis spras pa'o// de 'og brgyad pa'i tha ltag la// dbyangs kyi bcu drug pa yis brgyan// de 'og lnga pa'i gnyis pa gzhag/ de la gsum pa'i dang po mnan// mi 'gyur a kro bcu bdun pa// rgyal ba nyid kyi zhal nas gsungs// lhag chad med par bya ba dang// gsang sngags gtan la dbab pa'i phyir// rtsa ba'i sngags su btus pa'o// yun gyi gsang sngags btu bar bya// 'chug med mi 'gyur nges pa'i phyir// oM gzhan thog mar gzhag pa ste// dang por lnga pa'i dang po ste// dbyangs ni gcig pa yis brgyan// de 'og drug pa'i gsum pa gzhag/ de la dbyangs kyi gsum pas brgyan// de 'og brgyan pa'i tha ltag la// dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa yis brgyan// de 'og drug pa'i gnyis pa gzhag/ de 'og dang po'i tri pa la// de 'og bdun

pa'i dang po gzhag/ nyis 'gyur mtha' ru hUM phaT gzhag/ mi 'gyur yum gyi sngags su bshad// hrISh+ti yi ge 'bru bcu po// dang po ya man ta ka te// de 'og brgyad pa'i tha ltag la// drug pa gnyis pas 'og tu brgyan// dbyangs kyi gsum pas steng du brgyan// de 'og bdun pa'i tha ma gzhag/ de la dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan// de 'og lnga pa'i gsum pa gzhag/ dbyangs kyi bzhi pas de la brgyan// de 'og dang po'i dang po gzhag/ drug pa gnyis pas 'og nas spras// dbyangs kyi gsum pas steng nas brgyan// de 'og bzhi pa'i dang po gzhag/ de 'og brgyad pa'i tha ltag gzhag/ dbyangs kyi bzhi pas 'og nas brgyan// bcwa lnga pa yi steng du mdzes// de 'og lnga pa'i gnyis pa gzhag/ de 'og gsum pa'i dang po sbyin// 'gyur med nges pa'i sngags su gsungs// gzhan dag rangs pas nor bu lugs// btus te shog phrad dag tu blta// btu yig med par byin rlabs med// gsang sngags nges pa med par 'gyur// ma btus 'bras bu mi 'byung ste// dper na sdong po khong rul lam// sa bon mes su tshig dang 'dra// de phyir gsang sngags btu yig gces// zla gsang nag po man ngag yig chung gi rgyud las// 'jam dpal 'them yig btu ba'i le'u ste don bdun pa'o//// yang zhus pa/ ston pa lags/ 'jam dpal mtshong zhes bya ba ste// de la rnam grangs du tsam mchis// ston pas gsungs pa/ nyon cig 'khor tshogs thams cad nyon// 'jam dpal las phran 'phyor zhes bya ba/ lnga bcu rtsa gsum dag tu gsungs// mi 'da' ba dam tshig gi mchong/ rtogs pa lta ba'i mchong/ la dor ba spyod pa'i mchong// gzhi 'dzin man ngag gi mchong/ skrod pa dbang gi mchong/ nyams len ting 'dzin gyi mchong/ lam rin 'khor lo'i mchong/ phul du byung ba 'phrin las kyi mchong/ las 'jug sreg pa'i mchong/ mtha' brtul gnan pa'i mchong/ phan bya bsrung ba'i mchong/ mi 'gyur rgyun gyi mchong/ dbye ba gnas kyi mchong/ bod thabs sgra yi mchong/ dbye ba ming gi mchong/ bskor ba 'khor lo'i mchong/ dbab pa thog ser gyi mchong/ gzhug pa rta yi mchong/ bsags pa rdzas kyi mchong/ bsnyen pa lha yi mchong/ bsgrub pa rtags kyi mchong/ bsad pa las kyi mchong/ gzhi ma rgyu dang snag tsha'i mchong/ dgyer lugs lam rim gyi mchong/ tshad ma rnams sum bka' gzhung gi mchong/ brdeg pa thug kyi mchong/ mi snyel gzungs kyi mchong/ bsre ba man ngag gi mchong/ lo rgyus gtan tshigs kyi mchong/ m-i 'gyur gtan la 'bebs pa'i mchong/ bsrung bsgom 'bras bu'i mchong/ cho 'phrul thugs rje'i mchong/ rdzas sbyor bsrung ba'i mchong/ bod thams sgra yi mchong/ ma 'dres ngos gzung gi

mchong/ 'khyam med brgya yi mchong/ don 'byung ma 'dres sgrub pa'i mchong/ bsrung ba 'khor lo'i mchong/ mi 'bral phyag mtshan gyi mchong/ 'chug med gdeng gi mchong/ dom khyor lha yi mchong/ nges pa rgyun gyi mchong/ pho rgyud mo 'dra'i mchong/ mo rgyud pho 'dra'i mchong dang// drangs thabs kyi mchong/ sbyar thabs sman gyi mchong/ brgyud pa gnas kyi mchong/ mi mthun dbyibs kyi mchong/ nges tshig yi ge'i mchong/ bsgrub lugs tha dad rtags kyi mchong/ yid brtan rtags kyi mchong/ la nye mtshan ma'i mchong/ 'jug don gza' skar gyi mchong/ gnan gtad mdzes nag gi mchong/ de don gtan la 'bebs pa la// dngos grub 'byung ba'i don rnams grub// man ngag sgrub thabs tan tra bya// zla gsang nag po'i mchong zhes bya// kha char mchog srung kyi mchong zhes bya ba'i le'u ste don brgyad pa'o//// yang zhus pa/ ston pa lags/ ma 'ongs lam pa'i rnal 'byor pa la/ zas kyi bza' thabs sman du bsgyur ba ji ltar lags// bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig 'khor rnams dang bar gyis// nga yis yang ni bshad bya yis// rnal 'byor zas kyi bsgyur thabs te// sngags pa rtag tu bza' zhing bsgom// sngags pa'i spyod lam dam pa ste// rus pa'i 'o ma zhes bya ba// de bzhin 'od kyi lo ma dang// 'jim pa skam po nyid dang ni// de bzhin me yi khu ba dang// sgra snyan gyi ni rdzas dgos te// 'di rnams rtag tu rten na ni// rang bzhin gyis ni nad med cing// tshe ring dbang thang rgyas par 'gyur// rtag tu lang tsho dar la bab// lha rnams kyis kyang byin gyis rlob// 'di spyad par ni mi bya ste// mthu dang ngo bo rang gis 'byung// ting 'dzin sngags kyi byin rlabs las// las kyi rnam smin byang bar 'gyur// rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa thob 'gyur// de phyir cho ga bzhin du rtag tu brten// tshes gcig skya rengs shar ba la// snod la ma reg rus sbal bzho// drod ma yal bar gtang bar bya// yang na nyi ma'i sbu gus btung// mar gyi ngos la tshes gcig la// 'od kyi lo ma btsal nas ni// de nyid nas ni bzung nas su// zhag gsum skya rengs shar ba la// lo ma de bzhin bza' bar bya// yang na nyi ma'i sbu gus btung// 'jim pa bzang po sbyar nas ni// zhag gsum chu yi nang du bskams// de nas bskams te phye mar btags// phye ma byi ba'i bar chad gang// ba yi 'o ma dang sbyar nas// sngags pas rtag tu btung bar bya// me yi sdong po sar ba ni// sa yi mar gyis gril bya ste// kha sbyor snod dang ldan bya ste// me chung sa yi btsir nas ni// btung ba nyi ma sbu gus btungs// lan tshwa bral ba'i skra dang ni// zhag gsum bsgrub pa'i sgra snyan rdzas// nam gyi gung la blangs la gtad// snang srid sgo ste zhag gsum bzhag/ rtse

mo chang ni byugs bya ste// dbu ma'i cha ni bdud rtsi nyid// rtsa ba'i cha ni dor bar bya// 'di rnams so sor brten pas ni// tha mal 'bras bu gsum gyis dbye// byi la'i ser tshad re dang sbyar// ma sbyar na yang nyes pa med// 'tshogs pas byas na nges par bshad// dam rdzas re re bsten kyang nges pa med// 'jam dpal gyi dam rdzas rmad du gyur pa// de yi sgrub pa'i grogs bshad pa// zhi ba'i las grogs zla ba yin// rgyu yi grogs su mig tu bsgrags// dbye ba'i grogs su yon tan te// dbang grogs byed pa rig byed yin// dgug pa'i las la de bzhin mda'// bskrad dang gnan pa'i dbang po yin// bsad pa'i las ni rgya mtshor 'dod// las rnams de dag re re yang// bde gshegs mchod la dang por bshad// nyi ma gnyis pa gtor ma sbyin// gsum pa la bzlas 'bad par bya// lnga ba las kyi 'khor lo bskor// drug pa bsam gtan rtse gcig bya// bdun pa las kyi lhag chad bskangs// rigs kyi las kyi khyad par du// las kyi gtso ru gang bsgrub pa'i// 'khor lo bskor te nyi ma bzhi// las kyi rim pa 'dir shes na// zhi bas 'jigs pa brgyad la skyob// rgyas pas yon tan drug dang ldan// dbang gis mos pa de rnams bsgyur// dbye bas gas ste brgyad dang dbye// gnan pas dbang po snga ka 'chings// gzhan rnams kyang ni las rnams byed// spyad na dngos grub mi 'byung ste// gal te yid gnyis za 'gyur ram// bsam pas 'gyur ram dad pas nyams// de tshe dngos grub nye ba yang// phyir ldog 'gyur bar gdon mi za// dad pa brtan pos bsgrubs pas na// nam mkha' med par gyur na yang// sngags kyi dngos grub med mi srid// lha dang drang srong gis bzhengs pa'o// rigs sngags slu bar mi srid na// 'dod pa bral ba'i bshad pa yi// gsang sngags sbyor ba slu ba ste// chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pas// don la the tshom med pa yis// mkhas pa la ni dngos grub nye// yang na blun po dad pas brtan// de la sbyor ba'i dngos grub nye// rtogs shing spyod na dngos grub de// de la shin tu dngos grub ring// man ngag dam pa byin gyur kyang// slob ma yid gnyis yod pa la// de la dngos grub rim par bshad// bla mas man ngag sba byas kyang// slob ma yid gnyis mi za zhing// bla ma'i gdams ngag dam pa gces// gces sprad byas na 'grub par 'gyur// de yi phyir na sngags pa yin// rang gi yid gnyis spangs pa'i phyir// bla ma gnyes pa'i bya ba gces// bkur sti byas pas nus pa che// gsang de brjod pas bar chad med// yon chen phul bas man ngag thob// 'bras bu rin chen gter kha phye// slob dpon btsun la rang dbang che// dgos 'dod thams cad 'byung rgyas shing// de phyir

slob dpon mnyes par bya// yon chen phul bas rang yang gnyan// de phyir bla ma spyi bor khur// bsngags pa dag tu ma byas na// dper na nor bu rin po che// gang la bsngags pa byas pa der// de don dgos don mi ster ro// de phyir bla ma mnyes par 'bul// ma chags phul na gter dang 'phrad// dad pa rtag tu bkur bar bya// dad pa dkon mchog gsum yin no// rang sems dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir// shin tu gdung bar bla ma bkur// ma khur ba yi slob ma la// 'jig rten 'di ru sdug bsngal 'phel// tha ma rdo rje dmyal bar ltung// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// rnal 'byor pas dam rdzas bdud rtsir bsgyur ba dang bla ma mnyes shing gdams pa'i le'u ste don dgu pa'o//// yang zhus pa/ ston pa lags/ dam tshig gnyan po bsrungs pa la// 'jam dpal dam tshig ji ltar bsrung// bdag cag rmongs pas ma rtogs na// bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig rdo rje rnon po khyod// spyir dam tshig 'bum sde sa ya ste// bsdus pas nyi shu rtsa brgyad de// 'dir grags le tshe byas pa la// 'jam dpal dam tshig rtsa gnyis bshad// 'di ni khyad par dam tshig dag tu bshad// mi shigs pa ni seng ge ste// gcan gzan rgyal po yin pas so// za ma tog gis 'dod pa gter// dug sbyor bya ba mi rigs pa// rin chen smyu gu lcug phran dag/ de ni dregs par rigs par min// gangs kyi zhun chu khol ma dag/ mkhas pas btung bar bya ba min// pad+ma ze 'bru kha mi dbye// zla tsher ma yin kha mi dbye// ma rtags bug rdol can gyi snod// kha mi dbye zhing bcud mi blug/ don dang mi ldan bcos mi dgos// bsril zhing spyad par bya ba min// shel gyi mchod rten 'od 'bar ba// mgul nas gdags par bya ba min// khyung chen nam dpangs spyod pa yang// gshog pa g.yas g.yon gcod mi bya// bai DUr+ya yi rdo rje dag/ ra bcag sdig pa bsam mi khyab// rin chen 'bar ba za ma tog/ dug sbyor ba yi sems tsam bya mi rung// rin po che yi lcug phran rnams// cung zad snang bar spong mi bya// rdo rje 'phreng ba rgyun thag ni// 'dres shing spyan par bya ba min// spu gris gtams pa'i tshig pa dag/ sus kyang dral bar bya ba min// dgos pa 'byung ba rin po che// bsreg pa'i dras gros bya mi rung// dung dang bcas pa'i me tog dag/ nam yang dbul bar bya ba min// gser gyi lcags kyus ma bzung ba'i// nya sha nam yang bza' mi bya// nags khros stong pa'i phyogs dag tu// rnal 'byor mig ltar mi rung ngo// ma yis sbyar ba'i rtsi sman dag/ the tshom med par rgyun mi gcad// 'phrul gyi me long snang ba'i g.ya'// rtag tu phyi zhing blta bar bya// dug sbrang 'thung dang tshong bsam gyis// 'gro nyal mi bya mar me gtang// sdom la

gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu rnam gnyis so// the tsom med par rnyed par 'gyur// de phyir 'bad de bsrung bar bya// 'di yi gdams ngag bla ma'i ngag/ yi dam klu yi le'u dang// 'jam dpal ting 'dzin le'u gdon// nyin gsum mtshan gsum gdon pa'am// yang na ra ba gsum la gdon// gtor chung re dang tsha re gdab// rgyun gyi spyod lam dag tu gsungs// rtag tu rang nyid ma yengs par// a kro gdon zhing yid mtshams gcad// rang gi ltag pa'i bdud sgo na// car langs nag po bya yi bdud// nyung lo ma ru rtag tu gnas// des na khro bo gsal bar bya/ shel dkar rin chen sgo nga dang// 'dam bu'i rdzas su bsub mi bya// seng ge dkar mo'i 'o ma dag/ dug can snod du blugs pa min// rin chen nor bu rin po che// bsreg par bya ba yongs ma yin// khyung chen gshog pa 'khor brgyad pa// de dag bcag par bya ba min// gnam lcags me yi rdung mo dag/ brdab par bya ba ma yin no// stag zil 'grol ba'i sa las bya// las kyi lhag ma bsdu mi bya// rdo rje brag chen gtams pa'i gzhi// de dag gshigs par bya ba min// rdo rje ra yi go chas ni// bsdam bya brlag par bya ba min// bud shing bsregs pa'i sgron ma dag/ 'thor rlung drag pos bskyar mi bya// rdo rje tshig gi chu rgyun dag/ 'ol kha gcag par bya ba min// rgyal ba'i bka' rtags phyag rgya ni// nam yang spyad par mi bya'o// rdo rje pha lam gtam pa'i mkhar// rmad nas bzlog bar mi bya'o// gtsug gi nor bu 'bar ba dag/ rgyal mtshan rtse nas dbog mi bya// 'jam dpal rtags tu bsgom dang phyag tu be con bcang// ma yengs rgyun du rag sha bsgrangs// lam mi gzur zhing bgrod dka' 'gro/ tshig gis bar mi gcad par dang// rang nyid rtag tu khro bor bsgom// stag lpags gyon zhing sha chen mur// rtsa ba nyams pas yan lag rlag/ dper na bca' sogs sems btang bzhin// thams cad rlag par gyur pa'o// sku yi sa ma ya nyams na// dper na sol sdong de bzhin no// de la myu gu ci la skye// gsung gi dam tshig nyams gyur na// sa bon dbang mes tshig bzhin no// thugs kyi nyams na sad khyer 'dra// dpe don bshad de rdong du zhog/ zla gsang nag po'i dam tshig bsrung thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad cu thams pa'o//// yang zhus pa/ ston pa lags/ rgyun du mi 'bral ting 'dzin gang// rdzas kyi rim pa ji ltar lags// zhus pas/ bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig nga yis bshad par bya// rang nyid 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// ma yengs rgyun du drang bar bya// bcu bdun pa dang mi 'bral zhing// 'dzab bstod stong tshogs mchod pa dbul// seng ldeng 'dom tshad be con

nam// yang na be shing bzang po la// lhar bsgom mi 'bral phyag mtshan de// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub mu tra la// g.yas pa seng ldeng 'dom gang la// mi 'bral rtag tu bcang bar bya// des ni nus mthus mod la 'byung// mdun du bzas pa pho mo la// tsham rngar byas pas brgyal bar byed// be con brgyab pas 'chor mi srid// des na nus pa yod pa'i shing// phyag mkhar dag tu rgyal bas gsungs// mi shis pa yi rdzas rnams dang// gdug pa can gyi shing rnams ni// drang po rdzas su shis par bshad// 'brub khung rdul tshon 'khor lo bri// rnal 'byor pa yis las rim yin// btu bkod yo dang drang ba ni// 'jam dpal sngags kyi thems zhes grags// rdzas shes bya ba'i rim pa la// seng ldeng phur pa 'dom gang la// mi rkang 'phreng ba rtag tu bgrang// zhing gzhab bzhi dang chas pa bgo/ tsit+ta tshil chen bsku mnye bya/ go ro tsa na sha chen brten// rgyu 'phreng khrag chen rgyun du bca'// 'khor lo gu gul nyungs kar dang/ dug sna thun sna brgyad pa bsogs// sems can lbugs can lbugs med khrag/ zhing gi stan te spre spu dang// rang gi bsgom thabs ma nor bsgom// skye tshe thun rdzas mon bzhi bskul// rgyun du a kro nyi shar bzhin// brjed med dag tu gdon zhing bskul// snying khar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam// de stengs a kro bcu bdun pa// de yi dbus su oM bsgoms te// oM kyi dbus na rtsa spu'o// de yi nang na phar rgyas pas// 'jam dpal bdud kyi drag sngags bdun// khong nas brgyud de// khung gi dkyil na gzas pa yod pa yi//
