rtags// phyag drug g.yon gyi bar pa na// zhing chung dbyug to sngon po bsnams// bdud dang dgra bgegs rdul du rlogs// phyag drug g.yon gyi tha ma na// dung chen dmar gyi bkang ba bsnams// nyon mongs chags pa dam la 'du// sku yang che ste rngam ril bzang// glang chen ko rlon na bzar gsol// zhing chen rlon pa'i ya ba bskor// stag lpags rlon pa'i sham thabs can// sprul nag stong gis lhu tshigs brgyan// 'phags pa'i khro rgyal gshin rje gshed// gtan gyi lhar yang gsol 'debs na// ri rab gser gyi ngos la bya gnas pa// bya yi rang bzhin bor nas gser du snang// lha mchog khyed kyi sku ru bdag bsgoms pas// bdag gi rang bzhin bor nas khro bor gsal// khro mo yum dag bcas te skur ston cig/ g.yon na yum bskyed khro mo nyer bag ma// za byed nag mo chen mo pe ta le// gtum mo dug hrul gos gyon mo// gdong nas mig gsum khros pa'i tshul// mig gsum gdong ni khro gnyer can// za byed gzi chen rab tu sdigs par byed// gyen du skra rdzes gsus po che// rab tu 'jigs pa'i kha yang bgrad// lus ni me lce 'bar ba 'dra// g.yas pa'i phyag na tri shul bsnams// bdud dang dgra bgegs rdul du rlogs// g.yon pa'i phyag na bsnams pa ni// thod rlon dmar gyis bkang ba bsnams// stob pa yab kyi zhal du stob// yid tsam gtso la 'dud pa'i tshul// bde gshegs yab kyi bka' bstod ma// zhing chung bkram pa'i gdan stengs 'dir// brkyang bskum tshul du brjid par bzhugs// me ri 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'khor ni thogs med tsan thabs dang// khro mo kai ri brgyad kyis bskor// sing ha 'phra men brgyad kyis bskor// thar byed chen mo brgyad kyis bskor// ma mo nag mo'i tshogs ni sprin ltar gtibs// dbang phyug ma mo'i tshogs dang ldan// yi dwags

bal chen gnas 'di ru// byonacig gshegs pa'i gnas ngan yang// bsnyen cing bsgrub pa'i lha lags kyis// yal gam can rnams brtse dgongs la// rnal 'byor bdag gi don la gshegs su gsol// oM many+dzu shri ya ma badzra ta u tsuSh+ma kro d+ha po ta li la/ zhes pa'i sngags bzlas/ g.yas nas yum bskyed e ka dza ti ma// gnyis ka'i sku ni dbus kyi gtso dang mthun// srid pa gsum gyi gtso ni thod pa'i 'phreng ba can// 'khor ni rnga zhon mang po dang// g.yer dang shel gyi rnga mo la// g.yu yi rta sga wang se wangs// g.yu yi na bun thibs se thibs// mu men gur chen khyi li li// snga 'phreng mdzes pa'i do shal ma// phye 'phreng g.yas nas g.yul zlog ma// phyag na mdung dmar chems se chems// bran g.yog mang po'i 'khor dang bcas// khyod kyi 'khor ni rab tu mi srun te// nga rgyal drag shul che zhing bdud kyi bu smad 'khol// gsod pa don du gnyer zhing dgra snying tshal par gshog/ dbang phyug chen mo bskyed tsam na// nam mkha'i rgyal po gsheg su gsol// bzlog cing bsgyur ba'i dus la bab// bdud kyi khram bam dgra la bsgyur// nad ka rims kha dgra la thong// sdang dgra gnod bgegs thal bar thong// oM badzra shrI ya ma ra dza ma ma e ka dza ti dza// zhes spyan drangs la mchaud pa dbul// phrin las bcol// gshin rje ya ma ra dza dang// myos byed 'bar ba At+ya ma ru dang// ral pa tshar dgu yab yum brgyud// gnas 'di brtse phyir gshegs su gsol// ya ma rA dza/ sa twa me ya/ ya me to ru/ na yo ta ya/ ya ta yo ni ra yak+She ya/ ya k+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya/ zhes pas sbyan drangs la// ga pur gsum dang dri zhim spos// a ka ru dang du ru ka/ dzA ti pha la gur kum mchog/ gshin rje'i tshogs la mchod par 'bul// oM a ha ra d+hu pa puSh+pe A lo ka gan+d+he d+hu pe sad/ gan+d+he pa tsa kra sa ma ya/ zhes mchod pa rnam lnga dbul/ dza gad 'bru bcud dpa' bo yis// rtsa ba brgyad la lo ma stong// sangs rgyas yongs kyi thugs dam 'di// gshin rje mamo'i tshogs la 'bul// oM AHhUM/ sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta khA hi/ sman dbul/ bdud rtsi bcud ldan zhal zas ro mchog 'di// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro// reg bya la sogs mchod pa 'di// gshin rje ma mo'i tshogs la mchod par 'bul// rag+ta khA hi khA hi/ zhes 'dod yon lnga'i mchod yon dbul lo// ma lus bsgral ba'i sha sna dang// gtubs gtor ldan pa'i maM sa sha yi mchog/ rkang dang tshil bu bcud kyi rgyud// gshin rje ma mo'i tshogs la mchod par 'bul// oM maM sa ma tsa rag+ta ba liM ta kha hi/ zhes sha khrag gi gtor ma dbul lo// 'khor ba'i mgo bcad ban da mtshan dang ldan// 'dod chags khrag gi rgya mtsho khyi li li// dmar chen dam pa ma mo'i dam rdzas

mchog/ gshin rje ma mo'i tshogs la mchod par 'bul// ma hA rag+ta sa mun tra kha hi/ zhes khrag dbul/ de nas hUM gtum chen gyis bstod/ lnga brgya tha mas thugs dam bskul/ bzlas pa bya'o// bsnyen pa dang ni sgrub pa yang// 'phrin las chen po'i gzhung dang mthun// gshin rje gshed po'i rgyud gsang ba drug cu pa las/ gshin rje lnga'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi le'u ste so bdun pa'o//// rdo rje 'dzin pas yang zhus pa// gshin rje gshed po khyod kyis ni// dngos grub myur bar bya ba'i thabs// ras ri sgrub pa'i thabs gsungs te// zhes pa ni mtshan ma can la dad pa dang// ting 'dzin g.yel ba spangs pa dang// 'bras bu ma yengs sgrub pa'i phyir// ras ris grub pa 'di ltar bya// lha yi bsnyen pa 'di ltar bya// ras sam dar dkar gzhi ma la// lha bzo mkhas pa dam tshig can// tshon rtsi legs par bya ba'i phyir// pho brang bzhugs skur bri ba dang// bzhengs skur bri ba gang rung bya// dbus su gtso bo bri ba dang// g.yas yum gnyis bri ba dang// gshed po phyogs skyong yab yum dang// ging dang bdud kyi pho nya dang// dbus nas rim par ji bzhin bri// sku mdog phyag mtshan gdan khri dang// bzhugs tshul rgyan cha la sogs pa// rgyud 'dis bshad pa bzhin du bri// ri mo legs par zin pa dang// rnal 'byor bdag gi mdun du ni// lho nas bris sku dgram par bya// mdun du maN+Dal legs par bya// maN+Dal ba byung dri yis byug/ chag chag legs par bya ba dang// maN+Dal steng du mchod pa ni// gong du bshad pa dgram par bya// 'phrin las dmigs pa gzhung bzhin du// zhag lnga bsnyen pa bya ba dang// zhag bdun nub mo bris sku ste// bdag nyid lha ru gsal ba las// thugs ka'i hUM las 'od 'phros pas// bris sku'i dngos po mtshan ma sbyangs// bris sku stong par gyur pa de// hUM gi gzugs su gyur ba las// hUM las bruM chad bris sku'i gnas su gyur// hUM nyid rdo rje rtse lngar gyur ba de// rdo rje chen por brjod pa las// ya man+ta ka'i sku ru gyur// yum la sogs pa'i lha rnams kun// stong pa'i ngang las yi ge hUM du gyur// hUM nyid rang rang phyag mtshan gyur// phyag mtshan rang rang sku ru gyur// so so rang rang sku de la// ye shes sems dpa' sbyan drangs la/ lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas dgug pa dang// zhags pa'i phyag rgyas ye shes sems dpa' rnams// dam tshig bris sku'i lha la gzhug/ lcags sgrog phyag rgyas gnyis med bstim la bcings// dril bu'i phyag rgyas bris sku la// dam tshig dbang gis bzhugs par bsam// oM many+dzu shrI ya man+ta ka de ba pi na nre trang sha gsha' badzra/ zhes bris sku'i lha thams cad la ye shes kyi spyan rnams par phye la/ ye shes sems dpa' dang bris sku'i

lha gnyis su med pa la/ mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod la/ bris sku la dmigs la/ rnal 'byor pa nyid ya man+ta kar bsgoms la bzlas pa bya'o// bzlas pa'i ting nge 'dzin bdag gi thugs ka'i nyi zla'i steng na ye shes sems dpa'/ de'i thugs ka'i nyi zla'i steng na rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ rdo rje'i lte ba la hUM/ hUM gi mtha' ma a kros bskor ba'o// mdun gyi bris sku'i thugs kar yang de ltar bsam/ de ltar byas la bzlas pa bya'o// bdag gi thugs ka nas 'od 'phros te/ bris sku'i thugs dam bskul// mchod par bsam// bris sku'i thugs ka nas 'od phyung bdag la thim sgrib pa sbyangs dngos grub thob par bsams la bzlas pa bya'o// de ltar mchod dang bstod byas nas// bzlas pa dus gsum rgyun du bya// bris sku de la dmigs byas la// bris sku 'dzum yal g.yo ba dang// gang 'dod dngos grub thob par bya'o// gang 'dod las la the tshom med// lha tshogs rangs pa bri ba dang// gtso bo gcig tu bri ba dang// lha lnga sgrub pa bri ba dang/ gang ltar sgrub pa de ltar bya'o// gshin rje gshed po rgyud gsang ba drug cu pa las/ ras bris la sgrub pa'i thabs kyi le'u ste so brgya pa'o//// rdo rje 'dzin pa de lta bas na 'jam dpal gshin rje'i dkyil 'khor du// slob ma gzhug cing dbang bskur ba'i// thabs ni bshad par bya ba la// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i slob ma de// gong du 'jam dpal gshin rje yi// spyi dang khyad par dam tshig kun// sku srung thub pa mi thub pa// slob ma de la bri par bya'o// thub pa khas ni len pa ni// dbang gi rim pa bskur ba ni// gu ru bsnyen pa tshad phyung la// bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor bri ba dang// mchod pa tshang bar bya ba dang// las kyi khog gzhung bya ba dang// bzlas pa bstod pa tshig gi 'khor lo dang// mchod pa byas pa'i slob ma de// gdong g.yogs nang du 'ongs pa dang// lha tshogs rangs pa'i mtshan smos la// lha phyag phyogs bzhir btsal ba dang// bar chod bgegs kun bsal ba dang// dam tshig sdom pa dbog pa dang// me tog 'thor du gzhug pa dang// me tog gang la 'phog pa'i lha// lha de bsgom du gzhug pa dang// lha de nyid kyi skur mi brjid 'phreng ba 'am// ye shes rnam lnga rdo rje'i dbang// gsung thabs grol ba dril bu'i dbang// nyan pa'i dbang ni rin po che// bshad pa'i dbang ni rin po che// bshad pa'i dbang ni 'khor lo dang// snod bcud snod du ban d+he'i dbang// rtog pa 'joms pa zhing chen dbang// dam tshig mi srung bdud rtsi'i dbang// dgra bgegs 'dul phyir phur ba'i dbang// sems nyid rtog med me 'bar dbang// dngos grub thob phyir zhal zas dbang// rnam rtog bkru phyir bum pa'i dbang// rigs 'dzin sa thob ming gi

dbang// dregs pa can rnams 'dul phyir du// dur khrod chas brgyad dbang yang bskur// de yang dbang bdag la ma lus thob pa dang// bsgom dang bsgrub pa byas gyur na// dngos grub myur te byin rlabs che// rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa la gnas// de nas dbang dang dam tshig thob// de nas las rnams grub par bshad// dam tshig dbang dang mi ldan na// dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur ro// gshin rje gshed po'i rgyud gsang ba drug cu pa las/ dbang gi le'u ste so dgu pa'o//// de nas dam tshig bstan pa las// spyi yi dam tshig rnams kyang ma nyams bsrung// khyad par dam tshig bstan pa las// sku yi dam tshig gshin rje rgyun du bsgom// gsung gi dam tshig snying po rgyun du bgrang// thugs kyi dam tshig spros pa gzhan spongs la// spyod pa'i dam tshig chos spyod ci nus bya// mi spang dam tshig lha yi blang dor spang// dang du blang ba'i dam tshig dus gsum mchod pa bstan par bya// shes pa'i dam tshig bsnyen bsgrub las la mkhas// bsgrub pa'i dam tshig gshin rje'i dngos grub thob// gzhan ma rnams la phyag mi 'tshal// lam khar mi gzur drang por 'gro// gzhan dang gtam yang mi bya'o// dam rdzas phud ni ma nyams dang// mchod pa'i yo byad bzang po dang// khas blangs dus su bya ba dang// snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa dang// spyod pa ras chod spangs pa dang// nyams pa'i cho ga bya ba spang// dam rdzas ma tshang sgrub pa spang// bsam pa log pa'i cho ga spang// gnyid kyis non pa'i bzlas pa spang// de rnams khyad par dam tshig go/ dam tshigs gzhi lta bu ste// dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyu yin pas// dam tshig ma nyams bsrung ba gces// de ltar dam tshig tshul bzhin bsrungs// gshin rje gshed po'i rgyud gsang ba drug cu pa las/ dam tshig gi le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o//// de nas gshin rje gshed pos bsgrub pa'i spyod pa dka' thub bstan pa// tha ma spyod pa gzhan dang mi mthun par bya'o// bsnyen pa'i dus kyi spyod pa ni// snying rje ting 'dzin tshul bzhin spyad// dus drug mtshan brjod 'don pa dang// tsha tshwa 'grub tshad gdab pa dang// chu gtor cha gsum btang ba dang// bsnyen pa byed pa'i nub mo kun// dge ba'i grogs ni ci nus bya// stong tshogs mchod pa gzhung ltar spyad// bsnyen pa'i 'dzab ni ci nus bzlas// bsgrub pa'i dus kyi mchod pa ni// phyag mi 'tshal ba gzhan ma la// lha yi nga rgyal gnas pa yi// che ba nyams su dogs pas na// lam yang mi gzur gtam mi smra// bsgrub pa chen po byed dus tshe// g.yal pa gzhan ma rangs pa spang// lag pa g.yas pa seng ldeng gi/ dbyug pa thogs la 'khar ba bya'o// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub bsgreng bar bya'o// zhing dang

glang chen pags pa gon// stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs bya'o// ri yi khrod nas ri khrod 'gro// sa che pa dang chung pa spyad// khams gos so ba'i thun mtshams su spyod pa de dag bya'o// gnas su yang 'ong lha'i sku/ gsal bar bsgoms la mchod pas mchod// phyag rgya be con phyag rgya bca'// g.yas pa 'phreng ba bgrang bar bya// khri khri smra ba bcad la bzlas// bzlas pa myur la rags pa ni// yi ge'i mtshams 'dres byin brlabs chung// bzlas pa bul na grangs mi thon// myur la bul ba ran par bya'o// shin tu gsal bar smra ba'o// dka' thub drag pos spyad par bya'o// bsgrub pa thon nas spyod pa yang// lha yi rnal 'byor ma nyams pas// spyod pa gar bde gar skyed bya// chos spyod snying rje che bar bya// gang la gang ci mthun par bya// rgyun gyi spyod pa bya'o// gshin rje gshed po'i rgyud gsang ba drug cu pa las/ spyod pa'i le'u ste zhe gcig pa'o//// gshin rje gshed po bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas// 'di ltar snang ba srid pa gsum// gshin rje'i lto na yod bar lta// snod kyi 'jig rten lha yi dkyil 'khor te// bcud kyi sems can mkha' 'gro lta bur lta// 'jig rten khams nas 'dod pa lnga// lha tshogs mchod pa'i rdzas su lta// kun rdzob lta ba de ltar ro// don dam lta ba 'di ltar ro// lha yi 'khor lo thams cad kyang// snang la rang bzhin med pa chu zla 'dra// gsal la rtog pa med de gzha' tshon 'dra// thugs rje phyogs dang bas nyi zla 'dra// lha yi sku mdog phyag mtshan yang// lhang nge sal le rang bzhin med// rtag pa'i mu mtha' spangs pa'o// skye ba med pas nam mkha' lta bu las/ skye ba'i cho 'phrul 'ja' dang na bun lta bu la// skye ba med pa'i cho 'phrul las// skyai ba'i cho 'phrul 'jam dpal gyi// gshin rje'i lha tshogs sku ru gsal// de yang mtshan ma'i skyon dang bral// chad pa'i mu mtha' spangs pa'o// rtag chad spangs pas lha yi dkyil 'khor lha// ye shes gshin rje dus gsum sangs rgyas yin// las kyi gshin rje dus kyi sangs rgyas yin// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su med par lta// gnyis med snang ba thugs rje'i mdzad spyod de// sems can gdul ba'i tshad du bstan// yang dag nyid la gnyis su med// ma rtogs pa la drang don du// gdul bya 'dul byed gnyis su bstan// gshin rje gshed po'i rgyud gsang ba drug cu pa las/ lta ba bstan pa'i le'u ste zhe gnyis pa'o//// gshin rje gshed pos sdud pa po rdo rje 'dzin pa la yang gsungs pa/ pho yis gsad dang mo yis gsang// rme thab dkrugs nas gsad pa dang// chos skus gdas pa thabs bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// gsad thabs dang po bshad pa la// pho gsad thabs bstan pa la// cho ga bzhin

du bsnyen pa bya// dur khrod dben bar 'khor lo bri// rgya chen sa yi 'khor lo bri// yig 'bru dgod dang phur bu dgod// 'khor lo legs bris par snang la// yas mar 'phyang dang mas 'degs pa// sngon dmar btags la yas mar 'phyang// sngags kyi thun mtshams shes par bya// ma ni rA dza k+She ya/ pra ma ya rbad/ nyi ma dang bo'o// k+She ya to ta yo ya/ mu rtsa ya hUM phaT/ nyi ma gnyis pa'o/ ya ya ru to me ya/ rag ta tsa ra ya rbad/ gsum pa'o// me sa to tsa ma ya/ mA ra ya dgra bo mA ra ya rbad/ nyi ma bzhi pa'o// nub bzhi pa'i sngags so// oM a kro ri ra rtso mA ra ya rbad// oM ma tsa sri ra ma ra ya rbad// oM ma te yi ti ga sa mA ra la rbad/ oM ya kha du ru mA ra ya rbad ya/ nyi ma bzhi pa'i las tshang na// phur bus gdab pa dang gnan pa'i las bya// las kyi gshin rje nag po'i phyag tu sba// gshin rje gshed po'i rgyud gsang ba drug cu pa las/ sgrol ba spu gri'i le'u ste zhe gsum pa'o//// yang gsad pa'i thabs gsungs pa/ ma mo'i 'khor lo logs byas la// dang po lha bsnyen tshad phyung la// de nas sgrub pa bya ba ni// mkhas pas dur khrod dben pa ru/ ma mo'i 'khor lo bri ba ni// phyi ru bstan pa thod pa'o// gsang ba de nyid drang ba'o// bsnyen pa sgrub pa bris byas la// rgya chen sa yi dkyil 'khor yang// mkhas pas gsang la nub mo bri// thig bzhi btab pas le tshe dgu/ dbus su e bzhi 'khor lo bri// bcu gnyis bcu drug rtse sprad de// rtse sprad bar du ming rus bri// 'khor lo gru bzhi zhal bzhi yang// phyag gis 'khor lo bskor ba'o// ming gi ma ltor 'khor lo gzhug/ 'khor lo'i thun mtshams spyi dang mthun// oM ya ma rA dza sa me to ya bra ma rbad/ nyi ma dang po'o// oM me to ru na ta yo ya/ rag ta tsa ra ya rbad ya/ gnyis pa'o// oM ta ni yo ra k+She ya ya/ mu ra tsa ya rbad ya/ gsum pa'o// oM k+She tsa ya ni mA ra ya// dgra bo mA ra ya rbad ya/ nyi ma bzhi pa'o// nub bzhi pa'i/ e rag ni sha ma hUM phaT/ oM ma pa ra tsa tra ni sha ya hUM phaT/ oM ma tra tsi sa ra ni sha ya hUM phaT/ oM mkhas li ni sha ya hUM/ zhes nyin mtshan dr-il phur bus gdab dang mnan pa bya/ gshin rje gshed po'i rgyud gsang ba drug cu pa las/ sbyor ba mdung thung gi 'khor lo bskor ba'i le'u ste zhe bzhi pa'o//// gsad thabs rme thab gsungs pa ni// dang po bsnyen pa tshad phyang la// de nas 'khor lo bri ba ni// dbus su a bzhag rtsibs bzhis bskor// bcu gnyis bcu drug rtse sprad bri// rtse sprad bar du ming rus bris// de yi phyir rim rdo rje 'khor lo bri// de yi bar du gsang mtshan gzhug/ srid pa'i lha srin ma mo la// dam yang bdar la dbang yang gzugs// nyin mo gtor la mtshan mo dril// ya ma rA dza sa to me ya nag mo rag sha che ge mo bam

ril rbad/ ya k+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya/ trag rag sha shig che ge mo thum ril rbad ya/ nub bzhi pa'i sngags/ oM ru ru kha rag ma de tsa snying kha rag tre tre ra ga sha dam nyams dun b+h+yo/ oM sing nga tsa dur kha rag snying la rbad ya/ tsad dam nyams lce sdibs/ drag rag sha tsa pa la phra ma rbad/ oM badzra ti ka ma du raka sha po le dam nyams traM traM srin po kha la rbad/ oM rag mo ru ru tsa ba la trig mo tro tro sho ri snying la ma rA ya rbad ya/ zhes pa ni re ma ti dang/ rmu lugs nag mo dang rag sha nag mo dang/ e ka dza ti dang/ ma mo bzhi yi sngags dang/ e ka dza ti'i sngags kyis mgo bo drangs la bzlas la/ nyin mo pho skor la mon pa bzhi bskul/ mtshan mo mo skor la ma mo bzhi bskul/ thun mtshams 'khor lo spyi dang mthun// phur bu gdab dang mnan pa bya// gshin rje gshed po'i rgyud gsang ba drug cu pa las/ sngags pa rme thabs kyi le'u ste zhe lnga pa'o//// yang gsad pa'i las gsungs pa ni/ lha yi rnal 'byor ldan pa yi// dang po gtor mas bdag dang// sa yi lha mo bstan ma dang// mchod pa lnga dang ldan pas mchod// sa blang ba dang gzu dpang bya'o// oM many+dzu shrI kI la ya hUM phaT/ byas la phur ba lnga khro bo lngar gshin rjer bsgoms la gdab/ oM many+dzu shrI kI la ya hUM phaT/ ces pas 'phags pa 'jam dpal du gyur/ des lag par rig par byas la/ oM A hUM/ tre yad ta sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya/ sug rme su ga rma shan+ta shan+ta dan+de na la ku lu ya sho ba ti bi shu b+he sa hA/ zhes pa lan bdun bzlas la bdag gi thugs ka nas 'od 'phros te/ 'phags pa'i thugs dam rgyud bskul nas// 'od tshur 'dus te 'jam dpal la thim pas// 'od phung de nas 'od phung gcig tu btags la// bsam pa ni chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin yin pas ni byin gyis brlabs so// 'od phung la 'bri 'bri dang tsha tshwa gdab/ oM many+dzu shrI shrI ska ni swA hA/ zhes pa'i snying po gang rung gdab/ tsha tshwa de shes rab gnyis su med pa'i thabs/ lha ya man+ta ka'i sku ru krong krong byung bar bsams la/ de nas rten 'brel snying po brjod la/ mchod pa mang pos mchod par bsam/ ya man+ta ka la sogs pa lha/ bcu bdun bsams la/ so so'i snying po brjod la gdab/ gzhan thebs dang sprul pa dang/ yang sprul dang/ snang bar bsams shing gdab bo// dkyil 'khor zlum po rim pa gsum// dbus su gru gsum gsum bya'o// bar ma'i gru gsum zlum po la yang gru gsum bcu/ gru gsum nag po bcu bdun la// lha'i tsha tshwa bcu bdun pa'o// dbus nas rim par dgod pa'o// gzhan yang tsha tshwa thebs tshad gdab// de yi phyi rim bskor la bzhag/ gnas dang mchod rdzas gzhan dang 'dra// dam tshig tsha tshwa btab pa la// ye shes lha tshogs spyan drangs te// phyag

rgya bzhi yis bstim byas la// mchod pa dang ni bzlas pa dang// bstod pa la sogs pa yang bya// pho thod mo thod 'khor lo dang// dgra yi ming rus bcas pa dang// gnan pa'i 'khor lo bya nas kyang// chos sku'i 'og tu gtad khram bya// dam nyams pa la lha bdud phob// gshin rje gshed po'i rgyud gsang ba drug cu pa las/ chos sku nan po 'od 'bar gyi tsha tshwa gdab pa'i thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste zhe drug pa'o//// rdo rje 'dzin pas yang zhus pa// gsad pa'i thabs bzhi po de lags na// gso ba'i thabs gsum po gang ltar lags/ zhes pas/ gshin rje gshed po'i gsungs pa'o// gso thabs bzhi yang bstan pa'o// sri'u gso dang nad pa gso// dpal gso ba dang tshe gso ba'o// dang po sri'u gso ba de// lan chags gnod pa byed pa la// lha klu che ba thams cad la// mthun pa'i glud kyis bslu bar bya// de nas bsnyen pa tshad du bya// lha yi bsnyen pa bzlas pa'i srung skud gdags// ma dang bu yang chu yi bum pas bkru// de nas sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor bri ba ni// lha dang dam rdzas tshang bar dgod// byang shar mtshams su 'brub khung bya// byang du spre'u de la gnod pa'o// bgegs kyi gzugs dang ming dang ni// ra sogs khyi dang phag gi gzugs// yang na dar zan gzugs byas la// 'bru khung nangadu gzhag par bya// khyi bal dkar nag skud pa yis// ske nas btags la phur pa la// ma ru tser bsams de la gdags// dam srid dgug cing bstim par bya// rgyab rten bya ba'i lha 'dre gdug pa lnga// gser skyems btang la bden pa bdar// thun gyis brab la phur pa gdab// sgrub pa byed pa'i bar du ni// yang nas yang du thun gsum du// dam sri bsgral zhing btab pa dang// sbyin sreg bya dang gnan pa bya// gang byed las ni byas pa dang// ma la 'phags pa gshin rje yi// snying po phog la zlos su gzhug/ dam tshig theg chen srung du gzhug/ de ltar byas pas las de rnams// 'grub bar dpa' bos gsungs ba'o// gshin rje gshed po'i rgyud gsang ba drug cu pa las/ sri'u gso ba'i le'u ste zhe bdun pa'o//// yang gso ba'i thabs gsungs ba/ nad par gyur pa gso ba la// lha yi rnal 'byor pa byas la// nad pa de la gnod pa yi// lha 'dre gang yin gdon pa la// glu dang zang zing sbyin pa bya// gnod pa'i bgegs ngan gdul ba dang// yang nas yang bskrad par bya'o// bden pa bdar zhing glung kyang dbul// nad pa'i skye ru srung skud gdags// khrus dang me tog me yi cho ga bya// gshin rje gshed la gtor ma yang nas yang du btang// dbul bar byas la 'phrin las bcol// nad pa rang gi lha de la// gsol mchod byas la las kyang gcol// de ni phan par bshad

ba'o// gshin rje gshed po'i rgyud gsang ba drug cu pa las/ nad pa gso ba'i thabs kyi le'u ste zhe brgyad pa'o//// yang gso ba'i thabs gsungs pa/ dpal ni bu tsha yod par byed pa'o// dang po lha bsnyen bya ba yang// bud med de la srung skud gdags// bud med khrus byas gos gtsag bskon// srid la gnod pa'i dam sri gdul// lha 'dre gdug pa che ba la// skyin glud byin la bden pa bdar// gshin rje gshed kyi dkyil 'khor du// dam tshig phog pa'i dbang yang bskur// 'jam dpal sku ru bsgom du gzhug/ gshin rje gshed por dbang bskur nas// snying po 'di dag zlos su gzhug/ srid thag nye bar bshad pa'o// gshin rje gshed po'i rgyud gsang ba drug cu pa las/ dpal bskyed pa'i le'u ste zhe dgu pa'o//// yang gso ba'i thabs gsungs pa/ tshe gso ba ni/ gang zhig tshe nyams pa de bsring bar bshad// ban d+ha lcang lo mdzes pa ru// chang dang bdud rtsis bkang byas la// snying po rnam lnga byug byas la// khrus phye bre gang byas pa yi// tshe yi 'brang rgyas byas ba yi// rtsi thog rgyas pa'i mar yang byug/ ban d+ha steng du bzhag byas la// ban d+ha'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rin po che yi snod nang du// nas bre gang blug de ru gzhag/ mchod pa legs pa bshams pa dang// cho ga rim par byas nas ni// bzlas pa bstod pa mang du bya// tshe yi ban d+ha'i nang du ni// 'jam dpal yab yum bskyed byas la// dbu la tshe dpag med pas brgyan// mchod pa kun gyis mchod byas la// snying po 'di ni bzlas par bya// oM pu Nehaya pu Nehaya ma hA a pa ra mi ta pu Nehaya dz+nyA na sam pa ro pa tsi te swAhA/ zhes a kro te ka dang bsgrags la bgrang/ gang bsrung ba de'i tshe nyams pa bsrung ba dang// tshe yar ba gzhug pa dang/ tshe ldegs bstan par bya ba dang// sngags kyi 'od kyi byin brlabs dang// sngags kyi tshe thams cad dang/ g.yang thams cad rdzas la bsdu/ rdzas kyi nus pa mi la thim/ gshin rje gshed po'i lha tshogs drangs pa yis/ mtshan nas brjod cing tshe khug bya// gshin rje gshed po'i rgyud gsang ba drug cu pa las/ tshe bsring pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o//// rdo rje 'dzin mas bstan pa bsrung ba'i ched du/ ser ba dbab pa'i thabs gsungs pa/ mon nam rabs chad thod pa ru// sha sna snying sna khrag sna dang// 'bru sna tshang ba'i sngo khu klud// dug sna blugs la chang gis bsing// lha yi bsnyen pa tshad phyung nas// drag sngags 'di yis bsngags la bzlas// rtse ba'i snying po gang grub la// gsang sngags 'di btags gdab pa yi// thig ni gcig med khrag brgyad bcad// dud phrom nam mthongs phye/ lcags sgrog khrol/ mi rengs sod/ rkyang rje rkyang mo cu ru ma/

'do pa to ya yul/ che ge mor phob byas la/ rdzas sngo'i gseb tu gza' rgyu ba'i dus su gtor la gtang ngo// gshin rje gshed po'i rgyud gsang ba drug cu pa las/ ser ba dbab pa'i le'u ste nga gcig pa'o//// gshin rje gshed pos ser ba bsrung ba'i thabs 'di/ dam tshig ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dang po lha bsnyen rdzogs par bya// de nas bsrung bar bya// de nas bsrung bar bya ba ni// zha shing gi byang bu sor bzhi la// sngags 'di klong bzhir bcad la bri// bsrung mtshams so sor mthong ba'o// rdo rje sgro ma bu nang du gzhug/ g.yam pas bcad la nang du gzhug/ oM a kro te pa la mahA si ka shag su pa sing gi rbad nan/ bzlog cig khaM b+h+yo/ shag hru tri khram b+h+yo/ oM mur shi kung tsud ka swAhA/ gshin rje gshed po'i rgyud gsang ba drug cu pa las/ ser ba srung ba'i le'u ste nga gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang gshin rje gshed po la/ 'khor rnams la sogs pa gshin rje'i tshogs dang bcas pa bstod pa/ de lta bu'i sgrub thabs mang po zhal nas gsungs pa la/ de dag ngo mtshar bas bstod pa ni/ gtum chen rab 'bar gshin rje 'joms mdzad lha// nyi ma 'bum bas lhag pa'i 'od ldan khyed// phyag mtshan mang po bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// rab 'jigs gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje'i sku la klu dbang rab brgyan cing// gcan gzan gdug pa'i pags rlon na bzar gsol// mi mgo thod khrag mi bzad sku la gsol// brkyang bskum tshul gyis gshin rje zhabs kyis gnon// mi bzad khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug hU~M sgra can// phaT kyis khams gsum sgra sgrog dus gsum dbang du sdud// sha za ma go bcad 'phreng ba sku yi rgyan du byas// spyan zlog tsam gyis rdo rje ser ba 'bebs// ljags 'dril gseb nas rdo rje thog chen 'bebs// 'khor gyi ma mo rnams kyang sgren mor 'don// rkan sgra gtogs pas lha chen khyab 'jug kyang// gan bub brgyal byas khrag 'thung nyid la 'dud// stong khams khebs par byed pa'i zhal gdangs nas// tshangs pa'i 'khor bcas rdul ba'i thig mdzad cing// nad gtong srin mo rnams kyang 'dar zhing 'bros// rgyu 'phreng khrag dang bcas pa thogs nas kyang// phyag mtshan mi mgo rlon pa rab bsnams shing// dngos grub mchog gi klad khrag zhal du gsol// gnod sbyin ma rungs mgo bcad 'phreng bas sku la brgyan// phyag na khyung dang 'ug pa lta bu'i khra bsnams shing// dam las ldog pa rnams la gtong bar mdzad// dur khrod chen por mtshan mo rab rgyu zhing// mgo gcad so yis chem chem 'cha' ba yang// khyod mthong tsam gyis zhabs la gtugs// de bas bzod par dka' la yang dag 'dud// gdung ba'i sems kyis bdag gi 'khor du gtogs pa

la// gnod par byed pa'i mi dang mi min gang yang rung// zung zhig chings shig rgol cig gar mdzad lha gshin rje gshed// yun gyi ltar yang khyod gsol 'debs na// ri rab gser gyi ngos la bya gnas la// bya yi rang bzhin bor nas gser du snang// lha mchog khyed kyi sku ru bdag bsgoms pas// bdag gi rang bzhin bor nas khro bor snang// lha mchog khyod la su dang gang brten pa// mi yi tha ma rnams kyang mchog tu 'gyur// de bas 'di dang pha rol gnyis ka ru// srog gi phyir yang lha mchog mi gtong na// byams pa'i zhal bzang sngon du bstan nas kyang// thugs rje'i dbang gis bdag la gzigs su gsol// khro mo yum dang bcas te skur ston cig/ g.yon nas yum bskyed khro mo'i sku// gtum mo dug hrul gos gyon ma// g.yas nas yum bskyaid e ka ti ma// chags gzhi chen mo khrag mdog ma// gnyis ka'i sku ni dbus kyi gtso dag mthun// sdang ba'i dgra dang gnod pa'i bgegs// thal bar thog la rlung la phyor// ces 'khor rnams kyis gtso bo la bstod do// thabs mang po bstan pa la ngo mtshar gyis bstod pa'o// gsang ba drug cu ba las/ gtso bo la 'khor gyis bstod pa'i le'u ste nga gsum pa'o//// de nas gshin rje gshed po'i lha tshogs la tshogs 'bul ba gsungs ba/ zan dang mar dang sha dang chang// zho dang chab mig chod ma la// byin gyis brlab pa byas la ni// spyan drangs la sogs bya ba ni// hUM/ chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang nas// 'khor 'bar ba'i sku ru gnas// 'jam dpal gshin rje 'khor bcas kun// rnal 'byor longs spyod tshogs la gshegs// ri rab chen po'i rmang 'og nas// gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po ni// 'chi bdag ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas// rnal 'byor longs spyod tshogs la gshegs// rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa la gnas// sngags kyi sdom la gnas pa yi// rig 'dzin 'khor bcas tshogs la gshegs// zhes spyan drangs so// de nas phud gsum du spros la// dang po la mchod pa/ hUM/ gzugs kyi bye brag mang po dang// sgra yi rnam pa mang po dang// dri yi rnam pa mang po dang// ro yi rnam pa mang po dang// reg bya'i rnam pa mang po kun// 'jam dpal gshin rje 'khor bcas la// mchod par 'bul lo bzhes su gsol// bar ma la bshags pa// lus kyi spyod pa rtsings pa mthol lo bshags// ngag gi cho ga lhag chad shor ba mthol lo bshags// sems kyi ting nge 'dzin g.yel bar gyur pa mthol lo bshags// chang dang gnyid dbang gyur pa mthol lo bshags// zhes pas bshags pa bya'o// tha ma la ling ga bcas la bsgral bar bya'o// de nas tshogs la rol/ gshin rje gshed po'i rgyud gsang ba drug cu pa las/ tshogs 'bul

ba'i le'u ste nga bzhi pa'o//// gshin rje gshed po las kyi rim pa rgyun du gtor chung gtang ba ni/ gtor ma'i snod ni mdzes pa ru// mtheb kyu lnga'am bdun byas la// hU~M gi gtor ma'i bag chags spyangs// oM gyis bdud rtsi'i rgya mtshor brlabs// oM gyis 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga lta bur bsam// mang zhing rgya che bar bya ba'i sngags ni// oM AHhU~M/ ba ling ta te dz+wa ba li ni/ la ba te gu h+ya rag ta sa ma ye swA hA/ zhes pas by-in gyis brlab bo// las kyi lha dang ye shes lha// 'jam dpal 'khor tshogs ma lus dang// gshin rje 'khor tshogs ma lus dang// ma mo'i 'khor tshogs mkha' 'gro ma lus dang// ging bdud gnod sbyin ma lus dang// rig 'dzin dam can ma lus kun// mchod spyin gtor ma 'di long la// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// oM many+dzu shri ya man+ta ka ba ling ta kha hi/ zhes gtor chung dbul lo// gsang ba drug cu pa las/ rgyun du gtor chung gtang ba'i le'u ste nga lnga pa'o//// rdo rje 'dzin pas yang gsol pa// gshin rje gshed pos gsungs ba'i don// nga yi dus kyi bstan pa ni// sangs rgyas bstan pa mi gnas shing// chos nyid bden pas mi 'dul ba// dge 'dun btsun sar mi gnas na// nga yi bstan pa de ru bsrung// nga ni dus gsum mngon du 'byung// nga ni dus gsum da ltar 'byung// lnga brgya'i snyigs ma byung tsam na// de tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung// bstan pa thams cad nub pa'i tshe// de tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung// dge bcu dag ni nub pa'i tshe// de tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung// dam tshig nyams pa mang po tshe// de tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung// nga ni dus gsum 'byung ba'i sku// nga ni da ltar mngon pa'i lha// nga ni rab tu gsang ba'i rgyud// nga ni srid gsum mngon du 'byung// dam tshig sems pa ston nas ni// dkon mchog dbu 'phang smod pa la// nga yi bstan pa 'byung bar byed// dben ri 'joms la bab chol spyod// nga yi bstan pa de bsrung bcas// 'khor gyi lha tshogs rangs pa yang// dus der bstan pa srung bar gyis/ zhes so// gshin rje gshed po'i rgyud gsang ba drug cu pa las/ gshin rje gshed po'i bstan pa'i dus nam 'byung ba'i le'u nga drug pa'o//// gshin rje gshed po'i las de dag thams cad kyis dngos grub 'grub pa'i le'u'i thabs gsungs ba/ ban da mtshan dang ldan pa la// bdud rtsi chang gis sprus byas la// 'brang rgyas zla gam byas pa yis// bdud rtsi chang gis kha bcad la// dkyil 'khor shar du zan bzhag la// lho ru khur ba nub tu sha// byang du cha ni bzhag byas la// zhal zas snod kun yum gyi b+ha gar bsgom// zhal zas rang kun 'dod yon lnga// bdud rtsi lnga ru byin brlabs la// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bsnyen sgrub las tshang

nas// 'dzab bstod byas la dngos grub blangs// bsnyen pa'i snying po bcu bdun pa la// ka ya wa ka tsit+ta sa ma ya stiSh+ta a yu ti/ su si ti dza ya sid+hi sid+d+hi sa ma ya dza dzaH/ zhes bzlas pas/ sangs rgyas dang 'gro ba rigs drug thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs dang bcud bsdus nas// sgrub pa'i zhal zas de dag la// mtsho la sbrang ma 'dus tshul du// thams cad 'dus shing thim par bsam// bzlas pa nus tshad thon pa dang// 'jam dpal lha tshogs 'khor bcas la// dngos grub blang ba 'di skad do// hU~M/ lta ba yangs la ye shes 'khyil ba ni// thig le byang chub snying po bsam yas pa// rang bzhin sna tshogs sku yi dkyil 'khor du// 'jam dpal gshin rje'i sku mchog lhun gyis grub// 'jam dpal rigs kyi lha tshogs kyis// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub bsam mi khyab// sku thugs kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// dus ni gzhan du ma yin pas// do nub nyid stsal du gsol// 'jam dpal thugs las sprul pa'i sras// skye ba med pa'i skye ba'i cho 'phrul bstan// ya ma rA dza myos byed 'bar ba dang// Ar+ya ma ru ral pa tshar dgu dang// gshed bzhis 'phrin las sna tshogs mdzad// 'phrin las sna tshogs dngos grub stsal du gsol// hU~M/ phyogs skyong dregs pa gdul ba'i phyir// 'jam dpal thugs las sprul pa'i sras// bdud 'joms ko tse brag 'joms dang// a ba glang mgo ya ba ti// phya sangs smigs pa tel pa dang// lha mchog dud kha chos kyi rgyal po dang// mig dmar la sogs phyogs skyong bcu// dregs pa dgra bgegs tshar bcad phyir// dregs pa gdul ba'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// shes rab chos dbyings 'brel pa dang// khams gsum dbang du bsdu ba'i yum gyi tshogs// gshin rje ma mo'i tshogs kyis byin gyis brlabs// dngos grub ma lus bdag la gsol// dgra bgegs bsgral phyir thugs las sprul// sgrol ba'i bdag po ma ru tsi+e// dpal gyi phyag brnyan khrag gi dri bsnams ma// lcags kyi spyang mo la sogs pho nya gsum// dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i dngos grub gsol// 'jam dpal sgo bzhi'i srungs ma dam can ma// ya sbyin de sbyin phyag sbyin la sogs sgo ma bzhi// khyed kyis dngos grub stsal du gsol// 'jam dpal bka' nyan ging chen bco brgyad dang// mon pa bzhi dang shan pa bzhi// gse yi skyes bu gdug pa bzhi// ma mo mkha' 'gro ma lus rnams// khyed kyi mthu rtsal dngos grub gsol// zhes dgos grub gsol/ ban da bdud rtsi bdag gis dngos grub blang ngo// bdud rtsi'i dngos grub len pa'i sngags dang ting nge 'dzin 'di ltar blang ngo// zhal zas zla gam de'i tshul du bsams la// dngos grub blang ngo// zhal zas kyi bye brag gzhan ma

kun tshogs kyi tshul du byas la// dngos grub blang ngo// phud la mchod/ de nas slob dpon la/ de nas mched dang lcam dral yongs kyi spyan du drang ngo// lag pa g.yas par chang bzung// g.yon pa kun gyis zhal zas bzung// slob dpon gyis smon lam gdab pa'o// 'jam dpal sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob par gyur nas/ thun mong mchog gi dngos grub thob par gyur cig/ a ho sid d+hi sid d+hi/ byas la zhal zas bza' 'o// de nas las rnams thams cad kyi// dngos grub blang ba'i thabs su bstan// gshin rje gshed pos dngos grub blang ba'i thabs su gsungs// gshin rje gshed po'i rgyud gsang ba drug cu pa las/ dngos grub blang ba'i thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste nga bdun pa'o//// gshin rje'i dngos grub sgrub pa dang/ sgrub pa'i thabs mang po bstan pas/ 'bras bu ci thob na/ 'jam dpal gshin rje sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pa gang zhig gis/ 'bras bu dpag tu med pa thob/ 'jam dpal skur ni bsgoms pa yis// rnal 'byor pa de 'jam dpal gyi// sku yi ngo bor gyur nas kyang// mtshan dang dpe byang ldan pa dang// gzhan gyis thub par dka' ba dang// dregs pa ma lus tshar gcod dang// rgas dang rgud pa med pa dang// chu la bying ba med pa dang// mkha' la bya ltar 'gro ba dang// chu la nya ltar 'dzul ba dang// brag dang ri la zangs thal dang// sku yi dngos grub gzhan ma dang// dpag tu med pa thob pa'o// 'jam dpal gsung du gsal ba ni// a kro la sogs snying po 'di// rgyun du drang ba'i bzlas pa yis// 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed po yi// gsung gi dngos grub thob nas kyang// 'gro ba sems can ma lus la// chos kyi sgo mo bsam yas ston// drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don// theg pa dpag tu med pa ston// 'jam dpal gsung dang dbyer med 'gyur// 'jam dpal thugs su gsal bas ni// ting 'dzin klong du gyur pa de// zhi bar gyur dang drag por gyur// che bar ston dang chung bar ston// mang ba dang ni nyung ba dang// gang ltar mos bston pa dang// snang ba dang ni stong pa dang// ting 'dzin dpag tu med par ston// dgongs pa chos nyid don la phebs// ting 'dzin ma yengs rtse gcig bsgrub// 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed po dang// tha mi dad par 'gyur ba dang// gang ltar byas pa'i las kyang 'grub// las kyi gshin rje bran du 'khol// ma mo mkha' 'gro dam la 'du// ging pho ging mo sprul par 'gyed// pho nya mang po las la 'dzud// lha srin sde brgyad dam la 'dogs// rgyal po blon po la sogs pas// mchod cing bkur sti byed pa dang// srid pa gsum na thub dbang med// 'khor dang yo byang phun sum tshogs// 'jam dpal gshin rje sgrub pa

yis// 'bras bu de dag thob bar 'gyur// gshin rje gshed po'i rgyud gsang ba drug cu pa las/ sgrub pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste nga brgyad pa'o//// gshin rje gshed po'i rgyud thams cad kyang// drag po las su sgrub par gsungs ba ni// rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di las kyang// 'phrin las rnam bzhi sgrub pa bstan// 'phrin las rnam bzhi thams cad kyang// drag po'i las su bstan pa'o// sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ni// yon tan 'phrin las lnga ru bstan// thams cad sku yi sgrub pa'o// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs// dus gsum sangs rgyas sku yi dngos// sku yi sprul ba bsam yas pas// 'phrin las thams cad drag por ston// las rnams so so gang bsgrub kyang// 'jam dpal gshin rje bsgrub par bya// las kyi gshin rje gcun la bya// de yis lha srin rags pa 'khol// zhes pa'o// gshin rje gsang ba drug cu ba las/ rgyud 'di sku'i rgyud yin pa dang/ drag po'i las bstan pa'i le'u ste nga dgu pa'o//// gshin rje'i 'khor mon pa bzhi dang/ shan pa bzhi dang// ging dang/ bse mo la sogs pas rang rang gi sgrub pa khyad par de dbul lo// gshin rje gsang ba drug cu pa las/ 'jig rten gyi cha 'dzin pa'i 'khor rnams kyis/ rang ra'i sgrub thabs phul ba'i le'u ste drug cu pa'o//// gshin rje gshed po la/ rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa yis rgyud gtad pa ni/ rnal 'byor dam tshig ldan pa dang// lha ba gdeng dang ldan pa dang// spyod pa don dang ldan pa dang// dkyil 'khor don dang ldan pa dang// 'phrin las don dang ldan pa dang// ting 'dzin yengs med ldan pa dang// dbang rnams thob dang ldan la gtad// de skad ces gsungs nas/ oM badzra muHzhes pa'i sgras/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor du gshegs so// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor de dag chos nyid rtag par lta ba'i mtha' bsal ba'i phyir na 'od du lam gyi zhu nas 'od de bdag ya man+ta kar sgom pa la thim// ya man+ta ka thugs ka'i ye shes sems dpa' la thim/ ye shes sems dpa' thugs ka'i rdo rje la thim/ rdo rje lte ba'i hU~M la thim/ hU~M zhabs kyu la thim/ zhabs kyu 'a la thim/ 'a zla tshes la thim/ zla tshes thig le la thim/ thig le stong par bsgom/ stong pa de yang skye ba med pa las/ skye ba'i cho 'phrul hU~M zhig tu bsam/ hU~M de las rdo rje rtse lnga pa zhig tu gyur/ rdo rje a kro ta brjod pas/ ya man+ta ka'i sku ru gyur/ de las lus bsrung/ go bgo byas la/ rigs lnga khrag 'thung gis dbu brgyan par bsgom mo// des 'gro ba rigs drug gi don mdzad pa dang/ drag pos gdul ba la drag po'i las/ zhi bas 'dul ba la zhi ba'i

las/ rgyas pas 'dul ba la rgyas pa/ dbang gis 'dul ba la dbang gi las/ dus rtag tu ya man+ta ka'i spyod pa las ma nyams pa'o// gshin rje gshed po chos kyi dbyings// ye shes dkyil 'khor gshegs pa des// 'gro ba'i don la ye shes kyi// sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa// 'gro ba'i don ni mdzad nas bzhugs// gshin rje gshed po'i rgyud gsang ba drug cu pa las/ rgyud gang nas ye shes sems can gyi gnas su gshegs pa'i ngang las/ dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bsdus nas slar 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste re gcig pa'o//// las kyi thig pas mdor bsdus pa// gsang ba'i bya thabs drug cu bstan// le'u re la man ngag re// de na gsang ba drug pa'o// rgyud ces bya ba dkrugs pa yin// gshin rje gshed po'i rgyud gsang ba drug cu pa las/ gshin rje nag po'i rgyud rdzogs so//// le'u khri drug stong gi bcud phyung ba'o////
rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI ya mAn+ta ka a d+has gu h+ya tan+t+ro/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed man ngag gsang ba sum cu pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ dpal ya mAn+ta ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed po/ dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid de/ 'og min chos kyi gzhal yas na/ btsun mo'i b+ha ga bde ba la sku mdun dang rgyab med par bzhugs te/ mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pa sku/ sangs rgya thams cad 'dus pa'i/ ye shes lnga'i rgyal po zil gnon nyid/ chos nyid ci yang ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i 'khor na ye shes kyi gshed bzhi dang/ phyogs skyong bcu gri thogs ging dang khram thogs bdud zor thun thogs pa'i mon mo dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// las kyi gshin rje bye ba dgu khri dang/ srin mo dug hrul gyi gos gyon ma dang/ las kyi gshed bzhi yab yum khram bdag bcu gnyis dang// phung po lnga la dbang sgyur ba'i// pho gshed sum brgya drug cu yis// gsod par byed pa'i gshin rje yin// 'byung ba lnga la dbang sgyur ba'i// mo gshed sum brgya drug cu yis// bla srog 'gugs pa'i las rnams 'byed// gshin rje bdun brgya nyi shu yis// nyin dang mtshan

mo'i 'khor lo bskor// srid gsum sems can lto na gnas// las kyi gshin rje 'khor dang bzhugs// 'khor gyi rdo rje snying po yis// mchod par brjod de 'di skad gsol// e ma ho ma skyes skye med chos dbyings las// gzugs sku dpag med longs skur bzhengs// thugs rje chen pos 'gro don mdzod// ces bskul bas na yum dang gnyis su med pa yis// sku gsung thugs la thugs rje 'byung// chos sku skyai ba med pa las// gzugs sku sgyu ma'i dal du bzhengs// 'gro ba'i don la de bzhin gshegs// rang gi 'od gsal gsang sngags kyis// nges pa nyid du bka' stsal lo// man ngag rtsa ba sum cu pa las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// 'jam dbyangs khro bo rngam pa'i sku// snod bcud 'jig rten 'di ltar lags// theg pa'i don dam ji ltar lags// 'jam dpal zhi ba ji ltar bsgrub// 'jam dbyangs khro bos bka' stsol cig/ snod ni ye shes gzhal yas khang// bcud ni lha yi rang bzhin no// dug lnga dang ni ye shes lnga// 'jig rten snod bcud lha yi dal// phung po lnga ni gshin rje lnga// 'byung ba lnga ni yum lnga'o// mi dge bcu ni phyogs skyong bcu// pha rol phyin bcu yum cu 'o// srid gsum ye nas rnam par dag/ de na chos rnams thams cad kun// sems nyid las ni gud na med// de nyid dran pa chen po 'chang// sems kyi skad cig don kun rig/ mchog gi dang po sku gsum 'chang// ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs pa'o// de nas 'jam dbyangs khro bo dang// thugs las ye shes gshed bzhi sprul// de las sprul pa'i sku re ni// kun dang mthun pa'i don mdzad de// sku bltam rab byung dka' thub dang// mdzad pa bcu gnyis don yang mdzad// de dag gdul bya'i dbang gis ni// nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems// kri ya u pa yo ga dang// ma hA a nu a ti rgyud// thugs rje sprul ba'i sku gsum gyis// gsungs so gsung ngo gsung bar 'gyur// zhi ba'i sgrub pa phyi nang gnyis// yid 'ong gnas su maN+Dal bya// mchod pa lnga dang dkar gtor bsham// b+h+ruM las ye shes gzhal yas su// muM las 'jam dpal gur kum mdog/ ral gri po ti bsnams pa'o// rin chen rgyan dang ldan pa bskyed// dbang bskur brlabs dang bstim brtan mchod// oM bA gI shwa ri muM/ yi ge drug pa rdo rje'i sgra// ye shes sku ste rang byung ba// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yi// snang ba thams cad ye shes sku// grags pa thams cad chos nyid gsungs// dran rtog thams cad ye shes thugs// sku gsung thugs las 'da' ba med// 'jam dpal gsang ba sum cu pa las/ theg pa'i don dang 'jam dpal phyi ltar sgrub pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// rdo

rje snying pos yang zhus pa// nang ltar 'jam dpal ji ltar sgrub// 'jam dbyangs khro bos bka' stsal pa// nyams dga'i gnas su maN+Dal bya// rdzas dgod mtshams bshags mchod gtor brlab// tshad med bzhi yis sems bskyed la// yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid// snying rje yi ni ma lad bgos// a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog/ gsum rigs gtsang ma dag pa ste// 'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig go/ ye shes lnga yi mkha' klong dag/ dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa ste// yid bzhin rin chen gzhal yas khang// dbus na chos nyid 'khor lo zlum// thig bzhi 'dab brgyad khyams dang ldan// gru chad sgo bzhi rta babs mdzes// rdo rje'i gdan ni ma lus ldan// mi 'jigs stobs dang rdzu 'phrul dbang// thogs med rin chen khri rkang mdzes// nyi zla pad+ma 'od kyi gdan// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin// 'bru lnga hU~M brgyad cho 'phrul brgyad// phaT bzhi dzaHhU~M baM ho las// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba// rigs lnga phyag mtshan ut+pal gyur// sngags brjod skur 'gyur bzhi bcu gnyis// ye shes sku rnams ma lus 'chang// longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal// 'jam dbyangs ye shes lnga yi sku// zhal gcig phyag bzhi mnyam pa'i zhabs// ser 'od dkar po sngo dang dmar// ljang khu gsal zhing mtshan dpe rdzogs// rang rtags ut+pal po ti dang// thabs dang shes rab mda' gzhu 'dzin// 'jam dbyangs yum chen dbyings phyug lnga// 'byung ba'i rtog sel me tog 'dzin// g.yon nas 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyi lha// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// sna tshogs pad mo'i 'dab ma la// sku mdog phyogs mtshams 'od las snang// rin chen ral gri pad mo dang// rdo rje gun d+he po ti dang// ud+pal bsnams nas phyed skyil de// mchod pa'i lha mo brgyad dang bcas// ye shes sku ste rang 'byung ba// 'jam dpal dmar ser ral gri dang// shes rab ut+pal po tis mdzes// shes rab kyis ni de bzhin rtogs// pha rol phyin pa sku mdog ser// rdo rje po ti gtso bo bzhin// sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba// phyogs bcur sprul pa'i 'jam dbyangs drug/ dkar ser dmar ljang dud kha dang// pi wang go mtshon gseg par dang// po ti rin chen me chu 'dzin// pad+ma'i gdan la bzhengs skur lde// dpa' bo bdud dgra 'dul ba'o// gtum po ro langs rag sha hri// gsod byed rngam pa yum dang bcas// mthing kha ser po dmar ljang phyogs// rdo rje be con ral gri dang// gtun shing lcags kyu zhags pa dang// lcags sgrog dril bu khro mo'i tshul// phyir gzigs med dpung nyi gdan la// rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur ldan// lnga gsum dbang bskur byin gyis

brlabs// bzhengs gsol spyan drangs bstim brtan la// phyag 'tshal gar dbyangs kun bzang dang// arga dri dang me tog mdangs// dri chab lha bshos chos kyi sgra// che ba'i don brjod sman gyis mchod// bdud rtsi khrag dang gtor ma 'bul// sbyor sgrol ting 'dzin rol mo glu// smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho ba// rnal 'byor bsnyen pa'i don la 'jug/ rigs lnga rang rang 'khor lor gsal// rdo rje rnon po chags med gsungs// sdug bsngal gcod pa mi 'gyur thugs// shes rab ye shes spyi gzugs sku// ngag gi dbang phyug yon tan brtsal// ye shes sku can 'phrin las de// 'jam dbyangs chen po sgra che ba// rdo rje zab mo dzi na dzig/ gnyis med ye shes badzra d+h+rig/ yon tan lhun grub rat+na d+h+rig/ ye shes snang ba a ro li ka a// don gnyis rdzogs pa pradz+nyA d+h+rig/ lnga bcu rtsa bdun spyi 'dus pa// bstod pa 'dod pa'i yon tan glu// tshogs gnyis tshogs ni bsags pa'o// thig le stong pa yi ge brgya// bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog/ ye shes ma yi 'od rab gsal// 'gor ba'i ngan song rnam sbyong ba// mthu chen gces par 'dzin pa de// gshegs bsdu rgyun gyi spyod lam bya// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal gsung ba sum cu pa'i rgyud las/ zhi ba nang ltar sgrub pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// lta spyod rim pa ji ltar lags// 'jam dbyangs khro bos bka' stsal pa// gcig dang du ma las grol ba'i// mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid// rang spyi rtags pas gnyis med snang// gzhan yang sems kyi phyir yul med do// de nyid dran pa chen po 'chang// sems kyi skad cig don kun rig/ mchog gi dbang po sku gsum rig/ ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs pa'o// rig pas ma bslad gnyug ma la// thams cad ma spangs rang sar grol// logs spyod sha chen khrag chen spyod// 'gro 'dug 'du 'dzi zas dag la// chags pa mi bya rang snang spyad// sngags kyi dra gra zu bcag pa min// lus skyob rngam tshig lci bar bca'// snying la lung bzung bzlas pa bya// ri khrod brtul zhugs spyod pa bya// ma bcos shugs byung rang sar spyad// 'dug sa dur khrod gzhal yas su// 'og na rag ta'i rgya mtsho 'khrug/ bar du thod pa'i rtsig pa la// zhing gi bla re rgyal mtshan 'phyar// ye shes lha tshogs 'od du 'phro// las kyi lha tshogs skar ltar 'khrug/ gshin rje bdun brgya nyi shu las la chas// mkha' 'gro rnam bzhi sprin ltar 'du// de ltar rang sar rig par bshad// shing bcu thams cad bsgral bar bya// spyod pa shugs byung 'gag pa med/ 'on kyang gsang sngags don dang ldan// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal gsang gsum cu pa'i rgyud las/ lta spyod bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi

pa'o//// de nas rdo rje snying pos yang zhus pa// las kyi gshin rje ji ltar brtul// 'jam dbyangs khro bos bka' stsal pa// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba'i// khyim bdag 'chi bdag nag po de// ma rig 'khrul pas lam dang bral// mtshams med lnga spyad dmyal bar skyes// bskal pa gcig tu sdug bsngal myong// de nas las zad yi dwags skyes// bkres skom sdug bsngal nyams su myong// de nas las kyi mtshams sbyar nas// nag po gel pa 'chi bdag bdud// bye ba dgu khri bya bar skyes// bdud mo nag mo las kyi yum// las kyi gshin rje khram bdag dang// rang rang sring mo chung mar byas// gshin rje bdun brgya nyi shu yis// srid gsum sems can zas su za// dus gsum sangs rgyas bka' bgros te// zhi ba bden pas ma thul nas// 'jam dpal khro bo zil gnon sku// tshangs pa'i yul sa rtse nas gnon// thugs rje chen pos bsgral ba las// nag po gal ba gtum pa'i tshogs// gus pas lus nyid gdan du phul// srog gi snying po bcu bdun phul// snyigs ma lnga yi dus nyid du// bstan pa srung bar khas blangs so// dmod pa'i 'khor lo drag po de// dug gi mtshon char byin gyis brlabs// sgrol ba'i ging du dbang bskur ro// rang rgyud gsang ba dam par bshad// ces gsungs so// 'jam dpal gsang ba sum cu pa las/ las kyi gshin rje btul ba'i lo rgyus gsang ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// rdo rje snying pos yang zhus pa// gnas kyi nges pa bstan du gsol// 'jam dpal khro bos bka' stsal pa// lang ka dang ni ma la ya// ri yi rtse dang skyed mos tshal// lha klu gnod sbyin dri za bsgrub// dur khrod chen po'i gnas su bsgrub// rdo rje snying pos yang zhus pa// gnas der dkyil 'khor ji ltar bya// 'jam dbyangs khro bos bka' stsal pa// bdag gi khro bo'i nga rgyal gyis// dur khrod gnas nas sa blangs la// swa yi 'phro 'du 'od zer gyis// rin chen phung po bzhi ru brlab// bdud rtsi lnga por brlabs byas nas// pany+tsa a mr-i ta maN+Dal hU~M/ chag chag rab tu gdab par bya// gnam thig 'bru lnga ye shes lnga// sa thig 'bru gsum sku gsung thugs// dz+nyA na maN+Dal hU~M/ tshon lnga 'bru lnga ye shes lnga// dbus su gru gsum mu khyud bri// rtsibs bzhi rtsibs brgyad lha yi mdog/ gru chad sgo bzhi rdo rje me// rdul tshon ye shes rang snang dal// mtshams bcad rol mos dal bskor la// ye shes spyan drangs sku la thim// 'od zhu ye shes lha rnams bskyed// dbang brlab ngang bstim sngags kyis bya// rdul tshon ye shes khang gdan brlab// rang sngags tiSh+Tha badzra yis// 'od dang bcas pas bzhugs par bsam// zhing gi bla re zhi khro dgod// zhing gi rgyal mtshan grwa bzhir dgod// dur khrod rdzas kyi tha ma

bskor// gtor ma bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor skyed// phyi lnga nang gsum mchod pa dgod// ces gsungs so// 'jam dpal gsang ba sum cu pa'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// rdo rje snying pos yang zhus pa// bris sku dbang bskur ji ltar lags// kha tshangs mnyams ras mchog la// bzo bo mkhas pas tshul ldan pas// tshon rtsi spyin med bzang po yis// nag po gsus chen 'jigs pa'i sku// mkhas pas yab yum sras bcas bri// dngos grub rab mchog 'dod pa'i phyir// ye shes lha ru dngos bskyed la// spyan dbye spyan drangasadabyer med bstim// dbang bskur byin brlabs rten 'brel sngags// mchod stod smon lam brtan par bzhugs// de nas dbang gis las byas pa// rdzas sogs bsnyen pa gsum mam lnga// nang par dal bri rab gnas bya// tha ma dbang gis sbyin sreg bya// khrus byas mig dgab mdun du dgram// phyag bya zhu 'bul lan slang ba// zhus lan phyag bya lus dbul ba// tshe dgu bstim pa sgrib pa bral// lhar bskyed go bgo lus bsrung bya// rdo rjes dam chu blud la dam tshig bshad// me tog gtor la lha bstim ye shes dbab// lha dbab gsang mtshan btags la bzhag/ mig phye lha yi rnam dag bshad// snying po dbu rgyan bum pa cod pan dang// thod 'phreng go cha zhing gdugs dang// zhing gi rgyal mtshan phyag rgya lnga// bza' btung phan pa'i dbang bcu bskur// thos dbang sgom dbang 'phrin las dbang// 'chad pa'i dbang dang slob dpon dbang// nus pa'i dbang lnga go bskyed do// gsang dbang rtogs pa ngo sprod la// rtogs grol nyams su blang ba'o// bam chen gsang ba brtul zhugs dbang// bam ni rigs bzang gtsang ma'i ro// ro yi tsar phyin bro yis bskor// gnyen po'i gshed bskrad mtshams kyang gcad// phur gdab gshin rje'i grong khyer bcom// sngags bzlas gshed ma'i lag nas 'phrog/ 'bru lnga bam gzung dug lnga sreg/ 'bru lnga mang du brjod la blang// ro khur phur gdab khog srung gzir// bam gyi khog par gzhal yas bskyed// dbang blangs drang bstim phung po mchod// mkha' 'gro rnams kyi dal bskyed do// ye shes lnga dang 'dod yon lnga yi rang bzhin bsam// gnas sleb mtshan byang chu gtsang bkru// spos chu bdud rtsi lnga yis sbyang// bro yis bskor la dug lnga sbyang// thams cad skul zhing thams cad bskyang// de nas bam gyis dbang bskur te// hU~M/ bam chen gsang ba'i brtul zhugs dbang// phung po ye shes dkyil 'khor te// yid bzhin nor ltar dgos 'dod 'byung// bam chen gsang ba'i dbang bskur ro// sti ra ba a b+hi Shiny+tsa a a/ lha rnams bu yi lus la thim// de nas bshas nas

dbang po lnga// don snying lnga dang sha rus khrag/ dal gyi rgyan de skabs skabs bskang// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal gsang ba sum cu pa'i rgyud las/ dbang bris sku'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// rdo rje snying pos yang zhus pa// dam tshig rim pa ji lta bu// 'jam dbyangs khro bos bka' stsal pa// byang sems rnam gnyis slob dpon drug/ mched bzhi sngags gsum phyag rgya gsum// gsang bcu rtsa bar shes par bya// spyad pa lnga dang mi spang lnga// dang blang lnga dang bsgrub pa lnga// shes pa lnga dang yan lag go/ slob ma'i rgyud bcos rlang por smra// snod ldan bu la rlang chos smra// dam nyams bsgrubs dang ga la 'grub// dam tshig ma nyams ci yang 'grub// rang sems dpang du btsugs la bsrung// shes pas mi rnams lding ba'i bdud// longs spyod 'du 'dzi g.yeng ba'i bdud// le lo gnyid chang nyams pa'i bdud// bdud la mdzems na thub pa yin// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal gsang ba sum cu pa'i rgyud las/ dam tshig gi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// rdo rje snying pos yang zhus pa// 'phrin las rim pa ji ltar lags// 'jam dbyangs khro bos bka' stsal pa// gnas dang sa gzhi gzung ba dang// phyi mtshams bsrung la nang mtshams bcad// dkyil 'khor bri zhing rgyan rnam dgram// mchod pa'i yo byad ci 'byor bsham// stong nyid rang sngags skur bskyed cing// hU~M las rdo rje me ru bcas// sgo dbye dbang po sbyan drangs la// lus ngag yid kyis dag par bya// dbang po nyid zhu dngos grub thob// las kyis lha bskyed mchod pa brlab// sems nyid mi 'gyur go bo las// rig pa ji ltar 'char ba ni// mchod pa brlab pa zhes bya'o// ji ltar shar dang 'ja' tshon ltar// ye shes rang snang mchod pa'o// slab dang dbul ba 'ang de ltar shes// de bzhin stong pa chos sku la// kun ting gsal la longs skur snang// rgyu ting rig pa sprul sku hU~M// 'od zer 'bru gsum snod bcud sbyangs// 'byung ba mkha' lnga ye shes lnga// b+h+ru~M ye shes gzhal yas gdan// phyi nang yid bzhin mchod rten dbyibs// rgyu bcas cho ga lnga yang gsungs// gtso bo yab yum bskyed par bya// mkha' gsang brlabs te brdas bskul sbyor// byang sems yi ge gdan thog 'thon// sngags brjod 'khor rnams rdzogs tshul bskyed// lus la rdul tshon gsal tsa na// dal gnyis dbang bskur byin brlabs bya// snyan gsan rang 'od dal du sbyangs// sbyan drangs bstim dang bstan par bya// gnyis med dal la mtshon pa ni// lha la lha bstim lta ba phyi// ye shes pa la ye shes thim pa nang// de gnyis ma spangs rang grol gsang kun la phyi nang gsang bar sbyar// phyi lnga nang gsum sbyor sgrol

gsang// 'dod yon rag+ta dug lnga btab// smon lam 'phro 'du tshogs lhags brtan// rtog med spros bral chos kyi dbyings// dmigs med mkha' mnyam byang chub sems// dngos po mtshan mar mi dmigs te// chos nyid ngang du dbyer med mnyam// chu zla'i dkyil 'khor ji bzhin du// sgyu ma'i sems nyid de dag 'dra// mkha' la 'ja' tshon snang ba ltar// nam mkha'i ngang du ro gcig mnyam// yod de yod par ma yin te// gzugs dang kha dog yul las 'das// med de med pa ma yin te// stong pa nyid la cho 'phrul 'byung// byang chub sems ni hU~M du gyur// hU~M gi 'phro 'du sbyor ba las// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams kun// raM yaM khaM gis bsregs sbyangs bkrus// 'od 'dus thog ma'i gzugs la gzud// steng 'og 'khor lo pad mar gnas// e yaM ra su keM raM/ dug lnga gdod nas dag pa'i phyir// zhe sdang 'bar ba'i nam mkha' la// phrag dog 'bar ba'i rlung nag 'khrigs// 'dod chags 'bar ba'i khrag mtsho 'khrug/ gti mug 'bar ba'i sa gzhi la// kang rus ri rab brjid dang ldan// nga rgyal 'bar ba'i me dpung 'bar// bruM bi sha bi shud de badzra ban d+ha dz+nyA na tsa kra maN+Dal/ dur khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// ye shes 'bar ba'i gnas chen po// mkha' dang dbus med mkha' dang mnyam// phyi dang nang med chos nyid dang// gru gsum mthing nag zla gam dmar// rtsibs bzhi rtsibs brgyad sgo bzhir ldan// mu khyud gru chad lcags rir bcas// sbrul gyi rgya gram mtha' bskor te// rdo rje rgya gram thod 'phreng mdzes// bdud dang mu stegs phyogs skyong dang// gnod sbyin srin po gnod sbyin gdan// ma he glang rgod brjid pa'i khri// nyi zla pad ma 'od du 'bar// ya ma ti ra baM/ ru tra tir ti ka/ rag sha/ yag sha sti ra baM/ ru tra yi g+ha/ a ga ni/ sa ma/ ni ri ti/ ba ru Na/ ba ya be/ ku be ra/ i sha na/ pu ra na/ ti ra baM/ ma he ma d+ha na/ pa pad+ma/ a tsan+d+ra/ ma sUr+ya maN+Dal/ gdan stengs hU~M gi 'phro 'du las// cho ga gsum gyi byin brlabs la// chos sku 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// sbyor sgrol yum dang bcas pa sgom// hU~M tiSh+Thi badzra/ oM a kro d+he ka ya mAn+ta ka ha na ma tha b+han dza hU~M phaT/ k+Sha/ oM pe ta la rig sha yag sha hU~M phaT/ ma/ oM trig hrig ser ser khu lu mu lu hU~M phaT/ tiSh+Tha badzra swa rat+na oM phaT/ pa pad+ma maN+Dal/ oM sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya staM/ dza hU~M baM ho/ b+ha d+hi tsit+ta hU~M/ byang sems yi ge mkha' nas bton// ya me ta kA/ hU~M bcu rang rang kha dog gsal// ye shes khro bo rol bas bskul// sngags re brjod pas rdzogs tshul bskyed// ya ma rA dza sa dwA me ya/ ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ ya da yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ ya k+She ya ts+tsha ni rA ma ya/ oM hri ku ru dza la ni hU~M phaT/ oM hri sti ya hU~M phaT/ oM ma

hA pa ta la hU~M phaT/ oM de ba ri sha ti hU~M phaT/ oM sarba tri a hU~M phaT/ oM sarba tha pa hU~M phaT/ oM a mr-i pany+tsa hU~M phaT/ oM hri sti baM hU~M phaT/ oM rgya darma hU~M phaT/ oM raM dzA la ni hU~M phaT/ badzra aM ku sha dza phaT/ rat+na pA sha hU~M phaT/ pad+ma ma s+pho Ta baM phaT/ karma g+han+Ta ho phaT/ dbang snod bdud 'dul gdan la 'khod// oM badzra bud+d+ha badzra/ rat+na pad ma karma ku lan he he ho ho hU~M phaT/ gtso bor rigs lnga 'jam dbyangs lnga// 'khor rnams khro bo brkyang ba phyogs// tshad ni lha rang mtshon res brgyan// oM AHhU~M sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya wa ka/ tsit+ta badzra swa b+ha ba Ad+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ gnas gsum sku gsung thugs kyi lha re'o// sngags brjod dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ni// thugs khar ye shes lnga bcu bdun// lto ru lcags khang nang du ni// las kyi ya ma bcu bdun bsgom// lus la rdul tshon gsal rtsam na// rdul tshon la yang gsal bar bsgom// sngon 'gro tshogs sogs tshogs kyi lam// ting gsum gsal yas sbyor ba'i lam// lha bskyed gsal bar bsgom pa'i lam// drang bstim mchod pa mthong ba'i lam// 'phro 'du bsnyen pa mthar phyin lam// de don ldan na mthar phyin nges// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal gsang ba sum cu pa'i rgyud las/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor rig pa yid las skyed pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// rdo rje snying pos yang zhus pa// spyan drangs bstim mchod ji ltar lags// 'jam dbyangs khro bos bka' stsal pa// 'phags pa'i rgyal po khro rgyal gshin rje gshed// chos sku byang chub sems kyi byin rlabs las// byams dang snying rje'i shugs kyis gshegs nas kyang// bdag nyid khro bo 'bar ba'i skur bstan pa// tshangs pa brgya byin lha chen drag po rnams// gnyis med byang chub sems kyis sgral bar mdzod// thugs rje chen po'i dbang gis bzhes su gsol// oM badzra sa ma ya dza/ dbyings las rang 'od longs skur bzhengs/ hU~M/ mthing nag gru gsum chos dbyings dkyil 'khor nas// ya mAn+ta ka yab yum gshegs su gsol// zhe sdang rnam dag rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor nas// ya ma rA dza yab yum gshegs su gsol// nga rgyal rnam dag rin chen dkyil 'khor nas// myos byed 'bar ba yab yum gshegs su gsol// 'dod chags rnam dag pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor nas// Ar+ya ma ru yab yum gshegs su gsol// phrag dog rnam dag las kyi dkyil 'khor nas// ral pa tshar dgu yab yum gshegs su gsol// ru tra pho mo bsnol ba'i gdan stengs nas// gshin rje bdud 'joms yab yum gshegs su gsol// dri za pho mo bsnol ba'i gdan stengs nas// kong rtse brag 'joms 'khor bcas gshegs su gsol// me lha pho mo bsnol ba'i gdan stengs nas// a ba glang mgo yab

yum gshegs su gsol// gshin rje pho mo bsnol ba'i gdan stengs nas// ya ba ti yab yum gshegs su gsol// srin po pho mo bsnol ba'i gdan stengs nas// gshis rje phya sangs yab yum gshegs su gsol// klu rgyal pho mo bsnol ba'i gdan stengs nas// gshin rje dmigs pa yab yum gshegs su gsol// rlung lha pho mo ba'i gdan stengs nas/ lha mchog dud kha yab yum gshegs su gsol// dbang ldan pho mo bsnol ba'i gdan stengs nas// chos kyi rgyal po yab yum gshegs su gsol// sa bdag pho mo bsnol ba'i gdan stengs nas// gshin rje mig dmar yab yum gshegs su gsol// sgo bzhi zhing dang nyi ma'i gdan stengs nas// bdud 'dul sgo ma bzhi rnams gshegs su gsol// dur khrod chen po'i phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad nas// sprul pa'i ma gshin tshogs rnams gshegs su gsol// oM na ma b+hud+d+ha ya/ d+ha rma ya/ sang g+hA ya/ kro d+ha pa ri ra/ a gats+tsha ya/ bi sa ra dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ ye shes 'od zer phyag rgya bzhis// spyan drangs mdun snang 'od zer 'khrug/ ma bsgribs bar ni shugs las byon// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtsibs stengs su// dregs pa bsnol ba'i gdan stengs su// 'jam dpal 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol/ sra be sha phaT/ A be sha a/ kA ya wA ka tsit+ta tiSh+tha badzra/ chu dang bo ma 'dres bzhin bstim// sku gsung thugs su brten par bya// hU~M/ gtum chen rab 'bar gshin rje 'joms pa'i lha// nyi ma 'bum pas lhag pa'i 'od ldan khyod// phyag mtshan mang po bskal ba'i me ltar 'bar// rab 'jigs gshin rje'i gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// sbyor sgrol yum dang sras mchog gshed po bzhi// gdug pa gdul mdzad phyogs skyong gshin rje bcu// bstan pa bsrung ba ye shes sgo ma bzhi/ gshin rje nag po'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje sku+u la klu dbang rab brgyan cing// gcan gzan gdug pa'i pags rlon na bzar gsol// nad stong srin mo'i tshogs rnams rdul du rlog/ thar byed gzhon nu'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// khyung dang 'ug pa lta bu'i khra bsnams shing// dam las ldog pa rnams la gtong bar mdzad// rnal 'byor bdag la sdang zhing 'gal byed rnams// srid gsum zhing du sgrol la phyag 'tshal lo// dmigs med chos kyi sku+u la phyag 'tshal lo// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// cir yang sprul pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha'i lus can gar yang thogs med cing// 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can 'phrul po che// ma sring byams pa'i tshul du grogs mdzad ma// phyi nang ma mo'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// a ti pu ho/ sra ti pu ho/ rnam rtog lus thon

phyag 'tshal lo// ye shes 'od kyi lus rtog sbyang// gsar zhun sems la dam tshig pa// dbus kyi khro rgyal phyag rgya ni// zhal gsum phyag drug sku mdog mthing// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// 'khor lo ral gri tho ba g.yas// thos pa sdig mdzub phur pa g.yon// yum gnyis sku mdog gtso dang mthun// g.yas 'khyud g.yon pa dung dmar stob// ya ma rA dza sku mdog smug/ ma trang ro dbyug 'khor lo 'dzin// myos byed 'bar ba sku mdog ser// g.yas pa ro dbyug 'khor lo 'dzin// ar+ya dmar po sku mdog dmar// g.yas pa ro dbyug 'khor lo 'dzin// ral pa tshar dgu sku mdog ljang// ro dbyug g.yas la 'khor lo g.yon// yum ni sku mdog gtso dang mthun// g.yas 'khyud g.yon pa dung dmar stobs// bdud 'joms dgra sta 'khor lo gnag/ kong rtse brag 'joms 'khor lo dkar// glang mgo tri shul 'khor lo ljang// ya ti lcags kyu 'khor lo ser// phya sangs ral gri 'khor lo mthong// dmigs pa thod 'phreng 'khor lo dmar// rtel pa spu gri 'khor lo sngo// dud kha tho ba 'khor lo ljang// chos rgyal khram shing 'khor lo smug/ mig dmar shod d+he 'khor lo dmar// yum rnams sku mthun 'khyud stobs 'khril// sgo ma rigs mthun phyag rgya bzhi// lha la lha thim skur gsal te// ye shes ye shes skye med rtog/ mi 'da' thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yin// mkha' klong dbus mtha' kun tu bzang po'i klong// dbyings las ye shes mchod pa'i bye brag shar// de nyid ma bcos yul gyi rang bzhin te// snang srid thams cad kun bzang mchod par rol// rag ta'i arga tshil chen spos// dbang po'i me tog snang chen mdangs// rang 'byung bdud rtsi dri yi chab// sha chen bshos dang bcas pa rnams// 'jam dbyangs gshin rje'i dkyil 'khor la// gnyis su med par thim par 'bul// che ba'i yon tan brjod las sman gyis mchod// rang gi dam tshig bdud rtsi myang// bla med mchod pas gtor mar slab// hU~M/ yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba dgyes pa'i rdzas// dbang po dbyer med bde ba chen po'i ngang// byang chub sems kyi mchod pa dam pa 'di// kun bzang dgyes pa'i klaung du 'bul lags na// gnyis su med pa'i don gyis bzhes su gsol// srid pa'i gcog rnying zad par bya ba'i phyir// khams gsum nad rnams sos par bya ba'i phyir// bdud rtsi chen po pany+tsa a mr-i ta// bla med dman pa'i tshogs la 'bul lags kyi// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal bsal phyir bzhes su gsol// nyon mongs las kyis 'khrul pa'i sems can rnams// 'jig rten skye shi rtsad nas gcad pa'i phyor// dung chen rag tas bkang ba'i dam rdzas 'di// 'jam dpal gshin rje'i tshogs la 'bul lags

na// 'gro ba'i rims nad bsal phyir bzhes su gsol// dug lnga ye shes dbyings su bstab// smon lam btab la nyams pa bshags// de nas bsnyen pa'i don la 'jug/ 'jam dpal gsang ba sum cu pa'i rgyud las/ ye shes dal drang bstim mchod ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// rdo rje snying pos yang zhus pa// bsnyen cing bsgrub pa ji ltar lags// 'jam dbyangs khro bos bka' stsal pa// de nas rnal 'byor can gyis ni// lho yi phyogs su kha bltas la// mgo ni rma bya bzhin du bkug/ ri mo la ni sems gtad la// rag sha rus pa'i 'phreng ba bgrang// thog ma byang chub rtsa la brtan// shes rab de lta bu yang bsgom// sems dang rnams par mi rtog pas// bde gshegs dngos grub de dag thob// khro ba'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed// yid la rab gsal bsgom bya ste// thugs kar rang 'dra'i ye shes sems// nyi dal hU~M las a spros bskor// rang bzhin lhun grub 'jam dpal sku// phyag rgya gsal ba'i thugs kar bsam// thugs khar ye shes sna lnga yi// 'od zer gsal bar phyogs bcur 'phros// zhing khams so so'i bde gshegs la// thugs bskul mnyes ba'i mchod pa byas// 'gro drug sems can sgrib pa sbyangs// sprul sku 'od zer slar bcas bsdu// ya mAn ta ka'i thugs kar thim// de yang 'od zhu bdag la thim// bdag gi sgrib pa'i rgyun bcom nas// ye shes sku ru gsal zhing 'tsher// oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka ha na ma tha b+han dza hU~M phaT/ 'asngam dpal gshin rje'i lha rnams dang// kun rdzob lha yi skur bsams te// bsod nams rgyu yi tshogs rdzogs te// don dam sems nyid snang stong na// dbyer med nam mkha' lta bu la// snang bzhin stong la stong bzhin snang// snang dang de la ma zhen pa'i// dus na chos sku yin bar bshad// 'gag med ye shes phyag rgyar gsal// gsal dang dngos po mtshan ma med// chos rnams thams cad rang sems te// rang gi sems las 'di ltar 'byung// byung dang chos sku chen po yi// ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs pa yin// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan 'phrin// zhi khro bsnyen bsgrub gsang ba dang// gcig la tshang ba'i snying po 'di// gsang sngags nor bu rin chen de// yid la dgos pa don kun grub// yid dang dbang po rab grol gyis// lha yi phyogs su kha bltas la// ri mo la ni sems bzhag ste// bzlas pa'i yi ge rim par bya// ye shes lha yi snying po ni// mi myur mi bul 'dres pa min// mi drag mi zhen mi g.yengs par// bgrangs pas rang thos tsam dubazlas// 'phro na shes pa spangs smad la// rtse gcig sems kyi sku la brtag/ bying na gsal la dpangs bstod la// 'byung ba rang skyes dbyangs dang bzlas// 'od dang sgra dang

lung ston dang// sku gzugs 'gul dang rnam pa bzhad// rmi lam rtags ni sna tshogs 'byung// rtog med ye shes de bzhin nyid// bde ba'i ye shes sems las shar// 'jigs pa'i bdud dang gsang ba'i dgra// 'gro drug g.yang sa chod mi chod// tshad dang ldan nam mkhas par brtag/ chad dang ldan par gyur pa na// rtags kyi bsnyen pa skyol ba yin// sku yi bsnyen pa 'bum phrag bcu// ye shes lha ni gnyen byas la// gang 'dod las la sbyar bar bya// dus kyi rtag pa rgyun tu ste// 'di yi dus su lo phyed do// oM hriSh+ti bi kri tA na Na hU~M phaT/ thugs kyi snying po bcu gcig pas// ye shes lha nyid bsnyen cing bsgrub// nye bar gsang sngags 'dis byed pas// rtags bzang byung na dngos grub blang// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal gsang ba sum cu pa'i rgyud las/ ye shes lha'i bsnyen sgrub bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// rdo rje snying pos yang zhus pa// 'khor lo rang don rtsa rnams gang// 'jam dpal khro bos bka' stsal pa// rang byung ye shes 'khor lo ni// ma rig pa la bskor ba yin// rang byung ye shes rang grol ba'i// stong gsal 'gyur med ye shes de// ma 'des yongs su rdzogs par bskor// bdag nyid 'khor lo rnam pa bdun// klad pa bde ba'i 'khor lo ni// 'khor lo rtsibs chen sum cu gnyis// kA li sum cu rtsa gnyis brgyan// mgrin pa longs spyod bcu drug 'dab// pad+ma dbyibs can a yis brgyan// snying kha bzhi dang brgyad kyi rtsa// ye shes lha rnams rang bzhin 'char// a ba d+hu ti 'jam dpal nyid// thabs dang shes rab sbyor sgrol yul// dwangs ma'i rtsa bzhi gshed po bzhi// rig pa rlung rgyu 'byung bzhi yi// dwangs ma'i 'od bzhi gshed po bzhi// chos nyid yon tan gsum gsum drug/ ye shes rang rgyud 'khor 'das gnyis// steng 'og 'dus pa rnam bcu la// phyogs bcu skyong ba'i gshin rje'o// lte bas sprul pa drug cu bzhi// sum cu rtsa gnyis g.yas g.yon bsnol// gsang ba'i 'khor lo rin chen dbyibs// rtsa gsum dbus na 'od kyi mdangs// gru gsum me yi 'khor lo rang// nang na 'dab brgyad dbus na raM yaM// se ka rlung dal rgya gram gzhu// ba dan bzhi dang yaM du gnas// snying po'i rtsa gsum srog snying tshul// rlung la rnams pa gnyis su bstan// rig pa'i rlung ni gcig las med// bems po'i rlung las rtsa ba'i rlung gsum ste// lus zungs bcud rlung d+hu tir gnas// gsang lam rgyu zhing sa bon 'phel// srog 'dzin rlung ni snying la gnas// 'phar rtsa rgyu zhing shes pa gsal// dwangs snyigs 'byed rlung pho bar gnas// gyen 'thur rgyu zhing dwangs snyigs 'byed// lus la nus ldan rlung gsum gnas// rlung gsum la ni 'phen pa

gcig/ rten pa la rlung zin gyur na// kun dang rig pa rang sa zin// yan lag rlung gnyis bstan pa ni// me dang mnyam pa lte bar gnas// kun tu rgyu zhing drod dang bskyed// 'degs pa'i rlung gnyis rkang par gnas// kun tu rgyu zhing 'degs par byed// g.yas g.yon rlung gnyis srog rtsar 'dus// steng rlung mnan cing 'og rlung bsdam// rnam par rang bzhin mtshan nyid ni// sgong dbyibs ye shes lha la 'pho// 'byung ba rlung chen lhun gyis grub// chos kun ma lus gcig tu rdzogs// ma 'dres gsal ba gcig tu gnas// de ni sbyi rlung tshangs pa'i dbang// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal gsang ba sum cu pa las/ rtsa rlung dang ye shes kyi 'khor lo bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// gzhan yang rdo rje snying po nyin// 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed po la// don rtags gnyis su bstan pa// don ni gnas pa'i 'khor lo sems su 'dus// sems las sems 'byung chos kyi sku// rang sems 'khrul zhing 'khor ba la// rang rig sems kyi ngang du ltos// rang sems mngon du rtogs pa na// sangs rgyas byang chub de nyid do// shes rab kyis ni de nyid rtogs// dz+nyA na tsa kra chos nyid sgras// nyon mongs ye shes dbyings su gcod// rang rig sems kyi 'khor lo yis// las dang nyon mongs sgrib pa gcod// bskor thabs thabs dang grol ba'o// thabs ni rtsa nas ting 'dzin yin// grol ba rang sems chos skur sprad// sku lnga dang ni ye shes lnga// 'khor 'das lta spyod shes rab thabs// zhi gnas lhag mthong bden pa gnyis// thabs cad ngo sprad chos skur grol// 'khor grogs thabs dang shes rab gnyis// mi 'khor rkyen ni gzugs 'dzin dang// sems kyi sgrib pas bsgribs pa'o// 'bras bu chos sku chen por grol// de dag don gyi 'khor lo ste// byang chub lam gyi man ngag yin// ShamathaHrtags kyi 'khor lo 'phrin las te// zhi bas bdag dang 'khor rnams bsrung// rgyas pas tshe dang longs spyod 'phel// dbang gis pha rol dbang du sdud// drag pos dgra bgegs bsgral bar bya// ngo bo chos sku chen po la// 'jam dpal khro bo'i thugs nyid kyis// gdug pa'i mtshon cha yi ge yin// yi ge 'bru shag grong khyer ni// mun nag 'dra ba'i gshed po yi// de yi lto ba dag na gnas// srid pa gsum yang de na gnas// lte ba 'khrul zhing rtsibs kyis gcod// 'khor bas 'khor lo dag tu gcod// 'khor lo rgyu rkyen 'dzoms pa'i dpe// shing rta'ang chu yi 'khor lo 'dra// rgyu ni phyi nang gsang ba'i rdzas// ro ras thod pa zhing lpags la// snag tsha smyug gu la sogs te// de yang sbyor ba'i tshul du gnas// ma ra tsa kra drag po'i sgra// dmigs pa'i lus srog 'byed par byed// bskor thabs sngags

rdzas ting nge 'dzin// grogs ni dbang dang dam tshig dang// lha gsal bsnyen pa skyol ba'o// skyon ni dam nyams lha ma grub// 'bras bus zhing bcu rtsad nas gcod// gzhan yang gces pa'i man ngag ni// lhog 'khyam gcod dang 'khor 'brel bshad// lhag chad yi ge nor ba dang// shad 'dres snag 'byor tshig mtshams 'byor// re ka la rten tri ma gos// 'khor lo ldog pa'i rgyu brgyad do// bsnyen pa ma skyol 'dzab grangs nyung// cho ga chad dang gtad nan chung// ri rab ma bsgoms mnyen po med// tsa kra 'khyam pa'i rgyu nyid do// bsnyen bsgrub las sbyor mtha' brtul rdzogs// tsa kra gcod pa nyid du nges// yi ge so so mi nyam dang// 'khor lo log dang re mig nor// bsgrubs kyang mi 'grub thang sha chad// yi chad chos la skur pa 'debs// de ltar skyon yon shes par bya// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal gsang ba sum cu pa'i rgyud las/ don rtags kyi 'khor lo bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol ba// lam lnga bstan pa ji ltar lags// sa dang pha rol phyin pa gang// 'jam dpal khro bos bka' stsal ba// legs pa'i lam ni ston pa'o// rdul tshon dkyil 'khor tshogs kyi lam// des ni dman pa'i rtog pa 'joms// lus kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba'i lam// de yis rdul tshon rtog pa 'joms// drod dang rtse mo yin par 'dod// rtog tshogs ye nas lhun 'grub dal// rdzogs rim dkyil 'khor dam pa des// de yis bskyed rim rtog pa 'joms// bzod pa dang ni chos mchog go/ tsit+ta'i dkyil 'khor mthong lam ste// de yis lus kyi rtog pa 'joms// rtsa lung thig le bsgom lam ste// lus la nus ldan rlung gsum gnas// rlung gsum la ni 'phan pa cig/ rten pa las ni zin 'gyur na// kun kyang rig pa rang sa zin// rnam pa rang bzhin mtshan nyid rlung// bde ba chen por lhun grub pa'o// de yis snying gi rtog pa 'joms// bde ba chen po mthar phyin lam// bde ba chen po lhun gyis grub// gsang ba rig pa spyi blugs dbang// de nyid dran pa chen po 'chang// sems kyi skad cig don kun rig/ de nas sa dang sbyar ba ni// gnas btsal yo byed rab tu dga'// mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor dri ma med// sgrib sbyongs bshags pa 'od byed pa// mchod pa byin rlabs 'od 'phro ba// ting 'dzin dal bskyed sbyang dka' ba'o// ye shes drang bstim brtan mngon gyur// gnyis med dal mchod ring du song// bsnyen bsgrub 'phro 'du mi g.yo brgyad// tshogs gnyis lags pa'i blo gros dgu/ lhag mchod chos kyi sprin yin bcu// rigs 'dzin sa bcu yin par bshad// bya bral rtogs pa'i lam lnga ni// dbu ma sems tsam kun tu 'od// yo ga stug po

bskod pa'o// ma hA yo ga pad+ma spyan// a nu yo ga yi ge sa// a ti kun bzang dbye ba med// mi rtog mi shigs sa zhes bya// bstan pa sa yi las sa bstan// pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas// gnas dang rdzas sogs gtor sbyin pa// mtshams kyi dal ni tshul khrims so// de bzhin gshegs pa bzod pa ste// byin dbab mchod pa brtson 'grus so// dal bskyed drang bstim bsam gtan no// phyi nang gsang mchod shes rab ste// 'dzab bsnyen 'phro 'du thabs yin no// tshogs kyi dal ni bsod nams stobs// lhag ma'i dal ni smon lam yin// bstan pa dal bsdu ye shes so// pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ste// pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas// snang ba 'od gsal sbyin pa ste// ye shes rtogs pa tshul khrims so// rol ba 'gag med bzod pa ste// sku gsum 'brel med brtson 'grus so// ye shes rab gnas bsam gtan no// ma spangs rang grol shes rab bo// stong gsal 'gyur med thabs yin no// de la la bzla med pa stobs// blang dor med pa smon pas ste// ye shes rang gnas ngo shes ye shes de// pha rol phyin pa bcu ru dag/ ces gsungs so// 'jam dpal gsang ba sum cu ba'i rgyud las/ sa lam bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// rdo rje snying pos yang zhus pa// rtogs tshogs lha ru ji ltar sbyar// 'jam dpal khro bos bka' stsal pa// nyon mongs dug lnga gshed po lnga// 'byung ba lnga ni yum du nges// mi dge bcu ni phyogs skyong ste// skyon bcu yum du dag pa'o// de rnams kun gyi cha rnams ni// yon tan ldan pa yab yum bcu// sgo ma rta chad tshad med dag/ thabs mang dka' ba med pa dang// mngon sum nyid du grub pa dang// lus la lhun gyis grub pa'i dal// ye shes lhun grub rdzogs pa yi// rtogs pa ma spangs lha ru grol// gzugs kyi phung po 'jam dpal nyid// tshor ba yon tan myos byed 'bar// 'du shes gsung ste Ar+ya dmar// 'du byed 'phrin las tshar dgu ste// rnam shes chos nyid rA dza yA// 'byung ba yum du de bzhin nges// kun gzhi brag 'joms nyid yin te// yid kyi rnam shes ya ba ti// lus kyi rnam shes dmigs pa ste// nyon mongs yid ni lha mchog go/ sgo lnga rnam shes steng 'og khra// mig ni glang mgo phya sangs sna// sna ni rtel ba lce ni chos// yul ni chos nyid phyogs skyong yum// ma rig nyon mongs rtog pa de// rtogs na ye shes lha bcu bdun// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal gsang ba sum cu pa'i rgyud las// rtag tshogs lhar grol bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// rdo rje snying pos yang zhus pa// rnal 'byor tshe sgrub ji ltar lags// 'jam dpal gshin rjes bka' stsal pa// yid 'ong gnas su dpa' bo yis// rdzas bshams rdul tshon gong

ltar byi// rin chen bum pa gtsang ma ru// bdud rtsi mar dang mngar gsum dang// snying po lnga la tshe sgrub ri lu re// nang du blug la kha rgyan bsogs// mtshams bcad bum pa gzhal yas bskyed// gtso bo yab yum dmar por bskyed// hU~M badzra/ yum gyi kha ru rgya gram bsam// a tsan+d+ra/ de stengs zla ba'i ga'u bsam// a ces/ nang du tshe rten la 'tshar// hU~M badzra/ gu'u'i steng du 'ang rgya gram ljang// badzra spo Ta baM brjod pas// rwa bzhi rdo rje lu gus bsdams// hri brjod lte bar rta mgrin srun// tshe rten bskyed la dbus su dgod// tshal bu rdzas rnams gong ltar dgod// nang du tshe brtain thugs ka'i ga 'u 'o// gsang ba'i tshe rten chos nyid do// 'phrin las gzhung srang 'dzab la 'jug/ lha re bstod ba'i gsham la gdags// hU~M/ gnyis med rol pa'i sprul pa yis// khams gsum thams cad tshe bkug nas// mi 'gyur g.yung drung tshe gsol cig/ rang rang sngags la A yu dz+nyA na hU~M dza gdags// lha de'i sprul pa yang sprul gyis// khams gsum gang bar tshe bsdus te// 'gro drug bkrag dang longs spyod ni// tshe brten gsum la thams cad bstim// A yu dza zhes thor pa bsdu// bsdam dang bsrung ba gong ltar bya// ye shes lha rnams 'od du zhu ste// bstod bskul tshogs bya dngos grub blang/ zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal gsang ba sum cu pa'i rgyud las/ tshe bsgrubs kyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// rdo rje snying pos yang zhus pa// rtags dang mtshan ma mi 'tshal lam// 'jam dpal khro bos bka' stsal pa// chos sku'i 'od zer gsal ba dang// rang sems mi yo nyams ldan dang// 'od 'bar sku las 'thon pa dang// nyams stobs ldan zhing dbang po gsal// 'dod yon lnga nas med pa 'byung// khong khro dregs dang dbang po rno// lus la drod dang g.yo ba rlung// bde ba'i ye shes rang las 'char// gzhan yang phyi rtags rmi lam du// mon pa mon mo rgya gar dang// slob dpon pha ma ban d+he bzang// mgo la mchod rten yod pa dang// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan sgra sgrogs dang// nyi zla klad la bskor ba dang// mi 'bying chu la 'gro ba dang// gru rgal ri 'dzeg ru mtshon phyar// gdugs thogs lus la 'od 'bar dang// dkyil 'khor mthong dang yongs kyi khur// 'dod yon lnga yis dngos grub thob// bsnyen pa'i thabs su shes par bya// bsgrub rtags rin chen mang po rnyed// kun la dbang byed yul khams thob// rgyal po dbang 'dus sems can bzung// bla chen drug dang sprul bcu gnyis// de dag gzung dang khrid pa dang/ khro 'dod tshig dang mtshon cha snyed// srog chags ris non nam mkha' 'ja'// lha yis lung bstan me 'da' skyems// me yis tshig dang mtshon cha skyug/ ri nyil mkhar

gshigs nang rol 'don// de rnams bzang bar bstan pa po// thur la 'bab dang thags rings 'gro// bdag nyid rta la zhon rgyu pa// lta ba med na bkol mi btub// spyod pa med na dbang mi 'dus// grub pa med na las mi 'grub// dam tshig med na rang nyid rlag/ rang nyams med na bar chad 'byung// gdung ba med na 'grub mi 'gyur// the tsom can la grub pa med// rdzas med 'jig rten pho mo khro// bsnyen bsgrub nor na bdag gzhan phung// dbang ma thob bar chad 'ong// chos la dbang zos rdo rje dmyal// ra chod byas na srog la gzan// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal gsang ba sum cu pa'i rgyud las/ rtags kyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// rdo rje snying pos yang zhus pa// rnal 'byor dngos grub ji ltar blang// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bka' stsal pa// bkra shis pa'i dus dag la// thod pa dmar ser sum gyis dgang// 'el kon dza gad bdud rtsi blug/ dbang bshos gal phyis tshim byed dang// zla rgyas zla khrom maM sa la// 'dod yon bdud rtsir byin brlabs la// ljang dmar dar gyis bkab la bzhag/ 'jam dpal gshin rje'i lha rnams ni// bar snang dag la sprin dpung bzhin// ma 'dres gcig gi ngang du rdzogs// sngags kyi 'od zer mchod par phul// rang sngags sid+ha ku ru yis// lha rnams sprin las char byung bzhin// zhu ste dngos grub rdzas la thim// lha mchod dus drug dag na blang// chas gos bkra shis smon lam rol// mchog dang thun mong dngos grub thob// ces gsungs so// 'jam dpal gsang ba sum cu pa'i rgyud las/ dngos grub blang
