ba'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// rdo rje snying pos yang zhus pa// bsnyen pa skyel ba'i rnal 'byor pas// lus kyi 'khrul 'khor ji ltar lags// zhi ba'i rtsa rnams ji ltar sbyang// sngon du bshad pa'i dam tshig de// nyams na bshags pa ji ltar bya// 'jam dpal khro bos bka' stsal pa// ji ltar nor bu rin po che// ga 'u'i nang du gces par ma byas te// shin tu gces par ma byas na// dgos pa'i don mchog mi gter te// nor bu de la 'tshe ba mang// de bzhi na rang sems rin po che// ga'u lta bu'i phung po la// nyon mongs lnga las gyur pa'i nad// rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa rnams// phan bza' gnod spang kha zas kyis// ga'u lta bu phung po mchod// khams snyoms pa'i spyod lam ni// nyal dang ldang dang 'chag pa dang// lus sbyangs gnod pa'i kha zas spangs// gnyid sogs khams dang sbyar te bstan// de ltar byas pa'i yon tan ni// nad khams snyoms nas phung po bde// der rjes 'bol ba'i stan la 'dug/ lus sems bde ba'i gnas byas la// tshigs pa rin chen rtsar la brgyus// bsrung ste

mig gi rdzi ma phab// lce ni ya rkan dag la blan// mnyam pa'i skyil mo krung du 'dug/ dbang po lnga yang sgo bkag nas// nam gyi cha stod cha smad la// 'bad de yi dam rgyun du bsgom// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal gshin rje gsang ba sum cu'i rgyud las/ sgom pa lus kyi 'khrul 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu ba'o//// gzhan yang rdo rje snying po nyon// tsit+ta gur chen smug po na// snying la phyang ba'i dwangs ma bzhi// rtsa yi 'dab brgyad lte bar bcas// dwangs ma rtsa gnyis dbus na gnas// g.yas g.yon rtsa gnyis srog 'dzin rlung// yul chen lnga ni lhun grub gnas// oM gyi 'od zer yig 'bru dkar// chos nyid ye shes rang rgyud dang// yon tan bde chen yul lnga yi// chos nyid yul na rtsa gsum ste// dkar la zlum pa'i tshul nyid la// mdo na 'od zer sngo la gdangs// sa bon su tri snying po hU~M// kun gzhi rnam shes de na rgyu// yi dwags lha min skye byed rkyen// ye shes yul na rtsa gcig gnas// gru bzhi mdo na 'od zer ser// sa bon a ni snying po swa// yid kyi rnam shes de na rgyu// lha dang mi yi mtshungs ldan yod// yon tan rtsa ni rtsa gsum ste// mdo na 'od dmar zla gam gyi// sa bon pri du snying po oM// de nas sgo lnga'i rnam shes rgyu// byol song dmyal ba'i mtshungs ldan yod// rang rgyud yul na rtsa gcig ste// dwangs ma'i 'od ni ljang khu ste// de yi mdo na dmar nag og shol 'dra// dwangs ma sa bon ha dang taM// dmar nag mdog la gti mug nyid// shes pa gsum la snyoms par byed// de ni dbang po rtul po yin// dbus na bde chen rtsa gcig la// khyab byed rlung dang dbugs kyi mdangs// de ni ye shes thig le'o// rtsa lnga dbus na 'jam dpal lnga// dwangs ma 'od lnga yum lnga ste// snying dang lus sogs dbang po lnga// rang bzhin thig le ldan gyur na// bskyed cing 'dzin pa'i dbang po gang yin la// de ltar nyams pas dbang po la sogs la// las dang mtshan nyid dag la dmigs// 'od kyi sbyongs dang 'ju 'dul 'jam dpal nyid// ye shes chos nyid stong pa'i ngang du bstim// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal gsang ba sum cu pa'i rgyud las// zhi ba rtsa gnas bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// gzhan yang rdo rje snying po nyon// gong du bstan pa'i dam tshigs la// dam las 'das na nyams pa yin// nyams 'gyur nyes pa brjod mi lang// bshags pa'i thabs la gsum du nges// lus kyi nyes pa dag phyir na// yi dam lha sgom tsha tshwa gdab// nin mtshan phyad pa'i dge ba bya// mchod sbyin bya zhing nyes pa bshags// ngag gi nyes pa bsal ba'i phyir// spyi dang sgo yi na rag gdon// 'jam dpal mtshan brjod brgya ba gdon// bshags pa'i don la nang nub brtson// yid kyi nyes pa

bsal ba'i phyir// ye shes lha yi ting 'dzin bsgom// rang gi nyes skyon brtags byas la// snga ma bshags la phyi ma sdom// rtog pa me yis bsreg bya zhing// chos nyid klong la ma yengs bzhag/ rgyun gyi spyod lam thabs cad du// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo la// yan lag ma nyams bde bar bzlas// phyag rgya gsal dang dmigs pa thob// nyal na chos nyid dbyings su nyal// ldang na dbyings las shar don spyod// 'gro na 'gro ba'i don la bskyod// 'dug na rang sems lha sgom zhing// za na tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor// 'thung na bdud rtsi mchod sbyin dgye// bskor ni zhing khams bde gshegs bskor// snang ba thams cad ye shes sku// grags pa thams cad ye shes gsung// dran rtog thams cad ye shes thugs// sku gsung thugs las 'da' mi bya// skad cig ma gcig lhar gsal kyang// bskal pa stong gi sdig pa dag/ ces gsungs so// 'jam dpal gsang ba sum cu pa'i rgyud las/ nyams sgrib bshags pa dang/ rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o//// rdo rje snying pos yang zhus pa// zhing bcu gdug pa 'dul ba'i phyir// 'khor lo bskor dang thun sdebs dang// bsreg dang gnan dang 'byung ba bshig/ khro bo nyid kyis bka' stsol cig/ 'jam dbyangs khro bos bka' stsal pa// dur khrod gdug pa'i gnas dag tu// lcags khang drag po'i maN+Dal bzhengs// ro ras dug gi chus byugs la// khrag chen sha za sgro yi rtsa ba yi// drag po'i 'phrin las 'khor lo byi// bcu bdun lcags khang bcu drug brtsigs// mu la rtsa ba'i 'bru lnga dang// me dbal gshad kyi bcu gnyis dang// kha gnon ming gi thun gyi sngags// spyan dbye snyan bsal shangs spu btog/ zhal gdangs ljags rlob bzhengs bar bsam// rab 'jigs mche ba gu rings te// lcags mkhar la sogs rang grub ste// yi ge gshed bzhi khram bdag ste// las ky-i bdag po bos la bstim// ya ma rA dza sa to me ya/ ya me to ru Na yo ta ya/ ya ta yo na/ ra ya k+She ya/ ya k+She ya ts+tsha ni rA ma ra ya/ 'od zer gshin rje'i gnas su gtang// las kyi bdag po bod par bya// dgra po'i rdzas la ling ga bya// oM a kro te ka ya mAn ta ka/ ka la rU pa Ni A kar+sha ya ni hU~M hU~M dza dza/ bsgrub bya'i srog bkug ling ga bstim// oM a kro te ka ya mAn ta ka kA la rU ba nr-i de ba A kar+sha ya ma ku ta la hU~M phaT/ gu gul dud pas lha dang dbye// phur pa gtod pa la sogs bya// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal gsang ba sum cu pa'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo bca' gzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o//// nyon cig rdo rje snying po che// rnam shes brgyad 'joms ya tshogs brgyad// phyi yi 'khor lor yang dag bshad// rna lam phyi yin

bzlog pa nang// bsnol ba gsang bar shes par bya// skye mched dug lnga 'joms pa yi// gsang ba'i rtsa ba bcu bdun pa// rnal ma phyi yin bzlog pa nang// lto ba dkru gas pa gsang ba ste// nang gi 'khor lor yang dag bshad// gsang ba'i yi ge 'bru bdun pa// 'bru ded gsang ba'i 'khor lo ste// g.yas bskor phyi la g.yon bskor nang// bsnol ma 'bru ded gsang ba yin// nub mo 'bru bzhi 'og gcod de// de yang g.yas bskor g.yon bskor 'dra// gsang ba'i 'khor lo thams cad drang// bskor ba shis pa phyi yi phyi// dril gtor sngags kyi mtshon cha ste// nyin mo dril las spu gris dgug/ mtshan mo gtor la spu gris gsad// bar du spyi rgyud thun las bya// bdag gis ye shes gshed bzhi bskul// des ni 'chi bdag gshed bzhi dang// khram bdag pa dang ging rnams bskul// rtsa bzhi gcad la sa bzhi byas// 'byung bzhi sdud cing bdud 'joms// mgo 'khor khrag skyug brgyal dang gsol// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal gshin rje man ngag gsang ba sum cu pa'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo bskor thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o//// gzhan yang rdo rje sems dbang nyon// ya ma rA dza sa to me ya/ ya me do ru na yo ta ya/ ya ta yo ni ra ya k+She ya// ya k+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya/ nyin mo dril la spu gris dgug/ che ge mo A kar+sha ya hU~M dza/ ti ya ni ra ma A kar+sha ya hU~M dza/ A yu dz+nyA na A kar+sha ya hU~M dza/ rU ba tan da A kar+sha ya hU~M dza/ nub mo gtor la spu gris gsad// hri ti a mo kaM pra ma ya hU~M phaT// rag+ta tsa ra oM phaT/ mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ phyi yi phyi yi gsang sngags so// ya ma ra ni dza ya ker+sha ya/ ya k+She ya ra ni yo ta ya/ ya ta yo na ru to me ya/ ya me to sa/ tsa ra ma ya/ phyi yi nang ni gsang sngags so// ya ma rA dza sa to me ya/ ya me to sa tsa ra ma ya/ ya me to ru na yo ta ya/ ya ta yo na ru to me ya/ ya ta yo ni ra yak+Sha ya/ yak+She ya ra ni yo ta ya/ yak+She ya dza ni/ ra ma ya/ ya ma ra ni dza ya k+She ya/ phyi yi gsang ba bsad pa'o// nang gi rtsa ba mi 'gyur ba// ya ma me ta k+She ra dza sa to ru na yo ni ra ya dza ni/ nang gi phyi ru shes par bya// ni ya ra ni yo na tu to sa tsa ra k+She ta me ma ya/ nang gi nang du shes par bya// ya ni ma dza me ya ta ra k+She ni ra yo tsa na sa ru to/ nang gi gsang ba shes par bya// gsang ba bdun pa 'bru ded ni// ya ma rA dza sa to me/ ma ra tsa sa to me ya/ ra tsa sa to me ya ma/ tsa sa to me ya ma ra/ sa to me ya ma ra dza/ to me ya ma rA dza sa/ me ya ma rA dza sa to/ gsum dang de bzhin 'bru ded nyid// mtshan mo 'og gcod 'byung bzhi 'joms// ya ma me ta k+She hri ti a mo kaM pra ma ya hU~M phaT/ rA dza sa to sri ti a mo kaM rag ta rA dza ya hU~M phaT/ ru na yo ni// mur tsa ya hU~M phaT/ ra ya dza ni mA ra ya hU~M phaT/

gsang ba'i phyi ru shes par bya// gsang ba nang gi 'bru 'ded g.yas// ya ma ra ya ni dza ya k+She/ ma ra ni dza ya k+She ya/ ra ni dza ya k+She ya ma/ ni dza ya k+She ma ra/ dza ya k+She ya ma ri ni/ ya k+She ya ma ra ni dza/ k+She ya ma ra ni dza ya/ gsum dang de bzhin shes par bya// nub mo g.yon bskor 'byung zhing 'joms// ya ma k+She ta ma hri ti ka pa ye/ pra ma ya rbad ya/ ra ni dza ya hri ti ka pa ye/ mA ra ya rbad/ gsang ba nang du shes par bya// gsang ba nang du bskor ba ni// 'bru ded g.yas g.yon nyin mtshan 'gro// de ltar phyi nang gsang dgu yang// bskor bar shes pa phyi yi phyi// mi skor ba'i rnam pa brgyad// bsod nams can gyi rgyal po'am// las rnams rtugs ba'i rnal 'byor las// gzhan gyis bya bar ngas ma bshad// ces gsungs so// 'jam dpal gsang ba sum cu pa'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o//// gzhan yang rdo rje snying po nyon// 'khor lo spyi rgyug thun las ni// thod pa khrag sna dug snal// ma mo 'bum sde bskyed cing bstim// sngags kyi bar du thun 'di brdeg/ oM shri many+dza ya man+ta ka pe ta la e ka dza ti kro d+hi shwa ri snying kha rag sa ma ya thuM ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza sa to me ya/ khrag la ho ru me/ dgra bo klad pa la he re ho re thum ril rbad/ ya man+to ru k+she ya to ru me ya glo snying tsit+ta la thun rbad ya/ 'od zer nad blang thun la bstim// skabs su sngags 'di phur pa gdab// oM ni mA ra ya/ ma ra du/ ya ma snying/ ya ma khrag/ tshal pa bam ril dum bu dum bu gshin rje nag po dug khug mA ra ya rbad/ oM ni mA ra ya/ kri ta ya na ta kyi ra tsa/ pe ta li kro d+hI shwa ri snying mgo chod/ rtsal zhos/ khrag la chib/ kI li kI la ya baM ril rbad/ ces gsungs so// 'jam dpal gsang ba sum cu pa'i rgyud las/ thun gyi le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o//// gzhan yang rdo rje snying po nyon// sems can 'byung ba bzhi 'dus te// 'byung ba bshig pa'i 'khor lo 'di// ka la tsan tra'i gdan du bshad// zhing lpags ro ras dag la ni// gshed po bzhi bsnol 'khor lo bri// mu la me dpal spyi dang mthun// kha non sku yi snying po dgod// btson khang ming rus 'byung bzhi bri// ye shes gshed bzhi bskyed bstim mchod// 'byung ba'i 'khor lo rang gcod pas ma// ya ma rA dza sa to me ya/ laM laM sra ma ya hU~M phaT/ ya me to ru Na yo ta ya/ khaM khaM rag+ta tsa ra ya/ ya ta yo ni ra ya k+She yA/ raM raM mur tsa ya rbad ya/ ya k+She ya dza ni ra ma ya/ yaM yaM mA ra ya rbad ya/ 'byung ba gshed kyi spu gri 'di/ ye shes bzhi yi khro bo yis// gnas bzhi bdud bzhi srog chags gzugs// bung ba sdom dang gyad dang sdig/ 'byung ba rang rang snying po ste// las kyi gcong du 'di la 'dod// ces gsungs so// 'jam

dpal gsang ba sum cu pa'i rgyud las/ 'byung bzhi gshig pa'i le'u ste nyer drug pa'o//// gzhan yang rdo rje snying po nyon// ho ma zur gsum nyi shu sor// rim gsum dang po thod 'phreng steng// bar pa rdo rje tha ma mda'// rgya gram dbus te gzhal yas dbyibs// yam shing drag pa dmar nag dbyug/ mchod pa rdzas dang bsreg rdzas bshams// me lha cho ga dbye dgu rdzogs// thab tu gzhal yas lha bskyed la// me la phyag tshang sreg rdzas bstab// sprul ba'i ma gshin sngags kyis dbul// rdo rje bcom bskul drag tu bya// badzra mu gyis lha bteg la// dug lnga gzhom pa'i khro bo brdung// me lha nyid la gtang rag gtang// ye shes lha rnams gshegs su gsol// ya his me la gshegs su gsol// bskyed pa thams cad bdag la bstim// tha ma rlung ngam chu la dbo// drag po las kyi char ka yin// gzhan yang gnan pa'i las byed la// thod par ling ga 'khor lo dril// dur khrod dbyings su dong brus la// sa gzhi gshag cing rgya mtsho dkrub// 'chi bdag pho brang gsal byas la// ral pa tshar dgu lag tu gtad// de yi sgo srungs ngan song gsum// gdug pa'i phyag brnyan chu srin sbal// las mkhan gnod sbyin gdong dmar dang// blon po gshin rje glang mgo dang// srin po a ru a lug dang// lha chen byi nu mgo gsum pa// thugs rje sprul ba yul la gtad// sa bzhi sgo bsdam brau yang brdung// ri rab lha yi pho brang gdab// ces gsungs so// 'jam dpal gsang ba sum cu pa'i rgyud las/ drag po las kyi mjug bsdu ba'i le'u ste nyer bdun pa'o//// rdo rje pos yang zhus pa// tshogs dang lhag ma ji ltar lags// 'jam dbyangs khro bos bka' stsal pa// rin chen snod du zhal zas la// hri ti a smri ta yis gsang// hU~M gi rang bzhin med par bsam// oM las bdud rtsi'i rgya mtshor brlab// oM gyis 'dod ba'i yon tan lnga ru bsgyur// rU pa badzra/ gzugs mdzes dkar mo me long ma// sap+ta badzra/ jon mo snyan pa'i pi wang sgrog/ gan+d+he/ ser mo dri zhim spos me 'dzin// ra sa badzra/ mar me ro ldan zhal zas thogs// spri re sha badzra/ ljang khu reg bya lhub lhub can// d+harma d+hA du badzra/ mthing kha chos nyid po ti 'dzin// 'dod yon sprul pas bar snang gang// dkyil 'khor gsal gdab spyan drangs bstim// 'dod yon lha mo spyi ru dbul// sku gsung thugs ni don mthun phyir// dang po bstod la bar pa bshags// tha ma ling ga byas nas ni// pho nyas dgag cing sngags kyis bstim// phyogs skyong phur btab ral gris gtub// dug lnga mchod pas lha la bstim// sangs rgyas bsod nams sku yang 'asngig/ rol cing smon lam gdab par bya// lus ngag yid gsum sgrib sbyang phyir// gar

dang phyag rgya tshig dang sngags// ting 'dzin don dang ldan par bya'o// des ni tshogs chen rdzogs par rol// lhag ma gtor ma byin gyis brlab// yar gyi lha rnams sngags kyis dbul/ dgug dang zil gnon rdzaugs pa dang// sprul pa'i mkha' 'gro rnam gnyis drug/ ye shes dbyings dang sprul pa dang/ yon tan sha za las kyi ma// drug mchod rigs dbasum cu mchaud// gshin rjes mchod la kha chus brdab// ma mdun sring bzhi dbangaphyug dang// ging dang pho nya mchod nas ni// gter dang sreg dngazor du bya// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal gsang ba sum cu pa'i rgyud las/ tshogs lhag gi le'u ste nyir brgyad pa'o// rdo rje snying pos yang zhus pa// sngon byung zhi ba'i 'khor lo de'i// 'phrin las las rim ji ltar lags// 'jam dpal khro bos bka' stsa la pa/ chos sku skye med rnam dag las// skye ba'i cho 'phrul 'jam dpal sku// 'gro don cir mdzad zug rngu med// ye shes rig pa rang las shar// de don rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// zhi ba'i las rim rgyas par bshad// nub ri mtho la byang ri skyob// tsan dan nags tshal me tog chags// shar lho dma' zhing gzhol ba dang// nyams dga' phun sum tshogs pa btsal// bla ma gsang sngags che'i mchog/ gdeng gsum pa'i slob dpon gyis// ji skad smras pa sngi bzhin byed// snod dang ldan pa'i slob ma btsal// bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa// dus dang gza' skar bzang la 'jug/ bdud rtsi bum pa lcang lo sku/ bkra shis rdzas dang dkar dmar hU~M/ phyi nangamachaud pa b+ha li ma bshams// hUM/ byams dang snying rje smon bstang la// yang dag ye shes blo yis ni/ ma rtogs gol ba'i sems can la// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do// yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid/ yang dag mtha' ste yi ge med// de bzhin nyid bdag dag pa'i bdag/ chos rnams kun gyi snying por gnas// snying rje yis ni ya lang bgos// 'od bzang 'bar ba dpal be'u// chos rnams sgyu mar rig pas na// ye shes chen po'i chau 'phrul 'byung// a ni yi ge 'bru kun gyi mchog/ don chen ye shes dam pa ste// khong nas dbyung ba skye ba med// tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste/ brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog/ badzra tsit+ta dz+nyA na har+b+hA a/ gsum rigs gtsang ma dag pa ste// byang chub sems kyi cho 'phrul la// ye shes me rlung chu yis sbyangs/ steng 'og 'khor lo pad mar gnas// raM yaM kha~M/ 'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig po// gru gsum mthing nag kun bzang mkhan// gzhu 'dra ljang khu rlung sgrol ma// rgya mtsho sngo zlum mA ma ki/ sa gzhi mtsho khyab rin po che// dkar po gru bzhi sangs rgyas spyan// ye shes lnga ldan ri rab brtan// me dmar gru gsum gos dkar po// e

maN+Dal/ yaM karma rag+sha haM/ baM mA ma ki maN+Dal/ su rat+na tiSh+Tha maN+Dal/ yaM dz+nya na ru pa maN+Dal/ baM badzra dz+wa la raM/ dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa ste// de bzhin nyid kyi de nyid ni// dpag cing gzhal ba'i tshad las 'das// dpag med rgyal ba'i pho brang yin// de nas kun 'khor der gcig gnas// b+h+rUM/ dbus na chos nyid 'khor lo zlum// thig bzhi 'dab brgyad khyams dang ldan// gru chad sgo bzhi rta babs ldan// rdo rje rin chen 'phreng bas mdzes// b+hUM bi shwa bi shu d+he/ rarna pad ma dz+nya na maN+Dal/ rdo rje gdan ni ma lus ldan/ chos nyid mi 'jigs stong pa'i stobs// rig pa rdzu 'phrul thogs med dbang// rang 'byung dbang po shang shang dang// rin po che'i khri rkang mdzes// nyi zla pad ma 'od kyi gdan// rarna da ra traM/ siM nga ma hA bA la/ tir yang ma hA bA la/ g+ho ra ma hA pA la/ rI byi ma hA bA la/ po shaM ka ma hA bA la/ pad ma sur+ya tsan+Da maN+Dal/ stong pa nyid kyi snying po las// sna tshogs snang ba'i yi ger shar// sus kyang ma byas rang byung ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang yang yin// aM laM/ hU~M laM muM/ sa maM/ aM pyaM/ ha taM/ hU~M T+yaM/ hU~M T+yaM/ hU~M T+yaM/ hU~M T+yaM/ hU~M T+yaM/ hU~M T+yaM/ hU~M T+yaM/ hU~M T+yaM/ a A/ i I/ u U/ e ai/ phaT dza/ phaT hU~M/ phaT be/ phaT ho/ sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba// don dam rtags dang 'phrin las kyi// ye shes rigs kyi phyag mtshan 'bar// bde gshegs thugs rtags cho 'phrul snang// tsa kra badzra/ rat+na/ pad+ma/ kharga u t+pa la/ puSh+pe/ de nas rigs lnga sgo ba'i bar// sngon 'byung tshig gis gsal gdab cing// bar bar sngags brjod gsal bar bskyed// oM dzi na dzig/ laM te sha ra ti/ hU~M badzra d+hig/ muM d+hA du shwa ri/ swa rat+na d+h+rig/ maM mo hA ra ti/ aM a ro lig/ pyaM ra ga ra ti/ ha pra dz+nyA d+h+rig/ taM badzra ra ti/ oM pra dz+nyA dz+nyA na mur ta ya/ dug tshe da/ sa ba gI shwa ra/ oM badzra tig+na/ ha dz+nyA na ka yA/ k+sha shri rA dza yA/ hU~M lA se sa ma ya s+t+waM/ traM a gar b+ha yaM hU~M/ traM mA le sa ma ya s+t+waM/ hri ha hU~M pad ma ba dam hU~M/ hri girti ra ho haM/ dz+haM ku ru pa na hU~M/ i nir te ra ga ya mi/ me d+ha ra ni hU~M swAhA/ dza du pra be sha hU~M/ tha lhim ni sa raM pa ya/ hU~M puSh+pa A be sha ya oM swa ra tsa ya/ baM dI paM su ki ni/ muM shrI a raM pa ra ya hU~M/ ho gan d+he tsit+ta ho/ hU~M hU~M hU~M badzra tsit+ta hU~M/ a a badzra b+ha trA sa man+ta a/ oM mu ne kriM swA hA/ oM mu ne braM swA hA/ oM mu ne suM swAhA/ oM mu ne srung swAhA/ oM mu ne ye swA hA/ oM badzra ya man+ta kri ta dza phaT/ badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dza la ni hU~M phaT/ big+nan ta krid hU~M phaT/ rat+na d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dza la ni hU~M phaT/ oM pad+man+ta krid baM phaT/ pad+ma d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dza la ni hU~M phaT/ oM pra dz+nyA ta krid ho phaT/ karma na ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dza la ni hU~M phaT/ rgyal ba rigs lnga 'khor dang bcas// bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa

kun// 'gro ba skyob phyir gzi byin che// ye shes lnga yi dbang bskur cig/ oM ma hA shun+ya ta/ a ta ri sha/ pra ta be sha/ sa man ta/ ti ta a nu ta na/ dz+nyA na badzra swa b+ha wa ad+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ sa rnams kun gyi rgyan dang ldan// gnas dal mtshams bcad kun tu 'od// sgrib sbyang bshags pa rdo rje'i 'od// dam bca' byin dbab nam mkha' 'od// mchod pa byin brlabs bdud rtsi'i 'od// ting 'dzin dal bskyed rin chen 'od// spyan drangs bstim phyag pad+ma'i 'od// mchod dang smon lam las kyi 'od// 'dzab bsnyen 'phro 'du med sa// tshogs kyi dal ni dpe ldan sa// lhag ma'i dkyil 'khor shes rab 'od// gshegs bsdu thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa// rdzogs rim rang rig skye med sa// bcu gnyis sangs rgyas sa dang ldan// gzhung don rigs lnga'i yan lag rdzogs// sku bskyed rnam par snang mdzad de// dbang bskur drang bstim mi bskyod pa// phyi nang mchod pa rin chen 'byung// bdud rtsi myang ba 'od dpag med// 'dzab bskul bstod pa don yod grub// sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can// gtir gsum bsreg sbyangs chos kyi sku// zhing khams lhar gsal longs spyod rdzogs// 'gro don spyan drangs sprul pa'i sku// mchod dang 'dzab sogs byang chub sku// rdzogs rim 'gyur med rdo rje'i sku// khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag/ gti mug bsreg sbyang stong pa nyid// 'byung lnga gzhal yas me long lta// lha dang mnyam sbyor mnyam pa nyid// phyag rgya mchod sogs so sor rtog/ bzlas brjod sgom sgrub bya ba grub// de don ldan na rnal 'byor nges// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal gsang ba sum cu pa'i rgyud las/ zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o//// de nas yang bka' stsal/ mtheb 'thub nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor la// a yaM bsam 'das se gol sgra// dus gsum bde gshegs kun gyi gsan// chos nyid ngang las glu 'dis bskul// skye med rnam dag rang bzhin dag pa las// dus gsum bde gshegs 'jam dbyangs bzhi bcu gnyis// dag pa'i don la longs spyod rdzogs mdzad nas// bzhes shig bzhengs shig chos kyi dbyings las bzhengs// badzra sa ma ya dza/ snyan gsan rang 'od dal du bzhengs// 'og min lhun grub pho brang nas// dus gsum bde gshegs 'jam dpal bzhi bcu gnyis// longs sku mtshan dang dpe byang rdzogs pa'i sku// dus gsum bde gshegs spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol// thugs rje lcags kyus thugs dam rgyud bskul zhing// byams pa'i zhags pas gnas nas spyan 'dren na// lcags sgrog bka' yi pho nyas gnas bskyod la// bde gshegs bzhugs shing rtogs bral dges pa bskyed// e h+ye hi b+ha ga ban ma hA kA ru Ni ka kri sha ho/ dzaHhU~M baM ho/

phyag rgya bzhi yi 'od zer las// bar snang mkha' la sprin phung bzhin// 'od phung 'dabs 'dres tsam du drangs// gnyis med bstim zhing gzhugs su gsol// lha dang gnyis su bdag med la// rtog pa'i lus kyis phyag kyang btsal// bde gshegs 'od zer lus rtog bcom// rnam bzhi don ldan phyag rgyas mchod// kun bzang dbyings nas mchod pa sprul// che ba'i yon tan bdud rtsis mchod// rang las 'od bsdus dngos grub blang// hU~M/ ye shes chos nyid gang zhing rgyas// 'do yon drug gis bsam pa gang// ye shes lnga yis 'do zer 'phro// bA liM gtor ma'i mchod pa 'bul// ma hA ba ling ta pU dza ho/ bdag dbang rdo rje brtan pa'i sku// lnga rdzogs bde ba gcig tu 'khyil// rang 'byung lnga dang mdzes pa'i ro// 'chi med bdud rtsi'i mchod pa 'bul// pany+tsa a mri ta pU dza ho/ chos nyid bde bas mdzes gang la// khams gsum bsgral ba'i rag ta la// dngos med ye shes mchod par sbyar// rag ta chags pa'i mchod par 'bul// ma hA rag+ta pU dza ho/ ye shes rang gnas 'od 'bar nas// khams gsum yongs su bsgral nas kyang// log rtog chos nyid dbyings su rol// khams gsum yongs sgrol mchod par 'bul// sarba ta thA ga tA dz+nyA a be raM raM a yaM spa ra Na phaT/ sta na pU dza ho/ thabs dang shes rab ro mnyam gcig/ kun tu bzang mo yum gyi mkha'// ye shes thig le gcig tu 'khril// ma chags pad+ma sbyor ba'i mchod par 'bul// sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya stoM/ hU~M/ thabs dang shes rab chos dbyings las// las chen sbyor ba'i yul dbang bsgrol// ting 'dzin shugs mchod chu rgyun bsgyur// byin rlabs shugs ldan mchod pas mchod// phyogs bcu ma lus bde gshegs zhing// sna tshogs rin chen mdzes pa'i 'od// mnyen 'jam reg bya bde ba'i mchog/ lha mo bsam yas bro gar glu// dbyibs legs mdog sdug sgra dbyangs ldan// rol mo sil snyan 'phan gdugs dang// bla re rgyal mtshan lhab lhub dang// rin chen 'dod yon sna tshogs bsnams// sems las dbang bsgyur thabs lam pas// chos kyi dbyings nas rang sprul nas// rig pa'i rang dbang rgyun mi 'chad// tshangs pa'i gnas su mchod rgyun khyil// bdag nyid bdag la rol zhing mchod// skye ba med pa'i dbyings su thim// ye shes glu dang rol mos mchod// lha dang bdag nyid rdzas rnams dang// kun kyang byang chub sems nyid yin// smon lam ye shes rgya mtshor brlab// gnyis med bsgrubs la 'gro don bshad// ces gsungs so// 'jam dpal gsang ba sum cu pa'i rgyud las/ ye shes kyi dal spyan drang zhing mchod pa'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o//// rdo rje snying pos yang zhus pa/ gshin don rnam pa ji ltar lags// rang byung

bdud rtsi ji ltar bsgrub// 'jam dpal khro bos bka' stsal pa// gshin don rnam pa gsum du bstan// sems sbyang lus sbyang tsha tshwa'o// sems sbyang dkyil 'khor dgu dang ldan// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bsod nams gtor// gshed lcags drug po rgyud drug bsgral// rdo rje dbyings dang lam lnga bgrod// bgrod pa dbang dang mthar phyin bsreg/ 'gro ba'i don la skul ba'o// gzugs brnyan rdul tshon bum pa dang// me long dmar nag lding bu dang// mda' gzhu zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// dri ma bca' ba spyi rgyu shes// bsod nams sbyin gtor dge ba'i las// 'das dang ma 'das mchod pa'o// gshed lcags khro bos brtul ba ste// phur thun bstabs dang bsreg par bya// rgyud drug sgral ba'i dkyil 'khor la// ngan song gnas su dug sbyang zhing// mi yul zas gtad bsod nams tshogs// lha yi gnas su phan pa'i dbang// de bzhin nus pa'i dbang yang bskur// rdo rje dbyings ni zhi khro yi// dkyil 'khor gnyis po bskyed cing sbyang// rgyud drug sems bkug lus la bstim// 'dzab kyis bag chags sgrib pa sbyangs// skye ba'i rgyun ni gcad par bya// lam lnga bgrod pa'i dkyil 'khor la// khro bo'i dal la gsol gdab 'jug/ ye shes 'od kyi lus rtog sbyang// rim par skor zhing byin brlabs te// 'byung ba'i sgo dgag tshogs lam non// bum par zhi khro gnyis la bstod// lus ngag yid gsum sku gsung thugs// mnyam par sbyor te sbyor lam non// thabs dang shes rab mda' gzhu yis// shes bya'i sgrib sbyang me long bstan// chos rnams rang gsal sems kyi don// rdo rje lta bu'i mthong lam non// med rtsa a yaM zhi par spar// gsol gdab rim 'jug gtso bo yi// mkha' gsang dbyings nas sras su bskyed// zhi khro rdzogs pa'i dbang yang bskur// sa bcu bgrod de sgom pa'i lam// dmar po dar la sems ngo bstan// mthing nag la bzla byang bu bsreg/ bskyed rdzogs gsum gyi smon lam gdab// 'gro don dbyings la skur bzhengs la// phyag rgyas spyan drangs brgyad kyis mchod// rdo rje 'chang gi sa la bstan// sems sbyangs rim pa rdzogs par bshad// lus sbyangs ro bsreg cho ga ni// brtul zhugs spyod pas ro langs la// khro bos drag po gshed dang dbral// dri yis byugs la ras kyis gril// gnas rnams zhugs mar sdong bu dang// khams dang skye mched dag 'gyur bri// zhugs mar rol mos sna drangs la// dkyil 'khor bskor la dbus su bzhag/ mchod rdzas bshams la 'jam dpal gyi// dkyil 'khor gnyis po bskyed la sbyang// sdong po rnams la zhugs sbar la// 'jam dpal zhi ba'i lha la btab// bsreg khang brtsigs la me lha bskyed// zhi khro'i lha la rtog pa

dbul// dkar byang bla ma'i phyag tu dbul// nag byang me la bsreg par bya// rnam gsum smon lam rgya chen gdab// lus sbyang sgrib pa rdzogs par bshad// tsha tshwa gson don gshin don gnyis// bsod nams bdag gzhan thun mong ste// bdag don lha dang chos nyid rtog/ thun mong zhi rgyas dbang drag ste// gshin don ngan song rnam gsum sbyang// lta bas gtan phab lha bsgom la// rus pa sgrib sbyang rnam shes bsdu// yum lnga 'byung ba byin gyis brlabs// a las skor phor snang stong med// gang reg ye shes maN+Dal// kun dang chos sku phyag rgya che// rgyu 'bras chos rdzogs gzhal yas su// zhi khro lha bskyed spyan drang mchod// rnam shes sku bstan thugs khar bstim// bstod cing smon lam rtags par bzhugs// tsha tshwa'i las rim rdzogs par bshad// rang byung bdud rtsi'i dngos grub ni// dang po khro bo bar chad brtul// zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs gsol la// rigs su gyur pa'i thod pa lnga// rigs mthun sman la phyag rgyu dgod// srungs ma bos mchod bstim thog gzhom// zhi khro 'phrin las khrol bu sbyang// nye ba'i bsnyen po de rdzogs nas// bdud rtsi 'khril pas brtag btsag sbyang// rigs lnga'i 'phro 'dus phye ma sbyang// sman rnams bsdus la mdangs gdon zhing// khro bo 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// a gro gar gyi brog dungs la// dgu pa'i sngags kyi gong bu sbyang// rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor du// dbang bskur dbang grub blang bar bya// bde gshegs mchod la rang nyid bza'// sman rnams dam rdzas sna re la// yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pas// dngos grub khyad par can dag thob// ces gsungs so// 'jam dpal gsang ba sum cu pa'i rgyud las/ gzhan don rnam pa gsum dang// rang byung bdud rtsi'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i le'u ste sum cu so gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor la rgyud gtad pa 'di gsungs so// e ma ho/ skyon med rnams dag chos kyi dbyings// rang bzhin gdod nas dag pa la// ngo bo rol pa 'gag med du// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ru shar// thugs rjes 'gro ba drang ba'i phyir// brgyad khri bzhi stong chos kyang bstan// kun kyang drang ba'i thabs yin te// bde gshegs thugs kyis 'dul ba'i thabs// bde gshegs thugs kyi gsang brtol ba// gsang sngags bskyed rdzogs thabs lam grol// sgyu 'phrul drwa bas mngon rdzogs pa'i// byang chub thob pa'i don chen te// gsang don gsang ba sum cur ldan// lta spyod dkyil 'khor dam tshig dbang// kun tshang 'brel bas man ngag rgyud// 'khor gyi dang po khyod la gtad// shes rab rig pa'i rtsal gyis long// chags pa'i bsam pa brtan po bzung// gsang

sngags nges don dam pa 'di// zab mo nges par 'byung ba'i dus// sprul sku mya ngan 'das 'og tu// shAkya dge slong skal can ni// lnga brgya phrag bcu'i dang po la// lho nub srin po'i gyad yul 'byung// de la bstan pa'i char pa phab// mtshan don gsum dang ldan pa des// g.yu 'od gling du grags par nges// de phyir gsang ba'i rgyud don gtad// ces gsungs pa la 'khor rjes su yi rang zhing bstod do// 'jam dpal gsang ba sum cu pa'i rgyud las/ gdams shing gtad pa'i le'u sum cu gnyis pa'o//// 'phags pa 'jam dpal man ngag gsang ba sum cu pa'i rgyud las/ sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i bka' ba gcod pa'i las thig zhi khro'i rtog pa dang bcas pa rdzogs so//// rgya gar gyi sngags 'chang khrag 'thung nag po dang/ bod kyi lo tsha ba gnubs sangs rgyas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o////
rgya gar skad du/ siM ha tsa tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ seng ge 'o ma'i rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ rgya gar yul gyi pha mtha'/ mtsho yongs 'dus// ri kun 'dus/ lha 'dre kun gyi tshogs sa/ the brang kun gyi rgyu srang/ de na dpal chen po ya man+ta ka bzhugs pa la/ gnod 'dul lha yis zhus pa las/ seng ge 'o ma'i rgyud gsung du gsol zhes pas/ dpal chen po des bka' stsal pa/ 'di la mang por yod kyis kyang// bsdu na rnam pa bdun gyis bstan// phyag 'tshal ba dang/ skye rgyud bstan pa dang/ gnas dang/ sngags dang dam tshig dang/ 'khor lo dang/ gnan sreg 'phang dang bdun du bstan to// de la nan tan ji ltar bgyi// zhus pas/ yid la zung la lce la zlos/ zhes gsungs so// seng ge'o ma'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi dang gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas gnod 'dul lhu yis yang gsol ba/ yab lags/ bsdus tshig bdun po bstan du gsol// zhes pas/ bka' stsal pa/ phyag 'tshal ba ni lha srin sde brgyad kyis/ dpal chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// skye rgyun ni// pha srin po ma klu yin pas/ klu srin tshogs pa'i bu/ srin po ra hU la/ de ba sde brgyad tshang bas dmag dpon yin/ pha lha dbang phyug chen po/ ma lha mo dung skyong ma// de gnyis kyi bu nag mo

gsod byed ma/ de la sde brgyad tshang bas dmag dpon no// pha bzang thog gi rgyal po/ ma dug mgrin ma/ de gnyis kyi bu mo mon mo gser gyi rtsags bu can/ de la sde brgyad tshang bas dmag dpon mo// seng ge 'o ma'i rgyud las/ phyag 'tshal ba dang/ skye rgyud bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// gnas ni gangs ri'i rtse 'am/ dur khrod dam/ chu gling sum mdo 'am/ sngags ni rab tu bstan pa ni/ ke ta/ ra hU~M sring/ rag mo/ trig bi snu hril phob/ tsa pa ni rbad dza lhan nan/ zhes \u0f84gsungs so// seng ge 'o ma'i rgyud las/ gnas dang sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas dam tshig bstan ni// khyi dang bud med ser ba'i dug/ phud nyams kha rlang srog gi dug/ rdzas ma tshogs ba ltas ngan dug/ dug gsum spangs na dam tshig yin// seng ge 'o ma'i rgyud las/ dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas 'khor lo bstan pa ni// srog la 'khor lo rnam pa gnyis su bskor// dbus su gru gsum ling ga'o// de yi logs la brung gsum gsum// de la spu gri sbyor bri// 'khor lo rtsibs mchan bcu gnyis la// de la rtsa ba'i srog sngags gsum// de yi phyi skor gsum pa la// gzer ba dang po'i sngags// de 'od sgrub pa'i sngags// de 'og las sngags dug tu shes// zhal gyi phyogs su rtod la bri// de ni gsad pa'i 'khor lo 'o// srog gi 'khor lo reg chod ni// rim pa bzhi ru bskor ba la// gcig la spu gri mgo nang ngo// gcig la rtsa ba mgo phya'o// phyi nang bar du che ge mo yang bri// drug gsum nyis rtse gsum pa drug/ phyi pa rtsa sngags nang pa mda'// zla gam bsgrub sngags bar na ldan// phur ba'i 'khor lo bri ba na// rgya mdud dang po gzir sngags la// 'khor lo logs brgyad nye sngags te// rgya mdud 'og ma sgrub sngags la// dbus la las sngags bri ba yin// gcan zlog 'khor lo bsnol ma ste// pho mo re yi zhal re bri// 'khor lo bzhi ru bri ba ni// phyi la yul gyi gzugs su bri// de nas sde brgyad bsnol dang gzir// lkog ma'i 'og tu 'ga' pi bri// phyogs kyi rgyab tu tram sngags bri// le'u tshe bzhi la rtsa ba'i sngags bri// lho rnal 'byor gru gzir btsan rbad// the rang brid la dbab ba ni// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dag tu zi// mkhas pas sngags rnams bris la dbab// de med las rnams yug pa rgyang// seng ge 'o ma'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ mnan sreg 'phang ba'i las bstan te// 'khor lo thod pa'i nang du bcug la// nag gi lto gshag/ rgya mtsho sbyar dbye/ ri bo lto gshag/ bka' rten byin can 'og tu sba// sreg la skyer ba'i me la bsregs// thal ba rlung la phyar la

btang// 'ug pa bya rog srin bya la sogs ba'i// khrag dang dug dang phur pa 'phang// seng ge 'o ma'i rgyud las/ gnan sreg 'phang ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// rgyud lnga pa rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ siM ha tsa tra a rod na ma/ bod skad du/ seng ge 'o ma'i rgyud phyi ma zhes bya ba/ dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud phyi ma 'di gsungs so// de nas sku gsung thugs las sngags 'di bton to// ra hU~M ra ma tri ga/ phu+u ri tso to ra/ pi sbu ma/ tsit+ta tsi shu tshi ma khug thang thang/ bi sbu rag tri tsi shu la hriM hriM/ ga pi ga pi/ tsi to tsi to/ ba bum 'bu ma 'du thu 'du thuH rag sho rag shoH rag kho rag khoH yag go yag go/ badzra ru tri tram b+h+yo/ nA ga ru tri tri b+h+yo/ yag sha ru ti traM b+h+yo/ rag shu ru tri traM b+h+yo/ tsa ga sha ru tri traM b+h+yo/ pa tra ru tri traM b+h+yo/ ya ma ru tri traM b+h+yo/ 'khyags pa rlung du dbab pa dang// 'khyags pa lam du zhugs pa yin// tsa ba ni ra hU~M la phob/ kro ti kro la sha ra tsa phroM/ tha ma ni hu ru hu ru phroMHma ma khro ril ril phob/ sha ra sha ma ta nA ga phobaH dul nal dul nal/ chem chem phobaH ta kyi rA dza ti pa phobaH 'bi sbu rag trig tshi shu la sharaH dam thag hU ma hU ya phob/ na ga le nA ga le phob/ de ni bcu rnams chags su gshugs pa ste/ seng ge'i rgyu'o// srin mo srog gzer btab pa ni// bi sbu rag trigaH s+t+ri shul hriH lo thog kha hi/ 'phang 'gro gzan la dbab pa'o// bya ti ti la ba sha mi ki ra hU la swA hA/ bi shi mi ki du ru ma sha ki dza la a ta swA hA/ dza pa ti ra hU la ma hA kro d+ha ka phab sha la sha la te hU~M phaT/ bi sbum pu ri tso/ tor ra hUr ma trig/ tsi ta tsi shu tshil ma khug thang thang/ sku gsung thugs dang 'phrin las bzhi yi sngags// de yang 'phrin las sngags su gsungs pa'o// seng ge 'o ma'i rgyud las/ ser ba drag po'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas yang srog gi reg chod 'di gsungs so// 'khor lo chas su bcug nas ni// sngags kyi sbyor ba rab tu bshad// tsa ba ni ra hU la/ kro hi kro la/ thal man hU ru hU ruH ma ma khri ril/ shal shal taH dul nal dul nalaH ta ki dza ta pa ti/ bi sbu rag tsi shu la// sgrub pa'i las su de bstan no// las sbyor gsang ba'i sngags de ni// snying mgo chod hUr sprugasaH rbad u ra b+h+yoH myos sod rbadaH thum ril rbad/ khrag rngubs dzaH srog long rbadaH lus dul rbad ya/ srog la myos thibs rbad b+h+yo/ srog hU long phur rbad dzaH gzer thum rbadaH tsa kra liM ga chas byas la// rdzas rnams spyi yi gzhung du shes// seng ge 'o ma'i rgyud phyi ma las/ srog gi reg chod kyi le'u ste gnyis ba'o//// de nas yang bsnyen pa'i las sngags 'di gsungs so// pu ri tso to ra bi sbu ma ra hU ra

ma trigaH tsi ta tsi shu tshil ma khug thang de thang nge// bi gi ni kun le mA ra ya rbad/ ya ba smi gu pa ye she na rbad/ pus ti nas se tshil ma su tri ba ya rbadaH sa ma ya ka li ku pi ka ra ni ldanaH du ka ni a shu ro hu tsa pa la lhan/ ma hA sha to ku pa ya lhan/ bu kri ba ya a trig bal mi rbad dzaHtra rag sha ma/ ma ha ma khrim sham rbad dzaH tsha ba ni a dza ha tsha rbad dzaH seng ge 'o ma'i rgyud phyi ma las/ bsnyen pa'i las kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang gso ba'i las 'di gsungs so// lug nag 'ben brdas sngags 'di bzlas// ma ma bas smi gu li swA hA/ sri'u gso na ra rog 'ben// ser ba srung na mi rta phur// nad pa srung na mdos dang zor// ba sbru trag b+h+yo/ seng ge 'o ma'i rgyud phyi ma las/ gso ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang bcun bzlog las kyi sngags 'di gsungs so// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la sngags 'di bris// pho lto dkrugs la btsan la bskor// ma hA bI/ da pa tra/ bi sbu/ tsa tra/ pa ni/ ra hU la/ lo thog la b+h+yo/ me lto bzlog pa the rang brid// kha la ra ga sha thun b+h+yoH ma ma rag sha thun b+h+yoH tri tsa ba a ya thun b+h+yo/ ya ma rA dza kri spu dun ti kha la du ti b+h+yoH nA ga rA dza thun b+h+yoH ba ru na thun b+h+yoH rag sha thun phob/ po lto gzir ba lha bskor/ ma hA tsan+d+ha la rag+sha phob/ btsan dang klu dang lhas/ ser srun gyi yon lag la// thog mtha' btang ba'i las thabs ni// rin chen sna lnga gyo mo lto byas la gang rung sar sba'o// mo lto gzir la chu mig chu la bskor// na ga rA dza be ni a nanaH phroM hril shar phobaH ma hA tsan d+ha rag+shaH tri tha nri mA ra ya che ge mo la tri b+h+yo/ pho lto gzir/ na ga ra dza be ni a nan tha/ nA ga badzra rag sha ti/ san da ra shu na/ tsit+ta bo smi gu ru/ mo lto gcun/ ma hA bi a tra bi sbu tsa kra sa ni/ ra hU la dgra bo'i tsit+ta la bun dza ho khA hi/ he khaM li ma hA tsan d+ha mA ra ya khug dza dza/ pho lto dkrug/ kha la rag sha rag sha thun b+h+yo/ ma ma rag sha thun b+h+yo/ tri dza pa la a thun b+h+yo/ ya ma tsa kri sna dun ting kha thun b+h+yo/ nA ga rA dza ba ru na thun b+h+yo/ mo lto bzlog/ seng ge 'o ma'i rgyud phyi ma las/ bcun pa gzer mnan gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang mkha' 'gro gzan dbab pa dang/ 'khyag pa rlungs su dbab pa ni/ rata trig tsi shul hring bi sbu ma dam thob/ 'bri ru g.yas pa'i nang nas 'phang// mi sogs khyed byas thab zor 'phang// seng ge 'o ma'i rgyud phyi ma las/ 'khyag pa rlungs su dbab pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang ma thebs na/ mon pa mon mo bal mo gsum// za gsum gzir bas las rnams 'grub// des kyang thebs par ma gyur na// rtsa ba bzlog pas rang gzir nas/ skyin thang rab ru 'bab bar nges// des kyang las byed ma 'dod na// sngags kyi yang

rgod go bzlog go/ de nas rnal 'byor las rnams byed// seng ge 'o ma'i rgyud las/ sngags bzlog pa trag po'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas yang phung sri thod pa'i 'khor ni/ phyi ma bsnyen sngags mig la shar// rna ba thob la sna la hril// rdzas rnams la sogs sngo rnams blugs la mnan// rta ma rnams kyi mchog tu gsungs// 'di med rta ma 'khyams pa yin// ra rog lug nag ra dmar snying// rta nag g.yag rog glang dmar snying// bya nag nal bu btsan bya'i snying// srog dang ser ba gnyis ka'i rdzas// skyer lde seng ldeng mdzo ldeng dang// 'di gsum lha ni rtan pa'i rdzas// lcags phur skyer phur mchog phur gsum// 'di gsum gdab pa'i phur ba'o// 'di med las byed yug pa rkyang// 'khor lo sngags med sa yi gter te yugs pa rkyang// seng ge 'o ma'i rgyud phyi ma las/ phur shing thod pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang bstod pa 'di gsungs so// 'jam dpal bstod la lha rnams bskul// 'jigs byed chen po sprul pa'i sku// gza' bdud chen po mi srun pa// khyab 'jug chen po kun tu rgyu// pha ni srin la ma ni klu// klu srin tshogs pa'i sras po mthu po che// lus po gcig la mgo bo dgu// mgo lus med pa mig gis khengs// ro stod mi la ro smad sprul// sde brgyad kun gyi dmag dpon mdzad// phyogs mtshams kun gyi dmag dpon re// bcol ba'i las su thog ser phob// shar gyi stag srin/ lho'i baM srin/ nub kyi rkang srin/ byang gi 'brog srin// 'dod chags khrag mtsho 'khrug pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// yum chen klu mo yag ma ni// bcol ba'i las su thog ser phob// bsnyen pa'i dus su las bcol lo// 'jam dpal bstod la sde brgyad bskul// seng ge 'o ma'i rgyud phyi ma las/ bstod bcol le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi mtha' bstan/ bi sbu rtsa ba gsum gyi bsnyen pa bya// rtsa ba nas ni sgrub pa bya// 'ga' yi brgyad kyis zor mtha' bsu// tram brgyad mkha' 'gro las la gzud// gcun bzlog 'khor lo gzir la dbab// sku gsung thugs kyis zor thab bya// skyin thang 'khor los rta ma bya// lhag ma bzhi yis gnas skabs sbyar// seng ge 'o ma'i rgyud phyi ma las/ gab pa las ser gyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas sgrub pa'i bye brag bstan pa ni// phyi sgrub nang sgrub gsang sgrub gsum// phyi ni dkyil 'khor la gsad pa ni// maN+Dal 'dom gang gru bzhi la// dbus su gru gsum sum brtseg go/ kha khyer gser gyi phur ba bco brgyad dgod// de stengs dar gyi gur yang dbub// nang du ling ga zhing gi rgyus pa rtags// thun gsum phyogs brdeg ling ga'i gnas// snying gsum la sgrub/ rta

nag ra rog btsan bya'i snying// thod pa gsum pa sgrub/ mon thod sbyang lo rabs chad thod par 'khor lo bskor// khrag gsum la bsgrub/ ra rog lug nag ra dmar khrag/ rten gsum la bsgrub/ seng ldeng skyer pa mchog phur dril de can// thun gsum la bsgrub/ khrag dug yungs kar thun// nang ral gsad pa'o// gsang ba 'khor los gsad pa'o// seng ge 'o ma'i rgyud phyi ma las/ phyi gsang bas gsang pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas gsang ba'i sdebs bstan pa ni/ chu bsdud bsnyen pa ste/ chu tshags su gzhugs bsgrub pa'o// phrom gnyis shar gsum dril ba'o// tram brgyad sngags kyi sham bu ste// 'ga' yi zor gyis las su bstan// sku gsung thugs 'phrin las bzhis nye bar bya// ser ba'i lam bstan 'khyag pa lam du gzhug pa ni/ oM na phya na phya hU~M kha hi kha hi/ bcun bzlog 'khor lo rab tu brdeg/ phroM phroM shar gsum sems kyi rten// seng ge 'o ma'i rgyud las/ bsdebs su bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas sde brgyad kyi srog snying phul nas rang rang gnas su gram mo// gzas bag gi phul/ klu yis tsit+ta phul lo// gshin rjes rag to phul/ lhas 'bu la 'phul/ lha ma yin gyi 'du thu phul/ srin pos rag sho phul/ ma mo'i raka go phul/ gnod spyin gyis yag go phul/ sde brgyad dril nas bi sbum pu ri tso tor ra hU ra ma trig tsit+ta tsi shu ma khug thang thang phul lo// yang gzas tsa pa ni phul/ btsan gyis kro d+hi kro la phul/ gshin rje thal ba ni phul/ ma mos khraM ril phul/ klus sha la shal ta phul/ bdud kyis dul nal phul/ rgyal pos ta kyi dza ti phul lo// skye brgyad dril nas bi sbu rag trig tsi shu la r+d+hing/ zhes phul nas/ rang rang gnas su song ngo// seng ge 'o ma'i rgyud phyi ma las/ srog snying phul ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas yang tram brgyad sngags kyi lcags gzer ni/ nA gu ru ti traM b+h+yo/ klus phul/ de ba ru tri traM b+h+yo/ lhas phul/ ya ma ru ti traM b+h+yo/ gshin rjes phul/ yul sha ru tri traM b+h+yo/ srin pos phul/ des yul lha'i sbyor ba gzhom pa'o// kha rag ru tri traM b+h+yo/ tsag sha ru tri traM b+h+yo/ pa tri ru tri traM b+h+yo/ des srun gyi sbyor ba gzhom pa'o// khyi lud rwa ru tshil chen bsregs// mi rus yungs kar 'bob dud btang// des ni sbyor ba kun bcom ste// traM brgyad sngags kyi sham bu bya// seng ge 'o ma'i rgyud phyi ma las/ sbyor ba gzhom pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas gnad kyi sbyor ba ni// 'khor lo'i bar nas sngags kyi gnad// lto ba sbyar na bsad pa'i gnad// btsun bzlog phan tshun rgya gram gnad// yi ge mgo sprod pa gsad pa'i gdan// de yis bar nas dgra yi ming// 'khor lo bzhi yis dbab pa'i gnad// lha dang btsan

klu dang the brang ngo// phyogs kyi 'ga' pi zor gyi gnad// mtshams kyi traM brgyad sham bu'i gnad// sku gsung thugs 'phrin las bsnyen pa'i gnad// gzir ba phur pa'i gnad/ gnan pa thod pa'i gnad/ ro ras 'khor lo dgu yi gnad/ ces gsungs so// drag po gsod pa seng ge 'o ma'i rgyud phyi ma las/ gnad bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de las rgyud 'di gtad pa ni// seng ge zhes pa rab tu dkon// 'o ma zhes pa bcud yin te// 'jig rten 'di ru 'byung ba rab tu dkon// de las byung ba'i chos 'di ni// tshangs pa brgya byin khyod la gtad// nyin kun snying gzer khyod la gtad// brjed bya srog gcod khyod la gtad// drag po las sdud khyod la gtad// seng ge 'o ma'i rgyud 'di khyod la gtad// de skad gsungs nas slar gshegs so// seng ge 'o ma'i rgyud phyi ma las// gtad ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa//// seng ge 'o ma'i rgyud phyi ma ru byung ba rdzogs so//// 'di gnas rnying rgyud 'bum na med////
rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI ya ma ra dza/ kr-iSh+Na gu h+ya tsan+d+ra tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed zla gsang nag po'i rgyud/ gshin rje gshed po la phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad mkhyen nyid dpal mgon mdzad// gdug pa'i tshogs 'joms gshin rje gshed po la// dad pas spyi gtugs rgyud 'di bstan par bya'o// nyon cig 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// lho yi phyogs su kha bltas pa'i// shin tu dben pa'i dur khrod dam// brag dang sa phug dag tu ni// bsgrub pa pos gnas btsal lo// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ gnas btsal ba dang bcas gzhi'i skabs te dang po'o//// de nas mthu stobs kyi bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsungs so// gzhung dang mthun pa'i gnas dag tu// sa chog mtshams bcad sdig sbyangs la// chag chag thig gdab mgo ma yengs// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum la// zla gam bzhi dang ldan par bri// thod 'phreng dang ni me ri 'bar// sgo dang sgo khyud ldan pa'o// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ dkyil 'khor bca' ba'i skabs te gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// lho yi phyogs kyi zla gam la// 'jigs byed rgyal po gshin rje gshed// sku dang gzugs brnyan bzhugs su gsol// g.yas

su sgeg mo ral gcig ma// g.yon du za byed pe ta li// g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi zla gam la// sku yi gzugs brnyan dgod par bya// yang na snying po yi ge bri// skur bskyed de bzhin bsgom par bya// byang gi phyogs kyi zla gam ste// snying po yi ge bris pa las// 'jigs byed ya ma rA dza yi// skur bsgoms mchog phur sor gsum gzugs// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ lha dgod pa'i bca' gzhi'i skabs te gsum pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// gshin rje yab yum sku yi gzugs// gzhung las smos pa'i yas stags rnams// 'tshogs bar sbyar ba'i snag tsha yis// kang ka'i sgro 'am 'ug pa'i sgros// yi dwags kyi ni gos la bri// mchod de rab tu gnas par bya// zhes gsungs so// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las// 'khor lo bca' gzhi'i skabs te bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// dgra bo'i rkang rje chu phud dang// bong bu'i bdud rtsi mchil snabs dang// ba'i lci bas sa mar sbyar// kha dgongs rnams la 'gag tu bya// bya rog ra'i khrag gis byug/ ri sho ma dang gro ga la// dgra bo'i ming dang rus bris la// snying kha dag tu glan te bzhag/ ces gsungs so// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ ling khang bca' ba'i skabs te lnga pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// gshin rje yab yum bar du gzhug/ tshon gyi skud pas bcings nas ni// mtshan ngan thod pa kha sbyar du// bcug la bud med yugs sa mo'i// skra yi thag pas bcing bar bya// mthing nag gru gsum steng du bzhag/ ces gsungs so// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phy-i ma las/ ling ga byad du gzhug pa dang/ gzhag thabs kyi skabs te drug pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// gtor ma gsum dang arga dang// bcas te dkyil 'khor 'gram du gzhag/ rgyan dang mchod pa kun kyang dgram// gsur chen dud pa gtang bar bya/ zhes gsungs so// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ mchod pa'i yo byad dgram pa'i skabs te bdun pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// de ltar dkyil 'khor bshams nas ni// sngags pa chas gos nag po gyon// khro bo'i sngags kyis mtshams bcad de// lho yi phyogs su kha bltas te// ting 'dzin rnam gsum rim bzhin bsgom// khrag 'thung dkyil 'khor rim kyis bskyed// spyan drangs mchod pa la sogs bya// gtor ma btang la dkyil 'khor bsdu/ zhes gsungs so// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ khrag 'thung gi 'phrin

las kyi skabs te brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// de nas ting 'dzin rnams gsum gyis// khro ba'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed// snying po sngags kyis yab yum bskyed// de bzhin gnas nas spyan drangs nas// gnyis su med par bstim par bya// bstod cing mchod pa phul nas ni// ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'phrin las bcol// mas yar bgrangs pa'i tshes brgyad de// nyi shu gsum nas drug tu ni// zhag ni bzhi yi bar du ni// ya mAn+ta ka'i bsnyen pa dang// oM shrI many+dzu ya man+ta ka ya ma rA dza/ de bi kro d+hI shwa ri/ yag sha dza dza/ e ka dza ti sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ dgongs dang tho rangs gtor ma gtang// ces gsungs so// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ phyi ma las kyi skabs te dgu pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// lho phyogs kha bltas mdun du ni// hoM khung gru gsum rtse mo lho// chag gang thur du brkos pa las// ming rus bsregs pa'i sol ba yis// kha dog nag po dag tu bya// de yi nang du ban d+ha gzhug/ ces gsungs so// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ dbang du bsdu ba'i bca' gzhi'i skabs te bcu pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// gshin rje dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// khro bo'i zhabs ni g.yas ba la// rdo rje phur pa rtse gcig bsgom// las kyi gshin rje'i snying khar mnan/ ces gsungs so// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang du bsdu ba'i skabs te bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// dgug cing dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// snying po sngags kyi bzlas brjod ni// nyin mtshan phye la mtshan mo bzlas// gshin rje nag po 'khor dang bcas// rang dbang med par dbang du bsdu// ji ltar bcol ba'i las kyang byed// dgug cing dbang du sngags 'dis bsdu// oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka ha na ma tha b+han+dza hU~M phaT/ yA ba nya shA shA/ dza dza/ thun/ yA mA snying du pA sha/ ya ma A kar+Sha ya hU~M phaT/ ces ni mtshan mo bzhi bzlas so// zhes gsungs so// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ sngags kyi dbang du bsdu ba'i skabs te bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// snying po sngags kyi bar bar du// khro bo'i bstod pa stang bar bya// rak+ta btab cing mchod pa dbul// drag po'i sngags 'das btab cing dbul// oM shrI many+dza ya mAn+ta kA/ e a ra li/ pU tsa khA hi/ kha kha khA hi/ zhes gsungs so// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ bstod cing mchod pa dbul ba'i skabs te bcu gsum

pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// nyi shu bdun nas gnam stong bar// zhag ni bzhi yi bar du ni// gsad pa yi ni las bya'o// zhes gsungs so// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ gsad pa bca' gzhi'i skabs te bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// gshin rje las la btsud nas ni// dgra po myur du gsad pa'i phyir// ban d+ha dkyil 'khor thog tu zhag/ bcol ba las kyi sngags bzhi ni// nyin mtshan phye la nyin mo bzlas// nyi ma dang po sngags 'di bzlas// oM hriSh+tiHbi kri tA nan/ che ge mo sha truM nA sha ya hU~M phaT/ ya ma ra dza sa do me ya/ che ge mo la mu kaM/ sa ma ya hU~M phaT/ bdag thugs 'od 'phros sras mchog bskul// de bzhin phyogs kyi gshin rje bskul// bzas pa po bkug 'khor lor bcug/ be con phyag rgya mgo la brgyab// mgo 'khor nad kyis zin par bsgom// nyi ma gnyis la sngags 'di bzla// oM hri Sh+t+rIHbi kri tA na na/ che ge mo/ sha truM nA sha ya hU~M phaT/ ya me don ya da ya/ mu ka ma/ mur tsa ya hU~M phaT/ 'od 'phros gnas kyi gshin rje bskul// bzas pa po bkug lto bar bcug/ be con phyag rgya lus la brgyab// lus po brgyal zhing rengs bar bsgom// nyi ma gsum la sngags 'di bzlas// oM hriSh+tiHbi kri tA na na/ che ge mo sha hrUM nA sha ya truM phaT/ ya ta yo na ra k+She ya/ a mu kaM rak+ta tsit+ta ya hU~M phaT/ 'od 'phros gnas kyi gshin rje bskul// gzas pa po bkug lto bar bcug/ be co na phyag rgyas mgrin par brgyab// khrag tu skyug cing 'chi bar bsgom// nyi ma bzhi la sngags 'di bzlas// oM hriSh+t+rIHbi kri tA na Na/ che ge mo// sha truM nA sha ya hU~M phaT/ ya k+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya/ a mu kaM/ mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ 'od 'phros gnas kyi gshin rje bskul// gzas ba bkug ste lto bar bcug/ be con phyag rgyas snying khar brgyab// lus srog phral te gsod par byed// gnam stong dag gi nub mo ni// ma gshin rje thun zor gzhan yang brdeg/ drag po bdud kyi hoM nag bca'// dgongs kyi dmar thag chad pa dang// tshogs dang mchod pa gtor ma dbul// dbang gzugs bcol bskul drag tu bya// nub mo dbang bsdu nyin mo bsad/ ces gsungs so// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ gsang ba las kyi skabs te bco lnga pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// sngags kyi sngags bzlas brjod par du// rdza rnga brdungs te gshin rje bod// rak+ta sbrengs te mchod pa dbul// khur bur dengs te spyugs gla blangs// dun ting kha ya'i sngags brjod la// dgra bo de la gshin rje rbad/ ces gsungs so// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ las kyi gshin rje rbad

pa'i skabs te bcu drug pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// tshe gcig tu ni brtsis pa'i// nyin mtshan gnyis kyi bar du yang// mnan pa'i cho ga bya bar gsungs// lha klu gdug pa'i 'dug sa 'am// ro khung dur mchad rgya gram lam// mnan pa'i ban d+ha nyid la ni// ri rab bang rim gsum pa'i gzugs// snying po la hU~M bri bar bya// 'jigs pa ya ma rA dza yi// mchog gi phur ba sor gsum pa// mnan pa'i sngags ni stong bzlas te// rdo rje phur pa rtse gcig pa// gzas pa'i ling kha'i snying khar gdab// gshin rje yab yum lto ru gzhug/ mtshan ngan ban d+har bcug nas ni// snga ma bzhin du thag pas bcings// ro yi khung du sbas te bzhag/ gshin rje nag po'i lag tu gtad// ya man+ta ka'i sngags kyis gzir// gdon mi za bar gsod par byed// ting 'dzin sngags kyi ri rab bskyed// ri rab chen po'i 'og tu gzhug/ steng du lha yi pho brang gdab// bskal pa mtha' yi bar du gnas// zhes gsungs so// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ mnan pa'i skabs te bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// las rnams 'grub par ma gyur na// lan gsum bar du cho ga spogs// des kyang grub par ma gyur na// 'khor lo bzlog cing gshin rje gzir// ces gsungs so// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las// gnad la dbab pa'i skabs te bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// las rnams grub nas thod pa dbyung// las kyi rnam smin sbyang ba'i phyir// bskang gso'i cho ga rgya cher bya// bdag dang gshin rje zas pa gsum// ya man+ta ka brtag par bya// ya man+ta ka rtogs pa ni// las kyi rnam smin sbyongs pa yin// zhes gsungs so// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ las kyi rnam smin sbyangs ba'i skabs te bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// drag po 'khor lo'i sngags rdzogs nas// tshes gcig dag gi nyi phyed na// drag po hoM gyi las brtsam ste// dkyil 'khor chen po'i lho ngos su// hoM khung kha khyer chag gang ba// gting du de yi phyed brkos bya// dur khrod sol bas nag por bya// zhabs su yi ge raM gcig bri// kha khyer mtshams su me ri bri// kha la rdo rje rwa ba bri// phyi rol zla gam gsum gyis bskor// dug shing tsher ma can gyi shing// sme ba'i khrag gis spang bar bya// hoM khung ji bzhin byas te gzugs// dur khrod skra yi thag pas bkyig/ ming byang bris la hoM la gdags// khro bo'i par pas dug dang spel// rtsang du re snam 'bru+u na ga ste// mchod rdzas bsreg rdzas ling ga

bzhag/ ces gsungs so// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ drag po hoM nag gi skabs te nyi shu pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsungs so// nag po shing shing phur sor bzhi// gru gsum sum brtseg rtse la gzugs// gtor ma nag po rgyun du btang// ling ga ji ltar 'dod pa'i dbyibs// dbang po yan lag tshang du dgod// las kyi gshin rje drag tu bskul// phur pa nyid kyi mgo mjug gdab// mnan pa dur khrod klu gnas chu// oM ti ra she rme du tso ta ru me ya nan/ che ge mo dza// ga tu da rme lan du ya rbad/ d+hi ma ku ta paM ril rbad/ oM ro ta shig rbad/ srog la phra du ti ril rbad/ tsha du ka nan shig shig/ chuM chuM rbad khrag tu tra baM ril rbad su ru ra na khug rbad/ sme du sha rbad/ oM du sa ha ra tsa du rbad dur tsa rbad/ ni ra du baM ril rbad/ tsit+ta ro la shan ti tsa dur nan rbad/ khrag tu tsa rbad/ rme len nu ka baM ril rbad/ tsu sha tsu sha tsu rbad/ tsa du ra baM ril rbad/ ces gsungs so// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ ma ra ya tsa sgrol gyi skabs te rtsa gcig pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// gru gsum nag po sum brtseg tu// me ri rdo rje lcags kyu dang// tho ba zhags pa lcags sgrog bri// nang du gzugs bca' thod par gzhug/ gdug shing rtsa dgu dug gis byug/ sems can sna dgu'i snying dgu yang// gru gsum rtsang gi rtsa la dgal// mon mo mchod dgu'i snying la bod// rtags bzangs mthong nas gtsang gis brdeg/ thod pa'i ling ga dur khrod mnan// rak+Sha mo'i snying la khug/ raM ril rbad/ tsa tra mu kri kru to sha ri baM ri la rbad/ rak+Sha mo kha lo kha hi/ sring mo rak+Sha long la khug thum ri li li rbad/ kha long ha khA hi/ rak+Sha mo snying la khug snying tshal pa baM ri la rbad/ dgra bo mA ra ya kha long kha long khA hi/ ya ma rak+Sha mo snying la rbad/ kha long khA hi ha/ ya ma snying la khug/ glo snying la kha long khA hi/ ya ma rag+sha mo glo snying khug long khA hi/ rag+sha mo snying la khug la thum ril rbad/ dgra bo mA ra ya thum ril rbad/ ces ni gzugs ming snying la brdeg/ khyi dang bu chung skad ngan dang// rus pa btsas pa mnam na sbyar// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ mon mo snying 'bru bcu gsum gyi skabs te rtsa gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// dur khrod glo nas ro blangs nas// dbang po bkrol la gtor ma bya// pags pa'i khung du 'khor lo'o// rgyab tu ma ri'i gzugs bris la// mtha' ma gdug pa'i sngags kyis bskor// snying khar trag nra rbad ces bri// 'doms su ya ma du zhes bri// lte bar dza nr-i phaT ces bri// tha ma mu nr-i dza

yis bskor// nyungs kar nyungs nag skye tshe la// drag sngags 'di bzlas gzugs la brab// oM snying ro tse kro d+hi shwa ri dun b+h+yo/ tsit+ta snying la rog ba thum ri li li rbad rmugs dza/ myag tshal rog ba snying ro rtsal shig shig/ de nas zhing gi 'khor lo de// dgra'i khang pa'i rmang du mnan// sna tshogs gtor ma rtag tu btang// de ltar byas na gdon mi za// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ ma mo snying la nyi ma rmongs byed pa'i drag sngags kyi skabs te rtsa gsum pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs ky-i bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// mtshan ngan thod pa sul mangs su// sna tshogs 'bru sna phyer btags la// zur gsum nyi shu rtsa lngar bsham// mi khyi rta'i khrag gis byug/ gdug pa'i shing gi gtsang re gzugs// brnag pa'i ming dang gzugs byas la// dkyil 'khor byang shar gru gsum gzhug/ drag sngags bzlas shing rtsang gis brdeg/ rak+mo tsit+ta ro shan snying rum thum ri li li mA ra ya rbad/ rak+mo tsit+ta me ri tsa rbad/ shig thum nr-i rbad/ mdze mo phag pa'i gzugs byung na// drag po'i sngags 'dis gnad la dbab// rak+mo tsa tra tsa kra r+t+ral hU~M tsit+ta rbad nan nan/ ces ni dam tshig phyag rgya bstan// me chen 'bar ba'i 'od gsal dang// dngos du 'od dang pi wang sgrogs// de ltar byung na grub rtags ta// gong gi gtor ma dgra phyogs 'phang// gtsang dang ling ka dgra phyogs sba// zhes gsungs so// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ srin mo nad gtong ma'i drag sngags kyi skabs te rtsa bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// lung gsum mdo 'am brag chu 'thab// byang du kha bltas brag khung ngam// bdun na shing rtsi 'thug po yod// chu mig byang nub kha bltas pa// klu bdud gnas pa'i sa yin te// dus tshod dbyar zla gsum pa lo// pha mes rjed dpon rabs chad mgo/ mon nam rabs chad thod pa ru// ra khyi mi yi khrag kyang blugs// mdze can drag can rims nad khrag/ klu nad sna tshogs khrag kyag blugs// gru gsum mthing nag dbus su gzhag/ zag pa'i rdzas bsdus gzugs byas la// chag gang ling ga'i tshad du bya// ta la'i shing la ming rus bris// sbrul nag kha ru chud pa la// sdig pa nag pos 'jug nas rdul// sdom dang sbal nag za ba'i gzugs// sme ba'i khrag gis mkhas pas bri// gzugs dang ming rus bcas pa de// ro nye shun pa'i nang du gtum// sngon dmar thag pas rgya gram bkyig/ gu gul nag po'i dud pas bdug/ mdze can rabs chad thod par gzhug/ dur khrod ras la 'khor lo ni// bcu gnyis rtsibs dang bcas pa// thod pa 'khor lo'i nang du dril// za mo'i phur bu sor brgyad pa// nag po 'og rgur dbang bskur la// dkyil

'khor gru gsum dbus su gzugs// dkar gsum gtor ma rtag tu btang// gshin rje'i bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang// drag po'i sngags 'di rgyun du drang// oM nag po ti pa tsa pa ya/ nA ga rag+sha che ge hi la nu la phe sha na phobs/ shig shig chuM chuM/ hu ya hu ya/ klu nag po mgo dgu pa dgra bo la mA ra ya dza dza/ sprul dang spal pa sdom dang sdig pa dang// mon dang byol song gzugs 'dra bdag la ston// de 'dra rtag tu byung na 'grub pa ste// drag sngags 'dis ni rab tu gsad par bya// nag po ti pa tsa rag ra ka u nag nan/ nag po ti pa tsa ya/ tsi ra tsi ra/ tsa pa ru shun/ che ge la yam/ nag po ti ba tsa pa ya/ tsu ta ru tsu ta ra/ ka la k+Sha che ge mo la yam/ a shan nag po ti pa tsa pa/ nA ga dgra bo kro d+hI shwa ri te shan rbad/ ku ra sha rbad/ ti pa tsa ba/ dza la dza la/ kha yan hU~M sha/ che ge mo la mA ra ya/ oM nag po ti pa tsa pa u shug sha rbad/ nag po sha pa na tra dre ba tra ba ti rbad/ ba du na be sha nA ga rbad/ nA ga phes ye/ phe shan hU~M nan/ be lang sha shag shig yan/ dgra bo mA ra ya dza/ zhes ni rab tu khros la brdeg/ nub byang kha bltas chu mig brngog/ khru gang brkos la thod pa sba// steng nas gra ma'i phur pas gdab// rtsal nag sprul gyi dud pas btang// dkar gsum mngar gsum mchod pa dbul// bdag nyid gshed pos gtad khram bya// yang na chu mig sngo thub tu// sgyed bu btsugs te thun khrag bskol// des ni gnad la dbab pa'i las// yang na thun de zor du 'phang// de ltar byas na brlag par 'gyur// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ mA ra ya mdze can gyi skabs te rtsa lnga pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// mdze can pho mo'i thod pa ru// sna tshogs khrag dang dug tu sbyar// gtsor ni mdze khrag btsan du gces// phyir yang de bzhin sbyar te byug/ zangs phye lcags phye rdo phye dang// gtsor ni nyungs kar nyungs nag gces// thod pa re ba nag po'am// yugs sa mo yi zhabs mas gtum// dur khrod ras la skyag nul bya// ldong ros baM gyi khrag gis byug/ mgo phur bdud kyi nyi ma 'am// ki'u kang rgyu ba'i dus nyid du// mkhas pas 'khor lo 'di ltar bya// rim pa gsum dang ldan byas te// sum cu rtsa gnyis yi ge dang// drag bo'i sngags pa'i sngags 'di spel te bri// nag po ti ba tsa ba nA ga rak+Sha che ge mo hi la nu la/ phe sha na bobs shig shig chuM chuM hu ya hu ya/ mA ra ya/ gsod pa'i drag sngags sum cu gnyis// rtag tu bzlas cing 'khor lo bskor// 'khor lo bskor la thun gyis bsad// khol lam rlangs ba byung na 'phang// thun gyis btig cing bsngags 'dis gsad// tad+ya thA oM/ ta ki sha sha shu shu ti te ti ba re nA ga hu yu hu yu swAhA/ nA ga rA dza ma ra

ya tsit+ta dza la ya/ oM ma yur shig sod// yan re shig sod/ thun tri shig sod/ rbad shig sod/ yid shig sod/ thun dang thod pa sngags 'dis 'phang// oM A yu tshe shig/ sod/ nA ga li yag yam/ su ra ta rbad/ baM der tsa thun b+h+yo/ 'khor lo'i nang du ling kha gril// nub byang kha bltas chu mig tu// khru gang brkos la sngags 'dis gtad// tad+ya thA/ oM ta ki tsi ki shar le shu mu le sha sha shu shu ti te bi ba re/ na ga hu yu nA gA hu yu swA hA/ zhes gtad par bya'o// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ mdze'i le'u nag po'i skabs te rtsa drug pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum la// mtha' ma me ri 'bar ba bri// dbus su dmar nag ya gcig bri// lcags kyi phur pa sor bzhi pa// gru gsum dbus su gzugs par bya// khyi mi rta yi snying khrag dang// sha sna khrag sna'i gtor mas bskang// tshil chen dud pa rgyun mi gcad// ming rus phur pa'i mgul du gdags// drag po'i sngags 'di rgyun du drang// oM many+dzu shrI d+hi da ya/ gshin rje nag po dgra bo'i snying la dza dza/ mon dang g.yag dang ban de dang// rbab dang thug com 'od dang sgra// gshin rje grub pa'i rtags yin te// gtor ma gtang la gsad par bya// gshin rje nag po dgra bo'i snying rtsa rtsa nan nan/ rbad rbad rmugs rmugs/ dgra bo mA ra ya dza/ zhes brdeg go/ de nas dur khrod klaung du mnan// bcom ldan 'das kyang 'jig par 'gyur// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ bla phur nag po'i skabs te rtsa bdun pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// dur khrod dkyil du gnas btsal te// dur khrod ras sam pags pa las// 'chi bdag nag po zhal gcig pa// ma he sngon nag zhon pa bri/ snying khar ya mA rA dza zhes bris// mchog gi phur pa sor bzhi pa// ya man+ta kar dbang bskur la// 'chi bdag nag bo'i snying khar gdab// oM ma many+dzu shrI ya man+ta ka pa la ya ma tsit+ta kI la ya rbad/ ya ma kr-i sna tsit+ta breng breng/ srog thums ril rbad/ ces ni gshin rje gzir gyur nas// gnam ris sa brag 'gems par byed// de nas snying khar hoM btsugs la// ming dang rus bris hoM la bsreg/ ya ma ka la che ge mo tsit+ta rA dza rbad/ ya ma snying/ ya ma khrag/ ya ma rtsa la hur/ dbugs thum ri li li dza dza rbad/ 'khor lor hoM dang ling khar bcas// dur khrod gling du slan te bzhag/ ma he skad ngan 'don pa'o// wa 'am brag srin brgyal ba'ong// ces gsungs so// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ gshin rje srog phur nag po srog 'phrog pa'i skabs te rtsa brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di

skad ces gsungs so// dur khrod klong nas ras btsal la// mda' gang gru bzhi'i tshad du bya// mthing nag gru gsum dkyil 'khor tshad du bri// nA ga du ya ka sha dza zhes bri// mtha' mar thal chen dkar por btang// sna tshogs sha khrag gtor ma bsham// mchog tu glang nag snying la rten// gshin rje'i bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang// dur khrod bdag po'i srog nas bzung// yak+sha ka la sa ma ya dza dza/ yag me ka li ma ma shaM shaM dza dza/ btsun po pho mor gang byed kyang// mon dang bud med smra byed de// 'od ni gsal la gdangs pa'o// gzugs bcas gru gsum nang du gzhug/ phur pa gcig la sngags 'dis brdeg/ yag sha 'bar ba'i srog dung dung/ d+ha sha gr-i ba na dung dung/ ya ka sha tsit+ta ro la srog chod/ snying phur khrag zhibs/ gnod sbyin mo rol rol rtsa la hur thums/ dkyil 'khor ling gar bcas pa rnams// dur khrod lta bu'i gnas su sba// yang na pha tshan phung shul du// gnod sbyin lcam dral 'tshogs te// de ru sbas na phung bar 'gyur// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ gnod sbyin nag po lcam dral gyi drag sngags kyi skabs te rtsa dgu pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// gdug can gyi shing rnams la// sor brgyad pa 'am sor bzhi'i tshad// gu gu la dud pas bdugs nas kyang// rtse mo gri lcags ma de 'ur gzhug/ rtag tu bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang// ming dang gzugs la sngags 'dis gdab// oM a ni ma ra ni ma ra du/ ya ma snying/ ya ma khrag/ tshal pa baM ril/ dum pa dum bu hU~M phaT/ ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ babs snying la ro sha snying la babs/ ya ma rA dza snying la kha khug thum ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza snying la khug thum ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza sa to me ya/ ya ma rA dza snying rtsa ro mo baM ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza snying la khug/ ro sha snying la baM ril rbad// ces btab na lha yang brlag par 'gyur ro// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ phur thun nag po'i skabs te sum cu pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// mon nam rabs chad thod pa ru// dug sna stong rtsa brgyad sbyar te// 'brub khung nang du ling ga gzhug/ ya ma'i bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang// dug gis brdeg cing sngags 'di bzlas// ya ma rA dza khram thogs rbad/ ya ma rA dza mugs thibs thibs rbad/ ya ma rA dza subs ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza snying du ya rbad/ ya ma ra dza myags bying ya ma 'ubs thul/ snying gi chod kha la zo/ tshal pa snying rtsa ro la baM ril rbad/ dug dang thod pa dur du mnan/ ces gsungs so// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ myos pa dug thun gyi skabs te sum cu so gcig pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di

skad ces gsungs so// rabs chad pho mo'i thod pa ru// nyungs kar rgyal pos dgang bya ste// dug dang khrag gis nyungs kar byug/ gru gsum nang du ling ga gzhug/ ya ma'i bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang// nyungs kar brdeg cing sngags 'di bzlas// ya ma rA dza che ge mo/ d+hi tiya man+ta ka snying khrag tshal pa baM ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza glo la rtsa ro me tha ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza glo rtsa baM/ mchin rtsa rul rgyu rtsa khuM/ snying rtsa pra ma ya/ srog la te par rtsa snying laM rbad/ rtsa ro sha khug snying la rol/ tshal pa baM ril rbad/ ces brdeg par bya'o// rabs tshad kha sbyar thod pa de// lha khang them pa'i 'og dag gam// mchod rten snying po'i 'og tu mnan// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ rtsa skems nyung thun gyi skabs te so gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// mi bsad mda' la gri mde'u gzhug/ 'ug sa bya rog zhing lpags dang// gdug pa gsum gyi sgro bskyon la// mda' dang ltas ngan sna tshogs gzugs// mkhas pas mi yi khrag gis bri// 'od ma'i gzhu la rgyus chen rgyud// gzhu mchog gnyis la yab yum bri// chang par ma ra b+h+yo zhes bri// mda' ni ya ma rA dzar dmigs// brnag pa'i gzugs bcas 'brub khung gzhug/ ya ma'i bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang// brnag pa'i gzugs la sngags 'di brdeg/ ya ma rA dza snying la gtod par ka sha me baM ril rbad// aM shu sha snying la khug/ mchin rtsa rbad/ kas pa kas rtsa la shos/ rtsa ro ma g.yobs/ ro la rtsa me baM ril rbad/ khrag rtsa snying la shos/ ro rtsa shos baM ril rbad/ dgra bo mA ra ya baM ril rbad/ ces ni brnag pa'i gzugs la brdeg/ de nas mde'u me btang la// ling ga bsregs la dgra phyogs 'phang// smal po gzhal lag nub mo'i yi// gsungs so// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ mda' thun nag po'i skabs te so gsum pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// rgya tshil gu gul sbyar nas kyang// g.yag ru nag po'i nang du gzhug/ ming dang gzugs bris dud pas bdug/ gu gul me btang lid+ga bdug/ ya ma'i bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang// drag pos sngags 'dis brdeg bar bya// ya ma rA da sa twa me/ ya ma ra dza snying la ro du me ya/ ya da yo ni snying la to ru me ya/ baM ril rbad/ rak+sha k+sha ya/ a kra ma kra ma snying la rtsa ro me baM ril rbad/ ces ni las de rdzogs pa dang// dgra bo'i yul lha rten 'og sba// yang na khang pa'i ru la sba// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ gu gul gyi skabs te so bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// rnel dri mo 'am kha ra la ma// mdze mo sprang mo'i mgo thod du// rims khrag mdze khrag

rme khrag tshogs// thod pa'i nang du blugs nas ni// phyir yang de bzhin bcug par bya// yugs sa mo yi dor rtar gril// ya ma'i bsnyen ba rdzogs pa dang// brnag pa'i gzugs bca' sngags 'dir brdeg/ ya ma rA dza rtsa la rod pa khug thum ril rbad/ snying la rag sha mye baM ril rbad/ ya mA rA dza snying la rtsa rtsa nan nan/ sdigs sdigs/ rmugs rmugs/ che ge mo thum ril rbad/ mkha' ras dngos sam phyogs dag tu// bgrod khar 'gro zhing sngags bzlas te// gshin rje'i chas su zhugs la 'phang// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ rme ba khrag thun gyi skabs te so lnga pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdags pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// mon nam glen pa'i snying nang du// glang rog bya rog ra rog snying// rta nag khyi nag nya yi snying// stag dang bya rgod mi yi snying// phye mar btags te blugs par bya// nyungs kar nyungs nag dug rdzas la// ya ma'i bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang// snying nang ling ka bcug la brdeg/ ya ma rA dza sa to me ya/ snying la ro sha baM ril rbad/ dgra po'i mchin rtsa glo rtsa snying la khug kas pa kas pa/ tshal pa tshal pa/ snying la rol pa rtsa baM ril rbad/ kha raM nr-i tsit+ta kha raM khA hi/ ral gris gtubs la gtor mar dbul// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ drag po'i snying thun skabs thun gyi skabs te so drug pa'o// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// lcags sam nag po'i snod nang du// sna tshogs khrag dang bse zhor sbyar// ling ga ji ltar 'dod pa'i dbyibs// ming dang rus bris gzhug par bya// yang na rba'i sbar bu ru// dug dang sbyar te gzugs la bsku// ya ma'i bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang// sngags 'di bzlas la khar la brdeg/ oM d+h+ri tI ya man ta kra shrI many+dzu/ a kro man dza ye/ be ta pi dgra bo'i ro la tsit+ta ro la shan+ti/ snying la rog pa/ rtsa khug/ kro d+hI shwa ri pe te li khug/ khug baM ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza srog la baM/ a many+dzu snying la khug/ srog la rgal de baM ril rbad/ ni ma ra ya to pa ma ya/ tod pa pas smi de hU~M dza/ oM sha many+dzu ya ma ta pe ta le kro d+hI shwa ri/ snying kha rak+sha sa ma ya thum ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ khrag la ho du me ya/ klad pa la ha re ho re/ baM ril rbad/ ces ni ling ga'i snying khar brdeg/ phyogs su mi 'phang dngos la brdeg/ bcom ldan 'das kyang 'jig par 'gyur/ ser ba 'bebs na lo tog la'o// smyo 'bog gtong na lha khang du'o// mdze nad gtong la chu mig la'o// thog tu 'bebs na lha rten la'o// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ drag po bsnyen thun gyi skabs te so bdun pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// zug pa'i rdzas dang sna ma la

dang// grogs mkhar sa dang thigs pa la// ma ra ya yi gzugs byas te// dbang po yan lag tshang bar dgod// gru gsum mda' gang nang du gzhug/ mchog gi phur ba sor brgyad pa// ya ma'i bsnyen pa rdzogs byas te// rtsa srog bcad pa'i sngags 'di bzlas// oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ khrag thibs ba ril rbad/ mug thibs rbad/ subs ril rbad/ gling du ya rbad/ gshin du rbad/ khrag gsham du rbad/ khrag ka khrag ka baM ril/ tsit+ta ro la shan+ti rtsa nan nan/ gshin rje nag po'i pho'i mo'i snying la kha la glo snying khug/ dgra bo mA ra ya baM ril thum ril rbad/ dza dza zhes brdeg go/ de nas gzugs kyi lhag ma de// dug shing me btang sbyin sreg bya// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ rtsa thun nag po'i skabs te so brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// brag nag bdud kyi rten gnas te// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum la// dur khrod sol bas nag por byug/ de la thal chen sbar khab dgye// gru gsum kha la rjes ngan brdeg/ gla ba nag po'i snying la bod// tsa ra rog po dmigs pa'i rten// nyungs kar nyungs nag brdeg pa'i rdzas// sna tshogs sha khrag gtor ma la// gtso ru srid pa phyi mi rta// snying dang rak+ta bskangs ba'i rdzas// brda mi 'phrad dang mon mo'i gzugs// btsun pa'i gzugs dang sngags pa'o// sngags ni rtag tu 'di dag gdon// bdud pra ma ya bdud mA ra ya/ bdud snying mgo chod/ du ru du ru/ ha ra ti ha rti/ dgra snying la dza dza/ nag po ti pa tsa pa'i/ dgra snying rtsal baM ril rbad/ nA ga kro d+hi shwa ri snying la pa tsa la/ trag ma trag shi/ dgra snying la kha raM khA hi/ nag po sha pa ti/ rtsa baM ril rbad/ nag po her haM baM ril rbad/ nA ga snying mgo chod/ kha la zo snying mgo chod/ rtsa la rig pa'i dgra snying la dza dza/ dgra bo'i snying la ha re hu re/ be ra baM ril rbad/ hu ya dgra snying la du ra du ri glo rtsa la baM ril rbad/ yang na myos shing lkugs su cig/ yang na smyos zhing 'bog tu chug/ yang na rtsa rgyud bdun rgyun chod// yang na don snying thal bar rlogs// yang na mdze dang 'brum bu thong/ zhes ral brdeg par bya'o// de nas ra bsgral te/ mnan pa hoM khung rnying par bya// thugs dam bskang la gtad khraM bya// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ bdud kyi drag sngags kyi skabs te so dgu pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// lha khang lta bur song nas kyang// dar dkar bting la 'bru sna spung// spyan gzigs sna tshogs legs par dgram// snying chen gcig la rten bcas te// spyan gzigs tshogs kyis thugs dam bskang// brnag pa'i gzugs ming bcas pa yang// dgra yi gos la bri bar

bya// mchog gi phur bu sor brgyad la// ya ma'i bsnyen pa rdzogs par bya// oM many+dzu shrI rI dza ma hA tri kra shar li pra ma ni rA dza tr-i tr-i dza dza/ 'od la sogs te sgra rnams dang// mi ma yin pa'i gzugs kyang ston// rA dza ma hA pU tsa pra ti tsa ho kha raM khA hi/ zhes ni mchod dbul thugs dam bskang// bsad na mchog gi phur pa la// sngags la ling ga dag la brdeg/ oM ni ma ra ni ma ra du/ ya ma snying ya ma khrag/ tshal ba baM ril rbad/ daM pa duM bu/ gshin rje po de kun khug khug/ dgra bo ma rA ya dza dza/ oM ni ma ri ni/ d+h+ri ta ya ya man ta kri rA dza/ te pa li kro d+hi shwa ri/ snying mgo chod/ rtsa la shos/ khrag mgo chod/ khrag la kI li kI la ya/ baM ril rbad/ ya ma rA dzas to me ya dun b+h+yo/ ya ma rA dza snying do me dun b+h+yo/ ya me do ru me da ya/ ya ta yo ni snying la khre k+She ya baM ril rbad/ oM shrI many+dzu gshin rje nag po/ dgra snying la gu ra gu ra baM ril rbad/ ha ra tu ha ru baM ril la rbad/ tra ha ra tra ha ra baM ril rbad// rme ru me ru baM ril rbad/ hU ra sha hu ra sha baM ril rbad/ ta ka ka ha ri ka baM ril rbad/ du raM su ru raM baM ril rbad/ ha ra tsa ra nan nan ha ra ra nan/ sruM hU~M ra baM ril rbad/ kra ya ha kra ya ha/ sme'u lu sme'u lu/ tsur da tsur da baM ril rbad/ smre sha sme sha kra shu me kra shu me/ tshur haM tshur haM/ gu raM gu ba raM bi la rbad/ tsa du ra tsa du ra sle sha sle sha baM ril rbad/ mi rus dar dkar spyan gzigs bcas// lha khang mgon po'isnying khararbad/ zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ khu thun smyo ba'i skabs te bzhi bcu pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// dur khrod dgon pa'i gnas dag tu// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum bri// nang du rabs chad thod pa ru// gri mor shi ba'i snying chen gzhug/ snying gshags nang du ming rus ni// ha la'i shing la bris te gzhug/ rgyas chen btsems la sngags 'dis srab// oM many+dzu shrI ya ma rA dza kr-i sna bri mA ra ya dza dza/ ya ma rA dza snying la rbad/ rtsa la stungs dbugs la thums/ snying la kha raM khA hi/ zhes ni ral gris gtub par bya// phyed na dug shing sbyin bsreg bya// phyed ni gtor ma'i nang du dbul// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ snying zor nag po'i skabs te zhe gcig pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// khrag gis sbrus pa'i maN+Dal ni// chag gang gyen la brtsig par bya// khru gang thur la bru bar bya// kha khyer thal chen dkar por btang// ma gu kha sprad tshul du bri// dbus su yi ge ya gcig bri// gtsang dgus gru gsum kha la bskor// sha khrag gtor ma sna tshogs bsham// rgyun du sngags 'dis bsgrub par bya// oM many+dzu shrI tra ka rak+mo snying te kem snying rtsa srog srog breng breng ma ma dza dza/ dam

tshig phyag rgya bcas nas ni// ma ma rag+mo sa ma ya daM daM dza dza/ zhes dam bsgrag go/ ma mo gshed mo 'di rnams ni// hor ba gzan la bcum gzhin 'ong// gru gsum nang du rjes ngan 'ong// wa'am brag srin skad ngan 'ong// gru gsum nag por ling ga gzhug/ drag sngags dgu po 'di yis bsad// trag rak+mo ni khug rbad/ ma ma gzer shad ma rbad// ma ma 'dar yed yed rbad/ ma nr-i sha ku ru thun nr-i rbad/ ra ka sha mo kha long nri kha long rbad/ ma sha ma ra ka mo snying ling rbud/ ma ma rak+mo srog bye shag snying rtsa kum rbad/ ma ma dung srog bye mA ra ya rbad/ ma ma trig trig sha long/ khrag ling mA ra ya rbad/ ces ni rtsa dgus gzugs la brdeg/ de nas dong nang tsher mas dgang// me btang ling ga sbyin sreg bya// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma la/ gshed mo dgu'i drag sngags kyi skabs te zhe gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// dkyil 'khor gru gsum nag po la// zla gam dmar po kha spyod rgyu// dkyil du khrag gi dza ro bri// ban d+ha dgu ru snying chen dgu// sha khrag sna tshogs sbyar la bzhag/ lcags phur dgu la ling ga dgu// rang rang sngags kyis btab nas kyang// gtor ma ro ru mchod pa dbul// ma ma trag kha mun long dza dza/ ma ni rag ta trag mo dza dza/ ma ma snying rtsa shad shad dza dza/ ma ma srog snying rtsa sham sham dza dza/ ma thig nig srog thun snying thun dza dza/ rak+mo yag+mo ka li daM dza dza/ ma gar za ma snying thig srog la dza dza/ sa ma rak+mo srog skems ma dza dza/ che ge mo ni sha tu srog la rbad/ snying kha long rtsa thun srog thun mA ra ya rbad/ ces phur pas gdab bo// thugs dam bskang ngo// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ srin mo khrag 'thung sbar sdebs ma dgu'i drag sngags kyi skabs te zhe gsum pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// mchog gi phur pa sor brgyad dgu// dgu dang khrag tu sbyar bas byug/ sngon dmar skud pas 'og nas bkyig/ sngags 'dis bzlas la gzugs la brdeg/ bal mo shaM shaM srog la sham/ tr-i rag mo srog gu ru tsit+ta ma ra rbad rbad/ ces btab na brlag par 'gyur ro// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ bal mo nad gtong ba'i dgu'i skabs te zhe bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// khyi mo dkar nag grod pa ni// gnyis gshags sbyar la kha yar btsem// grod pa dkar mor khrag gis dgang// grod pa nag po dug gis dgang// nag du dmigs pa'i ming rus gzhug/ dug la khrag gi grigs dang sbyar// nyungs kar nyungs nag ske tshe la// pho sngags grod pa nag por gdab// rag sha rbad dza
