dza/ ru tra rbad dza dza/ yak+sha rbad dza dza/ pag sha rbad dza dza/ rA dza rbad dza dza/ mo sngags grod pa dkar mor gdab// rak+mo mA ra ya tr-i ni sad/ rak+mo snying kha raka ba ti snying rtsa ril/ yak+mo snying rtsa ril/ trag mo shig shig/ snying la rol// ru tra ma ma rtsa shig/ ya ma snying khrag sha ru ru pa t-i srog pr-i sham khyer b+h+yo/ zhes grod pa khab kyis btsem// rme lug nag po lcags ru la// mgo bo mthing nag dar gyis gtums// khal du bkal la dgra yul btang// de bzhin sngags 'dis phyogs su btang// rag mo srog baM kha 'ur khug mA ra ya khug/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ zhes ni nyungs kar phyogs su 'phang// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma las/ sbre nag gtor skyel gyi skabs te zhe lnga pa'o//// zla gsang nag po'i rgyud phyi ma rdzogs so//// rgya gar gyi slob dpon khrag 'thung nag po dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba gnubs sangs rgyas ye shes kyis/ dur khrod ha la sgrogs pa'i sgrub gnas su bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o////
rgya gar skad du Ar+ya many+dzu shrI rat+na gu h+ya tan tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal rin po che gsang ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das dpal gshin rje gshed po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas/ khyab brdal chen po'i klaung/ rgya yongs su ma chad pa dur khrod chen po rab tu 'jigs pa gtum pa'i tshal bam ro brtsegs pa'i pho brang mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dbyings na// bcom ldan 'das dpal khro mchog ya man ta ka za byed kyi yum chen mo pe ta li+e dang 'khril te/ gnyis su med pa mnyam pa chen po'i ngang las/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bcud bsdus nas/ g.yo ba med pa'i ngang la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ nyid las ma g.yos pa'i sprul pa rdo rje 'jigs byed dang/ dus gsum gcig pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ sa dang lam la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ gdug pa 'dul byed khro rgyal dregs pa can rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te// 'di ltar ye shes kyi gshed bzhi dang/ khros pa'i yum bzhi dang/ thar byed chen po brgyad dang/ khram bdag chen po bcu gnyis dang/ shan pa chen po brgyad dang/ mdangs len gyi khro mo brgyad dang/ za byed kyi tshogs dang/ 'joms byed kyi

tshogs dang/ gsod byed kyi tshogs dang/ khram thogs kyi bdud dang/ rtsis byed kyi ging dang/ zor thogs kyi ma mo dang sha za'i srin po dang/ srin mo la sogs pa dregs pa can thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de yi tshe 'khor de dag gi nang nas thugs kyi sprul pa 'jigs byed chen po bzhengs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// ye nas ma skyes chos sku dag pa yis// mi rtog mnyam pa'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang/ gdug pa 'dul phyir rdzogs pa'i skur bzhengs la// thugs rje drag pos 'gro ba'i don mdzod cig/ ces gsol pas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ mnyam pa chen po'i ngang las/ rol pa chen po gtum pa'i sku/ dregs pa can thams cad zil gyis gnon bar bzhengs te/ gdug pa gdul bar byed pa dpa' brtul 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de yi tshe 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g.yos par gyur/ rab tu 'gul zhing ldeg go/ 'khor du gtogs shing 'dus pa rnams 'gyel te/ rab tu gan te 'gyel bar gyur to// de nas thugs kyi sprul pa ya ma ra dzAs gsol pa// kye ma sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bo rdo rje 'chang// mnyam pa'i ngang las 'jigs pa'i sku khros pa'i// dpa' brtul 'bar byed brtan pa ngo mtshar che// 'jig rten khams kun 'ur 'ur chem chem g.yos// 'khor du gtogs pa rab tu brgyal te 'gyel// 'khor rnams so so srog dang ldan par mdzod// ces gsol to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ chos thams cad ci yang ma yin pa zhes bya ba mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang la snyoms par zhugs so// de ma thag tu 'khor thams cad brgyal ba las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la srog gi snying po dril te phul to// kye ho 'phags pa'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed// rab tu khros pas sems can dran pa nyams// rdzun 'phrul rmad byung ngo mtshar che// bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa yis// rnam shes srog snying dril ba'i mchog/ bstan pa bsrung phyir mdongs gsol phul// dkyil 'khor chen po'i bsrungs ma bgyid// e ya ma me ta k+She/ ra dza sa to/ ru Na yo ni/ ra ya tsa ni/ zhes pa mdongs gsol du phul lo// de nas yang thugs kyi sprul pa ya ma rA dzas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma 'jigs byed chen po lags// gtum rngam 'khrugs pa'i nga ro yis// 'khor gyi dregs pa dbang bsdus nas// 'jam dbyangs khro bor zhugs pa nyid// gshed bdag dpa' bo sgrub pa dang// 'khor gyi shan pa bkol ba yi// las kyi rim pa bshad par mdzod// ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'gro ba yongs su bstan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs

so// mi rtog mnyam pa chen po las/ bstan pa'i snying po nges par bshad// byin brlabs ldan pa gsang ba'i bcud// rnal 'byor chen po rtsa ba'i don// bstan pa rin chen rgya lam gcig/ thabs dang shes rab snying po'i bka'// nye bar gyur pa gsang ba'i don// dngos grub chen po nye ba'i mchog/ lus gcig yan lag bzhi dang ldan// mtha' sdud kha gso las kyis so// rnal dang lto dkrug bzlog pa yi// bsnyen bsgrub spogs dang shi sa 'gro// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yis// las kyi gshin rje'i grong khyer dkrug/ yan lag nye ba shan pa'i so// gsang sngags don gyi snying po 'di// rigs ldan nye ba'i sras kyi zung// bgrod pa gsum gyis bcud blangs te// yun du mi gtong rnal 'byor can// nyid kyi lta spyod gsang ba ste// bka' byin rlabs yun du bde// thabs kyis 'gro ba'i lam du yang// smod pa'i rgyal po lam gyi mchog/ zhe sdang gtum khro'i ngang tshul can// nye bar gyur pa'i lam du bshad// 'jam dpal gshin rje gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ khro bo 'byung ba zhes bya ba nyid kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so// rtog med spros bral chos kyi dbyings// dmigs med mkha' mnyam byang chub sems// dngos dang mtshan mar mi dmigs pas// chos nyid ngang du dbyer med mnyam// chu zla'i dkyil 'khor ji bzhin du// sgyu ma'i sems nyid de dang 'dra// mkha' la gzha' tshon snang ba yang// nam mkha' ngang du ro gcig mnyam// yod de yod pa ma yin te// gzugs dang kha dog yul las 'das// med de med pa ma yin te// stong pa nyid la cho 'phrul 'byung// sems nyid 'od kyi thig le las// 'ong 'phro 'dus nas hU~M du gsal// hU~M las 'khor lo b+h+ruM gyi sgras// rnam par dag pa yum gyi klong// skye ba med pa'i dbyings nyid las// thugs kyi byin rlabs chen po yis// ye shes lhun grub gzhal yas khang// phyi nang med par kun tu nang// gsar snying thod chen 'bar bas gtams// gru bzhi rin chen rgyu dang ldan// sgo bzhi gru chad bar khyams ldan// rta babs bzhi ngang rta ra na// dra ba dra phyed chun 'phyang sbrul// lha brgyad klu brgyad ka ba gdung// nyi zla rin chen gdan dang bro// gza' brgyad rgyu skar ldan pas klubs// rus sbal sbrul nag khyung gis mdzes// ban d+ha lcang lo kha bad can// ta la'i shing dang ro myags 'dam// dur khrod po'i gnas brgyad ldan// bde gshegs kun gyi rang bzhin gyi// yi ge hU~M gi byin rlabs las// lhun grub gzhal yas gsal ba'i dbus// ma mo gshin rje ded dpon gyis// dam tshig dran de gdan du bsnol// yi dwags ma he'i khri stengs na// gyad kyi 'jigs tshul brjid par gnas// sngags

kyi yi ge bcu bdun pos// nga yi gzugs su gyur par byos// ro langs khro ma mthing skya'i sku// tri shul ban dmar phyag na bsnams// skyem mo'i khro mo smug gcig ste// mi snying spyang mor 'dzin pa gnas// ye shes thugs kyi sa bon las// smugs nag khros pa'i gshin rje ste// 'jigs byed ya ma rA dza dang// nag mo khrag gi mig can ma// mngag pa las kyi pho nyar bsam// thod khang gshin rje bdud dang ni// srin po gnod sbyin khro bo la// lcags mkhar khram bdag bcu gnyis ldan// dur khrod 'bar ba'i gnas brgyad nas// brda dang gar bsgyur rdo rje gdang// sprugs pa'i glu len dung 'bud dang// sha za khrag skyems rkan brdabs dang// khro dang rgod dang dar nag g.yab 'dor dang// dur khrod ro la 'thub zhing za ba dang// 'khor lo gdengs dang gnam lcags 'phen// 'o dod 'bod cing khrag chen 'thung// 'dzum pa'i mdangs 'don rngam pa'i sgra chen sgrogs// lce spyang ling du kang ka mchu rings sogs// dpag med dur khrod 'bar ba'i rgyan dang ldan// dkyil 'khor bsam 'das rtog med rdzogs pa chen// mi rtog dbyings nas thugs rje chen po yis// 'gro drug thabs kyis 'dul phyir khro bo'i sku// dbu gsum phyag drug 'jigs shing rngam par bgrad// rtag chad 'dzin rtog mtha' las 'das pa'i sku// phyag rgya chen po sgrol ba'i lam du gsungs// 'jam dpal gshin rje gsang ba'i rgyud las/ sku'i dkyil 'khor mngon du phyung ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ drag po'i tshim rngam 'bar bas gdug pa 'dul ba'i phyir/ khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi gsung gi de kho na nyid gsang sngags kyi yi ge 'di dag gsungs so// bsnyen dang nye ba rgyun gyi sngags// drag po'i mtshon cha rno myur ldan// lha srin srog gi rtsa ba 'di// ma yengs ting 'dzin 'phro 'du yis// mi yur mi 'khyams bsam gtan gyis// lho yi phyogs su kha bltas te// ku sha'i stan la 'dug nas ni// gshin rje'i sku la blta zhing bsgom// myur ba ma yin bul ba min// de bzhin yi ge 'dres pa min// shin tu gsal zhing dag par smra// yid bzhin nor bu'i 'phreng ba ste// rnam pa yi ge ngo bo lha// rang bzhin stong pa nus pa me// ya man ta ka'i ngo bo nyid// oM a kro te ka ya man ta ka ha na ma tha b+hany+dza hU~M phaT/ 'phags ba'i nang nas 'jam dpal nyid// 'chi bdag gshin rje bshan rje bshan pa'i tshogs// rdo rje khrau mo khrag mig ma// nag mo ral pa 'bebs pa'i tshogs// bsnyen cing bsgrubs na gang yang 'grub// oM sa ma ya many+dzu shrI mu tra/ sa man ta ka pa tsa te ro ni hU~Mdza/ oM sa ma ya many+dzu shrI ya man ta ka ya ma rA dza/ ma ma e ka dza Ti dza dza/ traka ragi sha mu tra snying kha rag ma b+h+yo/ rag mo te kuM dza dza/ kha la kha

la ma hi b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ya ma lon tsin dan ma la b+h+yo dza/ snying khar rag srog la b+h+yo b+h+yo/ 'chi bdag gshin rje'i smod pa ste// mtshon cha'i ya gi dug gi ngar// ye shes lha dang las byed dang// srog gi rtsa ba'i 'di lta bu// oM ya man ta ka ya ma rA dza sa ho me ya/ ya me to ru Na yo to ya/ ya ta yo na ra yak+She ya/ yak+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya hU~M phaT/ oM oM ya ma rA dza sa to me b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu che ge mo hU~M phaT/ baM ri li li rbad nan/ oM nub dur nub dur/ che ge mo tshal pa tshal ba nan/ oM snying gshogs snying me kha la mu lo tsa thun nan/ oM sa ti ru ru gong bkra ra tsa nan/ che ge mo mA ra ya nan/ oM a kro te ka many+dzu shrI kak+Sho la rU pa sha ya nan/ baM rbad ru lu ru hU~M dza/ ru lu tshal pa yin/ sta sha ru ni nan che ge mo mA ra ya nan/ oM ya man ta keM ar+ya a tsa la k+ShaM/ oM ma dug tsa tsa/ tshal pa tshal pa rbad rbad/ ma dug k+ShaM/ ya man k+ShaM/ che ge mo srog rtsa mugs ti rbad/ tsa tsa ra dza rbad/ ma mo khrag la gshin rje khram/ dun ting rngubs/ srin po rus la chom chom tshal/ lhan lhan thob/ dgra bo khram ka khraM ri li li ni dza rbad/ oM muM ya/ oM mugs te subs/ che ge mo la cho cho/ bal hub bal hub/ bal yu bal yu/ snying mgo ma thun nan/ ma thun nan/ che ge mo nan/ khrag thun khong khreg la ya/ raka mo shen pa mA ra ya/ mgo 'phyangs ma dza dza/ dug mun bla rtsa la dza dza/ rtsa bo che la dun rmugs nang khrol smad la lnga rtsa ba thun baM/ thums ri li li rbad rbad/ gsang ba'i kha thun brnag pa'i so// khrag dang phur ba nyungs kar sngags// 'khor lo gcod pa'i sngags su 'gyur// sngags kyi grong khyer sgrel byas pa// spyi rgyugs dus mtha' brtul bar byed// gsang sngags drag po thun gyis so// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal gshin rje gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gsang ba sngags kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor la bstod pa 'di gsungs so// hU~M/ gtum chen dregs pa chen po thams cad 'joms pa'i lha// dbang byed bdud 'dul dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// khro rngam gdug par srid gsum thal bar rlog/ sgrol byed sku mchog ma mo 'bangs su 'khol// gtum chen rab 'bar gshin rje 'joms mdzad lha// 'jigs byed ya ma rA dza'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// nyi ma 'bum bas lhag pa'i 'od stong phyogs bcur 'gyed// gdug byed mtshon cha mang po bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// rab brjid gshin rje 'joms la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje'i sku la sku dbang rab brgyan cing// gcan gzan gdug pa'i lpags rlon na bzar gsol// sha za 'ug pa'i tshom bus dbu yi thod du bcings// khro bo'i rgyal po zhal gsum phyag drug hU~M sgra can// phaT kyis khams gsum stong mdzad zhabs drug gshin rje

'joms// brkyang bskum brjid pas gshin rje ya ba ti'i snying kha gnan/ ljags 'dril tshems kyi gseb nas thog phab bas// 'khor gyi ma mo rnams kyang bran du 'khol// tsham rngam khro bo'i rkan sgra brdabs pa yis// 'khor gyi ma mo rnams kyang 'dar cug bcug/ tshangs pa 'khor bcas rdul gyi thigs 'dzag cing// lha chen khyab 'jug mahA de ba gnon// phyag na ban d+ha rlon pa rab bsnams shing// dngos grub 'khrug cing klad khrag zhal du gsol// khyung dang 'ug pa lta bu'i khrag bsnams shing// dam las ldog pa rnams la gtong par mdzod/ e ka dza Ti gu ya ral gcig ma// mi pham khro gnyer g.yu yi ral gcig ma// ral pa sprugs pa'i skra gseb re re nas// khro chung zhal gsum phyag drug stong khams khengs par 'gyed// kun kyang mi bzad 'jigs byed lcags kyu can// lcags kyu btab pas dgra bo'i rtsa ba gcod// gtum khro 'jigs byed yab yum tshogs la bstod// ces bstod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag la/ mchod pa 'bul ba 'di dag gsungs so// mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// mthing nag kham pa ral pa gyen du 'khyil ba'i lha// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil ba yis// sum cu rtsa gsum lha rnams kun kyang 'dar spyug spyug/ spyan dgu sdang mig gyen du bzlog pa yis// phyogs bcu'i khro bo kun yang gan bub bsre// smin ma glog stong 'od du 'bar ba yis// sprul pa'i pho nyas srid gsum gang bar 'gongs// mche ba zla tshes dkar po gtsigs pa yis// dam nyams dgra bo'i srog rtsa gtsod par mdzad// zhal nas khro bo'i gad rgyangs bsgrags pa yis// khams gsum srid gsum 'gul zhing ldeg/ phyag drug mtshon cha mang pos dgra bgegs thal bar lhogs// thugs dam bskul gyis gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol// 'jigs byed ya ma rA dza'i thugs dam dgyes bskul ma// e ka dza Ti 'jigs byed dpal gyi yum// dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshur gshegs tshur gshegs ma gcig rdo rje lha mo dam tshig ma// sku stod g.yu yi dril bu 'bum gyis brgyan// sku smad stag lpags rlon pa 'bum gyi cha ga can// g.yu yi ral pas dur khrod khams kun khyab// 'jigs byed ya ma rA dza'i thugs dam bskang phyir gshegs su gsol// sha khrag dmar gyi mchod pa bsnams su gsol// bdud rtsi sman gyi mchod pa dang// rag+ta dmar gyi gtor ma 'bul// 'jam dpal gshin rje gsang ba'i rgyud las/ pho brang dkyil 'khor chen po la bstod pa dang mchod pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ las kyi ru tra bsgral ba'i phyir/ 'phrin las kyi rgyal po yi dgas 'khor lo nag

po gsad pa las kyi spu gri 'di gsungs so// thog mar shes bya blo sbyangs shing// dad dang dam tshig ldan pa yis// lta spyod gdeng ldan rnal 'byor gyis// dur khrod chen po rab 'jigs pa'i// gsar rnying mi ro spungs pa 'am// lho yi phyogs su kha bltas pa'i// brag ri nag po ha la'i mdog/ 'chi bdag pho mo sgrub pa'i gnas// sngon du bsod nams rdzogs pa yis// dur khrod sa la maN+Dal bya// rme ba'i khrag gis rab byugs la// byang chub sems dang rab ldan pas// mi smra mi yur mi 'khyam par// bzlas pa'i yi ge bcu bdun no// bye ba sngon du rdzogs par bya// khyad par gshin rje bsgrub pa'i dus// snang srid rak+ta'i gzhal yas su// dpal dang ya ma'i gtor ma dang// gshin rje pho mo'i dam rdzas bsham// snang sring ma mo 'du ba'i phyir// rak+ta dmar gyi arga dgram// sngags pa chas gos ldan pa yis// lha yi ting 'dzin gsal ba'i rten// bu don lho yi phyogs su dgram// ting 'dzin rnam gsum rim pas bsgom// ya man ta ka 'khor bcas bsgom// dbyings nas spyan drangs mchod pa dbul// de nas drag po'i sbyor ba ni// drag po'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i dus// dur khrod ras la sngags bstims te// las la sbyor ka'i bsnyen pa bya// ras la dug dang sme khrag byug/ srid gsum lto na yod rtags su// 'khor lo rim pa gsum du bskor// dbus su mu la'i yi ge ya// phyogs bzhir ma me ta k+She bri// phyi rim khang pa bcu gnyis su// me dbal yi ge bcu gnyis dgod// ya logs khang pa bcu drug la// sngags kyi rgyal po bcu pa bri// nag po 'jigs pa'i lto bar gzhug/ phyi rim smod pa nag po'i mtshon// sde brgyad dug gi spu gri dgod// rgya chen sa yi dkyil 'khor yang// rme khrag gsum gyis rab byugs la// thig bzhi btab ba'i le'u tshe dgu// phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis// thal chen gyis ni bri bar bya// dug dang mtshon cha'i yi ge dgod// yi dgas ro yi gos blangs la// bla sems chags shing nyams par byed// dmigs pa'i lus ni ci 'drar bri// rnam shes gnad kyis dgug pa'i phyir// dza yi bar du yi ge nri// bod par byed pa'i ming rus bri// rnam shes bkug la gzugs la bstim// gu gul sbyar ma'i dud pas bdug/ lha bskrad bya phyir zhabs mas bsdam// sngo dmar skud pas ske nas gdags// dur khrod khrag gi maN+Dal du// 'khor lo rtsang dmar kha la skyon// yi dwags gshin rje nag por bskyed// bdag nyid ting 'dzin ldan pa yis// sa gzhi gshags cing rgya mtsho dkrug/ las kyi gshin rje bkug la bstim// dngos ni 'chi bdag bdud chen yin// dbang du bsdus la dam rdzas sbyin/ zhes gsungs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ nyin bzhi

'khor lo bskor ba'i gsang sngags 'di dag gsungs so// a ma dza ra sa to me ya/ che ge mo zhig a mu ka pra ma ya hU~M phaT/ ya me to ru na yo da ya/ che ge mo zhig a mu kham mur tsa ya hU~M phaT/ yad yo ni ra yak+She ya che ge mo zhig a mu ka rak+ta tsa ra ya hU~M phaT/ yak+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya che ge mo zhig a mu kaM mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ nyin bzhig dgongs kyi kha skongs su// thun sngags nyin bzhir phyed la bzlas// spyi rgyugs sngags kyi phu sprugs kyang// stong stong bar du dril la drang// reg chod drag sngags dril ba yis// 'khor lo gcod pa'i grogs su 'gyur// mtshan mo rgyun 'dzab thun du dril// gal te grub par ma gyur ram// las kyi thus ka'i dus dag tu// sngags rnams bzlog cing ar la gtad// tshogs drug gzhom zhing lnga phung gcad// dug gsum shes pa ar la gtad// 'khor lo rdzogs dang gnan sngags bzlas// tshes gcig dag tu brtsis pa yi// nyi ma dmar thag chad pa la// shis pa'i sa 'am gdon yod sar// 'khor lo mnan pa'i cho ga bya// drag po'i 'khor lo las sbyar mthar// thun gyi kha gso rgyun ma gcad// dus mtha' myur du brtul bar byed// ces gsungs so// 'jam dpal gshin rje gsang ba'i rgyud las/ yi dgos 'khor lo nag po'i las bsten pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ las myur du bya ba'i phyir/ 'chi bdag thod pa nag po gsang ba'i kha thun 'di gsungs so// gdeng gsum ldan pa'i sngags pa yis// dur khrod gdug pa'i gnas phyin la// dur khrod sa la maN+Dal bya// rme ba'i khrag gis rab byugs la// dbus su 'bru ba khung brtseg cing bru// kha sgyer dug shing rtsang gis bskor// gtor ma gsum dang rak+ta dang// 'chi bdag pho mo'i dam rdzas bsag/ lho yi phyogs su kha bltas la// ting 'dzin gsum po rim pa yis// gshed bdag khro bo yab yum bskyed// yang dang yang du gsal bar bsgom// 'jam dbyangs rdo rje hU~M rings kyis// sku rgyan gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor la// bstod cing gsol gdab byin rlabs kyis// gdug pa'i dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i phyir// drag po sngags kyi tsham rngam brjod// gru gsum mthing nag dkyil 'khor nas// ya man+ta ka 'khor dang bcas// dbyings nas spyan 'dren dbyer med bstim// mchod cing bstod pa dag kyang bya// rgyun du gsang sngags dril la bzlas// lha rtags mngon du gyur pa'i tshe// dngos grub blang ba'i cho ga bya// de nas drag po'i las la 'jug/ rabs chad mon dang mu su ra// thod pa nag po de blangs la// gug rgyal chu dang dri yis gsang// ma nor thod pa gshags par bya// ltag pa'i phyogs na gnas pa'i bdud// 'chi bdag gdug pa seng ge mgo/ zhal bgrad mche ba gtsigs

pa ste// srid pa gsum po lto na 'chang// de yi gzugs brnyan legs brtags la// rims dang khrag tu sbyar ba yis// gshin rje'i zhal ni dbyung bar bya// dngos ni bye ba gung rings so// de yi snying khar yi ge ya// rdo sol nag pos bri bar bya// zhal nas kha thun g.yas bskor du// 'chi bdag mtha' ma 'khor bar bri// zhal gyi smod pa nag po yin// thod pa gong ma'i nang dag tu// ro langs lto bar mu khyud gsum// glong dgu bcu gnyis lcags khang du// drag po'i yi ge bcu bdun dgod// rag sha nag po 'jigs byed ma// dngos ni sr-in mo nag mo ste// dus mtha' brtul byed ma ru gsungs// de nas 'khor lo kha sbyar te// 'brub gnas bzhi ru ling kha bri// thod pa nag po'i rtsang la bskyon// gsang ba'i drag sngags rgyun du drang// zla ba nag po tha chung la// drag po thun gyi 'khor lo bskor// mtshan mo thun gyis brab par bya// khram la gdab dang thun gyis gsang// nyin mtshan sngags ni ma nor bar// bla rkun sngags kyis bla 'gugs te// spyi rgyugs sngags kyis dus mtha' brtul// 'khor lo nag po mA ra ya// gsang ba'i las su 'di shes bya// ya ma me ta k+She/ ni ra tsa sa/ to ru na yo ni ra ya dza/ dgra bo mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ ya ma k+She ta me/ dza ra ni ra/ ya ra ni yo/ na ru to sa/ che ge mo a mu kaM ma ra ya hU~M phaT/ ya ma me ta k+She/ ni ra ya tsa/ ni ra sa to/ ru na yo dza/ che ge mo a mu kaM mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ ya ma k+She ta me/ na ru to sa/ dza ra ni ya/ ri ni yo dza/ che ge mo a mu kaM ma ra ya hU~M phaT/ nyin gyi 'khor lo de ltar bskor// dug shing khram byang dag la yang// khram sngags bris la khram la gdab// mtshan mo rgyun 'dzab khob phub la// kha thun sngags kyis brab par bya// sngags kyi brgya bar stong bar du// khrag thun dbab pa'i las kyang bya// nyung kar sngags kyis bla dgug cing// 'chi bdag bshan pa'i dmag dpung dbab// gal te las de ma grub na// 'khor lo dkrug cing shi sa bstan// 'chi bdag ya ma rA dza dang// bdud kyi lcam mo rtag tu rbad// spyi rgyugs sngags kyi char phab la// 'khor lo thod pa re bas dril// shis pa'i sa 'am klu gnas mnan// thun gyi kha gso rgyun du bya// de ltar byas na lha yang 'chi// 'jam dpal gshin rje gsang ba'i rgyud las/ thod pa nag po 'chi bdag kha thun gyi le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung chen po des/ 'phrin las kyi rgyal po gshed chen po ma traM gsang ba'i las rim 'di dag gsungs so// lha yi rnal 'byor ldan pa yis// dpa' brtul can gyi sngags pa des// dur khrod gdug pa'i gnas phyin la// dpa' bo gri ru shi ba yis// zhing chen pags pa rab bshus la// gsang ba sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor yang// dug khrag rdo

sol sbyar ba yis// mi rkang rgyus pa skra shad pa ri ldan pas 'khor lo bri bar bya// bcu gnyis bar du a mu kaM/ mkhas pa dag gis bri bar bya// 'chi bdag gshin rja nag po yi// zhal phyag ldan pas shes par bya// rabs chad nag po'i thod par gzhug/ lho yi phyogs su phyag rgya'i rten// mig gi rten du mngon par dgram// zhing lpags gzhi 'am yan lag la// smu nag ser nag dmar nag ljang// zhing dbyug 'khor lo bsnams pa yis// gshed bdag khro bo 'jigs pa bzhi// tshon rtsi spyin med dam ldan pas// mkhas pas bris la phyogs bzhir dgram// mi rtogs dbyings nas thugs rje'i sku// bskyed de dbyings nas spyan drang mchod// gnyis su med pa'i yang snying la// mi smra rgyun gyi bsam gtan bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma traM nag po gsang sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor 'di gsungs so// ya ma rA dza sa to me ya/ nag po rag sha che ge mo baM ril rbad ya/ ya me to ru na yo ta ya/ nag po raka sha che ge mo snying baM ril rbad ya/ ya ta yo ni ra yak+She ya/ ar+ya che ge mo rbad ya/ yak+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya/ raka sha che ge mo thum ril rbad ya/ sngags dang 'khor lo'i bar dag tu// bod par byed pa'i ming rnams gzhug/ nyin bzhi'i 'khor lo'i sngags su gsungs// mtshan mo'i srog sngags ma bzhi yis// gsang ba'i thun gyis brab par bya// re ma ti dang snying 'phrog ma// dza Ti ma dang raka sha ma// gsang ba'i yang snying 'di lta ste// oM ra ma ti rung trag kha rag mo snying kha rag trag ra kasha/ dam nyams che ge mo srin mo ru b+h+yo/ oM tsa du kha sha ka snying la rbad/ tsa du mA ra ya che ge mo lce ldibs/ raka sha tshal pa la pra ma ya/ oM dza ti ka ma ru raka sha ga ta che ge mo traM traM srin mo kha la rbad/ oM rag mo ru ru tsa pa la trag trag mo kro d+hI shwa ri snying la rbad ya/ gsang ba rag sha nag po ste// ma traM nag po gsad pa'i mtshon// nyungs kar gsang ba bla dgug cing// khram la gdab dang khrag thun dbab// gshed bzhi khram bdag bskul ba dang// spyi rgyugs las kun rdzogs par bya// dgongs dang tho rangs dus dag tu// rmad du byung ba'i gtor ma gtang// mtshan mo'i dus su yang snying dang// srin mo bzhi yi smod pas gdab// thun dbab srog phur sngags kyis brab// shis pa'i sa ru mkhas pas mnan// gal te las de g.yel ba na// 'khrul byed ro langs dril ba'i sngags// mtshan mo bzhi la bzlas pa bya// las 'jug 'khor los bzlog cing gzir// 'khrug pa'i gsang sngags 'di dag bzlas// ya ma rA dza snying ro shan/ sa tome ya krod+hI shwa ri/ ya mo to ru tsit+ta ro la shan ting/ na yo ta ya sa ma ya dza/ ya ta yo ni ro tsa rmugs/ ra yak+She ya sa ma ya dza/ yak+She ya tsa snying khrag chod/ ni ra ma ya srog srog mA ra ya phaT/ snying rtsa dgra bo

mA ra ya/ brnag ba'i rgyal po gsang ba ste// ro langs rno myur ldan pa 'di// 'jig rten mgon gyis gsang bar gdams// 'jam dpal gshin rje gsang ba'i rgyud las/ rag sha nag po ma traM bsgral ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen pa des// 'phrin las kyi brnag pa srog bdag g.yang gzhi la sgrub pa'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// dur khrod bdag po'i gnas dag tu// bdud bcad sa la maN+Dal bya// ra ro khrag gis chag chag gdab// dbus su gru gsum rgya bcad de// ni rang shu dang dug gis bri// 'khrul mig bcu bdun gsang sngags dgod// zag pa zad pa'i rdzas btus la// ra khrag sbyar te shog shog la// dmigs ba ci 'dra'i ling ga bri// gnang dang mtshon cha'i yi ge dgod// pho nya gtang zhing bla tshe dgug/ rnam shes bkug la gzugs la bstim// lha lnga bskrad phyir rdzas rgod sreg/ sngon dmar thag pas rab btags la// lho phyogs gshin rje nyid la gdags// rog po lte dkar dmigs pa'i rten// khrag byang bcu gsum mar la gdags// ting 'dzin gsum las gshed po bskyed// mchod dang bstod pa rdzogs pa dang// drag sngags 'khor lo bskor bar bya// srod dang tho rangs dgongs kha rnams// 'phrin las bcol ba'i las kyang bya// nyi ma ri la babs pa'i tshe// nyi ma bzhi pa'i 'khor lo bskor// rdzogs dang ra bsgral g.yang gzhi bshu// dbus su e la'i yi ge ni// phyi rol 'khrul 'khor rdzogs bris la// snying dang ling kha g.yang gzhir bshu// dmar nag drag sngags dril ba bzlas// rdzogs dang 'khor lo mnan pa bya// thun gyi khaM gso shes par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las gsang sngags 'di dag gsungs so// ya ma rA dza sa to me ya/ ya me do ru na yo da ya/ ya ta yo ni ra yak+She ya/ yak+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya/ che ge mo pra ma ya hU~M phaT/ raka ta tsa ra ya/ mu ra tsa ya mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ rnal ma rnal to gshod la rngam gsol la mer mer/ spris la chum/ thu pis thu pis/ lcags kyi dgra/ dgra bo mA ra ya nri rbad/ nyin mtshan sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor dbye// nyin ni so sor gtor ba ste// mtshan mo dril lA mA ra ya// rnal ma rnal te'i sngags kyis gdab// bla dgug myos pa'i khrag gis bran// gshin rje nag pa'i khram la gdab// gsang ba'i 'khor lo rdzogs pa dang// g.yang gzhi ling ga kun dril te// lam po che 'am dur khrod khyim// stag gi kha 'am klu gnas su// mkhas pas gtad ba'i rim pa bya// rdzogs dang ra khrag dug rdzas bsre// kha thun sngags kyis kha gsos la// brnag pa'i phyogs su 'phang bar bya// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po yis// bkra shes tshe yi cho ga bya// las kyi rnam smin sbyang ba'i

phyir// bskang gso'i cho ga rgya cher bya// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal gshin rje gsang ba'i rgyud las/ srog bdag g.yang gzhi la rten te sgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal bo yis/ ro langs nag mo gsang ba'i 'khrul 'khor 'di dag gsungs so// las rnams kun gyis ma grub na// 'khrug byed dus mtha' brtul byed ma'i// 'khor lo thun bsdebs brnag pa'i las// las kyi thus kar ro langs bsgrub// dur khrod 'jigs pa'i gnas dag tu// dur khrod sa la maN+Dal bya// khrag gis byug la dam rdzas dgod// dur khrod ro yi gos blangs la// ni rang su yis mdog bton la// sme khrag dug sbyar gnag tsha yis// gshin rje'i lto bar 'khor lo bris// mu khyud rim pa gsum pa yis// dngos su lcags mkhar gling dgu bya// phyi rim lcags khang bcu drug tu// tha ma re cha drug dang ldan// de la gnas pa'i rim pa ni// dbus su mu la'i yi ge ste// mtshon bya'i yi ge 'bru brgyad dgod// bcu drug mkha' 'gro rtsa ba'i sngags// khang pa drug tu thun drug bri// maN+Dal dbus su rtsang la bskyon// rabs chad mon gyi thod pa ru// snying khrag dug sbyar thun yang sbyar// 'khor lo yig 'bru lhar bskyed la// mchod dang 'phrin las dag kyang bcol// nyi shu bdun nas gnam stong du// nyi ma bzhi pa'i 'khor lo bskor// dmod pa drag po dmo ba dang// sngags kyi phu sprugs dag kyang bya// mtshan mo dril dang thun drug sngags// mtshon cha bsnol ma brgya phrag gdeg/ khrag la gdab cing khrag thun dbab// 'khor lo thod pa re bas dril// bi ro tsan gyi khu ba 'am// klu yi pho brang yod sar mnan// gal te grub par ma gyur cing// ro langs las la g.yel ba na// 'khor lo bzlog cing dkrug par bya// de ltar byas na lha yang 'chi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ro langs nag mo gsang ba'i sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor 'di dag gsungs so// oM sa ma ya many+dzu shrI ya ma rA dza/ ma ma e ka Ti dza dza/ traka rag sha ma tra sting kha rag ma b+h+yo/ srog la rbad/ nyi ya ya lon tsin dan ma ma b+h+yo/ snying kha rag srog la b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ya dum sham dun man tsit+ta rak+ta/ raM thun gzer snying/ rtsa ro myags ud/ che ge mo a mu ka/ srog la thum shag mA ra ya rbad/ nyin mtshan sngags ni dril gtor sdeb// ma ma tsit+ta kha la rak+Sha dun b+h+yo/ ma ma dum bu dum bu tshal pa tshal pa/ ha na ha na thun b+h+yo/ ma ma hur yaM ling rbad thun b+h+yo/ ma ma brag brag ni mi ni li thun b+h+yo/ ma ma thum thuM rub rub/ tsit+ta yaM shaka thun b+h+yo/ ma ma kha la rak+mo tsa la breng shag thun b+h+yo/ yang ud ro myags tsa/ yang snying gzer thun ri/ ya ta rak+ta tsi/ ya man dum shan dum/ a mu ka srog thum shag mA ra ya rbad/ ya

ma me te ma b+h+yo ru lu rbad/ ro langs las la g.yel ba na// bzlog cing dkrug ba'i gsang sngags te// ya ba sha yi las su gsungs// 'jam dpal gshin rje gsang ba'i rgyud las/ ro langs gsang ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos srog tig phur zor nag po zhes bya ba/ mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i las 'di gsungs so// gsung dang mthun pa'i gnas dag tu// maN+Dal legs par bshams nas kyang// pho brang gsang ba'i zhal phyung la// drag po'i zor kyang rdzogs par bya// mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i dam rdzas bsag/ sngags pa chas gos nag po gon// ya man+ta kar gsal byas la// gnyis su med pa'i yang snying bzlas// phur gdab zor 'phang mnan pa bya// spyug pa'i glu blang ma mo bod// rdza rnga brdung ste gshin rje rbad// rak+ta dmar gyi arga sbreng// bla rtags lon dang phur bus gdab// grub rtags byung nas zor yang 'phang// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las/ gnyis su med pa'i yang snying khyad par du bzlas pa 'di dag gsungs so// oM sa ma ya many+dzu shrI ya man+ta ka ya mA rA dza/ ma ma e ka dza Ti dza dza/ rak+mo te kun dza dza/ kha la ma hi b+ho b+h+yo/ snying kha rag che ge mo srog la b+h+yo b+h+yo/ nag mo baM ri li li/ nag mo khrag la ri li li/ nag mo snying la ri li li/ nag mo srog la ri li li/ nag mo srog la cho cho/ nag mo baM ri li li/ dza dza re ma ti pa sha tsa pa la dza dza/ nag mo dgra bo'i snying la thum ril rbad/ nag mo dgra bo'i rtsa la baM ril rbad/ nag mo dgra bo'i srog la hur thums rbad/ nag mo dgra bo'i khrag la thum ril rbad/ pa tsa pa tsa mA rA ya thum ril rbad/ nag mo snying la thuM ril rbad/ nag mo srog la baM ril rbad/ nag mo sha la staM pa ril rbad/ nag mo rtsa la khug ril rbad/ nag mo dbugs la hur thums mA ra ya rbad/ srog phur gsang ba'i yang snying ste// gsang ba'i brnag par yang dag bshad// 'jam dpal gshin rje gsang ba'i rgyud las/ mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ yogs su bskor ba'i 'khor rnams la gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gtad do// nyon cig 'khor du 'dus ba'i tshogs// e ma yang gsang rnal 'byor che// dbyings dang ye shes rol ba'i don// nye bar gyur pa gsang ba'i rgyud// 'khor lo thun bsdebs bsgral ba'i lung// brnag pa'i rgyal po gsang ba'i bcud// gnas dang srid pa sprul pa gcod// gnas pa'i 'khor lo sems la 'dus// sems las sems byung chos kyi sku// gsum gnyis lnga dang gnyis su yang// gnyis med gnyis su med par rdzogs// sprul pa'i 'khor la rkang la 'dus// gom pa bgrod pas 'gro drug gnas// srid

pa'i 'khor lo lus la te// lus med lus te lus kyi mchog/ gcod pa'i 'phrin las dngos nyid de// stong phrag bdun dang brgya phrag brgyad// ye shes sgrol ba'i rtags kyis sgrol// 'phrin las du mar shar ba'o// gnang dgu gzer chen rgyu dang ni// bcu gnyis tshul dang 'gros lugs brgyad// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang// 'od zer brgyad kyis yang dag rdzogs// de dag dngos grub nye ba'i mthar// dus nyid rang 'byung rtsol ba la// bskul ba rnam bzhi sbyor ba gsum// bgrod stobs phyag rgya ldan pas brtsam// tsakra sUr+ya ya ma kar// mahA gu h+ya man+t+ra ste// phyi nang 'khor lo gsang bar 'dus// rgyu rkyen dgra las bca' ba'i thabs// yul la phyin nang gsang ba gsum// dbang po dod pa'i ngo bo lus// rgyu bcas sgra las lnga yi mtshon// de bzhin gsang sngags 'byung ba'i rgyu// ngo bo sgra dang drang dang dkrug/ las dang gdags pa mtha' ru sbyar// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du bshad// de ltar bu rgya gsum dang ldan// sgra dang ngo bo gnas dang las// rgyu ba'i tshul des nyi ma bshad// gshin rje gsum lus thugs kyi bdag/ rang gi ngo bo rgyud dang sgra// gnas dang las de gsod pa'i tshul// de yis gshin rje'i grong khyer du// 'gro ba bkug nas khrid cing 'chang// srid gsum khyams khang gshin rje'i gnas// byin rlabs 'byung phyir ting 'dzin gtsor// mA ra ya yi brda sgras 'joms// de dag gshin rje nag po yis// 'khor lo thun bsdebs bsgral ba'i las// brnag pa'i rgyal po gsang ba'i don// 'khor gyi khro bo dregs pa dang// lha dang mkha' 'gro rnams la gtad// dam tshig srung dang thugs brtse'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rang ngo// 'jam dpal gshin rje gsang ba'i rgyud las/ rgyud gtad cing rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// 'jam dpal rin po che gsang ba'i rgyud rdzogs so//// bal po'i rgyal po b+ha su d+h+wa ra dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba snubs ban sangs rgyas rin po ches/ bal yul b+ha ra sa'i brag phug tu bsgyur ba'o//// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI kro d+ha/ rat+na gu ya tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal khro bo rin chen gsang ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das dpal gshin rje gshed po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas/ khyab bdal chen po'i klong/ rgya yongs su ma chad pa/ dur khrod chen po rab tu 'jigs pa/ gtum pa'i tshal bam ro spungs zhing brtsig pa/ mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal khro mchog yan+ta ka/ za byed kyi yum chen mo pe ta li dang 'khril te/

gnyis su med pa mnyam pa chen po'i ngang las/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bcud bsdus nas/ g.yo ba med pa'i ngang la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus na nyid las mi g.yos ba'i sprul pa rdo rje 'jigs byed dang/ dus gsum gcig pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ sa dang lam la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ gdug pa 'dul ba'i khro rgyal dregs pa can rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// 'di ltar ye shes kyi gshed bzhi dang/ khros pa'i yum bzhi dang/ thar byed kyi khro bo brgyad dang/ khram bdag chen mo bcu gnyis dang/ shan pa chen mo bcu gnyis dang/ mdangs len khro mo brgyad dang/ za byed kyi tshogs dang/ za byed kyi tshogs dang/ 'joms byed kyi tshogs dang/ ma gdon gyi tshogs dang/ gsod byed kyi tshogs dang/ khram thogs 'thoms pa bdud kyi tshogs dang/ brtsis byed kyi gri thogs ging gi tshogs dang/ khrag skyug zor thogs ma mo'i tshogs dang/ sha za srin po dang srin mo la sogs te/ dregs pa can thams cad dang thabs gcig bzhugs so// de'i tshe 'khor de dag gi nang nas/ thugs kyi sprul pa 'jigs byed chen po bzhengs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// ye nas ma skyes chos sku dag pa yi/ mi rtog mnyam pa'i ngang la ma g.yos kyang/ gdug pa 'dul phyir rdzogs pa'i skur bzhengs la// thugs rje drag pos 'gro ba'i don mdzod cig/ ces gsol bas// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyam pa chen po'i ngang las rol pa chen po'i sku// dregs pa can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa bzhengs te/ gdug pa 'dul bar byed pa dpa' brtul 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g.yos par gyur te/ rab tu 'gul zhing ldig go/ 'khor du gtogs shing 'dus pa rnams kyang brgyal te// rab tu gan te 'gyel par gyur to// de nas thugs kyi sprul ba ya ma ra dzas gsol pa/ kye ma sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bo rdo rje 'chang/ mnyam pa'i ngang las 'jigs pa'i skur khros te// dpa' brtul 'bar byed bstan pa ngo mtshar che// 'jig rten khams kun 'ur 'ur chem chem g.yos// 'khor du gtogs pa rab tu gan te 'gyel// 'khor rnams so so'i srog dang ldan par mdzod// ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad ci yang ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang la bzhugs so// de ma thag tu 'khor thams cad brgyal ba sangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la rang rtags srog gi snying po rnams dril te phul lo// kye ho/ 'phags pa'i rgyal po 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// rab tu khros pa'i sems can dran nyams pa// rdzu

'phrul rmad du byung ba ngo mtshar che// bdag cag 'khor dang bcas yi// rnam shes srog gi snying po dril ba'i mchog/ bstan pa bsrung phyir mdongs gsol dbul// dkyil 'khor chen po'i bsrungs ma bgyid// ces gsol to// srog gi snying po rnams mdongs gsol du phul lo// de nas yang thugs kyi sprul pa 'jigs byed ya ma ra dzas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma 'jigs chen chen po lags// gtum rngam 'khrug ba'i nga ro yis// 'khor gyi dregs pa dbang bsdus nas// 'jam dbyangs khro bor zhugs pa nyid// gshed bdag dpa' bo'i sgrub pa dang// 'khor gyi shan pa bkol ba yi// las kyi rim pa bshad par mdzod// ces gsol to// de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'gro ba yongs su bstan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// mi rtog mnyam pa chen po las// brtan ba'i snying po nges par bshad// byin rlabs ldan pa gsang ba'i bcud// rnal 'byor chen po rtsa ba'i don// bstan pa rin chen rgyal lam gcig/ thabs dang shes rab snying po'i don// nye bar gyur ba gsang ba'i bka'// dngos grub chen po nye ba'i mchog/ lus gcig yan lag bzhi dang ldan// mtha' sdud kha so las kyi so rnal dang// lto dkrugs bzlog pa'i phyi dang nang// gsang ba'i las kyi gshin rje'i lto ba dkrugs// yan lag nye ba shan pa'i so// gsang sngags don gyi snying po 'di// rigs ldan nye ba'i sras kyis gzung// bgrod pa gsum gyi bcud blangs te// yun du mi gtong rnal 'byor can// nyid kyi lta spyod gsang ba ste// bka' yi byin brlabs yun du bde// thabs kyi 'gro ba'i lam du yang// smod pa rgyal po lam gyi mchog/ zhe sdang gtum khro ngang tshul can// nye bar gyur ba'i lam du bshad// ces gsungs so// mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang la snyoms par zhugs so// 'jam dpal khro bo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos/ nyid kyi dkyil 'khor chen po yong su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad mnyam chen po de kho na nyid spros pa med pa'i dbyings su snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad ces ched du gsungs so// rtog med spros bral chos kyi dbyings// dmigs med mkha' mnyam byang chub sems// dngos dang mtshan ma mi dmigs pas// chos nyid ngang du dbyer med mnyam// zhes gsungs pas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin spros pa dang bral ba la/ yum gyi spros te kho na nyid du gyur te/ de nas yang thugs rje chen po'i shugs kyis/ chos nyid stong pa chen po'i don las/ ched du 'di skad gsungs so// chu zla'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin du// sgyu ma'i

sems nyid de dang 'dra// mkha' la 'ja' tshon snang ba yang// nam mkha'i ngang duro gcig mnyam/ zhes ched du glengs kyang/ stong pa nyid kyi ngang las/ steng 'og mtshams thams cad du ye shes kyi 'od zer mang po 'phros so// brdal lo// yongs su khyab par gyur to// de'i dus su ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad yongs su gsal bar byas so// de nas yang dregs pa can thams cad 'dul zhing/ dkyil 'khor chen po lhun gyis grub par bya ba'i phyir/ ched du brjod pa 'di gsungs so// yod de yod pa ma yin te// gzugs dang kha dog yul las 'das// med de med pa ma yin te// stong ba nyid las cho 'phrul 'byung// sems nyid 'od kyi thig le las// 'od 'phros 'dus nas hU~M du gsal// zhes ched du glengs pas/ sems kyi rang bzhin hU~M mthing nag 'od zer 'phro ba gcig tu gyur to// de'i tshe 'do zer bye ba phrag mang po bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag yongs su 'dus te thugs kyi rang bzhin las/ tsak+k+ra bruM zhes bya'i sgra 'di skad ces gsungs so// rnam par dag pa yum gyi klong// skye ba med pa'i dbyings nyid nas// thugs rje byin rlabs chen po yin// ye shes lhun grub gzhal yas khang// phyi dang nang med kun tu snang// gsar rnying thod chen 'bar bas gtam// gru bzhi rin chen rgyu dang ldan// sgo bzhi gru chad bar khyams bzhi// ta babs bzhi dang ta ra dang// dra ba dra phyed chun 'phyang sbrul// lha brgyad klu brgyad ka ba gdung// nyi zla rin chen gdan dang zi// gza' dang rgyu skar ldan pas klubs// rus sbal sbrul dang khyung gis mdzes// b+haD+h+ra ba khyang gas mdzes// b+haD+h+ra lcang lo'i kha bad can// rta la'i shing dang ro rnyag gling// dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad ldan// gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba la// zla gam dmar po dbang gi tshul// thod mkhar bzhi dang ldan pa la// lcags mkhar gling chen bzhi gsum ldan// 'bar ba khrag gi bar khyams la// sgo bzhi mu khyud dur khrod brgyad// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub// bde gshegs thugs kyi rang bzhin gyis// lhun grub dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i dbus// ma mo gshin rje'i ded dpon gyis// dam tshig dran te gdan du bsnol// dri za gshin rje'-i klu bdag dang// gnod sbyin grag pa bsnol ba yi// nyi zla 'bar ba ro yi gdan// yi dgas ma he'i khri steng na// gyad kyi brjid tshul 'jigs par gnas// sngags kyi yi ge bcu bdun po// nga'i gzugs su gyur par bya'o// sbyor sgrol khro bo 'jigs byed tshogs// smug nag ser nag dmar nag dang// ljang nag 'jigs pa'i tshogs dang bcas// ye shes thugs kyi sa bon las// 'jigs byed ya ma ra dza dang// nag mo khrag gi dmig can dang// sngags pa las kyi pho nya bcas// thod

mkhar gshin rje bdud dang ni// srin po gnod sbyin khro bo las// lcags mkhar khram bdag bzhi gsum ldan// zhing dbyug dgra sta ral gri dang// sdigs mdzub mdung dang thod rlon dang// tri shul b+han+d+ha dmar bkang dang// tsit+ta spyang mo khra thabs tshul// ral gri zhags pa me dpung 'bar// 'gugs byed snying khrag stobs pa dang// dbyug pa 'khor lo la sogs pas// mtshon cha me lce 'bar ba 'khrigs// glang chen ko rlon stag sham sprul// thod pa tshar gsum nyi zla dang// khrag zhag tshom bu 'bar ba yi// ye shes khro bo 'jigs pa'i sku// de mthong tsam na khro bo kun// lag cha shor nas gan cing bug/ hU~M dang phaT dang ha la dang// b+h+yo dang a ra li la sogs// khro bo rngam pa'i sgra dang ldan// dur khrod 'bar ba'i bar khyams nas// nag mo ral pa 'bebs pa'i tshogs// rak+ta'i rgya mtshor 'khrug cing skam// dur khrod 'bar ba'i gnas brgyad nas// brda dang gar gyur rdo rje gdeng// spyugs pa'i glu len rkang dung 'bud// sha za khrag 'thung rkan rdeb dang// khro rgod dar nag g.yab dor dang// dur khrod ro la 'thung zhing za ba dang// 'khor lo gdeng dang gnam lcags 'phan// 'o dod 'bod cing khrag chen 'thung// 'dzum pa'i gdangs 'don rngam pa'i nga ro sgrogs// lce lcang li rngu rkang ka mchu rings 'tshogs// dpag med dur khrod 'bar ba'i rgyan dang ldan// dkyil 'khor dur khrod lhun grub rdzogs pa che ba ho// mi rtog dbyings las thugs rje chen po yin// 'gro drug thabs kyis 'dul phyir khro bo'i sku// dbu gsum phyag drug 'jigs shing rngam par bgrad// rtag chad 'dzin rtog mtha' las 'das pa'i sku// rang 'byung lhun grub gshin rje gshed po ste// phyag rgya chen po grol ba'i lam du gsungs// zhes gsungs so// dkyil 'khor chen po yongs su rdzogs shing gsal bar gyur to// 'jam dpal khro bo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor chen po yongs su rdzogs pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang po des/ 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po dag la/ mchod pa mnyes par bya ba'i chen du/ 'bar byed 'jigs ba'i gtum drag can rnams spyan drangs pa'i ched du gsungs// rang bzhin dkyil 'khoralhun grub ni// rang bzhin ngo bo thugs rje'i lha// ma lus 'dus ba'i bdag nyid che// rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la// bar byed dkyil 'khor spyan 'dren mchod// mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// mthing nag 'bar ba ral pa 'khyil ba'i lha// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil ba yis// sum cu rtsa gsum lha rnams kun kyang 'dar// spyan mig sdang dgu gyen du zlog pa yis// phyogs bcu'i khro bo kun kyang gan bug

sreg/ smin ma glog stong 'od du 'bar ba yis// sprul pa'i pho nya mang pos srid gsum 'gengs// mche ba zla tshes dkar po gtsigs pa yis// dam nyams dgra bo'i srog rtsa gcod mdzad pa'i// zhal nas khro bo'i gad rgyangs sgrog pa yis// khams gsum srid pa ma lus 'gul zhing 'degs// phyag drug mtshon cha dgra bgegs thal bar klog/ thugs dam bskul gyis gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol// 'jigs byed ya ma ra dza'i thugs dam dges bskul ma// a ka tsa ti 'jigs byed dpal gyi yum// dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshur gshegs tshur gshegs ma cig lha mo rdo rje dam tshig can// sku stod g.yu yi dril bu 'bum gyis brgyan// sku smad stag lpags rlon pa 'bum gyis chag chag can// g.yu yi ral pas dur khrod khams kun khyab// 'jigs byed ya ma ra dza'i thugs dam bskang phyir gshegs su gsol// dgra bgegs rtsa ba drung nas 'byin cing gshegs su gsol// oM A kro te ka man+ta ka 'dzuHshri ka la ru pa k+Sha ya nan/ baM rbad ru lu hU~M dza/ ru lu ru lu tshal pa ya ni te sha ru ni nan/ che ge mo ma ra ya nan/ ces gsungs par gyur to// de'i tshe phyogs dus bdag nyid chen mo'i sku// dpal 'bar gshin rje gshed pa'i tshogs/ ma lus lus pa med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis dbyings las/ 'jigs pa'i sku khros te/ bdud kyi tshogs thams cad 'joms par gyur to// de nas yang 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag la mchod pas mnyes pa'i 'phrin yongs su bskang ste// mchod pa yongs su mnyes par 'bul ba zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// mkha' gting dbus mtha' yum gyi klong// dbyings las ye shes mchod pa'i rdzas// snang srid sku gsung thugs kyi rgyan// gnyis su med pa'i don gyis ni// blang dor tha dad spang ste dbul// 'bar chen dkyil 'khor mnyes gyur cig/ thugs kyi rgyan// gnyis su med pa'i don gyis ni// blang dor tha dad spang ste dbul// 'bar chen dkyil 'khor mnyes gyur cig/ ar+g+haM d+hU pa mar me dri// me tog zhal zas sgra snyan rnams// bza' dang bca' btung dang bgo/ longs spyod lngar ldan thams cad kyis// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor thim par dgyes// dug lnga bdud rtsi rab sbyar ba'i// ye shes lnga rdzogs mchod pa'i rdzas// gtum rngam 'khrugs ba'i tshogs la dbul// 'bar byed dkyil 'khor khros pa yis// gnyis su med pas gdug pa bsgral// 'khril byed mchod pa mnyam sbyor ba'i// lha dang lha mo ji snyed pa// dkyil 'khor nyid la rdzogs par thim// zhes gsungs so// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po rnams// rab tu mnyes pa thim par 'gyur te// 'jam dpal khro bo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor mchod pas mnyes

par bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rin po che 'phreng ba rab tu 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ skyob pa bla na med pa gsang sngags kyi de kho na sku gsung thugs rdo rje las thon te/ oM sa ma ya many+dzu shri mu tra/ ya man ta ka/ pan tsa te re ni hU~M dzA/ oM sa ma yA/ many+dzu shri/ ya man ta ka ya ma rA dza/ ma ma e ka dza ti dza dza/ trag rag sha mu tra/ snying kha rag ma b+h+yo/ rag mo te kum dza dzA/ kha la ma ti b+h+yo b+h+yo/ yA yA/ lon tsin dan ma la b+h+yo/ dza dzA snying kha rag/ srog la b+h+yo b+h+yo/ zhes gsungs so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags kyi 'phreng ba 'di dag rab tu bsgrags ma thag tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang g.yos te/ 'ur rab tu 'ur/ kun tu rab tu ldeg go/ 'thor ro// rab tu 'thor ro// de'i tshe 'khor du 'dus pa rnams kyang rab tu byed de/ la la ni snying 'gas pa sems so// la la ni snying 'byung ba snyam sems so// la la ni rab tu 'gyel ba snyam sems so// de bzhin du 'ub pa dang/ gan ba dang/ rgod pa dang/ khro ba dang/ glu len gar byed pa la sogs te/ 'khor na 'dus pa rnams dang/ 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi srog thams cad 'phrog par 'gyur ro// de nas gdug byed kyi gshin rje la sogs pa rnams kyis rang rang gi srog gi snying po rnams yongs su sgrag par gyur pa ni/ yang 'di skad ces gsungs so// ya ma me da k+She rA dzA sa twa ra na yo ni/ ru na yo ni/ ra ya tsa ni/ ya ma ra dza sa to me ya/ ya me to ru Na ya ta/ yo ni ra yak+She ya/ yak+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya/ oM sa ma ya many+dzu shrI ya ma rA dza/ trag rak+Sha ma hi dun b+h+yo/ ma hA yag sha tig sna nag mo dun b+h+yo/ trag rag sha mu tra snying kha rag mo b+h+yo/ rag mo te kuM dza dza/ kha la ma hi b+h+yo b+h+yo/ snying kha rag phrom hing ma dun rag mo/ shan pa ma ra ya/ thun ba sa ma ya dza dza/ ya ma du/ snying du/ khrag du/ prom sring srog khug/ sa ma ya che ge mo zhig/ a mu ki bra ma ya hU~M phaT/ che ge mo zhig/ a mu khaM rag ta tsa ra ya hU~M phaT/ che ge mo zhig/ a mu khaM mur tsa ya hU~M phaT/ che ge mo zhig a mug kham ma ra ya hU~M phaT/ ni ma ra ya/ ma ra du ya ma snying/ ya ma khrag/ tshal ba baM ril/ daM pa duM bu hU~M phaT dza/ oM ya ma ra dza sa do me b+h+yo ru lu ru lu che ge mo hU~M phaT/ baM ril li li rbad nan/ oM dub nur dub nur che ge mo tshal pa tshal pa nan/ oM snying ba sho/ snying me kha la/ mu lu tsa thun nan/ oM swa sti/ ngu ru gong ka rA dza nan/ che ge mo ma ra ya nan/ ces gsungs par gyur to// dkyil 'khor chen po yongs su rdzogs par gyur te/ 'jam dpal khro bo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ sngags kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po yis/ dngos grub nye bar bsgrub pa zhes bya ba

'di thugs rdo rje las thon to// thog mar dam tshig ldan pa yis// stobs ldan 'grod pa thog pa yis// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po yis// lho phyogs brag gam dur khrod gnas// dben zhing nyams dga'i gnas dag tu// tshul ldan bshes pa'i grogs khrid de// dur khrod sa la ma 'dal rtsig/ bsgrub dang mchod pa'i rdzas bkod la// dur khrod ras la dpa' bo'i gzugs// tshon rtsi spyin med bzang po yis// khros pa'i gzugs la sprin nag mo// mkhas pas yab yum sras bcas bri// rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga bya// sngon du bsod nams tshogs bsag la// sngags kyi yig 'bru bcu bdun po// khro bo nyid kyis gsungs pa dag/ 'bum phrag bcu gcig rdzogs par bya// de'i tshe mtshan ma lus la 'bar// 'od dpung 'khril dang lung ston smra// rmi lam rtags rnams mang du 'byung// mtshan ma bzang po byung ba dang// dngos grub blang ba'i cho ga bya// rtags rnams mngon du ma byung na// dam tshig gshegs la bsnyen pa spogs// dka' thub ldan pas brtul zhugs spyod// mi smra mi yur mi 'khyam par// lha yi phyogs su kha bltas te// ku sha'i stan la 'dug nas ni// ri mo dag la sems lta zhing// bzlas pa'i yi ge'i rim par bya// bying nas shes pa mug 'gyur na// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis rab bskul la// rgod cing g.yeng bar gyur na ni// mgo ni rma bya bzhin bkug la// mtshan ma lha yi sku la brtag/ ji srid yid ni mi skyo bar// rtse gcig sems kyis bzlas par bya// be shing seng ldeng thogs nas ni// zhing lpags gon zhing dom lpags 'dings// bgrod dka' dur gan gnas su 'grim// myur ba ma yin bul pa min// de bzhin yi ge 'dres pa min// shin tu gsal zhing dag par smra// sngags kyi bzlas grangs bar bar du// khro bo'i stod ra gtang bar bya// rak+ta dmar gyi arga dbul// lha srin srog gi rtsa bar ni// yid bzhin nor bu'i 'phreng ba ste// rnam pa yi ge ngo bo lha// rang bzhin stong pa nus pa med// nyi zla rgya mtsho lhun po brjid// ya man ta ka'i ngo bo nyid// oM a kro te ka ya man ta ka ha na ma ta ban dza hU~M phaT/ 'phags pa'i nang nas 'jam dpal nyid// lha mo'i nang nas 'od zer can// 'chi bdag gshin rje shan pa'i tshogs// rdo rje khro mo khrag mig ma// nag mo ral po 'bebs pa'i tshogs// bsnyen cing bsgrubs na gang yang med pa 'grub// rtag pa chu bo'i gzhung bzhin du// dus kyi bsnyen pa gtso ru blang// sngags kyi 'phreng ba stong rdzogs dang// stong tshigs mchod dang bstod par bya// drag tu gshin rje dgug pa ni// khur pas bus la gshin dmig zlog/ tshil chen mar me rgyun mi spyad// rdza rnga brngungs zhing gshin rje'i tshogs// smug chen smug chung snying la bod// dpa' bo grub rtags

byung ba dang// dngos grub dam shing blang bar bya// shan pa las mkhan 'byung ba'i tshe// dmigs pa dgu pa'i las byas te// sngags dang ting 'dzin pho nyas dgug/ bla rtags mthong nas bsad pa tsam// 'khor lo thun bsdebs bsad pa'i las// bzhi dang bdun bzhi dag tu yang// dus med dus kyi 'khor lo bskor// thun gyi kha gso rgyun tu bya// sngags kyi drangs bar brgya stong la// phu sprug dril ba'i ci kyugs bya// tshes gcig dag du brtsis pa yi// nam phyed mnan pa'i cho ga bya// las 'jug drag bo hom gyis bcad// ces gsungs so// 'jam dpal khro bo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ bsgrub pa rtsa ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'khor la dbang nges par bskur ba'i ched du 'di gsungs so// 'jam dpal khro bo'i dkyil 'khor da// bsnyen pa drod dang ldan byas la// tshogs dang gtor ma gtang bar bya// rnal 'byor nyams chag tshogs kyis bskang// phyi dang gi mtshams bcad la// bkra shis sa la man Dal bya// bkra shis bum par lha grangs dgram// rang byung bum pa bdud rtsis dgang// ma nyams mgul chings kha rgyan mdzes// gdan la yig 'bru yab yum bskyed// khro bo'i snying po 'bum phrag brjod// rin chen bum pa mdzes brgyan la// lha grangs rdzogs par bskyed la bzhag/ lcang lo mdzes pa'i b+han d+ha ru// bdud rtsi zhun mar snum gyis dgang// dngos grub dpal dang lha bsnyen dang// las su byin rlabs so so'i sngags// bcu bdun mtha' ru gang 'dod gdags// bum pa'i bya ba rdzogs pa dang// dbu rgyan la sogs byin brlabs la// slob ma bskyed la khrus dang sbyar// phyag bya gdong bgab gsol gdab dang// sdig bshags sdom pa gzung ba dang// sdig ba bral la ye shes dbab// bstan par byas la so shing dor// rtags rnams brtags la ku sha phyin// lhag par gnas la rmi lam brtag/ yi dgas phal chen dkyil 'khor 'dir// me tog gtor la dmigs pa gzung// phyag 'tshal gsol gdab spro ba bskyed// lung bstan dam 'bog sdom pa sbyin// brda bsgo dbye dang gdong g.yogs bkrol/ lha ngo bstan zhing dbang rdzas sbyin// snying kar nyi zla rdo rje bzhag/ lus bsrungs pa'i phyag rgya dgod// de nas bum pa'i bya ba brtsam// khyad par bdag blang las kyi grub// rigs kyi bum pas dbang bskur bya// dbu rgyan dpal gyi chas brgyad dang// phyag mtshan stobs kyi dbang bskur bya// rdo rje dril bu rig pa 'dzin// thabs dang shes rab phyag rgya byin// las bstan khams gsum bdag por bskur// dbugs dbyung gzengs bstod lung yang bstan// ming gdags brgya dgrol

bka' bsgo bya// dam bsgrags gdam ngag bca' gzhi bstan// gsang ba mi smra mchod pa dbul// de nas dur krod khyad par dbang// yi dgas phal chen dkyil 'khor du// rdzas dang yo byang kun bsags la// gdan la lha rnams rdzogs byas la// dbang stegs lho ru slob ma bkru// 'jug rims rdzogs dang byin gyis brlabs// lhar bskyed lho phyogs gdan la bzhag/ dbu la rdzogs pa'i rigs lnga la// de bzhin pad+ma badzra dag/ gdan la lha rnams rdzogs byas la// dbu dang lce steng thugs khar bstim// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor che// dug gsum gnas su 'joms pa yi// zhing gi dbyug pa'i dbang yang sbyin// 'khor ba dbyings su dag pa'i dbang// dgra sta 'bar ba 'debs pa sbyin// nyon mongs ye shes rang gnas pa'i// shes rab chen po ral gri sbyin// sdigs mdzub me ltar 'bar ba yi// gdug pa zil gnon dbang dag sbyin// nyon mongs ye shes bsal 'big ba'i// mdung thung 'big pa'i tshul du sbyin// ye shes lhun par bsal ba yi// b+han d+ha mdzes pa khrag khal byin// glang chen ko rlon stag sham dang// g.yang gzhi rak+ta'i thig le dang// zor ris thal chen tshom bu yis// dug lnga sku sngar sgrol ba byin// thod pa skam rlon tsit+ta dang// sbrul dang rdo rje gshogs pa dang// rin po che dang me ri yis// bsod nams ye shes byang sems dang// skye med dug gsum gtan bsregs pa'i// dgos 'dod yon tan rdzogs par sbyin// dur khrod gzhal med dregs pa dang// ma he nyi zla pad+ma sbyin// khams gsum ma lus sgral ba dang// dbang chen bran du mngags pa yi// bdag po phyag rgya bstan dbang sbyin// rna ba'i dbang po nyan pa'i dbang// thabs kyi man ngag lhug par spyod// 'chad pa lce la bskur ba yis// 'das dang ma 'das kun gyi rje// thabs kyi rgyal pos 'gro pa 'dren// bsgrub dang bsgom pa'i dbang bskur bas// thun mong mchog gi dngos grub thob// re dogs med par dbang du bskur// 'phrin las rnam bzhi'i dbang bskur bas// rtsa ba yan lag las rims grangs// rtsal chen gsum dang las mchog gsum// thog pa med par spyod pa sbyin// dam rdzas bzhi dang mi 'gyur tshe// 'chi med bdud rtsi b+ha ling dang// longs spyod tshogs dang mchod pa dang// thabs dang shes rab byang chub sems// lta spyod 'brel ba'i dbang rnams sbyin// de nas dbang rnams rdzogs pa dang// shes rab gsang mchog sam pa yi// rgya chen slob ma gzugs mar bcas// dus nyams yol bas bar bcad la// dbang gi sbyor ba thon dang sbyin// gdan la slob par rol du gzhug/ dngos grub blang dang mkha' 'gro mchod// snying po lha dang bcas pa sbyin// yang dag don gyi

man ngag sbyin// 'bras bu ma bltos bgrod pa'i mchog/ ces gsungs so// 'jam dpal khro bo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ bgrod pa phyag rgya'i dgrol ba dbang bstan pa'i le'u ste drug ba'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dam tshig gsang ba bkod ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du 'di dag brjod/ rtogs dang bsrung dang gnas bya dang// spyi dang khyad par lhag pa'i don// chos rnams ma lus kun gyi gzhi// sngags 'chang go 'phang bgrod pa'i srog/ ngo bo chos sku byang chub sems// 'khor 'das lhun grub ngang du rdzogs// de mtshon dam tshig srog ltar mtshungs// rnam grangs rnam pa gnyis yin te// thun mong khyad par rim pa'o// thun mong rtsa ba yan lag gnyis// sku gsung thugs dang byang chub sems// yan lag mi spang dang du blang// bsgrub dang spyad dang shes pa lnga// bcu phrag gnyis dang lnga ru bshad// khyad par bsrung ba rnam gnyis la// bsrung ba nyi shu gcig pa bkod// gcan gzan rgyal po gsad mi bya// za ma tog tu dug mi blug/ rin chen lcug phran gcad mi bya// gangs kyi zhun chu btung mi bya// bug brtol snod du bcud mi blug/ mi shig snong du mdangs mi dbab// yid bzhin nor bu bsreg mi bya// bya khyung gshog pa bcag mi bya// gnam lcags u rmo nang mi 'thab// stag gzig rol ba'i lhag mi bsdu// rdo rje bltams pa'i brag mi bshig/ mun sel sgron ma bsad mi bya// rdo rje chu bo bka' mi bcad// rgyal po phyag rgya rtag ming byed// rdo rje rdzong gis mkhar mi bshig/ rin chen rgyal mtshan rtse mi dbab// sngon 'byung brtul zhugs dgos pa gcad// rdo rje ra ba'i rmang mi bcad// ma brtags nor dang rdzas mi bsreg/ pad+ma'i ze 'bru kha mi dbye// rdo rje rmang gis ri mi bshig/ khyad par dam tshig bsrung par bshad// dngos su nyams na rtsa ba rul// zur gyis nyams kyang 'bras bu ring// gzhung du bsrungs na 'bras bu 'char// rgyun bsrings don gyi man ngag 'grub// lhag pa'i dam tshig rnam gsum bstan// spyod pa rgyun dang rang bzhin lta ba dang// khyad par lhag pa rnam pa gsum du bshad// sbyor ba sngags kyi 'khor lo la// ma yengs bsam gtan ting 'dzin bstan// gsang ba'i lam min gzhan mi 'gro// rig pa'i ma mda' len phyag mi btsal// mi smra bar ni sha chen za// g.yang gzhi stag lpags ro gos gyon// dur khrod gnas 'grim 'phreng chen bgrangs// lta ba'i dam tshig chen po 'di// med pa 'phyal pa gcig pu nyid// ye 'byams ye gnas ye gsal khyab// lhag pa'i dam tshig lnga ru bshad// 'dun pa gsum gyi brtan par brtag/ yin pa bzhi yis lhag par rtags// dbang bskur gnyis kyis brtan par 'gro// lta ba bzhi yi

nyams rtogs ldan// gsang ba gsum gyis rang dbang sdud// ces gsungs so// 'jam dpal khro bo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ dam tshig bkod pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrin las yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// srog don bka' dam las gyis dang// mtshan ma 'dod pa nyams pa yis/ sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig pa rnams// myur du bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir// yi dgas 'khor lo nag po yis// las kyi spu gyi 'khrul 'khor so// gsang ba'i mngon spyod sgrub 'dod na// thog mar shes bya blo sbyangs shing// dad dang dam tshig ldan pa yi// lta spyod gdengs ldan rnal 'byor gyis// dur khrod chen po rab 'jigs pa'i// gsar rnying mi ro spungs pa 'am// lho yi phyogs su kha bltas pa'i// brag ri nag po ha la'i tshal// 'chi bdag pho mo bsgrub pa'i gnas// sngon du bsod nams rdzogs pa yis// dur khrod sa la ma 'dal bya// sme ba'i khrag gis rab byug la// byang chub sems dang rab ldan pas// mi smra mi yur mi 'khyam par// 'das pa'i yi ge bcu bdun po// bye ba sngon du rdzogs par bya// khyad par gshin rje bsgrub pa'i dus// snang srid rak+ta'i gzhal yas su// dpal dang ma mo'i gtor ma dang// gshin rje pho nya'i dam rdzas bshams// snang srid ma mo 'du ba'i phyir// rak+ta dmar gyi arga dgram// sngags pa chas gos ldan pa yis// lha yi ting 'dzin gsal ba'i rten// bu don lho yi phyogs su dgram// ting 'dzin rnam gsum rim pas bsgoms// ya man ta ka 'khor bcas bskyed// dbyings nas spyan drangs mchod pa dbul// de nas drag po'i sbyor ba ni// drag po'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i dus// dur khrod ras la sngags bstim ste// las la sbyor kho'i bsnyen pa bya// ras la dug dang smra khrag byug/ srid gsum lto na yod tegs su// 'khor lo rim pa gsum du bskor// dbus su mu la'i yi ge ya// phyogs bzhir ya me dak+She bri// phyi rim khang ba bcu gnyis su// me dbal yi ge bcu gnyis dgod// yang logs khang pa bcu drug la// sngags kyi rgyal po kha snom stobs// nag po 'jigs pa'i lte bar bzhugs// phyi rim rmod pa nag po'i mtshon// rnye kre d+ha de bla de ba/ wa te a mo khaM/ dgra bo mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ sde brgyad dug gi spu gri de// 'chi bdag srog snying 'phreng ba dgod// rgya che ba yi dkyil 'khor yang// sme khrag gsum gyis rab byug la// thig bzhi btab bas le tshe dgu// phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis// thal chen gyis ni bri bar bya// dug dang mtshon cha'i yi ge dgod// yi dgas ro yi gos blangs la// brla sems 'chags shing 'gug par byed// dmigs pa'i gzugs ni ci 'drar bris// rnam shes

gnas nas dgug pa'i phyir// dza yi bar du yi ge nri// 'bod par byed pa'i ming rus bri// rnam shes bkug la gzugs la bstim// gu gul sbyar ma'i dud pas bdugs// lha lnga skrag phyir zhabs mas gdab// sngon dmar skud pas ske nas gdags// dur khrod khrag gi ma 'dal du// 'khor lo gtsang mar kha la dgram// yi dgas gshin rje nag po bskyed// bdag nyid ting 'dzin ldan pa yis// sa gzhi gshag cing rgya mtsho dkrug/ las kyi gshin rje bkug la bstim// dngos ni 'chi bdag bdud chen yin// dbang du bsdus te dam rdzas sbyin// 'bru brgyad rtsa ba'i ming dang ni// yang snying spu gri'i gsang sngags dag/ nyi ma bzhi ru phyi la bzlas// drag sngags 'phro 'dus dmigs pa dgug/ sgongs nas gsad cing spu gri gdags// spyi rgyug las kyi phud sprugs kyang// stong stong bar du dril ba bzlas// 'khor lo gcod pa'i grogs su 'gyur// mtshan mo rgyun 'dzab thun du dril// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyin bzhir 'khor lo'i sngags 'di gsungs so// ya ma ra dza sa do me ya/ che ge mo zhig a mu kam bra ma ya hU~M phaT/ ya me do ru na yo da ya/ che ge mo zhig a mu kam ma ra dza ya hU~M phaT/ ya da yo ni ra k+she ya/ che ge mo zhig/ a mu kham rak+ta tsa ra ya hU~M phaT/ yak+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya/ che ge mo zhig a mu kham ma ra ya hU~M phaT/ gal te grub bar ma gyur na// las kyi thugs kha'i dus dag tu// sngags rnams ldog cing gshin rje gzir// srog bsgrub ma mo'i shar la gdab// tshogs drug gzhom dang lnga phung bcad// gru gsum shing la ar la gtad// 'khor lo rdzogs dang mnan sngags bzlas// tshes gcig dag tu brtsis pa yi// nyi ma dmar thag chod pa la// shas pa'i sa 'am gdon yod par// 'khor lo mnan pa'i cho ga bya// drag po'i las la sbyar ba'i mthar// thun gyi kha so rgyun mi gcad// dus mtha' myur du brtul bar byed// ces gsungs so// 'jam dpal khro bo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ yi dwags 'khor lo nag po'i las bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gdug pa'i 'chi bdag gi tshogs thams cad dbang du bsdu ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms bar zhugs te/ thod pa nag po gsang ba'i kha thun 'di gsungs so// gdengs gsum ldan pa'i sngags pa yis// dur khrod gdug pa'i gnas phyin la// dur khrod sa la ma 'dal bya// sme ba'i khrag gis rab byugs la// dbus su gru gsum mthing nag bya// kha khyer dug shing rtsang gis bskor// gtor ma gsum dang rak+ta dang// 'chi bdag pho mo'i dam rdzas bsag/ lho yi phyogs su kha bltas te// ting 'dzin gsum po rim pa yis// gshed bdag khro bo yab yum bskyed// yang dang yang du

gsal bar bsgoms// 'jam dbyangs rdo rje hU~M rings kyis// sku rgyan gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor la// bstod cing gsal gdab byin gyis brlabs// gdug pa'i dgra bgegs bsgral bar bya// drag po sngags kyi tsham rngam brjod// gru gsum mthing nag dkyil 'khor nas// ya man ta ka 'khor dang bcas// dbyings nas spyan drangs dbyer med bstim// mchod cing bstod pa dag kyang bya// rgyun du gsang sngags dril la bzlas// lha rtags mngon du rgyud pa'i tshe// dngos grub blang ba'i cho ga bya// de nas drag po'i las la 'jug/ rabs chad mon dang ma su ra// thod ba nag po de la blang// gu rgyal chu dang dri yis gsad// ma nor thod pa shes par bya// ltag pa'i phyogs na gnas pa'i bdud// 'chi bdag gdug pa seng ge'i mgo// zhal bgrad mche ba gtsigs pa ni// srid pa gsum po lto na 'chang// de yi gzugs brnyan legs brtags la// rams dang khrag tu sbyar ba yis// gshin rje'i zhal ni dbyung bar bya// dgong ni bye ba gug rings so// de yi snying khar yi ge ya// rdo sol nag pos bri bar bya// zhal nas kha thun g.yas bskor du// 'chi bdag tha ma 'khor bar bri// zhal gyi rmod pa nag po yin// thod pa gong ma'i nang dag tu// ro langs lto bar mu khyud gsum// gling dgu bcu gnyis lcags mkhar du// drag po'i yi ge bcu bdun dgod// rag sha nag mo 'jigs byed ma// rngos ni srin mo nag mo ste// dus mtha'i gtul byed ma ru gsungs// de nas 'khor lo kha sbyar la// 'brub gnas bzhi ru ling ka bya// thod pa nag po rtsar la skyen// gsang ba'i drag sngags rgyun du drangs// rlung dang chu dag me dang sa// de bzhin nam mkha' dag dang ldan// dus dang me dang lta byed chu// lta byed rlung dang me dus ro// lce dang sna ba ro dang dus// me dang rlung dang lta byed sbyar// bcu bdun drag sngags 'phreng ba ste// rgyun tu bzlas par yang dag bshad// rlung dang chu dang nam mkha' dang// sa me lta byed me dang dus// lta byed rlung dang me dus ro// sna ba la sogs bcu bdun pa// gshin rje'i dmag dpung 'bebs pa'i sngags// gsang ba'i las su de dag 'dod// rlung dang chu me sa dang mkha'// dus me rlung dang lta byed dang// dus dang/ me dang/ sna dang chu lce rna ba ro// lta byed la sogs bcu bdun ba// mkha' 'gro phyi ru bkri ba'i sngags// rlung dang chu dang/ nam mkha' dang sa/ me dang/ rna ba lce chu sna/ lta byed me dang dus dang rlung// me dang dus dang ro dang ni// lta byed yi ge bcu bdun pa// ma grub spogs pa shis pa'i sngags// las kyi thus ka gsang ba ste// bcu bdun drag sngags 'phreng ba ste// ya bag sha ru yang dag bshad// go mtshon gtar dang gser thog 'bebs// btsan gyi jag

pa rgyug pa dang// bdud kyi shan pa srog gcod ltar// drag po sngags kyi bzlas pa tsam// spu gri ming dang rnam shes sbyar// rtsa ba spu gri gsang bar gdab// de ltar nyin gyi 'khor lo bskor// mtshan mo rgyun 'dzab khog phub la// khu thun sngags kyis brab par bya// sngags kyi brgya bar stong bar du// khrag thun dbab pa'i las kyang bya// nyungs kar sngags kyis bla dgug cing// 'chi bdag shan pa'i dmag dpung dbab// ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dag gsungs so// ya ma me dang k+she ni ra dza sa/ to ru na yo// ni ra ya dzA/ dgra bo ma ra ya hU~M phaT/ ya ma k+She ta me/ ni ra dza pa ya ra ni yo/ na ru to so/ ya ma me da k+she/ ni ra dza/ ni ra sa do/ ru na yo tsa/ ya ma k+she ta me/ na ru do sa/ dzA ra ni ya/ ra ni yo tsa/ che ge mo a mu khaM ma ra ya hU~M phaT/ las kyi lcong du dmag dpung dbab// gal te ma grub las 'gyangs na// 'khor lo dkrug cing shis bstan// 'chi bdag ya ma ra dza dang// bdud kyi lcamamo drag tu rbad/ spyi rgyugs sngags kyi char da bab la// 'khor lo thod pa re bas gril// shis pa'i sa 'am klu gnas gnan// thun gyi kha gso rgyun tu bya// de ltar byas na lha yang 'chi// 'jam dpal khro bo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ thod pa nag po 'chi bdag kha thun gyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gshed po rnams dbang du bsdu ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// ma trang zhing lpags la bsgrub pa'i las 'di gsungs so// lha yi rnal 'byor ldan pa yis// dpa' brtul ldan pa'i sngags pa des// dur khrod gdug pa'i gnas phyin te// dpa' bo gri ru shi ba yi// ro yi pags pa rab bshus la// gsang ba sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor yang// dug khrag rdo sol sbyar ba yis// mi rkang pir la skra shad pir// ldan pas 'khor lo bri bar bya// bcu gnyis bar du a mu ka/ mkhas pa dag gis bri bar bya// 'chi bdag gshin rje nag po yi// zhal phyag ldan par shes par bya'o// rabs chad nag po'i thod par gzhug/ lho yi phyogs su phyag rgya'i rten// dmig gi rten du mngon pa dgram// zhing lpags bzhi 'am yan lag la// smug nag ser nag dmar nag ljang// tshon rtsi spyin med dam po yis// mkhas pas bris la phyogs bzhir dgram// mi rtogs dbyings las thugs rje'i sku// skye med dbyings nas spyan drangs mchod// gnyis su med pa'i yang snying bzlas// mi smra rgyun gyi bsam gtan bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma tang nag po gsang ba'i sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor 'di gsungs so// ya ma ra dza sa da me ya/ nag po rag sha che ge mo thum ril rbad ya/ ya me do ru na yo da ye/ nag po rag sha che ge mo snying baM ril rbad ya/ ya da yo

ni ra ya k+she ya/ ar+ya che ge mo rbad ya/ ya k+she ya tsa ni ra dza ma ya/ rag sha che ge mo thum ril rbad ya/ sngags dang 'khor lo'i bar dag tu// 'bod par byed pa'i ming rnams gzhug/ nyin bzhi'i ya 'khor lo'i sngags su gsungs// mtshan mo srog gcod ma bzhi yi// gsang ba'i thun gyis brab par bya// ri ma ti dang snying 'phrog ma// dz+wa ti ma dang rag sha ma// gsang ba'i yang snying 'di lta ste// oM ri ma ti ru ru trag kha la rag mo snying kha rag te rig sha dam nyams che ge mo srin mo ru b+h+yo/ oM tsa shu kha shag snying la rbad tsa du ma ra ya che ge mo cho/ lce ldibs rak+sha tsa pa la pra ma ya/ dza ti ka ma la ru rag sha ta che ge mo traM DaM srin mo kha la rbad/ oM rag mo ru ru tsa ba la trag trag mo kro d+hI shwa ri snying la rbad/ tro ti shwa ri shing la rbad ya/ gsang ba rag shan ga mo ste// ma tang nag po gsang ba'i mtshon// nyungs kar gsang bas zla dgug cing// khram la gdab dang khrag 'thung gdab// gshed bzhi'i khram bdag skul ba dang// spyi rgyug las kun rdzogs par bya// dgongs dang tho rang dus rtag tu// rmad du byung ba'i gtor ma gtang// mtshan mo'i dus su yang snying dang// srin mo bzhi yi rmod pa gdab// thon brab srog phur sngags kyis brab// shis pa'i sa ru mkhas pas gnan// gal te las te g.yel ba na// 'khrugs byed ro langs dril ba'i sngags// mtshan mo bzhi la bzlas par bya// las 'jug 'khor lo zlog cing gzir// dkrug pa'i gsang sngags shes par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ro langs 'khrugs byed kyi drag sngags rag sha nag mo 'di gsungs so// ya ma ra dza snying ro shan sa do me kro ti shwa ri/ ma mo do ru tsit+ta ro la shan ti/ na yo da ya sa ma ya dza/ ya da yo ni ro tsa rmugs/ ra ya k+she ya sa ma ya dza/ ya k+sha ya tsa/ snying khrag chod/ ni ra ma ya srog srog ma ra ya phaT/ snying tsa dgra bo ma ra ya/ brnag pa'i rgyal po gsang ba ste// ro langs rno myur ldan pa yi// 'jig rten mgon gyis gsang bar gdams/ zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal khro bo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ rag sha nag po gsang ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ srog bdag shan pa'i tshogs dbang du bsdu ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'phrin las 'di dag gsungs so// dur khrod gdug pa'i gnas dag tu// bdud bcad sa la ma 'dal bya// ra rog khrag gis chag chag gdab// dbus su gru gsum rgya bcad de// ni ra sa dang dug gis bri// 'khrul mig bcu bdun gsang sngags gdod// zag pa zad pa a mu ka'i// rdzas dang khrag sbyar shog shog la// dmigs pa ci 'dra'i ling ka bri// nad dang mtshon cha'i yi ge dgod// pho nya btang zhing bla tshe dgug/ rnam par shes pa gzugs la

bstim// lha lnga dbral zhing rdzas dgod sregs// sngon dmar thag pas rab btags la// lho phyogs gshin rje nyid la gdags// rog po te dkar dmigs pa'i brten// khram byang bcu gsum ra la btags// ting 'dzin gsum la gshed po bskyed// mchod dang bstod pa rdzogs pa yis// drag sngags 'khor lo bskor bar bya// srid dang tho rangs dgongs kha rnams// 'phrin las bcol ba'i las kyang bya// nyin ma bzhi ru 'khor lo bskor// rdzogs dang ra bsgral g.yang gzhi bshu// dbus su e la yi ge bri// phyi rims 'khrul 'khor dug rdzas dang// ra khrag dag gis bri bar bya// snying dang ling ga g.yang gzhi gzhag/ dmar nag drag sngags bsnol mar gzhag/ rdzogs dang 'khor lo gnan par bya// thun gyi kha gso rab tu 'bad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ srog bdag g.yang gzhi nag po'i gsang sngags 'di gsungs so// oM sa ma ya many+dzu shri mu tra ya man ta ka pa tsa te ro ni dza hU~M dza dza ya ra ni/ yo na ru na ni/ tsa sa ra ni k+she da me ma ya/ oM rnal ma rnal de bsod la rngams/ bshod la mer mer/ phril la chum/ thu bis thu bis/ lcags kyi dgra/ dgra bo ma ra ya hU~M ni rbad/ bla 'gugs myos pa'i khrag thun dbab// gshin rje nag po'i khram la gdab// gsang ba'i 'khor lo rdzogs pa dang// g.yang gzhi'i ling ka kun dril la// lam po che 'am dur khrod khyim// stag gi kha 'am klu gnas su// mkhas pas gtad pa'i rim pa bya// rdzas dang khrag dug rdzas rnams bsreg/ kha thun sngags kyi kha gsos la// brnag pa'i phyogs su 'phang bar bya// ra yi sha rus theb rol dang// ling ka bsreg rdzas kun bsres la// thab khung bcas la me lha bskyed// rtsa ba'i sngags la dzA la raM// ma ra ya dang kha raM khas// bcu phrag bcu dang brgyad kyis bsreg/ rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po yis// bkra shis tshe yi cho ga bya// las kyi rnam smin sbyang ba'i phyir// bskang gso'i cho ga rgya cher bya// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal khro bo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ srog bdag shan pa gshin rje'i tshogs// g.yang gzhi las grub pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ro langs nag mo dbang du bsdu ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// srin mo gsang ba'i 'khrul 'khor 'di gsungs so// las rnams kun gyis ma grub na// 'khrug byed dus mtha' rtul byed ma'i// 'khor lo thun rtog brnag pa'i las// las kyi mthu khar ro langs sgrub// dur khrod 'jigs pa'i gnas dag tu// dur khrod sa la ma 'dal bya// khrag gis byug la ma 'dal dgod// dur khrod ro yi gos blangs la// ni ra su yis mdog bton la// sme khrag dug sbyar snag tsha yis// gshin rje'i lto bar 'khor lo

bri// mu khyud rim pa gsum pa yi// dbus su lcags mkhar gling dgu bri// phyi rim lcags mkhar bcu drug lags// tha ma re'u cha drug dang ldan// de la gnas pa'i rim pa ni// dbus su mu la'i yig 'bru ste// mtshon cha'i yi ge 'bru brgyad bkod// bcu drug mkha' 'gro rtsa ba'i sngags/ khang pa drug tu thun sngags bri// ma 'dal dbus su gtsang brgyad// rabs chad mon gyi thod pa ru// snying khrag dug sbyar thun yang bca'// 'khor lo yig 'bru lhar bskyed la// mchod dang 'phrin las dag kyang bcol// nyi shu bdun nam gnam stong la// nyi ma bzhi yi 'khor lo bskor// rmod pa drag po rmo ba dang// sngogs kyi phu sprugs dag kyang bya// mtshan mo dril dang thun drug sngags// mtshon cha bsnol mar rgya gram brdeg/ khram la gdab cing khrag thun dbab// 'khor lo thod pa re pas dril// bam ro can gyi khungs su 'am// klu yi pho brang yod par mnan// gal te grub par ma gyur na// ro langs las la g.yel ba na// 'khor lo ldog cing sprug par bya// ro langs snying khar phur pa la// drag dang ldan pa'i gsang sngags 'phreng// rdzogs pa'i 'phro 'du rtsad nas gcod// de ltar byas na lha dbang yang// myur du rlag par dpa' bos bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ ro langs nag mo gsang ba sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor 'di gsungs so// oM sa ma ya many+dzu shri/ ya ma rA dza ma ma e ka dza ti dza/ trag rak+sha mu tra/ snying kha raka b+h+yo b+h+yo/ srog la rbad/ ya ya lon rtsin dan ma la b+h+yo/ snying kha rag srog la b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ya dun shan dun man tsit+ta rak+ta ram thun gzir snying/ rtsa ro myag ud a mu khaM srog la/ thun shag ma ra ya rbad/ ya ma de ma b+h+yo ru lu rbad/ nyin mtshan sngags ni dril ltor brdeg/ ma mo tsit+ta kha la ra k+sha thun b+h+yo/ ma ma dum bu dum bu/ tshal pa tshal pa/ ha na ha na thun b+h+yo/ ma ma hU~M/ ya ma ling rbad/ thun b+h+yo/ ma ma brag zag/ ni ling ni ling/ ka thun b+h+yo/ ma ma thun naM thun naM/ rub tsit+ta yaM shag thun b+h+yo/ ma ma kha la rak+mo tsa la breng shag thun b+h+yo/ a ur ro myags tsa yang snying gzer/ thun dza/ ya ta rak+ta tsit+ta/ ya man dun shan/ dum/ a mu ka srog la dum shag ma ra ya rbad/ b+h+yo ru lu rbad/ ro langs las la g.yel ba na// bzlog cing dkrug pa'i drag sngags te// ya bag sha yi las su gsungs// 'jam dpa' khro bo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ ro langs nag mo gsang ba'i thugs kha'i yang snying gi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ya ma ro langs kyi tshogs dbang du bsdu ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ ro langs nag mo lto ba dkrugs ba'i las 'di gsungs so// las rnams kun gyi tha ma la// gsod byed ro langs shan pa bsgrub// dur khrod gnas su man d+hal

bya// mkhas pas 'khor lo bri bar bya// byang shar rgya mdud 'brub khung du// srog gi mdangs len ma mo brgyad// bskor la thun rdzas gtor ma bsham// dmigs pa'i ling ka bcas nas ni// 'khor lo phur ba dag la gdags// nyi shu bdun nas gnam stong du// nyi mo 'gug cing mtshan mo bsad// dpal ldan nag mo re ma ti// grub pa'i gnas nas 'khor dang bcas// spyan drangs mchod pa dbul bar bya// nyin bzhi 'khor lo rdzogs pa dang// ral pa tshar dgu lto bar gzhug/ nag po klu yi pho brang mnan// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba ro langs kyi rgyud las gsang sngags 'di gsungs so// ya ma ra ni tsa ya g+heng ya/ che ge mo'i bla rtsa la rak+mo shan pa ma ra ya dza/ yak+She ye ra na yo da ya/ che ge mo rtsa bo che lar k+mo shan pa ma ra ya dza/ yak+She ya ra na yo da ya ta/ che ge mo rtsa bo che la rak+mo shan pa ma ra ya dza/ ya da yo na ru do me ya/ che ge mo'i nang khrol smad lnga la rak+mo shan pa ma ra ya dza/ ya me da sa tsa ma ras/ che ge mo'i srog rtsa la ma rag lo shan pa ma ra ya dza/ mtshan mo 'bru brgyad rnal ma ya// rtsa mdud gcod pa'i spu gri gdags// gsad pa'i las su de shes bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis shan pa'i gtso mo bod cing/ las la dgye ba 'di gsungs so// sku mdog dmar mo zangs kyi dril zhags can// zangs kyi ral pa sprugs pa'i skra gseb nas// ma mo nag mo lnga bcu rtsa bzhi dgra la gtong// lcags kyi phyag sor 'bar ba brdabs pa yis// gshin rje nag po dun bdun 'bangs su 'khol// khro mo sdigs mdzu ba phyar te brdabs pa yis// ma mo nag mo dun bdun 'bangs su 'khol// dgyes te gad mo drag tu dgod pa yis// sdang ba'i dgra bo gtan du phung bar mdzod// dam nyams dgra bo phung bar byed cing thal bar rlog/ 'go 'phyang ma dza dzA/ dun rmugs bla rtsa la dza dza/ rtsa bo che la dun dmugs/ nang khrol sna lnga la rtsa baM/ dun tsam/ thuM ri li li rbad rbad/ srog gi shan pa las la dgyes// srog la phur thun dbab pa dang// khram la gdab pa'i rim pa bya// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal khro bo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gsod byed nag mo ro langs kyi las bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'jig rten dbang du sdud pa'i srin mo'i tshogs rnams dbang du sdud pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gsang ba thun zor gyi las 'di gsungs so// dur khrod dgon pa ma mo'i gnas// rnal 'byor dam tshig ldan pa yis// ma 'dal bri ba shes bar bya// dbus su gru gsum brtsegs pa la// zla gam gru chad sgro khyud ldan// dbus su nag mo re ma ti// gru gsum srin mo gsum po dgod// gru chad la ni me 'bar bzhi// mda'

dang dug dang khrag dang zor// gtor zor rim pa dgod par bya// nyungs thun khrag thun snying thun dang// phur thun la sogs thun ka brgyad// bcas la bsad pa'i yang snying bzlas// khol lam blangs pa'i mdog gyur na// thun zor gnas khang dag la rdeg/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// zor thun gsang ba'i yang snying 'di gsungs so// oM sa ma ya ya ma du/ snying khrag du ma ma srid du la thun/ srog khugs sa ma ya dza/ ru ru ma ti thun/ che ge mo tsa thang mu le tsit+ta rbud/ grU'u rag mo kha tsa thun che ge mo tsa thang mu le tsit+ta rbud/ nag mo dgra snying la thun che ge mo tsa thang mu le tsit+ta rbu/ e ta ra dza ra dgra'i snying la thun ge che mo rtsa thang mu le tsit+ta rbud/ du ru ha na che ge mo tsar tha yu le tsit+ta rbud/ ma ra ti mar ti thun che ge mo tsa thang mu le tsit+ta rbud/ snying tsit+ta ma ra ya ti thun che ge mo tsa thang mu le tsit+ta rbud/ srog tsit+ta ma ti che me mo tsa thang mu le tsit+ta rbud/ a lo sha tsa rbud/ ya ma snying rbud/ ya ma khrag rbud// ya ma ra dza rbud/ ma ra ya rbud/ tshal pa tshal pa rbud/ dum bu dum bu rbud/ 'gri na 'gri na rbud/ srog thum srog thum rbud/ sha khaM khaM/ ma ma srog tsit+ta rbud/ snying tsit+ta dum bu dum bu/ kha ling rbud/ srog rbad pu rbad/ pu du ri yag sha rbad/ khrag thibs snang pa snang pa ma sha pubs rbad/ snying tsit+ta du su ra te ru te rbad snying tsit+ta snying dum bu kha la yak+Sha rbad/ rbad rbud kha la dum bu snying la rbad/ ma du ya ma du ya rbad/ khrag shaM tsang/ snying la rbad/ b+h+yo ma ra ni dza/ dun yaM/ tshal pa shag kha ril mug/ thum b+h+yo/ oM ya man ta ka k+Sham/ ar+ya a tsa la k+sham/ oM ma dug tsa tsa/ tshal pa tshal pa rbad rbad/ ma dug sham/ ya ma sham/ che ge mo'i srog rtsa la rmugs ti rbad/ tsa tsa ra rbad/ ma mo khrag la dun ti rngubs/ srin po rus la chom chom tsal/ gshin rje'i khram la lhan lhan thob// dgra bo yi khraM la ril li li ni dza rbad/ oM mun ya oM mugs ti subs che ge mo la cho cho bal hub bal hub/ bal yu bal yu/ snying gong tsa thun nan/ ma thun nan/ che ge mo nan/ khrag thun khong khrag/ che ge mo'i khong khrag la ya ya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ srog gshed bzhi dang khram la gdab pa dang/ thun gdab pa'i phyir/ ched du 'di dag gsungs so// kham nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// 'jigs byed yA ma ra dza gshegs su gsol// dpal chen drag po'i 'phrin las sku la rdzogs// smug nag dkyil bas bdud dpung thal bar rlog/ 'jigs byed de yi thugs dam dges bskul
