ma// yum chen srin mo mgo 'phyang dbyings nas bzhengs// yab yum gnyis med rol pa mkha' dkyil nas// thugs kyi sprul pa khro rgyal mi g.yo mgon// dbyug to 'bar bas lha mchog srid gsum bdag/ gshin rje 'chi bdag dpa' bo kun

'dul ba// kha rog nag po bdud 'dul ral gri can// sran mo ma he ni stag gzigs zhon nas su// ral gri srid pa gsum po thal bar rlog/ sku mdog sngo nag gshin rje gshed kyi lha// sku ni dud ka chen po la// 'byung po kun gyi gshed mar byung// gshed bdag ya ma ra dza'i dus la bab// ci bgyis bka' nyan ma mo'i tshogs kyi bskor// ma mo rbod gtong sdang ba'i dgra la gtor// sdigs mdzub 'bar bas dgra bo'i srog rtsa gcod// sdang mig bgrad pas gshin rje'i tshogs rnams 'dul// rkan sgra brdabs bas srin po bran du 'khol// srin po khros pas khrag mtsho khong du gsol// dbyugs glu blangs pas ma mo dgra la gtong// dug gsum zhal du rngubs la phyag 'tshal lo// zhabs 'og gshin rje ma mo srin po kun// dun dun guM guM sdang ba'i dgra la gtong// gshin rje khros te shin tu rngam pa yis// srin po pho mo don snying par gyis 'debs// gdug pa'i srin po khros te brgyugs pa yis// dam nyams dgra bo dbang du sdung cing thal bar rlog/ dmar nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// gsod byed ya ma ra dza gshegs su gsol// dmar smug brjid pas ma mo kun gyi rje// khro gtum btsun dag srid pa gsum gyi lha// che btsan dregs pas ma mo bran du 'khol// gsod byed de yi thugs dam dgyes bskul ma// ma gcig srin mo mgo 'phyang ma// dgra la khrag thun 'bebs kyin da tshur spyon// 'jigs byed de yi zhabs kyi chags 'og na// srid gsum sha khrag mnga' mdzad ma mo rnams// dmar lam bstan gyis ma thogs da tshur spyon// tsit+ta dbyung gis ma thogs da tshur spyon// khrag 'thung dbab pas ma thogs da tshur spyon// srid pa gsum gyi khram gyi mnga' bdag mo// dmar mo mchu 'jib rtsa srog mnga' bdag mo// phyag na lcags skam lcags kyus snying 'byin ma// 'khor gyi ma mo stong gi rtsa brgyad bsdus// thun zor 'phang gis ma thogs tshud spyon// dam nyams dgra bo dbang du sdu shig thal bar rlog/ ces dgra bo la thun zor brdeg/ 'jam dpal khro bo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ thun zor sgrub cing 'phang ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba mchog gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// \u0f84ched du brjod pa 'di gsungs so// gsang ba'i mchog ni dam pa yi// gtso ni ting 'dzin nyid yin pas// bsam gtan 'khor lo dam par bshad// bsal ba gsum ni de nyid las// ting 'dzin brgya dang rtsa bzhi las// nges par nye bar bsdus ba'i don// bsam gtan sems dang gcod pa sngags// bsam gtan 'jam dpal ye shes nyid// ngo bo chos sku byang chub sems// ma bcos bde chen thig le'i sku// sku mchog mi g.yo spyir yang

snang// khyab brdal bde chen 'gyur med la// sna tshogs ngos bzung med pa la// lhun grub phyag rgya spyir yang 'char// thabs kyis 'gro ba 'dul ba'i mchog/ zug rngu mi mnga' spyi yang ltos// mtshan dang dpe byad tshad las 'das// rig pa rgyal po rdzogs pa'i sku// sna tshogs sgyu ma sprul pa'i sku// thams cad sku gsum rol pa'i rgyan// phyi rgyud dag pas sku gsum rdzogs// dbus kyi thig le rtsa 'dus pa'i// sa ri rnam pa yi ge las// 'phro 'du sbyor len kun byed pa// nang rgyud dag pa'i sku gsung rdzogs// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med par// byang chub bde chen dngos med par// yum gyi mkha' la bde chen spro// 'khor lo rnam drug brgyud cing khros// thabs kyi spyod pa don byas nas// slar 'dus thig le bde chen sku// gnyis su med pa byang chub sems// ro mnyam mi shigs rdo rje'i sku// thabs dang shes rab rdo rje'i sku// thams cad yongs la gsal cing khyab// gsang ba thabs kyi sku zhes bshad// dus gsum mnyam nyid brdal ba yi// rig pa'i rgyal po byang chub sems// snang srid thams cad chos rnams kun gyi gzhi// sna tshogs ngos gzung bral ba'o// rgyu med 'bras bu lhun gyis grub// chags sdang longs spyod lam gyi rgyun// sems las ma phyung sangs rgyas gtso// ye shes nyi mas dbus mtha' rdzogs// lung med man ngag yang dag mchog/ khyab brdal dkyil 'khor yongs rdzogs yin// thams cad sku gsung thugs kyi rgya// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo rdzogs// gcod pa'i sngags kyis rol pa'i rgyan// 'dren pa gsum gyi don gnyis ldan// drag dag che dang 'phra la zhan// gang dang gtong dang 'phar ba dang// rngub dang stong dang bskyed pa dang// 'dud dang nyal dang 'dren pa yis// las kyi skabs sbyor so sor sbyar// nyi ma chu rlung rdo rje dang// pad+ma rin chen so ma ta// rdo rje lcags kyu b+he bag ta// rlung gis mtsho gling dka' 'phangs dang// mu men tu yi khu ba bcud// de bzhin ri yi rbabs tshan dang// rgyal po brlabs dang kla chen stobs// gser gyi chu tog skam pa'i so// sa ri so dang lce 'bab dang// bya rgod khra chen zan la 'babs// bco brgyad 'dren dang 'do zer dag/ ting 'dzin zhes ni yang dag bshad// bsnyen dang nye ba'i bsnyen pa dang// bsgrub dang bsgrub pa chen po yi// grub dang spogs dang mtha' bsdu dang// ting 'dzin gyis ni 'byed pas na// 'phen ba de nyid rtags zhes brjod// ces gsungs so// 'jam dpal khro bo rin po che gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gsang ba de kho na nyid kyi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'bar byed gtum rngam po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ ched du 'di brjod do// gtum chen

grags pa chen po thams cad 'joms pa'i lha// dbang byed bdud 'dul dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// khro rngam gtum pas srid gsum thal bar rlog/ sgrol byed sku mchog ma mo 'bangs su 'khol// gtum chen rab 'bar gshin rje 'joms mdzad lha// 'jigs byed ya ma ra dza'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// nyi ma 'bum las lhag pa'i 'od zer phyogs bcur dgye// gdug byed mtshon cha mang po bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// rab brjid gshin rje 'joms la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje'i sku la klu dbang rab rgyan cing// gcan gzan gdug pa'i pags rlon na bzar gsol// sha zan 'ug pa'i tshom bus dbu yi thod du bcings// khro bo'i rgyal po zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs drug hU~M sgru can// hU~M dang phaT kyis khams gsum stong gsum zhabs drug gshin rje mnon// brkyang bskum brjid pas gshin rje ya ba sti'i snying ka mnan// ljags 'dril tshems kyi gseb nas rdo rje'i thog phab pas// 'khor gyi ma mo rnams kyang bran du 'khol// tsham rngam khro bo'i rkan sgra bsgrags pa yis// 'khor gyi ma mo rnams kyang 'dar chum chum// tshangs pa 'khor bcas rngul gyi thig 'dzag cing// lha chen khyab 'jug mahA de wa gnon// phyag na b+han d+ha rlon pa rab bsnams shing// dngos grub mchog gi klad khrag zhal du gsol// khyung dang 'ug pa lta bu'i kha bsnams shing// dam las zlog pa rnams la gtong bar mdzad// rnal 'byor bdag la gdug cing 'gal byed rnams// rab tu chings shig phung bar mdzad du gsol// gshin rje ya ma ra dza khro bo kun gyi rje// gtan gyi lha yang khyod la gsol 'debs na// dgra bgegs mgo nas chem chem bsnams su gsol// nad gtong srin mo'i tshogs rnams dbang du sdud// khrung chen sngon po mkha' la lding ba bzhin// thugs kyi sprul pa khye'u chung mang po yis// rnal 'byor bdag la gnod pa'i dgra dang bgegs yud tsam gyis ni thal bar brlag bar mdzad du gsol// 'jigs byed de yi thugs dam dgyes bskul ma// e ka dza ti 'gu ya ral gcig ma// mi 'pham khro gnyer g.yu yi ral pa can// ral pa sprugs pa'i skra gseb re re nas// khro chung mang po stong khams khyab par 'gyed// kun kyang mi bzad 'jigs byed lcags kyu can// 'joms byed srin mo las la 'gyed// bcom ldan 'jigs byed chen po nyid la 'dud// ces gsungs pas/ 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po rnams sku yongs su rdzogs te dgyes pa chen po ha ha zhes sgra sgrogs par gyur to// 'jam dpal khro bo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ bstod pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'di skad

ces gsungs so// e ma ho/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi// 'jam dbyangs khro bo nyid kyi sku// spros med thig le chen po las// 'dzin rtog las kyis zin pa la// rnam grangs bsam gyis bsam gyis mi khyab kyang// grol nas mya ngan 'das pa'i lam// dmod pa'i rgyal po lam gyi mchog/ zhe sdang gtum khros 'gro ba sgrol// ma lus 'joms pa'i ngang tshul can// rnal 'byor chen po rtsa ba'i don// thabs dang shes rab snying po'i bka'// nye bar gyur pa sgrub pa'i lung// stong phrag bdun dang brgya phrag brgyad de don dngos grub nye ba'i mchog/ 'jam dpal khro bo gsang ba'i rgyud las// rdo rje snying po la sogs pa// gshin rje gshed kyi dge 'dun kun// nga'i bka' rgyud pa rim pa 'di// rnam rtog mtshan mar rang grol ba// rdo rje bde chen rgyal ba'i bka'// sku gsung mi zad brgyan gyi thugs// bdag gzhan 'gro ba yongs kyi dpal// don gyi lam ston mgo ma la// gsang ba don gyi ka dag gsang// lta spyod 'khor lo dam tshig dbang// bsgrab dang 'phrin las phyag rgya sngags// lam rings sbyor ba 'brel ba'i don// bcom ldan rigs rnams kun gyi sku// rgyal ba kun gyi rang bzhin dngos// rdo rje 'chang gi ngo bo nyid// chos dbyings skye ba med dbyings las// ye shes rol pa skur bstan nas// dngos grub nye ba'i bka' rgyud 'di// rnal 'byor can la gnas phyir bshad// rdo rje khro bo dregs pa'i tshogs// srog gcod shan pa ging gi tshogs// ma mo mkha' 'gro rigs 'dzin dang// bdud dang srin po byad stems dang// btsan dang rgyal po srog bdag ging// gnod sbyin dri za lto 'phye gza'// lha dang mkha' 'gro la sogs pa// kun kyang gshin rje nyid kyi 'khor// lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma la// rigs 'dzin gzhan gyi dngos grub ril// yal nas 'grub tu mi 'dod tshe// gshin rje mthar byed gang bsgrubs tshe// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po la// nga yi dam las mi g.yel bas// lha klu dregs pa chen po yis// rnal 'byor sgrub pa'i grogs gyis shig/ nga yi las rgyud gsang ba 'di// 'das dang ma 'das dreg pa'i 'khor// lha dang mkha' 'gro rnams kyis gsungs 'di la mos dang 'bri ba dang// bsgrub dang tshul bzhin yid la byed// dngos grub nye dang bar chad sel// dgra dang dug dang mtshon cha dang// me dang rgyal po chu la sogs// 'jigs pa kun las nges par thar// zhi dang rgyas pa dbang drag dang// mngon spyod la sogs 'phrin las kun// ji ltar bsam pa bzhin 'grub pas// snying po gsang ba'i rgyud du gsungs// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal khro bo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ 'khor la rgyud gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom

ldan 'das kyis 'bar ba chen po rngam ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin du gtso 'khor thams cad rdzogs par thim nas ched du brjod ba'i glu 'di dag brjod do// nga ni e ma gshin rje gshed// 'bar byed 'jigs pa gtum bag can// ma lus 'dul la phyag 'tshal bstod// e ma 'jigs byed gsang ba'i gsung// stong gsum ri rab 'bum snyil skad// gdug pa 'dul byed gsung sgra sgrog/ ma lus sgrol 'dul khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// e ma byang chub sems rab gsal// rnam rtog rig pa chos nyid klong// stong gsum sprul yang khyed las sprul// thugs kyis thugs la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces gsungs so// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po rnams// dgyes pa chen po'i ngang la gnas// sku gsung thugs de kho na nyid// mnyam pa chen po'i ngang du thim par gyur to// de nas 'khor du gtogs pa rnams shin tu ngo mtshar che ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// dga' mgu yi rangs te mngon par bstod pa'i klu dang/ 'khor rnams rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// 'jam dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ 'jam dpal khro bo gsang ba'i rgyud ces bya ba bsgrub pa'i rgyud las/ rgyud rin po che zhes bya ba/ bal yul gyi rgyal po ba su d+ha ra zhes pa dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba spu ngan snub ban sangs rgyas kyis/ yul bal yul gyi b+ha sa ri'i brag phug tu/ dbang rdzogs thag bcad de/ bsgyur ba'o/ sa ma ya/ na ra skan/ 'jam dpal zla gsang nag po yan lag gi rgyud rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ kr-iSh+Na ya ma ri kA la man tra tan tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ gshin rje nag po'i sngags rgyud nag po zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i zhing khams bdal ba chen po na/ spros pa dang bral ba'i gzhal yas khang na/ skye ba med pa chos kyi sku chen po'i ngang la bzhugs te/ de'i tshe sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i don du/ sngon gyi smon lam dag thugs rje'i mthus/ gzhan yang rdzogs par longs spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa'i sku bstan te/ ye shes chen po rdzogs par mdzad do// de'i skad cig la dman pa'i gdul bya la/ sprul ba'i sku thun mong pa khye'u zur phud can du sprul te don mdzad pa las/ gdul bya gdul bar ma gyur te/ se gol brdabs te nam mkha' la mi snang bar gyur to// de'i dus na mkhyen bzhin du/ nam mkha' nyid kyang mthing nag gru gsum du gyur to// ye shes kyi rlung phyogs bcur 'thor

ro// khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khrug go/ keng rus kyi ri snyil bar gyur to// de'i dbus na sgra chen po grag par gyur to// a kro te ka ya man ta ka hU~M hU~M/ shrI many+dzu ya man ta ka hU~M hU~M/ de las drag po'i skur gyur te// zhal drug phyag kyang bcu gnyis te/ zhabs brgyad yum dang bcas par bstan// thugs kha'i ya las 'od 'phros te// dmyal ba yi dgas byol song dang// lha min mi sogs sdug bsngal gsal// slar 'dus phyag mtshan 'od zer 'phros// 'gro drug bde ldan sems mchog bskyed// slar 'dus thugs khar sras mchog bskyed// gang mos de mthun theg pa bshad// de nas mdun du bka' nod tshul// gshin rje'i tshogs kyis 'jig rten bkang// sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa dang// nag 'joms phya sangs brag gyon dang// a ba ya ba dmig dmar dang// dmigs pa rtel ba lha tshogs dkar// chos rgyal thod dmar yum dang bcas// thub drug bdag po mkha' 'gro tshogs// bdud dang ging chen klu yi 'khor// sangs rgyas pas na sprul ba bstan// gshin rje nag po'i sngags rgyud las/ sngon byung sprul ba bstan pa gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// thugs kha'i sras mchog khye'u chung sngon// ya ma ra dza gshin rje yis// bde chen yab la 'di skad gsol// sngon byung de ltar sangs rgyas na// ma 'ongs sman pa'i bsgrub pa pos// sku gsung thugs su ji ltar bsgrub// bde chen yab kyis bka' stsal 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa// sku gsung thugs dang yab yum sngags// gtsug dang mgrin pa thugs kha nas// byin brlabs bskul ba'i sngags 'di g sung sha// a kro d+he ya man te ka oM/ a kro d+he ka ya man ta AM/ oM kro d+he ka ya ma ta hU~M/ a kro d+he ka ya ta ka hU~M hU~M/ shrI many+dzu ya mAn ta ka hU~M hU~M/ ra tsa tsa kra hU~M hU~M/ ma rag mo thum ril/ tsita ta na ling bram nan/ haM raM hUr thum b+h+yo/ gshin rje nag po'i sngags rgyud las/ sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ thugs dam bskul bar 'phrin las bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// thugs kha'i sras mchog thugs kyi sras// thugs la bstod pa 'di skad gsungs// mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// 'phags pa'i rgyal po 'jam dpal gshin rje'i gshed// srid gsum zil gyis gnon mdzad yid bzh-in kun gyi gter// kha/ mas gsum dbang du sdung mdzad 'phrin las gsung gi bdag/ skye shi rtsad nas gcod mdzad sgrol byed ging gi gtso// ri rab ngos la bya yi tshang bcas nas// bya yi rang bzhin bor nas gser du snang// lha mchog khyod la gang dag su rten pa// mi yi tha ma rnams kyang mchog tu 'gyur// g.yon gyi phyogs nas yum gcig ma// e ka dza ti ma yin nam// nam mkha' khams kyi dpal mo btsan// sgeg mo ral

gcig ma yin nam// lha dang lha min g.yul zlog mthu mo che// zhes bstod do// gshin rje nag po'i sngags rgyud las/ drin la lan gcig slan pa dang// zhu ba'i bstod pa bstan pa ste le'u gsum pa'o//// thugs kyi bdag po gsung gi sras// sdud pa pos ni 'di skad zhus// bsam gyis mi khyab chos kyi dbyings// brjod du med de gcig dang bral// mthong ba'i yul med dmigs pa med// dpe yis mtshon na nam mkha' bzhin// khyod la yon tan dpag med kyang// ma'ongs sems can gdul dka' la// drag po'i 'phrin las ji ltar bsgrub// 'phrin las bdag pos bka' stsal 'tshal// bde chen dpa' bos 'di skad gsungs// gdul bya'i bsam pa'i dbang gis ni// nga la bsgrub pa mtha' yas yod// khyad par drag po'i bsgrub pa nyon// bsnyen pa 'phrin las 'jug gis bsgrub// gnas dbye/ sngags/ grangs/ tshad dang/ thabs/ rtag dang/ dus/ dkyil/ rdzas/ bcu'o// bsnyen/ dgon shing dur khrod gang ga phyi// lus pa chos dbyings nang// gsang ba de nyid rnams su shes par bya// thun mong ma yin dbye ba dang// spyod lam rnam bzhir rnal 'byor sgrub// thun mong bsnyen par shes par bya// thun mong min pa rnam gnyis te// don dbye khyad par dbye ba gnyis// dgun bsnyen nye bsnyen don dbye ba// grangs tshad dus tshad khyad par dbye// gcig bcu brgya stong khri 'bum bye// sa ya dung phyi grangs med grangs/ zhal brtsegs ban dza bcun dang// hri ste bcu gnyis sa ma ya'i// bcu ni sum cu rtsa gnyis yin// g.yon bskor bsnyen pa'i sngags zhes bya// 'bum gcig khri lnga nye bsnyen tshad// 'bum bcu nas ni 'bum gnyis bar// rab 'bring tha gsum che 'bring dgu// bsnyen pa'i tshad du rgyal bas gsungs// mi smra glal sbrid gnyid rmugs dang// sgra chen sgra chung spang ba dang// drag brdul ring thung rdzogs pa dang// yid la shi phur bzlas pa'i thabs// mthong dang thos dang rmi lam gsum// bsnyen pa'i rtags su shes par bya// zla ba yar ngo gza' gang bzang// mda' 'phen pa yi zla ba'i dus// ting 'dzin lha yi 'khor lo dkyil// phyi nang gsang ba de nyid rdzas// gshin rje nag po'i sngags rgyud las/ bsnyen pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// gnas dbye sngags bgrangs/ tshad dang thabs/ rtags dus dkyil/ rdzas/ bcu'o// 'phrin las gnas ni sngar bzhin dbye ba gnyis// 'phrin las ngos dang spogs pa'o// nyin gtor mtshan dril thun sngags brgyad// las byed 'gor na 'bru ded dang// ro langs 'das pa 'phrin las sngags// grangs ni sngar bzhin khri bzhi dang// stong bzhi stong gcig brgya rtsa brgyad// 'bum gcig yang na khri phrag lnga// 'phrin las bzlas pa'i tshad du

bstan// 'brug ltar sgrogs shing bsgrub bya sreg/ lha rnams 'dar zhing gnam sa 'khrug/ 'phrin las sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya// dngos kyis dngas bsang 'phra men bsad// bla bkug bsad gnyis 'phrin las rtags// mar ngo'i gza' skar ngan pa la// bdud kyi nyi ma srung ba dang// 'brug sgra 'tshubs nag dus zhes bya// lha drug rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor dang// drag po gru gsum dkyil 'khor ro// 'khor lo zung ngam thig bris te// lder tsho'i nang ngam gzugs brnyan nam// ga'u'i nang ngam stegs bu'i steng// yang na ro khung bcug la bzlas// lho shar mtshams su 'brub khung bya// bsgrub pa'i rdzas dang brten pa'i rdzas// dgra bo bsad pa'i rdzas dang gsum// mi rta ra khy-i'i snying dang khrag/ sha dang dug sogs bsgrub pa'i rdzas// bam dang srog ni brten pa'i rdzas// bam ni ro langs bsgrub par blta// thugs rjes sgral lam gnas su sgral// phur bu nyungs kar dug dang mda'// gu gul khrag dang ske'i mtshon// dgra bo sgrol ba'i rdzas zhes bya// gshin rje sngags rgyud nag po las/ 'phrin las bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// byin gyis brlabs dang rdzas dgod sogs// rgyud gzhung gzhan nam bla ma shes// gnas dbye sngags dang grangs tshad thabs// rtags dus dkyil rdzas bcu po 'jug/ gnas ni bzhi ste snga ma bzhin// spyi phyogs 'khor lo lhu thubs dbye// drag sngags thams cad bzlas pa dang// hri sti bzhi bskor gnan pa'i thabs// grangs ni sngar bzhin brgya gcig tshad// mnan pa lha dang rim pa thabs// sa snyi don gsal rtags zhes bya// gnan pa gang yin gru gsum bru// nyi shu dgu 'am gnam stong ngam// skya rengs shar ba dus zhes bya// dkyil 'khor gnyis te snga ma bzhin// thod pa'i 'khor lo dug khrag sogs// ri rab gling bzhi ri bdun mtsho// bris pa mnan pa'i rdzas zhes bya// gshin rje nag po'i sngags rgyud las/ 'jug gnan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// thugs kyi sprul pa gsung gi bdag/ a ba glang mgos 'di skad zhus// spyir na rgyas par bka' stsal ba// khyad par ming gi sngags bka' stsol// bdud 'dul rgyal pos 'di skad gsungs// sku gsung thugs las phyung ba ni// yang dag sngags ni 'di rnams so// oM a kro d+he ka ya mAn ta ka ha na ma tha b+han dza hU~M phaT/ oM hri Sh+tiHwi kr-i ta na na hU~M phaT/ ya ma me ta k+she ra tsa sa to ru na yo ni ra ya tsa ni/ ma ma ta k+She/ ya ni tsa ya/ ra ni yo na/ to sa tsa ra/ ya ma ra tsa sa to me ya/ ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ ya da yo ni ra yak+She ya/ a k+She ya ts+tsha ni ya ma ra/ bra ma ya hU~M phaT/ rak+ta ra tsa ya hU~M phaT/ mur tsa ya hU~M phaT/ mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ ya ma ra tsa sa to me ya/ ya me do ru Na yo ta ya/ ya da yo ni ra yak+She yA yats+tsha ni ra ma ya/

dgra bo mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ ya ma du sbud/ ni dza khug shig/ ya ma tsa tsha rbad/ srog rtsa rtsa rbad/ khrag rtsa rtsa rbad/ oM ni ma ra du ya ma snying/ ya ma khrag/ ya ma du ya ma rbad/ tshal pa baM ril tshal pa daM pa duM bu hU~M phaT/ bsabs so ro sha snying la bsabs// ma ra dza dgra bo'i sny-ing la khrag thun ril rbad/ ya ma rA tsa sha snying sha rtsa la khrag thun ril rbad/ ya ma rA sa do me ya/ ya ma ra tsa snying te me ya/ ya ma rA tsa snying la ro me baM ril rbad/ ya ma ra tsa snying la khrag ro sha tsit+ta la baM ril rbad/ ya ma rA tsa dgra bo hriSh+tIHya ma ta tri snying la khrag thum ril rbad/ ya ma rA tsa khrag thibs rbad/ ya ma ra tsa mug thibs rbad/ ya ma rA tsa su bas ril rbad/ ya ma rA tsa gling du ya rbad/ ya ma rA tsa dza dza nyag tshal ba byi ma ya 'ub thul/ snying mgo chod kha la sha zo tshal pa snying rtsa la khrag baM ril rbad/ ya ma rA tsa klog rtsa la rtsa ro me baM ril rbad/ ya ma rA tsa rtsa la baM ril rbad/ mchin rtsa rul snying la hri Sh+t+rIHrtsa ro bal/ rgyu rtsa khug/ snying rtsa pra ma la/ srog la re bar rtsa snying la rbad/ rag sha khrag snying rol rba ril rbad/ ya ma ra tsa snying la to da pa rag sha me baM/ ya 'gra na dza dza/ snying la khug khug/ mchin rtsa bkas pa du du/ tsa ram ga g.yon/ rol gsha' mo baM khrag rtsa snying la shos ro raM ro/ rtsa rtog dgra bo ma ra ya baM ril rbad/ ya ma ra tsa sa do me ya snying la do ru me ra yak+She/ ya da yo na snying la do ru me ra yak+She ya a kra ma a kra ma snying la rtsa ro me baM ril rbad/ ya ma ra tsa tsa rod pa khug khug thum ril sny-ing la rag sha baM ril rbad/ ya ma rA tsa snying la tsa tsa nan nan/ songs srog mug dgra bo khrag thum ril rbad/ ya ma rA tsa sa do me ya snying la ro sha baM ril che ge mo rtsa rtsa krongs/ snying khug bkas pa rtsa baM ril rbad/ ya ma ra ni tsa yak+She ya/ che ge mo snying la baM ril rbad ya/ yak+She ya ra ni yo da ya che ge mo kha dngos la mu ngo rbad ya/ ya da yo na ru do me ya che ge ru rta nan khraM ti rbad ya/ ya me do sa tsa ra ma ya che ge mo mA ra ya khrag du rbad/ yA ma rA tsa sa twa me/ ya me do ru Na yo da/ ya da yo ti ra yak+She/ yak+She ya tsa ni ra ma/ rA tsa sa do me ya/ do ru Na yo da ya/ yo na ra yak+She ya/ ya tsa ni ra ma ya/ tsa sa do me ya/ ru na yo da ya/ ni ra yak+She ya/ dza ni ra ma ya/ thums rbad ya/ ra ma ya/ ro me ya/ s+pho Ta ya/ yak+She ya/ thums rbad ya/ gshin rje nag po'i sngags rgyud las/ sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste bdu pa'o//// de nas mthu chen dpa' bo la// 'khor gyi bdag pos 'di skad gsungs// sgrub byed gang zag ma tshan nyid dang// nyams su blang ba'i go rims zhus// thub pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad gsungs// rigs yod sdom dang ldan zhing dbang thob man ngag thob// rgyud thos dam tshig bsrung zhing snying rje che dang bdun// de bdun ldan pa'i rnal 'byor

pas// nyams su 'di ltar blang bar bya// mthun pa'i gnas su mthun pa'i rdzas bsags te// phyi nang tshogs bsags phyi nang sdig pa bshags// phyi nang mtshams gcad bsgrub par bya// gshin rje'i mchod pa lho ru dbul// zhes bya ste// mchod pa bya zhing bsnyen pa la 'jug/ bde gshegs gzugs brnyan nyi zla mkha' la shar// mgon gnyer bshes la sogs rmin rtags// nye bsnyen g.yon bskor sngags la 'jug bar bya// go gon mtshon thogs dmag sna 'dren pa dang// dgra yi bla bkug thugs rjes bsgral rmis na// 'phrin las drag po'i las la 'jug bar bya// phyag mtshan thams cad shar du bsgrub// ling ga thun gyi nub tu brtsam// las ngan thams cad byang du bya// zhes bya ste// phur bu la dug khrag tor zhing thun sngags kyis ngar blud pa des// nub phyogs kyi hoM khung du ling ga btsem/ de nas byang gi gru gsum du ling ga dang/ sha chen dang bcas pa dug shing gi me la bsreg par bya'o// de nas gshin rje'i bsgrub pa rdzogs nas ni/ ga'u dag na nan tan bya zhes bya ste/ bsregs pa'i thal ba dang ling ka ra mgo 'am/ thod pa la sogs par bcug la/ lam rgya gram gyi mdo la sogs par sba bar bya'o// de ltar gsum lnga bdun sogs bya'o// nag po thugs kyi bsgrub pa la// bsnyen pa byin rlabs zhal brtsegs bzlas// 'phrin las nyi ma bzhi pa'o// spyi bo'i 'khor lo bsgrub pa hri tri dang// sum cu gnyis dang sbrel te bzlas// spyi yi 'khor lo bsnyen par bstan// 'phrin las bstan pa snga ma bzhin// rtsa ba'i 'khor lo rgyas 'bring dang// bsdus pa bsgrub pa'i gsang sngags ni// yig 'bru bcu bdun rgyun bsnyen pa// sum cu rtsa gnyis g.yon bskor sngags// nye bar bsgrub pa'i bsnyen pa'o// nyin gtor mtshan dril thun brgyad dang// gnan pa stsog pa snga ma bzhin// b+han dzA bcu ni bskyed pa'i sngags// rgyu yi sngags dang rbod gtong sngags// rim pa ji bzhin shes byas la// rgyun sngags nye bsnyen 'phrin las sngags// rtags dang sbyar la rim pas bzlas// rtags med na ni gong nyid bzlas// gshin rje nag po'i sngags rgyud las/ bsgrub pa po'i mtshan nyid dang// nyams su blang ba'i go rims bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad ba'o//// de nas thugs mchog ya ba tis// bde chen yab la 'di skad zhus// ya mAn ta ka gcig pu la// nag po dmar po sgrub pa dang// ro langs sgrub pa ji lta bu// nyin bzhi'i don dang 'khor lo'i don// bskor ba'i sngags dang rgyud don gsungs// ma 'ongs pa yi gdul bya ni// mchog dang dman pa'i gang zag gnyis// don dam nges don mchog la bstan// kun rdzob drang don dman la bshad// nag po mi 'gyur chos kyi dbyings// nag po ye shes mi rtog pa// chos

dbyings e ka dza ti yum// mi rtog ya mAn ta ka yab// e ni rgyu sogs mtshan ma med// ka ni ngo bo stong pa yin// tsa ni 'bras bu smon pa med// ya ni yab ste rtog med thabs// ma ni yum ste stong pa nyid// ta kas gnyis med lhun gyis grub// gshin rje'i thugs las gzugs la sogs// mtshan ma'i chos rnams ye nas stong// phyi rol pa la kun rdzob bstan// nag po bsnyen pa'i bsgrub pa ste// dmar po 'phrin las shes par bya// yang na so sor bsnyen pa dang// 'phrin las bsnyen pa snga ma bzhin// dmar nag gnyis la bsgrub pa brgyad// yab bsgrub gnyis dang yum bsgrub gnyis// sras bsgrub gnyis dang rgyas bsgrub gnyis// nag po'i sngags rgyud las/ dmar nag sgrub pa spyir bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu'o//// de nas bde chen dpa' bo yis// ro langs sgrub pa bshad kyis nyon// phan gdags pa dang tshar gcad gnyis// ro langs phan gdags drug tu bsngu// rgyu rkyen dgos pa dbye ba dang// byad ba'i tshul dang 'bras bu thabs// rgyu ni mtshan dang ldan pa'i ra// rkyen ni dus tshod 'dzom pa'o// dgos pa phan gdags tshar gcad do// dbye ba ril po// sil ma/ ril lu gsum/ byed tshul lha dang/ mchod pa/ mthar thug go/ thabs la lnga ste/ lha dang/ blang ba'i tshul dang/ dkyil 'khor sngags dang go rims so// lha la slob dpon ya mAn ta kar bsgom/ slob ma las kyi gshin rje gsum mam/ ya ma ra tsar bsgom/ blang tshul ro lhar bskyed/ ro khung gzhal yas khang du bsam/ las kyi gshin rje ro khung kha 'byed tsam na/ gzhal yas khang phye bar bsam/ lag pa lcags kyus ro'i snying kha nas drangs la/ skra dang gos dum ro khung bcug la/ ro'i yi dgas khyod de la rten chos la/ ro'i phyi rol ma 'brang zhig ces brjod la/ mtshon cha dang stang thabs kyis mtsham gcad do// de nas gnas kyi phyi rol du// khrus bya dris byug gos bskon la// rgyan dang byang bu kun kyang gdags// dkyil 'khor ni rdul tshon dang/ 'khrul 'khor dang/ ting 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor ro// sngags ni bsnyen pa dang/ 'phrin las dang/ 'jug gi sngags so// go rims ni/ mtshan ldan byang bu can de/ cho ga gsum gyis lhar bskyed/ ye shes kyi lha bstim/ dbang bskur/ ting 'dzin gsum gyi gzhi bzung la/ lha rnams bskyed la mtshan ldan dbul/ bskang gso'i las bya/ phyi nang gi gtor ma gtang ste bgegs bskrad/ mtsham gcad do// yang blangs la phyi rol tu gzhag la/ khrus bya/ lhar bsam/ nang du phyin la lha rnams la dbul/ bskang gso dang gtor ma gtang ba la sogs pa bya'o// de nas zhag lnga 'am/ bdun nam/ dgu 'am gang byed kyang/ blang ba snga ma bzhin du byas la/ dang po nub mo

rgyun sngags dang nye bsnyen sngags sbrel la bzlas/ nub gnyis nas lnga'i bar du zhi rgyas kyi sngags dang sbrel ma gnyis la nyi ma bzhi pa bya/ nam phyed yol nas zhi rgyas kyi sbyin sreg dang gtor ma la stsogs pa bya'o// zhag bdun byed na snga ma bzhin du byas la/ dang po'i nub mo rgyun bsnyen bzlas/ nub gnyis pa la sgrub pa'i bsnyen pa bzlas/ nub gsum pa nas drug pa'i bar du zhi rgyas gang yang rung ba'i nyi ma bzhi pa bya/ nub bdun pa la sbyin sreg dang gtor ma 'jug gi las bya/ bsre ba'i tshul ni/ ro'i khog pa gzhal yas khang du gsal/ sems dang sems las byung ba ltar bsam la/ kha spub la thig btab la rim pas bsre'o// de yang mchod rdzas dang lhar bya ba gnyis las/ dang po gzhal yas khang du bya ba ni/ ro de'i khog pa gzhal yas khang/ rten mthing nag gru gsum du byin gyis brlabs so// ro de'i g.yang gzhi g.yo ba ni/ gzhal yas khang gi rten rlung gi dkyil 'khor du bsam/ ro de'i drod ni me'i maN+Dal/ ro de'i rlan chu'i maN+Dal/ ro de'i sha gser gyi sa gzhi/ ro de'i tshigs chen tshigs chung gser gyi ri bdun/ khrag rol mtsho chen po bdun/ skal tshigs ri rab 'dom gang gru bzhi rin chen gzhal yas khang/ ban d+ha dur khrod gzhal yas khang du byin gyis brlabs so// pags pa ni bla re dang gdugs su dbul lo// skra dang spu ku sha'i chun por dbul lo// dbang po rnam lnga me tog tu dbul lo// klad pa spos/ tshil mar mer dbul lo// dri chur dbul/ rgyungs pa a rgar dbul/ snying srog pa rtsa dang bcas pa ya mAn ta ka la dbul/ mchin pa ya ma ra tsa la dbul/ glo ba gshin rje thugs kyi sprul pa la dbul/ mkhal ma sku'i sprul pa la dbul/ mcher pa gsung gi sprul pa la dbul/ mig gi dbang po mthong byed kyi rtsa dang bcas pa phya sangs rgyas nag 'joms yab yum la dbul/ rna ba ti la dbul/ sna dmigs pa la dbul/ lce lha mchod dud ka la dbul/ lus rdo rje srid pa rgyal byed kyi rtsa dang bcas pa thod dbyug dmar po yab yum la dbul/ mgo rus ko rtse brag gyon la dbul/ lag pa g.yas pa glang mgo la dbul/ lag pa g.yon pa mig dmar la dbul/ rkang pa g.yas pa rtel pha la dbul/ rkang pa g.yon ma chos kyi rgyal po la dbul/ long kha gshin rje kha thun gyi tshogs la dbul/ grod pa dug thun tshogs la dbul/ gnye ma phur thun tshogs la dbul/ rgyu ma mda' thun tshogs la dbul/ pho ba nyungs thun tshogs la dbul/ mkhal ma sny-ing thun tshogs la dbul/ de de'i rang bzhin du shes pa 'am/ yang na byin gyis brlabs la dbul lo// ro de'i rnam par shes pa'i phung po rnam par dag pa ni/ ya mAn ta ka yab yum mo// tshor ba rnam par dag pa ni/ ya ma rA dza'o// gzugs rnam

par dag pa ni/ sku'i sprul pa'o// 'du shes rnam par dag pa ni/ gsung gi sprul pa'o// 'du shes rnam par dag pa ni/ thugs kyi sprul pa'o// mig gi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa ni/ phya sangs dang nag 'joms so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa ni/ yab ti'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa ni smigs pa/ lce'i rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa ni/ lha mchog dud kha/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa ni/ dmar po thod dang thod dbyug/ nyon mongs pa'i yid rnams par dag pa ni/ ko tshe brag gyon/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dag pa ni/ a ba glang mgo can/ kun gzhi rnam par dag pa ni/ mig dmar/ yid rang byung dag pa ni/ rtel ba/ rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ni/ chos kyi rgyal po yab yum mo// de dang de'i rang bzhin du shes pa 'am/ yang na bskyad pa'o// dbul ba'i bsam pa ni/ byin gyi brlabs pa 'am/ de'i rang bzhin shes pa'o// dbul ba'i sngags ni bsnyen pa'i sngags sam/ yang na so so'i sngags kyis dbul lo// dbul ba'i tshig ni/ bcom ldan ya mAn ta ka dang/ yum gcig e ka dza ti la// mthun pa'i rdzas chen snying mchog gis// thugs dam bskang phyir dbul lags na// dngos grub stsal phyir bzhes su gsol// gshin rje sras mchog yab yum la// mthun pa'i rdzas chen glo ba 'bul// byin gyis brlab phyir bzhes su gsol// ro mtshar gcad pa la/ ro blangs tshul la/ ro de bza' ba bor bsams la/ ro khung nas 'dren tsam na/ bza' pa po'i khyim nas 'dren par bsam/ khrus bya drag po'i rdzas byug/ bza' ba bo'i lus ngag yid gsum ro la bstim/ ling ga gdags sdig sgo/ lha dang dbye bar bya'o// de nas shar lho 'brub khung gi drung du gzhag la/ gshin rje'i lha tshogs la dbul/ bskang gso dang gtor ma gtang ba byas la/ bsnyen pa'i sngags bzlas/ de nas snying la sogs pa phyung la lha so so'i btab/ dbang drag gi nyi ma bzhi pa bya/ de nas dbang drag gi sbyin sreg bya/ gtor ma gnan pa'i cho ga bya'o// ro'i sha khrag rus pa la sogs pa lha rnams la dbul lo// sems dang sems las byung ba ltar mos par bya'o// ro de ji ltar spyod kyang dgrar dmigs la spyod/ rim pa kun gong ma dang 'dra'o// bstab pa'i tshig ni/ yab gcig ya mAn ta ka ni// sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// gshin rje pho mo'i gdan la bzhugs// ma mo smug nag las la 'gyed// dam nyams dam sri ma rungs pa'i// snying gi mchod pa 'di 'bul gyis// dgra bo sgral phyir bzhes su gsol// de lta bu'i bsgrub pa ni ril po'i bsgrub pa'o// sil mi'i bsgrub pa ni/ rdzas rnams rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la gnas gnas su bkod la/ dang po bsnyen pa

bya/ de nas phan 'dogs pa la/ zhi ba'am rgyas pa'i nyi ma bzhi pa bya/ sbyin sreg dang gtor ma snga ma dang 'dra'o// ri lu'i bsgrub pa ni/ bla ma'i zhal lam/ rtog pa gzhan las shes par bya'o// nag po sngags rgyud las/ ro langs sgrub ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas bde chen dpa' bo yis// nyi ma bzhi pa'i don gsungs pa// bzhi la rnam pa bzhir dbye ste// lo zla nyin zhag dus rnams so// lo la yang ni rnam pa gnyis te/ lo bcu gnyis dang/ lo gcig khyud bskor bsgrub pa'o// gnyis ka 'am ni gsum gsum sngud de bzhi// zla ba la yang rnam gnyis te// zla ba gcig tu sgrub pa dang// zla ba drug tu sgrub pa'o// lo phyed sgrub pa 'di bzhin te// zla ba bzhi la nyin bzhi bya// zla ba snga la sbyin sreg yin// drug pa dag ni gnan pa yin// zla ba gcig gi sgrub pa la// tshes gcig nas ni bcwa lnga la// rgyun bsnyen bzlas te bcu drug gnas// nyi shu bzhi la sgrub bsnyen bzlas// nyi shu lnga dang brgyad par du// nyin bzhi'i 'phrin las bya bar bstan// dgu la sreg cing stong la mnan// nyin zhag dag gi nyin bzhi la// rnam gnyis nyin zhag brgyad la bzhi// nyin mtshan so so bzhi bzhi brgyad// dus tshod nyin bzhi rnam gnyis te// spyi dang khyad par shes par bya// dpyid dbyar ston dgun spyi nyin bzhi// nang bar nyi phyed dgong mtshan phyed// mgo 'khor khrag skyug dang// gsum pa yid 'khrug gdon mi za// spy-ir brgyad khyad par sum cu gnyis// nyi ma bzhi pa zhes bya'o// nag po sngags rgyud las/ nyi ma bzhi pa'i spyi don bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas rgyud bdag gshin rje yis// 'khor lo spyi yi dbye ba gsungs// don dam 'khor lo mi 'gyur ba// don dam kun rdzob mi slu ba// gcod dang bzlog dang 'jam pa gsum// ting 'dzin lha yi 'khor lo dang// yig 'bru rdzas kyi 'khor lo dang// gcod byed mtshon cha'i 'khor lo gsum// bsnyen 'phrin mnan pa gsum dang sbrel// yig 'bru'i 'khor lo gnyis su dbye// spyi dang nyi tshe rnam pa gsum// hriSh+t+rIH'i sngags dang 'bru bcu bdun// sdom pa spyi yi 'khrul 'khor yin// nyi tshe ba la rnam pa gnyis// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gnyis// rtsa ba la yang rnam pa gsum// rgyas 'bring bsdus par shes par bya// sum cu gnyis dang bcu bdun dang// yig 'bru lnga po go rims bzhin// yan lag la yang rnam pa bzhi// snying bo zhal dang mtshon cha dang// go cha'i 'khor lo mtshon cha dang// 'khor lo sgrub pa gang byed kyang// bsnyen pa 'phrin las gnan pa gsum// kun la yod par shes bar bya// nag po sngags rgyud las/ 'khor lo spyi'i dbye ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas rgyun 'chad skyes bu

yis// 'khor lo la 'khor lo bskor gsungs// tshig dang don du shes par bya// don bskor bla ma'i zhal las bzhes// tshig la yang ni rnam gsum ste// rab tu gtor dang gtor ba gsum// sum cu gnyis dang bcu bdun dang// yig 'bru lnga ste go rims bzhin// yang na rnam pa bzhir dbye ste// thun mong ba dang bye brag dang/ phyi nang gnas su klag pa'o// thun mong ba la gnyis su dbye// thun mong phyogs su klag pa dang// phyogs mtshams spel te klag pa'o// bye brag nang la rnam gsum ste// phyi la gsum du shes par bya// phyogs dang mtshams dang thun mong ba'o// gnas kyi tshul la rnam gnyis te// sdom dang so sor klag pa'o// sdom du klag na rnam pa gsum// sum cu gnyis dang 'phel ba'i sngags la// 'grib pa'i sngags su shes par bya// so sor klag pa rnam drug ste// mu bzhi'i sngags dang 'jug ba'i sngags// ldog pa'i sngags dang thun mong sngags// bcu bdun rkang pa bzhir gdon pa'o// ya ma rA dza me ya/ ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ ya da yo ni ra yak+She ya/ yak+She yats+tsha ni/ ra ma ya/ rA dza sa two/ do ru Na yo/ yo ni ra ya/ ya tsa ni ra/ me ta k+She ma/ ta k+She ma me/ ya ra do yo/ ma me ta k+She/ ra tsa sa twa/ ru na yo ni/ ra ya dza ni/ yang na gnyis su shes bya ste// phung po lnga la brdeg pa dang// lus ngag yid la brdeg ba'o// don bskor zhes bya bsgrub pa ste// bsgrub pa la yang rnam bzhi ste// gshin rje srog gi bsgrub pa dang// phyi yi 'khor lo bsgrub pa dang// rtsa ba'i 'khor lo bsgrub pa dang// 'khor rnams rgyas pa'i bsgrub pa'o// srog gi bsgrub pa zhes bya la// bsnyen pa 'phrin las mnan pa gsum// bsnyen pa gnyis te rgyun bsnyen dang// nye bar bsgrub pa'i bsnyen pa'o// rtsa 'khor bsnyen pa rnam gsum ste// rgyun dang nye bar bsnyen pa'o// spyi yi 'khor lo rnam bzhi ste// rgyun dang nye bar bsnyen pa'o// 'khor rgyas bsgrub pa rnam gnyis te// dmar nag gnis kyi bye brag go/ nag po 'khor rgyas bsgrub pa la// rgyun dang nye bar bsnyen pa'o// nye bar bsnyen la rnam gnyis te// snying po nye ba'i snying bo'o// oM badzra sa twa par hU~M phaT/ oM ra tsa sa two me e ka dza ti mu ka a sho me/ oM AHhU~M/ rte ri rag sha ra ga sa ma na swAhA/ 'phrin las mnan pa snga ma bzhin// nag po sngags rgyud las/ 'khor lo bskor ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas thugs rje'i bdag po yis// 'khor la rgyud kyi don gsungs pa// rgyud ni bsdus bar shes par bya// bdag don gzhan don gnyis ka'i don// sku dang gsung thugs yon tan dang// 'phrin las sdud bas rgyud ces bya// don gyi rgyud dag tshig gi rgyud// rgyu'i rgyud dang thabs kyi rgyud// 'bras bu'i rgyud dang rnam pa gsum// rtsa ba'i rgyud dang phyi ma'i

rgyud// phyi ma'i phyi ma rtog pa'i rgyud// rgyud kyi bdag bo chos kyi sku// 'chad pa gzugs su rnam pa gnyis// bdag don la yang rnam pa gnyis// thun mong ba dag mchog nyid dang// thun mong ba la rnam pa bzhi'o// mchog gi gnyis su shes par bya// bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o// gnyis ka'i don la 'ang rnam pa bzhi// gzhan don la yang rnam gnyis te// phan gdags pa dang tshar gcad do// phan gdags ba ni rnam ba bcu// tshar gcad pa ni mtha' yas kyang// bsdu na brgya dang rtsa gcig yin// du las bsdu na lnga bcu gcig/ de las bsdu na nyi shu gcig/ de las sdu na bcu gnyis te// de las kyang ni rnam pa bdun// de las sku gsung thugs dang gsung// bsgrub pa gsum du shes par bya// sku bsgrub gzugs can rags tshul dang// gsung bsgrub yig 'bru'i 'khor lo ste// thugs bsgrub phyag mtshan mtshon cha yin// thugs bsgrub yab yum gnyis kyi ste// yum la srog thigs phran tshegs gnyis// dbab yar shugs sgrol rag sngags thun// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// yab kyi srog sdud tshe sdud gnyis// srog sdud gsad pa'i ga bu dang// gnan ba'i ga bur shes par bya// gshin rje nag po'i sngags rgyud las/ rgyud don spyir bshad pa ste le'u bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas ya mAn+ta ka yis// rgyud 'di 'khor la gtad pa ste// bde bar gshegs pa 'di lta ste// rdzogs ldan gsum ldan gnyis ldan dang// rtsod dus bstan ba mar 'grib la// gshin rje nag pos 'dul ba'i don// bstan pa 'di la mos pa yi// 'khor rnams snod du rung ba la// rgyud 'di tshig don rgyas par ston// rgyud 'di'i don la gang 'jug ba// thun mong mchog gi dgos grub myur// tshar gcad pa la mchog tu bshad// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed dpal ya mAn+ta ka rgyud thams cad kyi bdag po de skad bka' stsal te/ 'khor rnams rjes su yi rangs nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i sngags rgyud las/ rgyud bstan pa'i le'u ste bcwa lnga pa'o//// gshin rje sngags rgyud nag po'i rgyud rdzogs so//// bsnubs rdo rje dbang phyug gis lus sems rdul du glag nas/ slob dpon pa la gshin rje'i rgyud rnams zhus so////
